95a3(rgyud): de mchod na// 'dod pa rnams kyis gos mi 'gyur// phrag dog la sogs kyis sbags kyang // de la nyes pas gnod pa med// rnal 'byor pa de mchog de nyid// srid pa'i nyes pas gos mi 'gyur// ji srid kha ma bye ba'i gsor// sangs rgyas
95a4(rgyud): sku srid sdig dang bral// byang chub sems ni 'dzag byed pa// gang de phun sum tshogs pa'i shing // sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud// bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin du gsang ba las/ sems shin du rnam
95a5(rgyud): per dag pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// sna tshogs sde mas bsngags pa'i le'u// de ltar phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang // ri rab kyi rdul phra rab snyed dang mtshungs
95a6(rgyud): pa yi rnal 'byor ma rnams spyan gdangs shing mag pa'i sems kyis sna tshogs snga ma la btud de bstod pa/ e ma'o bcom ldan 'das lha mo// sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed byed yum// dpal dang grags pa che 'jigs byed// sems
95a7(rgyud): can kun la phan mdzad ma// lha mo snying rje tshere ldan ma// phyag rgya chen mo blo chen ma// don chen 'bras bu ston mdzad ma// sangs rgyas thod pa yi ni rgyud// rdo rje 'tshang gi sbas pa dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma gzigs shing // byang chub
95a8(rgyud): sems dpa'i yul min pa/ gsung gcig gis ni gsal mdzad de// de ni lha mo khyod kyis gsung // e ma'o snod chen lha mo khyod// rnal 'byor ma kun bsdus byas pa// de bzhin gshegs kun yul min ga/ rnyed dka' dngos
95b1(rgyud): / grub gang yin pa// de ni lha mos gsal ba mdzad// gsungs pa rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad nyon// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang // 'dod chags bral dang bdag chen nyon// sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa nyon// lha dang klu dang min rton
95b2(rgyud): / rgyud rgyal 'di ni klags tsam gyis// bsod nams gang yin de kun gyis// bsod nams rjes dang yongs su bsngo// phyag rgya chen mo'i don du ni// sangs rgyas yon tAn rnam pa dbul// sngags don zab mo rnams dang ni// sbyor ba shin du rnyed dka' gag/ 
95b3(rgyud): zhig gsal byas bdag bzod brjod// shin du sbas pa'i yul de yang // sems can don du gsal byas pas// rgyal ba'i mchog rnams bdag bzod mdzod// de nas yang dag rab bshang pa// sngags kyis bzlas pa stobs po che// gal te dngos grub/ 
95b4(rgyud): mchog 'dod na// sangs rgyas thod sbyor bzang po zlas// oM hI bud+d+ha hUM ka ba li ni a/ 'jug pa la oM// 'byung ba la hri/ gnas pa la bud+d+ha/ bde ba la hUM/ nub pa la ka ba li ni ldang ba la a'o// de ltar bzlas par rab rnyed dga'// sangs rgyas thod pa'i
95b5(rgyud): sbyor chung bzla// de ltar yid kyis bzlas ldan pa// dngos grub thob par the tsom med// oM bud+d+ha ka pa li ni a hri hUM phaT/ snying po'i sdigs so// oM ka ba la badz+ra ni ho huM a dur la k+She hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'i sngags so// de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ dab
95b6(rgyud): dus cho ga ji bzhin du// slob ma dang brtan gang zhig gis// shes rab ma la gsol ba gdab// dri zhim pa yi dngos po yis// maN+Dal rnam pa lnga bya ste// sangs rgyas kun gyis brgyan byas pa// lha mo che la gsol ba gdab// zhal du bza' ba'i rdzas
95b7(rgyud): mchog bstig// brdzas de rnams ni gsol ba dang // yid ni tshims zhing thugs dges so// lha mo dgyes par mthong nas ni// tshi ga 'di dag ni smra bar byed// rnam par rtog pa mang po yis// g.yogs pa'i bag chags rab ldan pa// 'khor ba'i
95b8(rgyud): 'dam du bying ba bdag/ mdzes ma khyod kyis skyob par mdzod// grags chen snying rjer ldan pa yis// lha mo des ni zhi bar mdzod// der ni rgyan rnams thams cad dang // lhab lhub brgyan rnams dbul bar bya// dad pa brtan pa'i sems kyis ni// de nas bdag
96a1(rgyud): sbyin gyu rgyugs ga glu sadu du sa g+sa/ sa / las smra ga/  sa rnamasas kyi ma dzu/ 'a nas nas sa rgyam rnams/ kun
96a2(rgyud): gcu 'dra ba/ snying de ldan pagazhano gang zhig/ mtha' 'gre ma kun 'dis bzhugs// ga dbang po gags 'gyur ba// bdug rtog rang bzhin nyams pa ste/ klud snyun cig ste dga' 'gyur/ bla ma'i sa ltar go sang bar nus// gapa ni/ 
96a3(rgyud): n+da drus chen dang po dang // yul mnyam nub gyur dril byug 'tshal lo// mdzes pa rnams kyi snying sras su sa dag// dris ni mngon dga' rgyal ba'i mdzes skye tsog/ sangs rgyasathong ba zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rlung bla ni med dgas pa
96a4(rgyud): 'i mdzo shin du gsang ba lag/ sngags kyi bac+doMs padang shes rab la gsol ba gdab pa dang / rlud thams cad kyi gling gzhi'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// 'di gsungs nas sna tshogs sde ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor mi bla ma thams cad du / 
96a5(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje laso gas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang rang gi gnas su 'dug ste/ ci yang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ rnal 'byor ma chen mos gsungs pa mchog tu gsang pa rdzog N+DI/ 
96a6(rgyud): rgyagar gyi mkhan po chen po shrIg+h+ra ma d+hAr dang / bong kyimi rgyab kyi ngo na pa 'byed par gyis bsgyur cing nus te gton la pa bang/ rgya gor smad du/ ba~Md+hAs mr-i ti tan gre bong skad du/ rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyug dang ma / 
96a7(rgyud): sems dpa' la drug 'tshal mo// 'di skad bdag gis thos padus gcig sa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying gA/ rdo rje bdud rtsi gsang ba'i bdi ma la btsugs so// gnam / 
96a8(rgyud): brtsegs pa'i khang bam sam ga dang thabs gcig du// bcom sngon rdo rje can ros ste// de la lha mo ngas zhus pa// gsung chen zhes bya cher gnas pa'i// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud kyi mchog sngon du smra khyod kyi gsungs pa// bdud rtsimi ni sgrub ni
96b1(rgyud): thabs// bde ba chen po bka' stsal 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje si bshad// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bsam med za med phra mo ste// don yod dbang po las 'das pa// dam pa'i zhib rnam dag pa// rdo rje bdud rtsi ro brjod pa yin// de nas
96b2(rgyud): bcom ldan rdo rje yis// mA ma kIr chags dang ldan nas// rdo rje bdud rtsi ting 'dzin gyis// gsang chen mngon sum du ni mdzad// rgyad rnams kun la gsang ba yi// ye shes rdo rje bdud rtsi mchog/ de ni bdag gis bshad par bya// brtan
96b3(rgyud): bor mkhyud dang 'o byed dang // dga' ba'i rol pa mnyam sbyor dang // dbyangs dang sil snyan gar rnams kyis// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud kyi mchog/ de ltar myur bar 'grub par 'gyur// bdud rtsi khu ba zhes gsungs ste// 'gro ba gsum ni des
96b4(rgyud): bskyed do// khyod la dga' ma zhal bzang ma// de yi sgrub pa bdag gis bshad// nyon cig dri yi sems kyis tshig/ mdor sngas nas ni bshad par bya// sems can thams cad phan 'dod du// sbyor ba'i rdo rje bdud rtsi mchog/ rnal 'byor gang
96b5(rgyud): gis shes 'gyur na// 'khor ba'i bcings las myur bar grol// bstan du med cing ye shes che// dngos grub 'jig rten gsum bsgrub bo// sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub don du// bsgrub pa pos ni bde ba spyod// rdo rje pad ma mnyam sbyor bas// 
96b6(rgyud): rdo rje bdud rtsi phyung bar bya// bA ga'i pad mar 'o btab ste// rdo rje mA ma ki sa 'o btab// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// bcom ldan rdo rje sa de gsungs so// bA ga'i pad mar 'o btab byas// de tshe dga' ba'i lha mo ngas// rdo rje bdud rtsi las byung/ 
96b7(rgyud): ga nyams dga' gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhus// cho ga'i rim pa gang gis ni// mchod pa dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya// 'dir ni mchod pa ji ltar ste// de bzhin dkyil 'khor ji ltar lags// dga' ba chen po thob dka' bas/ 
96b8(rgyud): rab tu dgas nas bka' stsal 'tshal// de ni sa bcom ldan rdo rje yis// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// 'o btab pas ni dga' 'gyur te// bzhad nas ji skad bka' stsal te// sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub don dang // 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho bsgrag
97a1(rgyud): ba'i phyir/ dga' ba chen po sbyor ba yi// mA ma kis ni 'dir bris pa// zur gsum dkyil 'khor bris nas su// gsang ba'i pad ma mA ma ki/ nang du snying po dang ldan pa'i// pad ma mdub brgyad pa ni ga/ de dbus gsang chen rig
97a2(rgyud): ma dag/ gtso bo zhal gsum phyag drug pa// dngo bo'i zhal ni nag po ste// g.yas pa la ni dkar por 'dod// g.yon du dmar mor rab gsungs te// lha yi rgyan gyis brgyan byas pa// lha yi na bza' me tog phreng // lho yi dr-i yis byug byed pa
97a3(rgyud): lha yi dngos grub byed zhig/ sku gsung thugs kyis rdo rje can// phyi rol du ni dkyil 'khor yang // sgo bzhi pa ni rab tu brtag/ shar du khro gnyer ma bzhag ste// lho na 'jigs par 'jigs byed ma// nub na rta'i gzugs can ma// byang du/ 
97a4(rgyud): tshogs kyi 'dren pa mo// mkhas pas padu ma mdab brgyad la// rig ma brgyad ni mnyam por bri// mdzes pa mo dang zhi ba'i zhal// zla ba mo dang dung can mo// ri bong 'dzin dkyil 'khor lo mo// ri bong 'dzin mo yid dga' ma// yid lo ba// 
97a5(rgyud): bde bar byed ma dag/ rig ma brgyad dang dge ma brgyad// thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug pa// sna tshogs gzugs ni yid dga' ma// phyogs rnams dang ni 'tshams dag la// rtag pa ru ni bri bar bya// mchod pa pi we dA lnga de bzhin// de/ 
97a6(rgyud): bzhin spos dang me tog sogs// dbyangs dang gar dang mchod pa ni// dga' ba rol pa sbyor ba yis// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bsgrub par bya// ma dang byin mo bu mo dang // sring mo gnyen mo de bzhin te// rdo rje bdud/ 
97a7(rgyud): rtsi de dag las// blangs nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mchod// ma lus bdud rtsi blangs pas ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi drang mnyam 'gyur// sring mo nad med na so gzhon// bu mo yi ni 'dod kun sbyin// byan mo yi ni don yod grub// gsang ba'i
97a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la 'dod byas// lce ni dril bar byas nas su// kha yis pad mar blang bar bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// de nas myur bar dngos grub bo// bung ba brtse ba'i tshul gyis ni// bud mod thams cad 'dod pa spyod// 'dus dang gru mo dang
97b1(rgyud): rkyang g.yar btag dang ni shin du brkyang // byed pa'i bcing ba sbyor ba yis// sa gsum dag ni sgrub par bya// sha chen dang ni khrag chen dang // de bzhin gshang lci khu ba dag/ de dag rdo rje bdud rtsi lnga// nyin dang nyin du bsgrub par bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi
97b2(rgyud): bde ba che// gal te dngos grub pa dgro 'dod na// de yis don rnams thams cad ni// bsgrub pa pos ni mchog tu bsgrub// dbang dang 'gugs dang 'thab pa dang // gsod dang skud pa la sogs pa// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos// bya ba thams cad kun du bya
97b3(rgyud): / rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje can/ rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i/ rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal po las gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor byed pa'i tshul
97b4(rgyud): bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// de nas mgu ba'i lha mo de// pad ma rgyas pa'i mA ma ki/ brtan por mkhyud pa byas nas su// dbang po thams cad la 'o btab// ma mchu sos bzung 'o btab ste// zin dgra sngags ni brjod par bya/ 
97b5(rgyud): rdo rje bcings pas sku yang 'dzin// rdo rje can gyi gsang byas te// pad mar rdo rje gtsug nas su// chags nas dga' ste 'dod par bya// zid sgra snyan pa dgra rnams dang // ko ki la dang gling bu sogs// lha me mA ma ki dang brtse// rdo rje/ 
97b6(rgyud): bdud rtsi bde chen po sa// nu ma bzung la gzir byas te// sen mo ri mos gdab par bya// de yang gos ni phung byas te// steng 'og la yang blta bar bya// rgyas pa'i pad mar 'o btab nas// dga' bo'i tshig kyang brjod par bya// rgyas pa'i ba
97b7(rgyud): ma mA ma ki/ lha mo chen mo legs so legs// gtan du 'dod la chags pa yis// bdag gis khyod la dga' bar bya// gang zhig 'dod pa khyod kyis zhus// khyod la bdag gis mchog tu sbyin// de nas lha mo mA ma kaus// tshig 'di
97b8(rgyud): dag ni ched du gsol// bcom ldan nyid kyi de bzhin nyid// byang chub sems kyis rnam sprul pa// phra bas shin du phra ba yis// zad med ye shes ji ltar rol// de 'dra lha yis spyod pa ni// dbang po gnyis kyi snyoms 'jug pas// de dag the tso
98a1(rgyud): na/ 'byung bas na/ bdag ni ngo mtshar dam par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje yis// rdo rje dung rtsi bde chen bshad// nyon cig de nyid mam kI/ ye shes sbyor ba 'bigs byed pa/ shin du phra ba gsung chen du// 
98a2(rgyud): ye shes shes bya ngo bo nyid// de ni bdag gis bshad bya ste// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa// mi 'jig zad med rtag pa ni// gdod ma med cing dang po spangs// yod nyid dang ni mid nyid kying // dbang po dang bcas dbang po med// 'byung
98a3(rgyud): ba kun du ma mthong ba// sbyor ba'i lam gyis mthong ba'o// sbyor ba rnam pa gnyis gsungs te// phyi dang nang du gnas pa'o// phyir ni gzugs kyi phung po tshogs// 'byung ba rnam pa kun rdzob ste// sna tshogs g.yo dang mi g.yo ba/ kham
98a4(rgyud): gsum la ni ma lus paro// de gcig pos ni khyab pa ste// thams cad rnam shes kho na'o// ci phyir sems can bdag med rnams// rnam shes phung po rten pa yin// blun sems snyigs mi mi rnams kyis// 'ga' yang shes
98a5(rgyud): ba ma yin no// sems las ma byung sems kyis dngos// ye shes shes bya'i ngo bo nyid// thams cad rnam shes gcig nyid do// gang tshe lus la rkyen nyid 'gyur// chos rnams dang ni chos cig 'gyur// dngos po dag ni de tshe 'gyur// 
98a6(rgyud): ci yi phyir na chos rnams kyi// mang po nyid du chos rnams kyang // chu rgyud bzhin du rgya mtsho la// thar pa de ni kho na ste// mang po nyid du mi rnyed de// ji ltar nang du chen gnas pa// bla ma'i zhal kho na las thob// bA ga'i pad mar nam mkhan
98a7(rgyud): grub nam mkha' lnga yis brgyan pa ste// snying dang snying po rnam ldan zhing // mdob ma brgyad kyis rnam par klubs// de dbus rdo rje can bzhugs te// byang sems bdud rtsi dang ldan pa// cha shas chas min rnam 'grol ba// thig
98a8(rgyud): le de yis rnam par spangs// der gnas rtag tu zag pa ni// bdud rtsi byang chub sems kyi gzugs// khams rnams kun gyi gzhi yin pa// steng 'og tu yang rnam par khyob// des ni mthong ba thos pa yang // bsnams pa dang ni// 
98b1(rgyud): myang ba yang reg dang bde ba'i long spyod ni// zas dang me tog phreng ba dang // rgyan dang gos kyis brgyan pa ste// gang gis sna tshogs grags pa yang // blang ba dang ni gzung ba rnams// rol dang kun du 'gro ba dang // 'dug dang de bzhin
98b2(rgyud): nyal ba dang // sad pa dang ni log pa dang // thams cad rmi lam mthong ba ste// bzhad dang de bzhin che de dang // shin du yid 'phrog ga ra dang ni// rnga rnams dag kyang brdung ba ste// sna tshogs dag 'dir brjod pa dang // smon pa dang ni myos pa'i
98b3(rgyud): gzugs// gti mug 'dod chags de de nyid// gzugs med mang po'i gzugs can bde// pho dang mo dang ma ning rnams// du ma'i gzugs can kun gyi bdag/ sna tshogs gzugs ni nor bu bzhin// khyab pa'i dngos kyis khyab nas/ 
98b4(rgyud): su de nyid dam pa cher gnas so// de bzhin nyid de mA ma ki/ bzlas med 'dzin pa yang med de// bgrang phreng bya ba 'ga' yang med// zas spangs pa yang mi bya'o// ba ga'i pad ma mchod byas te// mkhas pas bdud rtsi bza' bar bya/ 
98b5(rgyud): rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// de yis de nyid 'grub pa'o// gang de bdad rtsi 'bab pa'i rtsa// bA ga'i dbus su gnas pa ste// rtsa bzhin sum bcu rtsa gnyis la// de yi dbus su de brtso ste// de dag las gzhan shin du mchog/ rtswa dag dag
98b6(rgyud): ni rnam par gnas// sgo dgu la gnas rlig pa dag/ bsgrub pa pos ni mchod par bya// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga lha mo// rtag tu rdo rje can mAny+dzam lta// de bas de dag rape byad ni// tshogs bral zhes gsungs kun rig pas// de dag
98b7(rgyud): gsang tshan mchog rab ni// zhal bzang ma skye sbyor bar bshad// sna tshogs rnam snang mdzad tshogs pa// de bzhin gshegs pas mi shes te// gtan du dga' ba'i yid bde ba// sbyor ba dam pa rab bstan to// gsang ba'i pad ma
98b8(rgyud): mthong nas dang // shin du rgyas pa'i mA ma kau/ do nas rdo rje bdud rtsi bde po che// de nyid bdag gis khyod la bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje can// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po ni// rdo rje bdud na/ 
99a1(rgyud): rgyud chen po las/ de bzhin nyid sbyor ba ye shes bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u gnyis pa'o// de nas mgu ba'i lha mo des// ha ra nu 'bur gyis brgyan te// 'di dag dbyangs ni blangs nas su// sems pa chen po dgeg
99a2(rgyud): par byed/ phyung mdzad bde chen rdo rje las// bdag gis mchog gi yig 'bru 'tshal bar bgyi// bA ga'i pad mar bde ba chen po ste// rdo rje'i don de bde ba chen po lags// sa 'dzin po dang skad phran dang // drug ldan la sogs
99a3(rgyud): mtha' khobs tshul// sna tshogs thun mongs rnam dag gi/ snyan pa'i sgra yis blang bar bya// de rnams dbyangs dag blangs nas su// dga' ba yid bde rnams sbrul gyis// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// sangs rgyas byang chub bsgrub par
99a4(rgyud): byagasang ba'i dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pas// de bzhin nyid kyis the tsom bcad// rdo rje can khyod bka' drin gyis// rtag par ye shes bye ba bgyis// bcom ldan chags pa dang bral ba'i// rdo rje bdud rtsi 'byung ba yi// rdo rje
99a5(rgyud): theg pa 'byung ba yi// sbyor ba bdag gis bstan par bgyi// da dung bdag la the tsom mchis// phyag rgya gnyis kyi rnam sprul pa// ji ltar phyag rgya yang dag 'byung // de dag gi sngags ji ltar lags// sngags rnams gang las skye
99a6(rgyud): ba lags// khyad par do ni lha rnams kyang // lha de rnams bdag the tsom na// mdor sdus nas ni bdag la gsungs// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rje can 'di gsungs// phyag rgya sngags dag 'byung/ 
99a7(rgyud): ba ni/ bshad de nyon cig ma mA ki/ phyag rgya rnam pa gsum gsungs te// sku dang gsung dang thugs las byung // sku ni phyag rgya mchog 'gyur te// gsung ni phyag rgya sngags kyi las// thugs kyi mtshan ma'i phyag
99a8(rgyud): rgya ni/ brasam gtan ri mo gnyis mdo gnas/ rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyu de chen la// sbyor ba'i phyag rgya shes bya ste// mtshan ma'i phyag rgyorgya mi bri'o// phyag rgya mngon sum gzugs yin te// lha ni lha mo bud med do// dbang po thams
99b1(rgyud): cad bde ba ru// da ga'i pad mar mchod par bya// rdo rje pad ma mnyam sbyor zhing // las thams cad ni 'grub par bya// ji ltar dpag bsam shing chen gyi// yal ga brgya phrag stong can dang // rtsa dang de la bzung ba ni// skye ba'i rkyen du 'gyur
99b2(rgyud): babazhin// de ltar bdud rtsi 'bab pa'i rtsa// sngogs dang phyag rgya'i yu mo yin te// sngags 'di rnams kyi skye ba ni// bA ga'i dbus su gnas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos// rdo rje bcug no swa mA mA ki/ nyon
99b3(rgyud): cig sngags rnams mtshan nyid ni// dang po rnam snang mdzad sbyor te// badz+ra a mri ta ma hA su ka/ sa bon ba ni dang mnyam ldan la// swA hA yi ge yang 'byor ro// rnam par snang mdzad yang 'bul te// yi ge gnyis dang bzhi pa ste// bzhi pa yis nA
99b4(rgyud): mnyam ldan pa// mA ma kI'i snying po'i mchog/ brgyad dgu kho na'o dbus ma gang // brgyad la brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan// mdab brgyad la ni sbyor byas te// lha mo sngags kyi sngags phyung ngo // sgo bsrungs dgra gi sngags rnams ni// nyon cig/ 
99b5(rgyud): bskal bzangs mA ma ki/ sde yi mtha' ma sngags phyung to// sa bon brgyad ni sngags rig pas// stong pa'i lha yis gnon byas te// rnam por snang mdzad dang ldan la// swA hA yi ge mnyam por ldan// dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin rnam
99b6(rgyud): bzhi ni sgo bsrung gi yin te// bzhi ni spos dang d+hu be srogs// ma ni yi ge grwa bzhi la// swA hA rnam par snang mdzad yang // lha mo gsang ba'i mA ma ki/ rnga sogs kun gyis mchod par bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo ras de/ 
99b7(rgyud): gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje can// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po yi// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud chen po las sngags phyung ba bstan pa zhes bya ba le'u gsum pa'o// de nas sbyin
99b8(rgyud): bsreg las dag gis// cho ga rim pa bshad par bya// sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi cho ga yis// sku gsung thugs ni sgrub pa yin// zhi ba dang ni rgyas po'i las// de bzhin dbang dang mngon spyod dang // 'thab dong bskrad dang de bzhin du// sngags dong phyag/ 
100a1(rgyud): rgya'i sgrub pa rnams// de kun bdag gis bshad par bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi 'byung ba'o// rdo rje sems dpa' 'gying byed pa// skur sten bcas par gnyis gnas pa// rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan byas te// slob dpon// 
100a2(rgyud): / dkyil 'khor 'jug par bya// khams gsum rnam par rgyal 'gyur nas// rkang gnyis g.yas brkyang bya ba dang // g.yon brkyang bya ba yang byos te// rkang mnyam dang ni sa ga yis// sa ni sbyang bar byed ma dag/ sa la rog nas 'jam
100a3(rgyud): skye'o// de nas bgegs rnams bskrad nas su// gzhan yang sbrul po la sogs pa// gong du bla ma phyag 'tshal te// phyi nas sa yi lha mo dgug/ oM a h+ye byi lha mo che// sa yi brtan ma 'jig rten yum// rin chen thams cad rab rdzogs
100a4(rgyud): / popo'i lha yi brgyan gyis brgyan byed me// ha ra nu 'bur sgra 'byin ma// rdo rje sems pas rab tu mchod// yon 'di dag ni bzhes nas su// sbyin bsreg las ni sgrub par mdzod/ hri hri hri hA swA hUM/ bshang lci khrag dang khu ba yis// dkyil 'kho
100a5(rgyud): sa la gtor bar bya// byin brlabs bya ba'i phyir spos ni// sha chen gyis ni dbul bar bya// de nas rig ma 'jug byas te// gdol pa ma dang skye sha ma// ga ra mkhan ma dang bram ze mo// de kho na bzhin rgyal mo dang // rmangs rigs mo dang / 
100a6(rgyud): / rgyal rigs mo// dri dang spos kyis mchod byas te// lha yi rgyan gyis brgyan par bya// yan lag lnga la yi ge hri// bA ga'i dbus su yi ge bruM// spyan ma sgrol ma gos dkar ma// yid dga' ma bdag bsgom par bya// bA ga'i dbus su slob dpo
100a7(rgyud): gyis// me tog gtor ba khro nar bya// de nas sngags pas hau khu ni// tshad mar kun du bri byas ste// zhi la bzlum por bya ba ste/ khru gang tsam du thig bdab po// khru phyed sa la brkos nas su// dkar rtsi chen gyis byug par bri// kun du 'khor lo
100a8(rgyud): tshul ltar yang // glo ru mnyam por bri ba'o// rgyas pa la ni khru do ste// de la khru gang brko bar bya// gru bzhi pa ni mtha' mnyam du// dbugs dang btsag gis blo ba bo// mngon spyod la ni zur gsum ste// sor nyi shu ni yangs pa'i tshad/ nyi
100b1(rgyud): shu phyed ni brko byas nas// dbus su rdo rje rgya gram yang // 'bar ba phreng gis 'khrugs pa bri// de bzhin dbang dang dgug pa dang // zla gam yang dag bri ba'o// hriM khaM yang dag bstan nas su// phyogs kyi tshe yang bstan par bya// byang du mngon du
100b2(rgyud): kha gyur te// sngags pas zhi ba brtsam par bya// rgyas pa la ni shar du yang // mngon spyod la ni lho na ste// dbang ni nab du khaM nar bshad// dgug dang bskrad kyang de bzhin no// mngon spyod rtag par nag po ste// mtshon lnga yis ni dbang sogs bya// 
100b3(rgyud): 'bras dang til dang 'o ma dang // mar dang sbrang rtsi lhan cig par// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yi// zhi ba rgyas pa sbyin bsreg bya// bsreg shing rnams kyang thams cad la// dri zhim 'o ma can shing ngo // sna tshogs zas sam gtor ma yang // 
100b4(rgyud): 'byung po thams cad sbyin par bya// gtor ma gang yang sgrub pa pos// khrag 'thung phyag rgya chen pos sbyin// gang zhig yid kyis 'dod pa ni// rtag tu rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub// dbyar gyi dus na zhi ba ste// rgyas pa de bzhin dgun gyi// 
100b5(rgyud): dus/ dpyid ka mngon spyod las rnams ni// sgrub pa po se ni thams cad bya// shA ra du zhi ba rab tu gsungs// rgyas pa de bzhin srod la ste// nyi phyed la 'am nam phyed la// rtag par mngon spyod bya ba'o// hom khu dbus su yi dam
100b6(rgyud): yi ge hUM gis bskrad nas su// zhal ni gdang ba bsam byas ste// sprin bsreg de la dbul bar bya// sprin bsreg 'bum phrag 'bum 'gyur na// 'don du mngon sum kho nar 'gyur// dang po me ni dgug bya ba// lha thams cad kyis
100b7(rgyud): mchod po'i gnas// 'od zer phreng 'khrugs drag po'i lha// sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub pa'o// oM ai h+ya hi/ 'di gshegs gdon mi za bar khyod// me la mngon sum dngos grub sbyin// drag po khams gsum gyis mchod pa// 
100b8(rgyud): khyab 'jug tshangs pas phyag 'tshal ba// 'di dag yon yang bzhes nas su// zhabs yon rdzas kyang rdo rje can// oM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// dang pobro la ni yon dbul ste// phyi na lha bshos me tog dbul// oM lha'i me tog shin du dmar/ 
101a1(rgyud): @#dri zhim shin du mdzes pa ni// me tog di ring bzhes nas su// 'di la byin gyis brlab par gsol// hUM me tog gi sngags so// oM ma ra me 'od zer 'bar ba ni// ngan 'gro 'jigs pa 'joms byed pa// lha yi mig byed
101a2(rgyud): dkra shis pa// mar me khyod kyis bzheng su gsol// hUM mar me'i sngags so// oM tsan dan ga bur dang bcas pa'i// dri zhim spros me dge ba ni// mthu dang bcas par bya ba 'di// bzhes nas byin gyis brlab du gsol// hUM spos kyi/ 
101a3(rgyud): sngags so// oM sna tshogs lha'i dri zhim po// sna tshogs ga bur rnam brgyan po// sna tshogs yi ge hUM las byung // dri 'di 'bul te bzhes su gsol// hUM dri'i sngags so// dang por mchod pa'i cho bA ni// the tsom me par me la bye// phyi na/ 
101a4(rgyud): rang gi yi dam lha'i// bzla sngags rig pa brjod par gla dbyangs dang gar dang zas rnams kyis// rnam pa du mas rol byas te// rig ma dang ni sgrib pa pos// tshogs la mchod pas mnyes par bya// gal te dngos grub dag 'ad/ 
101a5(rgyud): nasku gsung thugs ni 'grub pa po// bla ma me lha rdo rje 'dzin// mchod par byas nas rdzogs par bya// oM me lha las ni grub par mdzad// sems can thams cad bde ba 'dren// sku gsung thugs dngos grub don du// lha rnams
101a6(rgyud): las ni rjes su skyobs// me lha zhi bar gshegs nas su// sa gzhi zhi bar mdzad mdzod cig/ rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas pa yi// sgrub pa po dang thams cad dang // bdag gi bsod nams 'bras 'gyur dang // sngags kyi dngos grub rab
101a7(rgyud): / sbyin cig/ a au/ i I/ u A/ r-i raM/ l-i l-I/ a A/ oM o/ aM AHhUM swA hA// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// bcom ldan rdo rje sa de gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje tsan// 
101a8(rgyud): rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'o// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud chen po las// sbyin ba sreg gi cho ga bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u bzhi pa'o// sbyin bsreg cho gra bshad zin nas// khyod la mig sman bshad par bya// tshil tshon gyi ni snying
101b1(rgyud): bo yi khan da la ni dud pa blang // 'ug pa'i mgo ni bsregs nas su// khrag chen dang ni bsres par bya// mtshan mo la ni btags nas su// zhib mor phye mar kho nar bya// bya rgod rje ngar bkang nas su// mi yi rus pa'i thur mang gis
101b2(rgyud): mig la bskus nas gzugs kun ni// rtag tu rnal 'byor pa yis byed// rdo rje bdud rtsi las byung ba// mig sman dngos grub sbyor ba ni// nag po'i tshes brgyad bcu bzhi la// ba ga'i dbus su bsgrub par bya// zhi ba dung ni rgyas
101b3(rgyud): pa dang / de bzhin dbang 'gugs las byed do// sna tshogs drag po'i gdon rnams dang // zhig bzhi pa'i rim dang dug/ thams cad med par byed lha mo// dga' ma khyod la bden par bshad// rgyal po'i khyab na chen por
101b4(rgyud): mchod/ dag po rnams kyang zad byed de// de bzhin bgegs kyang 'gag par byed// mig sman ldan par bzlab bya/ oM 'dod pa'i gzugs can mig yongs ma// gshang gtso khrug la dga' byed ma// zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i lha
101b5(rgyud): mo// drag po'i gzugs can mA ma ki/ hri hri hUM hUM aM a ha hUM swA hA// dang po'i zhal ni nag po ste// de kho na bzhin g.yas ni dkar// g.yon ni dmar por de rig nas// g.yas phyogs ral gri 'khor lo can// g.yon du zhags
101b6(rgyud): ba dang lcags kyu// de bzhin rdo rje dril bu yang // bA ga'i dbus su bsgom byas te// de la mig sman bsgrub par bya// bA ga gur kum gyis bkang nas// phyi nas ling ga gzhug par bya// de la brjod par bya sngags ni// oM/ 
101b7(rgyud): yig sgra yig bya ba dang // badz+ra a mri ta zhes brjod// sgra bsgrogs sprin dang oM yig go// bdud rtsi dang ni mnyamo ldan pas// be ge'i dbus su dbyung bar bya// de la sngags 'bu mo bzlas nas su// de yaus thig le kho nar
101b8(rgyud): bud med kyis khyo 'khol 'gyur te// mdun na 'don bcas rgyal po yang // skyes pa gang gis de byas na// bud med kun la bskal can 'gyur// rgyal po khab can chen por mchod// dgra bo rnams na zing byed do// dur
102a1(rgyud): dur ar ka'i 'bras blangs te// bdud rtsi dang ni bsres byas nas// zhal gsum drag de'i gzugs dang ni// gshin rje gshed khro bzlas nas su// sha chen dang ni ldan byas te// chang dang bsres la
102a2(rgyud): sbyin par bya// rtag tu myos nas 'khor nas su// mi ni skams nas shi 'gyur ro// oM hriSh+Ti wi kri tAn na saR+sha sha drung na sha yA sta ma bA ya ma ra ya hUM hUM phaT phaT// sngags pas g+hi wang blangs na se ni// bu ga la ni yig 'bru bri// 
102a3(rgyud): tsan dan gyis ni mnyam byugs nas// khyo dang lhan cig gnas par bya// gnas ma thag ni bad chen ste// 'khor g.yog dngos por 'gyur ba re// gshing gci gzugs brnyan byas nas su// sha chen gyis spos dbul bya/ 
102a4(rgyud): ste/ dgra yi skra yis bkris byas nas// rus pa'i phye mas byug par bya// ngag sbyor brkos nas sbas byas na// zhag bdun gyi ni shir 'gyur ro// gshang graci khrag dang bsres pa yi// sha chen gyis ni sbyin bsreg bya// 
102a5(rgyud): dur khrod kyi ni bsreg shing yang // shing gcig po dang lam mngon// me yi hom khu bris na sa su// nyin phyed nam phyed sbyin bsreg bya// khro chen gshin rje'i gshed po yi// sku la thal bas bskus pas ni// bsgon
102a6(rgyud): nas ngag la cher gnon na// gdon mi za bar shi 'gyur ro// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos// bcom ldan rdo rje sau de gsungs so// de bzhino gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung deng thugs kyi rdo rje can// rdo rje bdud rtsi/ 
102a7(rgyud): bde ba chen po yi// rdo rje bdud rtsi brgyud chen po las// las chen po bstan pa zhes bya ba le'u lnga pa'o// // rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen las// dpal ldan rdo rje hUM mdzad kye// bsgrub pa mdor sdus bshad par bya// dkyil
102a8(rgyud): 'khor cho ga rim pa yang // de yi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba// khams gsum rnam rgyal las byung yin// grwa bzhi pa rin thig bdab ste// khru gang yang na khru do'o// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba// 'od zer 'bar ba
102b1(rgyud): 'khrugs pa la// dpal ldan rdo rje hUM mdzad gzhag/ zhal gsum de bzhin phyag drug ste// rgyan thams cad kyis yongs rdzogs pa// phyag rgya yis ni phyag brgyan pa// rig ma bzhi dang mnyam ldan pa// u ma'i sra ba'i nu mar
102b2(rgyud): bzhugs// cung zad mchi bu gtsigs pa po// khro dang ldan par bshad byed zhal// g.yas pa lnga ni mnga' bris te// de kho na bzhin g.yon na gzhu// phyag bzhi pa ni bris pa la// phyag gnyis pas ni nu ma bsnams// rig ma thams
102b3(rgyud): ca zhal gsum ste// de bzhin sgo bsrungs lcags kyu dang // de bzhin me tog spos mI mar// dri yang yang dag bri bar bya// bsgeg me phreng ba de bzhin dbyangs// gar mkhan ma dang phyag drug nyid// de bzhin gling bu/ 
102b4(rgyud): ma bri ste/ pi wang ma dang rnga chen ma// rdza rnga ma dang sil snyan kun// dkyil 'khor la ni bri ba'o// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen la so// bskal pa bzang po yang bzhag ste// phyag gnyis pa la zhol gcig pa// bzang po de dag
102b5(rgyud): kho na'o// rgyan ni thams cad kyis brgyan pa// bsgrub pa po yang bdun bri'o// bgrang phreng de bzhin rdo rje dang // dril bu 'dzin pa bri bar bya// gtor ma'i gtor ma mchod rdzas dang // chang skye ma ro dang dga' ston mchod// 
102b6(rgyud): nag po brgyad dang bcu bzhi la// dkyil 'khor la ni rdul mtshan gdab// dbus su gru bzhi bri ba'o// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// sngags yig cig pa gtso b+h+yo no// rdo rje hUM mdzad bsgrub par bya// 
102b7(rgyud): phyi nas slob dpon la mchod pa// bdag gam rgyal srid dbang nyid dam// byin mo bu mo de bzhin du// ma dang sring mo dbul bar bya// sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub po yi// dngos grub gal te bdag 'di dra na// khaMs
102b8(rgyud): gsum rnam rgyal las byung ni// sngags pas rtag tu bsgrub par bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi los byung ngo // bdud rtsi dang ni mnyam ldan pa// ngan song thams cad med byed pa// 
103a1(rgyud): rdo rje se gol mnyam sbyor gi/ dpal ldan rdo rje hUM mdzad 'grub// rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byorar ma'i// byang sems rnam par sprul par gsungs// lan grangs du mar rig ma dang // dkyil
103a2(rgyud): 'khor du ni rol bar bya// bA ga'i dbus la myang byas pa// gang dge dpa'o sngags la gnas// pad mar kha yis 'o byas nas// bdud rtsi khu be kho nar blang // lag pa yi ni sor mo las// gnas de las
103a3(rgyud): ni glang mi bya// blang bar gyur na 'jig 'gyur nas// mthu 'ang 'jig nas 'bras bu med// rig me chen mos kyang phyung nas// rdo rje la yang 'o bdab po// de ni sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub// khu ba'i gzugs can
103a4(rgyud): bdud rtsi ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje can// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po'o// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po
103a5(rgyud): las// rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi bsgrub pa bstan pa zhes bya ba le'u drug pa'o// / de nas lha mo mA ma ki/ dga' ba'i rol par char bzhugs pas// thal mo sbyar nas phyag byas nas// dbyangs 'di dag ni ched du
103a6(rgyud): brjod/ dpa' bo chu skyes sngon po'i sku// dbang po gzhon gyis yongs bskor zhing // phyag rgya mo tshogs mnyam ldan pa'i// rdo rje bdud rtsi bdag phyag 'tshal// ston gyi nam mkha' dang 'dra ba// nga ro bung ba sgra
103a7(rgyud): bsgrogs ltar// dga' bar bzhugs pa bskal bzangs pa// rdo rje bdud rtsi bdag phyag 'tshal// thams cad thams cad gzugs med pa// thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad mdzes// yang dag dbang po
103a8(rgyud): lam gyis ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi bdag phyag 'tshal// ma lus pa'i khams gsum la// rdo rje bdud rtsi dpe med pas// nyi shu rtsa bzhir rigs chen mo// shin du chags pas dga' byed pa// srin mo rjes dang btsas
103b1(rgyud): pa'i sku/ rdo rje bdud rtsi bdag phyag 'tshal// ud pal sngon po'i mdab me lta bur phyag sngo ba// sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje khyod kyis bdag la ni// shin du dga' ba'i rjes su chags pas longs spyod cing // 
103b2(rgyud): khams gsum la ni bsgrub par bya ba'i don phyir ro// khyod ni skyon med dam pa'i stong pa las// yig 'grus rdo rjer 'gyur ba'i mgon po khyod// rgyu dang mi rgyu gang gis khyod mthong na// de dag 'khor ba ru ni gal 'gro// de
103b3(rgyud): de ltar dbyangs ni blangs nas su// rdo rje gar ni rnam par byed// rked pa dang ni rkang pa dang // dpung ba dang ni mgo yi ga ra// gar gri gzhung gi mtshan nyid do// rjes thabs rjes su rim pa dang // sdod pa dang ni 'gying bab
103b4(rgyud): ste/ rgyas dang bdud dang gsal po ru// rgya sra pa dang ni smin skyong gar// lag pa'i phyag rgya sbyor ba yis// bstabs brgyad kyis ni gar byed bya// rgyas pa'i pad ma mA ma ki/ gar byas nas ni lha mo des// rdo rje
103b5(rgyud): bcing gis rdo rje ni// rdo rje be con 'o btab byed// de na bcom ldan rdo rjes kyang // 'o bta bA mA mu kI pad mar// ston cig lha mo pad mo ni// de la mchod pa brtsam par bya// bzhugs shig mi g.yo bar rig mo// 
103b6(rgyud): bdud rtsi bsam gtan brtsam par bgyi// de bzhin nyid mchog brtsam pa ni// bdud rtsi thig le'i gzugs can te// mkha' yi dbus su zla ba 'dra// stong pa de nyid ched du brjod// 'jig med zad med phra mo ni// / 
103b7(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' 'joms byed pa// lte ba'i dbus su gnas lha mo// snying po gsung ba'i spyod yul la// khu ba'i gzugs kyis zags nas su// bA ga ling kha'i dkyil du gnas// 'di ni srog can rnams/ 
103b8(rgyud): kyai srog/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po rten// sangs rgyas de bzhin rdo rje 'dzin// tshangs pa khyabo 'jug dbang phyug cha// sa dang chu dang de bzhin me// rlung dang nam mkha' kho na yang // g.yo dang mi g.yo sna tshogs
104a1(rgyud): shes bya shes pa'i bdag nyid gtso// de nyid dam pa de bsams so// skye ba dang ni shi ba drang // thams cad de la 'dus pa yin// skyed pa byed pa po de gcig/ rang bdag gyur pa lhan cig pa// thams cad mkhyen
104a2(rgyud): ba kun nas kun// ni nas zhi ba khyab pa po// ci phyir khang pa de bkang pos// de bas skyes bur bashrad ma yin// lus la gnas phyir lus can te// shes byed phyir na shos par 'dod// bdag la bdag
104a3(rgyud): rig ma'i g+ha/ de phyir lnga zhes 'dod pa yin// 'dug pas khyab 'jug nas gsungs te// ngag gis rdo rje 'dzin du 'gyur// ston du med pa gsang ba 'di// nan tan du ni gsang bar bya// skyon can min+da dang / 
104a4(rgyud): g.yon can min// dam tshig sa na ma snang ba/ tsho bar smra ba med pas// blam la tshugs 'dul ba can// drug deg chags bsring byed pa// dkyil 'khor la ni zhugs pa dang // rdo rje bston pa'i slo / 
104a5(rgyud): drug/ des rnas pa'i sbyin du 'di// de bzhin nyid mchog sheng bar ga/ sgo bung dpon rig ma dung stan nas// de la dbang bskur sbyin par ga// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen gyi// bcom ldan rdo rje sa gsung ma // 
104a6(rgyud): de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rnon can// rdo rje bdud rtsi ba de chen po ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi r+g+ha cin tha las// dbyings deng dbang bskur ba dang / de bzhin nyid ni ra dmigs pa das/ 
104a7(rgyud): bstan pa zhes bya ba le'u bdun pan kyide nas lha mos yang langs nas// bzhad nas 'di dag nub ste/ bcom ldan 'di la the tsam pos// dam pa'i ngo mtshar bdag bskyed de// ni gzugs rdo rje rje n-i/ 
104b1(rgyud): delas/ khro ba'i gzugs su ji ltar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos// rdo rje pad ma mnyam sbyor te// khro bo'i gzugs ni rnam par phyung // 'bar ba 'phreng 'khrugs drag po
104b2(rgyud): can// 'jigs byed pa yang 'jigs par byed// zhal bzhi la ni phyag brgyad ste// thod pa'i dbu brgyan 'jigs par brgyan// kha T+wA~M kha dang mgo bsnams te// thod pa dang ni khrag dga' ba// gtum po rgyu ma'i phreng ba
104b3(rgyud): khrugs po// rig ma brgyad kyis yongs su bskor// dur khrod chen po bzhir bzhugs pa// phaT yi ge sngags kyi nga ro can// 'byung po ro langs 'tshogs pa dang // du ra khrod la ni rol mdzad pas// de 'og
104b4(rgyud): dbang dang bcas pa'i lha// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// bza' byed rdo rje can chen po/ 1/ dpal ldan khrag 'thung gzugs ni phyung // dang po'i rig ma 'jigs can ma// mi sdug gdol pa spro sha can/ ser
104b5(rgyud): mo rigs can drag mo dang // 'jigs par byed ma brgyad du 'dod// sngags 'di dag ni bzla byas te// gar yang byed nas dbyangs blang ngo // 'jigs byed chen po mche ba gtsigs// rgyu ma phreng gi rgyan skad brgyan
104b6(rgyud): shi chen dag ni gsol byed pa// dpal ldan khrag 'thung ba dog phyag 'tshal// bsgrub pa po rnams phan byed phyir// bzla ba'i sngags ni bshad par bya// gsum pa yi ni gsum pa la// bdun pa yi ni bzhi
104b7(rgyud): par sbyor// bdun pa yi yang gsum pa ste// gnyis kyi tshig ni gnyis su sbyor// kun le de bzhin nyid ldan te// yig phyed kyis rnam par brgyan// drug par bzhi pa phyung byas te// bdun pa'i drang pos gdan
104b8(rgyud): dubya// bcu gsum po yis steng gnon pa'i// swA hA mthar gzhag sngags ni phyung // dang po rnam par snang mdzad dbul// khrag 'thung rtsa ba'i sngags yin no// sngags kyi rgyal po 'di nyid kyi// mthu
105a1(rgyud): chen nyon cig mA ma ki/ lan gcig tsam gyis sngags bzlas na// skad cig 'jig rten gsum 'jig go// khams gsum ma lus pa rnams kyang // zos par byed pa the tsom med// 'di yis/ 
105a2(rgyud): 'dod pa thams cad sbyin// dpal ldan khrag 'thung mnyam 'gyur ro// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po// bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje can/ 
105a3(rgyud): rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rgyud las// dpal ldan khrag 'thung bskyed pa bstan pa zhes bya ba le'u brgyad pa'o// // de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yi// gzugs ni yang dag bshad par bya// zhal gsum pa la phyag
105a4(rgyud): drug ste// drag po nag po dud pa'i 'od// 'od zer phreng ba 'khrugs pa dang // gtum po spyan ni dmar po can/ dmar po'i smin ma ag rlom 'bar// glags chen po ni zil gyis gnon// phyag na dgra sta bsnos
105a5(rgyud): brtson pa// gtun shing rdo rje zhags pa dang // g.yon pa'i phyag gi sdigasa'adzub kyis// sdang ba thams cad sdigs par byed// ral gri phyag mtshan bsgom par bya// rig ma brgyad drang mnyam ldan zhing // sgra/ 
105a6(rgyud): bsrungs dang yang yang dag ldan// gsang ba'i pad ma bsgom bya ste// 'dab mar rig ma brgyad ni bkod// bdud rtsi mo dang bdud rtsi zhal// bdud rtsi can dang bdud rtsi sbran// grags med ma dang grags bzang
105a7(rgyud): ma/ mdzes pa'i gzugs can bde grub ma// thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug ste// phyogs dang 'tshams la bkod par bya// phyag gis pad ma bsnams par brtson// de dag lha mo gar byed nas// sna tshogs
105a8(rgyud): gzugs rnams mchog sbyin ma// bzhad cing rol par mdzad byed do// sngags kyi rgyal po phyung bar bya// rnam par snang mdzad yang dbul nas// tshig 'di yis ni yongs su dga'// dang po yi ni gnyis pas
105b1(rgyud): ste/ stong pa nyid ni gdan ldan pa// stong pas steng nas gnon pa'i sngags// mtha' na swA hA sbyor byed do// gtan du shin du dga' 'byor nas// bdud rtsi bdud rtsi phyung nas su// bdud rtsi bdud rtsi sbyor ba yis// bdud
105b2(rgyud): rtsi 'khyil pa bsgrub par bya// don kun dngos grub thams cad yang // de yis myur bar bsgrub par bya// pho 'am gal te mo dag gis// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dran byed na// rgyu dang mi rgyu 'jig rten gsum// de yi/ 
105b3(rgyud): phyag 'thil lde kun gnas// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// dus rtag par ni bsgom par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje can// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i/ rdo rje bdud rtsi
105b4(rgyud): rgyud chen po las// dpal bdud rtsi'i khyil pa 'byung ba zhes bye ba'i le'u dgu pa'o// de nas ro langs chen po yi// bsgrub pa gzhan yang bshad par bya// nag po'i tshes brgyad bcu bzhi la// ling gag
105b5(rgyud): dang lam mdo dang // shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang // ri dang chu 'gram de rnams la// las thams cad ni grub bya ste// de bzhin ro langs slong pa ni// 'gags nas shi ba mo rnams ni// mtshan thams cad
105b6(rgyud): ni kun rdzogs pa// gdol pa ma dang sme sha can// khyim chos ma rnams de dag ni// mdzes po bzang ba rma med pa// sum bcu rtsa gnyis bsngags pa ste// lo ni nyi shu rtsa lnga bskyed// bud med ro yi skra bzung ste// 
105b7(rgyud): gtsang ba'i chu yis bkru bar bya// sngags dang sman gyi rdo leb la// ga bur tsan dan dkar po yis// de la byug pa byA byas te// sna tshogs mye tog spo sra rnams kyis// mchod tsong gter ma dbul berarA bya// mar
105b8(rgyud): khu chen pos bskus nas su// yungs dkar gyis ni ngo la rdeg par bya// dpal khrag 'thung zhes bya'i bsgrib pa po// de la dkyil 'khor yang bri ste// thod pa zhes bya bla gam 'am// gzhil tshul gyis bka
106a1(rgyud): @bar bya/ thod pas nye bar brgyan byed cing // rim pa brgyad dang ldan par bya// sha Ti khams can thod pa dbang // kha nA thams cad kyis 'dzin te// zhal gsum pa la drag po'i gzugs// phyag drug
106a2(rgyud): ral gri phyag na 'dzin// dkyil 'khor de yi phyi rol du// sgro bsrungs ma ni rab tu rtag/ glang rna dang na gling chen rna// zhal mdzes de bzhin zhal sdug ma// drag mo zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin// mi sdug 'jigs pa 'dzag
106a3(rgyud): byed rnams// zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis so// me tog mchod pa yang dag bri// rnam pa sna tshogs rig ma yang // dkyil 'khor la yang mchod pa bri// de nas dpa' bo sgrub pa pos// dung chen gyis ni brgyan byas
106a4(rgyud): pa/ thod pa'i phreng bas thod bcings pa'i// khrag 'thung gzugs ni sgom byed pas// de la cang te'u brdungs nas su// gar byed cing ni khang par 'jug/ de yi snying khar gnas pa'i sngags// b+ho yig de la rgyu bya ste/ lha 'i
106a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mchod nas su// khrag chen gyis ni gtor bar bya// dpal ldan khrag 'thungs sngags chen ni// bsgrub pa pos ni bzlas ma thag/ khro dang ldan pa'i a ra tsar bya// ro langs kyis ni gang grogs byed
106a6(rgyud): de tshe sngags pas mi 'jigs te// khrag 'thung sngags ni dran par bya// langs pa'i ro langs de yis yang // sgrub pa bI la 'di skad smra// dpal che ni po kye las gang yang // bdag la bka' stsol rdo rje can// ral gri/ 
106a7(rgyud): mi sman sa 'og dang // mkha' la rgyu bar 'dod pa dag/ sgrub pa pos ni gang 'dod pa// las de dag ni grub par bgyi// de nas sgrub pos de la ni// yid la gang dang gang 'dod bslang // de lta rwa thams cad bsgrub/ 
106a8(rgyud): bya ba/ rgyas pa'i pad me mA ma ki/ ro langs sgrub pa'i mchog gyur pa// rdo rje bdud rtsi las byung yin// sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub don du// sgrub pa po'i bde yang 'dren// rdo rje bdud rtsi ba chen po// bcom ldan
106b1(rgyud): rdo rje de gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje can// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po yi/ rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po las/ ro langs sgrub pa bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u bcu
106b2(rgyud): pa'o// 5/ de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos// rdo rje bde ma mnyam sbyor te// cang mi gsung bar char bzhugs so// dbugs dgag phyir na mi g.yo nas// mi 'jigs pa dang mi gsung bar
106b3(rgyud): ting 'dzin mchog la zhugs pa la// mA ma kis ni yang zhus te// bcom ldan rdo rje phra mo ni// sems can kun gyis yid la gnas// ci ltar rnam pa grang gis ni// de bzhin nyid de thob par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can
106b4(rgyud): rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos// bzhad pa mdzad nas gsung 'di ni// spyan yang phye nas bka' stsal pa// de nyid sngon bzhin bshad pa ste// bdud rtsi gzugs ni khu ba yin// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan byas te// rtag par rgyun
106b5(rgyud): du myang bar bya// rdzas ni rI re'i mthu dag ni// bshad pa nyon cig mA ma kiM/ ye shes shes bya sgrub byed pa'i// khu ba dang por bza' bar bya// sku gsung thugs ni sgrub don du// khrag chen rab tu bsgrub bya ste// 
106b6(rgyud): gang zhe bud med rnams kyi 'am// bu mo yi ni rtag tu blang // khrag chen des ni mA ma ki/ don ni themaso cad byed pa po// drag shul shi ba rnyed na ni/ sha chen po yang bza' bya ste// gsal shing btsugs dong
106b7(rgyud): 'grogs pa 'am// g.yul du bsad pa gang da ni// zab cing bstan pa sA za byed na// tshe dang nad med 'phel bar 'gyur// dri bzhin 'dod pa'i bde ba dang // sangs rgyas byang chub grub pa yang // rdo rje sems dag
106b8(rgyud): bzhin du tshe// 'gro kun 'bras bu des byin no// rdo rje chu dang gshang l+ya ni// rong gis bza' bar rig par bya// phye ma zhib mor byis pa la// khrag chen gyis ni bsre bar bya// snga dra de bzhin nyid phyed dang // phyi
107a1(rgyud): @drol ni bza' bar bya// dus gsum zos na rnal 'byor pas// de nas rdo rje chu ni btung // nyin dang nyin du mA ma ki/ sgrub pa po gang sgrub byed pa// lus la nad ni med 'gyur zhing // rgas pa'i
107a2(rgyud): nad kyang med par byed// skal bzangs rgyas pa'i mdangs ldan pa// rgyal po'i sgom yang rgyal bar 'dren// de nas 'dod pa kun sbyin pas// mchog rab de nyid thob pa yin// rnal 'byor de yang kun
107a3(rgyud): shAs te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i yon tan ldan// 'dod chags zhes sdang las grol nas// brkam pa phra dog rnam spangs nas// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// de yis sgrub pa 'grub pa'o// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud
107a4(rgyud): 'di ni// don mang gsang pa'i rim pa can// ma lus rdo rje theg pa 'di// 'di las byung 'gyur lha mo kye// rgyas pa'i pad ma mA ma kis// 'dod chags kyis ni bde 'gyur bas// khyod la dam po'i dngos ston
107a5(rgyud): na bdag gis gang la yang mi ston// 'di ni gsang chen dam pa yin// yid bdag kun gyi bdag la gnas// byang chub sems dpas ma shes te// gzugs med stod pa mi 'gyur ba// de nas de nyid
107a6(rgyud): rig chen go/ rdo rje spyi gtsug nor bur 'dod// shin du gsang nas gzugs lha mo// pha dang bu la'ang bstan mi byi// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// gdan du gsang ba bstan pa dang // bla ma
107a7(rgyud): la chags brtul zhugs brtan// de yi sbyin gnas de nyid bstan// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud 'di ni// bde 'grub shin du thob dka' ba// yang dag rdzogs pa bskal bzangs zhi// snying po ye shes 'dus pa yin// 
107a8(rgyud): rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen la// sgrub pa po gang dbang bskur ba// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyis// de la kun gyis phyag byed de// phyag ni len gsum byas nas su// rdo rje slob dpon skal bzang mchog/ 
107b1(rgyud): de nyid da sems can thams cad kyis// 'khor ba las 'dren gtso zhes gsungs// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po// ston pa dga' ma la bstan nas// phra mo gzugs
107b2(rgyud): su rdo rje can// de nas bA gar cher bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje can// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ bdud rtsi lnga sgrub pa'i thabs bstan pa zhes bya ba'i
107b3(rgyud): le'u ste bcu gcig pa rdzogs so// // dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / rin po tsho dang / 
107b4(rgyud): pad mo dang / lus kyi rigs thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig gis sdom pa/ gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po'i dbang brnyes pa/ thabs dang shes rab kyi rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po// 
107b5(rgyud): gsum thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i pha rol du phyin pa/ skal pa dang ldan pa nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad dang mnyam par 'jug pa/ mtha' med
107b6(rgyud): pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i gsang ba/ zla gsang thig le'i shes rab dang / ye shes kyis dbang bskur bar// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rin po'i mchog tu gsung ba/ zla gsang thig la
107b7(rgyud): chen po'i bud mod kyi dkyil na gsung ni brjod pa med par bzhugs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nem mkha'i dbyings rdul dang phran pa/ rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha
107b8(rgyud): la 'gro ba chen po dang // skal ba dang ldan pa dang // 'jig par byed ba'i gsang ba chen po g.yog dang // 'byung ba chen po lnga dang / 'byung ba chen po las gyur pa lha'i tshigs 'bum phrag brgya stong gis kun du khyab pa ni/ 
108a1(rgyud): @'di lta ste/ snying po rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / me long gi ye shes rdo rje zhes
108a2(rgyud): bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / so so kun tu rtog pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / bya ba
108a3(rgyud): nan tan gyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po dang / nam mkha'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / rlung gri ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po
108a4(rgyud): dang / me ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / chu ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / sa ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / thabs
108a5(rgyud): dang shes rab kyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / gzugs kyi dbang po ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / sgra'i dbang po ye shes rdo rje zhes bya
108a6(rgyud): bu rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / dri'i dbang po ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / ro'i dbang po ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi rdzas kyi dbang phyug chen po dang // 
108a7(rgyud): reg pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / sgo'i ye sheso rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / gsung gi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang
108a8(rgyud): phyug chen po dang / thugaso kyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / bde ba chen po ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / kun du bzang
108b1(rgyud): bo'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / gsung gi dbang po ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal
108b2(rgyud): gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / zhi ba ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / 'dul dka' 'dul ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal ba 'dra/ 
108b3(rgyud): ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / me tog gi mtshon gyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / rab tu dga' ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba
108b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / dbang gi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / nyi mo'i khro bo'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal
108b5(rgyud): mtshan bsgreng ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug che na po dang / rdo rdo rje sgra cheni bzhad pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba'i ye shes
108b6(rgyud): rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / gzhon nu'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyu'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen// 
108b7(rgyud): po dang / gsung med pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / sna tshogs kyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / go cha'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya/ 
108b8(rgyud): ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / yang dag por zad par byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / 'dus pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbong
109a1(rgyud): @phyug chen po dang / bde ba chen po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / byang chub kyi sems ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang // 
109a2(rgyud): rin chen dbang bskur ma ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / pado mo dmar po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / dam tshig gi ye shes rdo rje zhes
109a3(rgyud): bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / mchod pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams dang / rnal 'byor mtshan mo'i tshogs g.yog dang bcas pa
109a4(rgyud): tshad med pa rnams la 'di lta ste/ shin du dga' ba ye shes rdo rje'i dbang po zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo dang / rmongs byed ma'i ye shes rdo rje dbang mo zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo/ 
109a5(rgyud): dang / gdung bar byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i dbang mo zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo dang / myos par byed ma ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba rnol 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo dang / gsod par byed ma ye shes rdo rje/ 
109a6(rgyud): dbang mo che zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo dang / rdo rje dbyings phyag ma zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo dang / ye shes dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo dang / 
109a7(rgyud): rin chen dbyings phyog ma zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo dang / pad me'i dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo dang / las kyi dbyings phyog ma zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug/ 
109a8(rgyud): ma chen mo dang / rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mos nam mkha'i dbyings kun du khyab pa ni 'di lta ste/ gnod par byed pa zhes bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo dang / 'dzums par byed pa zhes bya ba rdo rje
109b1(rgyud): nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo dang / rmongs par byed pa zhes bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo dang / rgyas 'de bas par byed pa zhes bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo dang / 'dren par byed ces bya ba
109b2(rgyud): rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo dang / gsod byed ces bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang / 'bigs byed ces bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang / bcu byed ces bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro
109b3(rgyud): ma dang / sngags byed ces bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang / tshig byed ces bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang / yan lag thams cad 'phrog byed ces bya ba rdo rje nem mkha' lo 'gro ma dang / 'jib byed
109b4(rgyud): ces bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' lo 'gro ma dang / khrag la dga' ma zhes bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang / gcod byed ces bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang / 'phyon byed ces bya ba rdo rje na mkha' lo
109b5(rgyud): 'gro ma dang / ngag 'phrog par byed ces bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang / zas sha rlon za ba zhes bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang / srin mo zhes bya ba rdo rje nom mkha' lo 'gro ma dang / 
109b6(rgyud): gnod sbyin mo zhes bya ba nam mkha'o la 'gro mo dang / gnod ma zhes bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang / sbrul dang / snang ge dang / stag dang / ri dag snga dang / phyag dang / spre'u dang / khyi dang / 
109b7(rgyud): byi la dang / ra dang / bya rog dang / wa dang / bya rgod dang / spre mo dang / me'i rkang rung dang / 'bu chen po'i ri dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / gzig dang / glang po dang / bung bu dang / rta dang / 
109b8(rgyud): ma he dang / ba lang dang // 'ug pa dang / rdo rje 'phrog par byed pa chen mo dang / de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs
110a1(rgyud): @g.yog dang bcas pa bye ba phrag brgya stong mang po rnams ca co'i sgra 'byin cing / nam mkha'i khams rab 'byam chen por khyab pa'i tshogs rnams kyis/ mchod par byed
110a2(rgyud): bA na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde bu chen po kun du bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' shin du dges pa chen po// gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang mo zhes bya ba'i
110a3(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rol pa chen po sa rab tu rnam par rol pa dang / spro ba po'i gi ra dang / glu dang sil snyan dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dro dang / 
110a4(rgyud): ro dang / reg gi bde ba chen po bde ba la chags par gyur pa dang / rol ba la sogs pa'i reg pa'i bde ba la sogs pa'i gar nye bar ston cing rnam par sna tshogs kyi tshul chen pos/ 'phag sde bar
110a5(rgyud): gyur pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gnon pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'khyud pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spyod pa dang / rnam pa tshogs kyis gar byed pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis za
110a6(rgyud): khur byed pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kun du 'dzin par byed pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sba bar byed pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bzlog par byed pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis myang bar
110a7(rgyud): byed pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'gyur bar byed po dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'phrog so par byed pa dang / rnga rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brtsom par byed pa dang / rnam pa sna tshe gos kyis
110a8(rgyud): rgyas pa kun du 'ad bas par byed pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis chen po shin du dges pa'i bde ba nye bar stobs shing reg pa'i ro'i ros bskal pa brgya stong mang po/ bye ba brgya stong tshad med par
110b1(rgyud): nam mkha'i dbyings rngub rnan pas 'das par mnyam par 'jug pas nye bar gnas shing 'tsho skyong ste/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mi gzigs
110b2(rgyud): mi dgongs/ dgongs pa yang nye bar mi 'jog/ thubs dang shes rab gtong bar yang mi mdzad/ shin du 'gal ba'i phyin ci log yang dag pa la nye bar 'jog par yang mi mdzad/ ma dad pa rnams
110b3(rgyud): dad par yang mi mdzad ma dul na dul bar yang mi mdzad/ nye bar gtses pa rnams/ 'tshe ba zhi bar yang mi mdzad/ ma 'gags pa rnams 'gog par yang mi mdzad/ ma bskul ba rnams bskul
110b4(rgyud): bAr yang mi mdzad/ ma rgyas pa rgyas par yang mi mdzad/ rnam par rmongs pa rmongs pa srel bar yang mi mdzad/ dga' bar gyur pa mi dga' bar yang mdzad/ dga' bar mi gyur pa dga' bar yang
110b5(rgyud): mi mdzad/ ma khros pa khro bar yang mi mdzad/ mi sdug pa sdug par mi mdzad/ 'jigs byed chen po la sogs pa dang / drag po ma rungs chen po dang / gtum po chen po dang / lha dang lha ma yin dang / log
110b6(rgyud): 'dren dang / gdug pa chen po dang / yi dgas dang / she za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / shin du gdug pa'i gdug pa chen po dang / tsha ba'i gdon nad dang / sbrul dang / sems can thams
110b7(rgyud): cad la 'tshe bar byed pa rnams nye bar zhi ba yang mi mdzad/ rnam par 'dul po ru yang ma mdzad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas/ dgongs pa nye bar gzhag ste/ spyan gnyis mi
110b8(rgyud): 'dzums par 'jigs shing / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la bskor ste/ sku dang gsung dang thugs thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phyag gis
111a1(rgyud): phyag byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i dbyangs kyis bskul ning gsol ba btab bo// rdo rje sems khyod sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba bsdu
111a2(rgyud): ba ste/ rnam dgra byang chub sems dpa'i rgya chen sras su bcas pa'i rnams/ yun rnyings stong pa nyid bsgoms pas ni/ shin du gdungs pa la// dga' ba'i yid 'ong bde ba chen po nyid kyis ma nyes
111a3(rgyud): bar mdzad// kye 'dod chags de ni dri med kun du bzang po sprod pa ste// dga' ba rdo rjes 'dod chags dam tshig la ni phye mdzad nas// dka' ba rnam pa drug po spyad pas shin du gdungs pa la// rab
111a4(rgyud): tu dges dbang 'dod pa'i bde ba nyid kyis 'jog par mdzod// rnam dag rdo rje las ni byung ba'i ye shes chu// rin chen 'bar ba byang chub sems ni rnam phyung nas// rgyal ba thams cad rnams kyis
111a5(rgyud): dbu ni skams pa la// dri med rin chen char gyis spyi bor dbang bskur mdzod// mnyam dang mi mnyam 'dod chags tshul dag pas/ pado ma'i gnas su rdo rje mdzod gtong bas// sna tshogs sems dpas
111a6(rgyud): sems can brlab gyur pa// sbyor ba gzhan min ma thogs bshe dre par gsol// rdo rje sems khyod dbang mchog bde bar byed pa'i mdzod// rdo rje sa pad mo dbye ba'i tshul gyis sbyor mdzod de/ 
111a7(rgyud): rgyal ba kun gyi gzungs kyi sku ni rab bston nas// thams cad bde ba'i sgrub pa nyid kyis mnyes par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyo shin du dges
111a8(rgyud): ba bde ba chen po'i bdag po kun du bzang po chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbyangs des bskul bar thugs su chud nas bzhengs te brjid pa dang bcas pas/ 
111b1(rgyud): gar mdzad cing // zhal 'dzum pa 'dor ba dang / bskul ba dang / 'gying ba dang / spyan mdzes pas smin rings bskyod cing bsgyur ba dang / pad ma'i phyag gi sor mo g.yas g.yon gang gis phreng ba'i tshul gyis sa'i
111b2(rgyud): ngos la zhabs 'phen zhing bsgyur ba dang 'dor zhing bskum pa dang 'jog cing 'digo ba dang / gnod pas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kun du khyab par mdzad de/ rlung gi khams chen po kun du khyab par mdzad// 
111b3(rgyud): rlung la kun du khyab nas me'i khams chen por kun du khyab par mdzad/ de yang kun du khyab nas chu'i khams chen po ro kun du khyab par mdzad/ chu'i khams chen po kun du khyab nas sa'i khams chen por kun
111b4(rgyud): du khyab phyir mdzad/ de yang kun du khyab nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems la kun du khyab par mdzad do// ri dang sems can thams cad dang / sna tshogs dang / phra ba dang / sgom pa dang / bud med
111b5(rgyud): dang / gzhon nu dang / rgan pa dang / skyes pa dang / skye ba ma yin pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / skar ma dang / gshin rje dang / chu bdag dang / brgya byin dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung po las
111b6(rgyud): gyur pa thams cad dag la/ bcom ldan 'das be do ba chen po kun du bzang po dpal rdo rje 'dzin gyis kun du rgyas par byas te/ yang dag par gnas par byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
111b7(rgyud): ba thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te/ yang 'dus nas phyag gar dang bcas pas thal mo khong stong du sbyar nas bcom ldan 'ongs kun du bzang po chen po la/ gtsug gis 'dud pas gsol ba btab pa/ 
111b8(rgyud): dpa' bo kun gyi gsang ba yi// zla bzang thig le dgo' byed pa// gnyis med ye shes yang dge 'byung // bcom ldan khyod kyi bshad du gsol// sems can kun gyis ma skyes pa// skyes
112a1(rgyud): dang ma skyes rnam spangs pa'i// 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur rab sbyor ba// mchog tu rtag par sbyor ba'o// rin chen thams cad 'byung gnas dag/ dri med nam mkha'
112a2(rgyud): 'dra ba yi// rgyal mtshan chen de bo sgreng byas ste/ nyi ma chen pos dbang bskur ba'o// chos kyi longs spyod yang dag 'byung // pad+ma ma dmar po mchog gi mdog/ 'dod chags de nyid gsung
112a3(rgyud): pa che/ thams cad bde byed bdud rtsi mchog/ la dang ar ni yang dag ldan// yang dag mdzes pa 'gying pa'i 'gros// sna tshogs ye shes sna tshogs cha// zla gsang thig la mchog nyid do// de
112a4(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag po kun du bzang pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas/ 'gog pa chen po'i
112a5(rgyud): ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas cang mi gsuMng brer bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ yang 'dus nas bcom
112a6(rgyud): ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen po la de kho na nyid kyi dbyings kyis bskul te/ bzhengs par mdzad // oM AHhUM mi skye ye shes bde ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i ro la mnams so// a la la ho// 
112a7(rgyud): sems pa'i bde mchog de nyid 'gog pa rnams las bslang ba'i phyir// chags ma med pa'i bde mchog kun du myed mdzad bzhengs shing gnab mchog tu gsang ba'i bde ba lnga rol cing ngam btsas
112a8(rgyud): 'jig rten sgrol// byang chub skye gnas bde mchog dbyings las mi mnyam dga' ba'i gar mdzod cig ho// sngon gyi zhen pa'i mtha' dang nyon mongs rdo skams gzir ba yi// rmongs med
112b1(rgyud): bde mchog brgyad dang ldan pas thabs kyis bskal te go bar mdzad// 'gro kun mtshungs par spyod pa'i sgo ma byang chub lam ston cing // bde mchog bdud rtsi khyad par med par 'dus pa'i tshogs
112b2(rgyud): la bka' stsol cig/ e la la ho// de nas becom ldan 'das kun du bzong po chen po nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i bdag nyid chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying
112b3(rgyud): bo chen po zla gsung thig le bskul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi thugs kyi gsang ba'i thig le 'di las shin du dges pa chen po'i bde ba zhes bya ba 'od
112b4(rgyud): ber gyi tshogs phyung nas/ de bzhino gshegs po thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po'i zla ba'i thig le'i dbus su rgyas por byas te/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du yang snang bar byas/ steng
112b5(rgyud): dang 'og tu yang zhugs te/ mA lus lus pa med pa'i ri dang / sems can rnams la gsal bar byas nas shin du dkris pa chen po'i byeng pas mnyes par byas te/ slar de nyid du log pa
112b6(rgyud): nas/ bcom ldan 'das shin du dgos pa chen po'i bde ba'i bdag po snying po gsang ba mchog gi zla ba'i thig le dbus ni bde bar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
112b7(rgyud): pa thams cad 'od zer gyi tshogs kyi phreng ba mchog tu bde chen por gyur pa'i snying po des bskur ba na/ gar mdzad cing rang rang gi ting nge 'dzin du dmigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kun
112b8(rgyud): du bzang po chen po'i thugs kha'i zla ba'i thig le'i dbus su/ mchog tu gseng ba'i dges pa chen po'i bde bar cig tu stug por gyur par bsgrubs te/ rang rang gi sku bud med kyi tshul/ 
113a1(rgyud): du bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thug kha nas mngon par byung bar gyur to// de nas la la ni spyan pad ma 'bar ba rgyas pa ltar bsgyur zhing bzlog te// sprin rings
113a2(rgyud): rab tu g.yo ba yis// sangs rgyas tshul gyis gar mdzad cing / sangs rgyas rnal 'byor ma dkyil du// rdo rje rab dges gdon mi za// sems dpa' che la mnyes mdzad cing // sangs rgyas bde
113a3(rgyud): ba'i bde ba yis// bcom ldan padu sangs rgyas bzhugs par 'gyur// smin ma bsgyur zhing zhabs bsgyur ba// spyan bsgyur shin du mnan pa yis// sor mo'i mtha' ma rnams bsgyure nas// rdo rje
113a4(rgyud): tshul gyis gar mdzad de// rdo rje che la mnyes mdzad cing // rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dkyil du// skad cig skad gcig bskul ba yis// bcom ldan rdo rje gnas par 'gyur/ brjid pa'i zhabs dang
113a5(rgyud): rIn chen dbu/ dri med spyi bor gar mdzad cing // zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rnam bsgyur bas/ bde byed chen mi mang bar mdzad// dur khrod yon tan tshegs dag gis/ pad mo spyan
113a6(rgyud): gyis gzigs mdzad cing // bde ba'i bdag po chen po la// rin chen tshul gyis mnyes par mdzad// shin du dges gsal ba de dam pa// pad mo dmar la phye mdzad de// 'dod
113a7(rgyud): chags bral dges rnam bsgyur bas// pade mo 'dra bas gar mdzad cing // pad mo rnal 'byor ma dkyil du// brjid pa'i spyan gyis kun gzigs te// bde ba che la mnyes mdzad cing // 
113a8(rgyud): bcom ldan pad mo gnas par 'gyur// phyag gi rtse mo sor mo'i mtha'// rnam par bsgyur bas gor mdzad cing // phyog sbyar khong stong pad mo yis// glog bzhin dpral dang spyi
113b1(rgyud): gtsug tu/ mchod pa'i sprin gyis long long pos// sna tshogs bde byed gtso nyid la// lus kyi tshul gyis mnyes mdzad cing // sna tshogs bcom ldan gnas par 'gyur// de nas bcom
113b2(rgyud): ldan 'das bde ba chen po dpral rdo rje sems dpa' kun du bzang po chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
113b3(rgyud): par zhugs nas/ yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / rtarin po che dang / padu ma dang / las kyi gsang ba chen po thams cad kyi gsol ba'i bzhed pa/ bde ba chen po zhes bya ba 'od
113b4(rgyud): zlor chen po'i sprin gyi tshogs nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje mchog las phyung ngo // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di dag thams cad la snang bas snang bar byas te/ nyid kyi thogs
113b5(rgyud): kyi zla ba'i thig le la/ stug po gcig tu gyur nas bzhugs te/ thugs kyi zla ba'i thig le'i dbus su 'od zer des dgras pa bskyed cing drangs bcug bcings dbang du byas nas/ nyid kyi sku
113b6(rgyud): dang gsung dang / thugs shin du dgos pa chen po gdon mi za bar rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang
113b7(rgyud): zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po shin du dgyes pa'i bde ba chen po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dkyil 'khor yid kyis tshul
113b8(rgyud): gyis su/ cho ga sbyor bas spro byas te// theg dang 'thun par dkyil 'khor gdon// sbyor ba'i gar gyis ger bya zhing // ji ltar yang dag rtag par bya// ci ltar dkyil 'khor de kho na// zla
114a1(rgyud): gsang thig le dkyil 'khor ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpa' bos kyang // rtag par nus pa ma yin no// dkyil 'khor ye shes kyis brtags pa// snying po phyag rgya
114a2(rgyud): sngags rig gis// lha yi sbyor bas rgyas btab pa// cho ga shes pas bri bar bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi bya// rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan// TIg bzhis yongs su bris pa ste/ 
114a3(rgyud): babargyad mchog yang dag gan sa// kun du yongs su rdum blo ste// zla ba de yi dbus pasam de// bde ba chen po mo byed pa// gtsu b+ha de yi steng du blo// de ni tshig drug btsas pa ste// yi ga ban+d+ha
114a4(rgyud): gsum ldan pa yi// yi ge mchog tu badri ba ste// rlung gri dkyil 'khor yang dge 'byung // shes rab can gyis de 'dun du// mi phyed ying 'bring b+h+r-i b+ha ste// drag pa'i tshig dang 'dren par bya// 
114a5(rgyud): gan yis gtsug tu byas pa'o// de mi lto yo phyogs su nI// ma~M s+thA ba lI gA'i tshogs// phyag rgya ye shes mchog thams cad// sprob par byed dra'i log hri/ ha dang rar ldan tshig drugo da
114a6(rgyud): bcas/ na pa mos nI dbyar byas glu/ sngags kyi gzugs kyi yi ge mi/ nub kyi phyogs su b+hI ba g+sa/ zla za ma mig mi she // mig+ne prAgA rgya rmad byung ba// brjid da
114a7(rgyud): bad+mo pa yas byung gi phyogs su bri shA hU~M// snyoms rten byams cad mchog dgarjong // dgas n+dan por ba sgrub phyi//  sa de nyid gsung gis ni// dkyil 'byor de ting ban
114a8(rgyud): bsan// sangs rgyas byang chub pade tshon go// gang gis chung pas rdzogs sangs rgyas// sems ni na mchog gis ston byed no// de nyid sangs rgyas byeng chub 'brug/ do nas bcom ldan 'dzi
114b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das shin du dges pa chen po'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la gar mdzad cing // rab tu spro ba'i spyan gdangos nas// 
114b2(rgyud): zhabs dang zhabs kyis gnon pa yis// bsdud cing 'dor ba 'dzugs par mdzad// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag gnyis kyis// brjid pa'i rtse mos mtha' nas dgrol// cung zad zur gyis gdangs pa'i
114b3(rgyud): spyan/ mdzes pa'i smin tshugs rnam bsgyur ba'i// spyan gyis phyag ni rgyas mdzad pas// 'gro la rgyas btib 'dud par 'gyur// sems dpa' chen po dpa'i bo la// dbyangs 'di yis ni bskul
114b4(rgyud): mdzad cing // shin du dgos chen dkyil 'khor du// rnal 'byor ma kun gnas par 'gyur// shin du dges tshon rdo rje bdag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen po// dkyil 'khor mchog tu dgas
114b5(rgyud): pa yid de nyid bcom ldan nyid kyis shod// rnam pa kun du skye ba med pa'i bde la rol cing chud mdzad pa// bdag cag gzungs kyi dam dang bcas te rnam spyod 'gyur ba med pa yid// bde mchog byang chub
114b6(rgyud): sems ni rnam pa kun du sdug bsngal yongs bral te// che bo'i ye shes lhun grub mchog lji ne re snod ste rol bar mdzod// 'di ni g+hu ru blangs pa yis// shin du sring las mya ngan 'das// drag chen de bzhin
114b7(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlob// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bde ba chen pos// zhal 'dzum pa drang bcas pas rgyas pa// spyani ud pa la khe phye ba bzhin smin ma dang / 
114b8(rgyud): spu rnam par 'gyur ba/ glog dang chu rlabs bzhin du 'gyur ba'i rnam par gnon pas// nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las de kho na nyid 'di gsungs // dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor zhes/ 
115a1(rgyud): byu ga/ rdo rje ye shes thugs la gnas// dkyil 'khor rdo rje mchog nyid ni// bdag nyid sbyor bas brtags pa yin// rdo rje dges pa chen po yi// dkyil 'khor zla ba gang
115a2(rgyud): ba 'dra// 'od zer dkar po phreng bas mdzes// byang chub sems mchog 'dra ba yin// rdo rje dpa' bo'i dkyil 'khor ni// mdzes pa zla ba kham pa 'dra// 'thing khA 'bar ba kun rgyas pa// me la rlung
115a3(rgyud): gis bus pa bzhin// shin du dges pa'i mchog sgrub pa// rdo rje rin chen dkyil 'khor ni// dga' byed dkyil 'khor cha brgyad kyi// 'bar dang bcas pa nyi ma bzhin// dkyil 'khor dges mchog
115a4(rgyud): 'byung byed pa// pad me'i dbang po pad ma 'dra// mad ba ma brgyad pa dges pa yi// ge sngar ze bas mdzes byas pa'o// thams cad las ni grub byed pa// rdo rje las kyi dkyil 'khor ni// dga' byed dkyil
115a5(rgyud): 'khor zur gsum ste// rab tu 'bar ba'i me dang 'dra// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i// dkyil 'khor rnams ni bdag bya ste// skyong ba rdo rje sems dpa'i sa// ji ltar de nyid sprul pa yis// de nas de bzhin
115a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cade yang bzhengs nas// brjid pa'i rdo rje ga ra mdzad cing // glu dang sil snyan dang gling bu dang / pri wa nga dang / rdza rnga dang / du na wa dang / pa na wa dang / ba le ka'i dang / zhi ba'i thal
115a7(rgyud): mo la sogs pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kun du brdung ba dang / sil snyan la sogs pa'i rnam par rol pas/ lha'i ro dang / ro yi zas dang / bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba dang / theg pa dang / gos
115a8(rgyud): dang stan dang / ldag pa dang / 'jib pa dang / 'dzom la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje 'dzin la bstan nas/ gus pa dang bcas pas/ pad ma'i so// 
115b1(rgyud): mo khong stong du byas te/ g.yon du 'dud pa'i tshul gyis 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i spyan gdangs te/ yang de kho na nyid bskul bar byed pa'i byangs 'dis bstod par mdzad do// shin du bde ba'i byams pas kun du
115b2(rgyud): gzigs pa'i thugs rje spyan mnga' ba// byang chub chen po'i snying por 'gro ba sgrol ba'i skyo yid mi mnga' ste/ 'thun pa'i lam ston nyon mongs dug las grol ba'i phyir// nim mkha'i tshul du gzungs kyi
115b3(rgyud): rang bzhin bde gshegs kun la stobs// e ma'o bde bas kun du rgyas pa'i che ba'i ye shes 'dren cing man pas/ sa mi khyab par bde bas rdzogs pa'i sku nyid stong pas 'tshogs pa'i rgyal po bzhin// chos
115b4(rgyud): nyid ji bzhin de la reg pas sku nyid che bas kan ston te/ snying po byang chub bgrod phyir 'gro la thubs kyi sgo mo bsam gyis mi khyab bstan// dpal gyi snying po gzugs su bstan te rig lnga'i gtso rnams mnyes
115b5(rgyud): mdzad cing // dges pasra drong la mnabs shing rab tu dgos pa rol mo mdzod// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde dngos bying ba'i gnas nas bslang pa'i phyir// gnod sbyin cha lugs skye 'gag med pa'i tshul dang
115b6(rgyud): rnam par ldan// snying rje chen po rgyun dang bcas nas bde ba chen po ston pa'i chos nyid nam mkha' bzhin/ dges pa chen po dang las sprul pa'i lha mi skye mched dang / rol po 'dus pa 'dus pa'i tshogs// bde mchog
115b7(rgyud): stsal bar mdzod// a la la ho// bde la gnas shring bde mnos hUM// dgos pa mchog dang ldan pas mi skyo bde ba mchog de nyid char pa rab tu dbab tu gsol/ rnam pa kun du mtha' dang bral ba'i dbyings pa/ 
115b8(rgyud): bde gshegs slob ma gzung du gsol// dpal gyi rgyal po tshul bzhin ji ltar bzhugs pa'i mnabs su gsol// ngo mtshar byang chub che 'di 'gro la ston zhing bde thob pa// pha rol phyin drug dngos nyid gang
116a1(rgyud): hru pa sa m+b+ha das pa'i gasgru sa nga/ g+hu d+hAnam thA sa sa dang rnam dbas kyis nyid byu du sa kun // slongs spyod nga/ 
116a2(rgyud): bus byed zhing gnas pa'i 'grol zhing rje'i chus khros mdzod// shin du dgis mchog mi tshigs pa'i/  'di ni g+hu ru byungs pa yis// yid dang 'thung ba'i bde chen po// dngos gru bamyur du thob par 'gyur// 
116a3(rgyud): de namo bcom ldan 'das kun du babang po bye de ba chen po dang la rdo rje sems depas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsol ba'i dbyangs 'dus bstod banye bar btsun nas// mdzin skyes kyi snang bas
116a4(rgyud): ba'i spyan gnyis kyi sa kun du gzigs shing / 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i zhal rgyas par gyur nas/ yang tshad med pa mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi tshogs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mang
116a5(rgyud): bsgra po brgyas pa'i sprin gyi rmyi mtsham lus lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / brang mo dang / lus kyi rigs thams cad las byung ba di bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje
116a6(rgyud): dang rin chen 'dzin dang / chos 'dzin da / sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gi tshogs chen po dang / thugs las 'byung ba dang / mtshon dang dga' ba dang / sgeg mo la sogs
116a7(rgyud): garnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug chen mo'i g.yog gi tshogs dang / tshad med par 'dren par byed pa dang / 'gugs par byed pa dang / 'jib par byed pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkhan
116a8(rgyud): 'gro ba chen po'i tshigs dang / grangs med pa'i rdo rje 'phrog par byed pa'i tshogs dang / gzhon yang phyi rol gyi rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad ma dang / las kyi rigs la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'dzin
116b1(rgyud): gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs rnams la rnam par 'gyur ba dang / bcas pa'i kun du gzigs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad pa dang / rnam par gyur pa dang bcas pa'i rnam par gnon pas
116b2(rgyud): kun du gnon pas kun du gnon pa dang / rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pas gdegs shing / tshems kyis 'debs pa dang / rnam par bsgyur ba dang / bcas pa'i kun du 'breng ba'i phyag gis mdzad pa dang / rnam
116b3(rgyud): bar gyur pa dang bcas pa'i sgeg dang bcas 'gying ba dang / spyod pa dang mi spyod par bcas pa rnams dang / kun du 'dor ba'i rnam par ge non pas/ 'khor gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po la byin gyis brlabs
116b4(rgyud): nas/ dges pa chen po rdo rje gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po nyid kyi sku da/ gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // bdag nyid de nyid mnyam gzhag dang / de bzhin lha yi de nyid dang / sngags
116b5(rgyud): dang phyag rgya 'di nyid ni// de yis dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'gyur// yan lag thams cad bsgoms las 'das// rtog dang mi rtog rnam spangs pa// 'dren pa dang tshig las yang dge 'das// 'di ni dkyil 'kho// 
116b6(rgyud): mchog ces bya// chos dang chos min rnam spyod pa// chos rnam thams cad brtag par bya// rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra ba yi// dkyil 'khor 'di ni bstan pa yin// 'dod chags mi chags 'dod/ 
116b7(rgyud): chags mnyam// chu yi pad mo dmar ba 'dra// rang sems 'dod chags shin du chagaso// 'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin no// gzugs dang gzugs min dri med pa'i// gang khams kun la 'jig
116b8(rgyud): gyur pa/ sems ni chu yi bskul byed pa'i// dkyil 'khor dkyi 'kho zhes bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po g.yog dang bcas pa dang / pho nya dang pho nya mo dang mkha' la
117a1(rgyud): 'gro ba chen po dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo'i tshigs kyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad/ yang bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po dpral rdo rje 'dzin gtso bo chen po la phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ 
117a2(rgyud): kye ma 'o ra ba dgyes sems dpa' mchog/ kye ma'o rab dgyes phyogs bsgyur ba// rnal 'byor ma yi tshigs mchog gis// dkyil 'khor gsung ba nyid kyis gsungs// sangs rgyas sbyor ba'i sbyor che ba// rdo rje sbyor ba bla na med// 'jigs
117a3(rgyud): gsum bde mchog thob 'gyur ba'i// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsungs// ran chen pad mo sna tshogs che// sna tshogs sbyor ba gar mdzad pa// rnam grangs thig le 'jig rten du// rnam dag dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsungs// de nas btso
117a4(rgyud): ldan 'das la rnal 'byor ma thams cad gar dang bcas pa'i phyag pad mo'i mdab ma kan du 'brel ba'i rdo rje'i thal mo dang / gar rnam par 'gyur ba'i brjid pa gsu bcas pas/ mtha' nas dgol zhing ma mchu tshems kyis mnan nas/ 
117a5(rgyud): chu skyes sor ba'i midab ma bzhin du gzigs pas bzhad pa'i klu'i phyag rgyas dbyangs len pa dang / gcig la gcig bskul ba dang / bdag nyid kyis dpung la 'degs shing g.yas dang / g.yon gyi rnam par gnon pa'i tshul gyis/ oM a la/ 
117a6(rgyud): la hoHkun du snang zhing gnas pa yi// mi chags pa'i bde mchog gis// bde ba'i rnal 'byor gzungs kyi rnams// stobs shing bde ba sbyin mdzad pas// a la la hoHbsam gyis mi khyab nam mkha'i rang bzhin te// bzhes shing gzhan la stobs// 
117a7(rgyud): la grub par mdzod/ chags pas mi gos dngos po yi// bde ba kun la reg par mdzad cing dgongs su gsol/ de nas kun tu bzang po shin du dgyes pa chen po rdo rje'i bdag po de kho na nyid kyi dbyangs kyis bskal bas thugs sad par gyur te/ shi
117a8(rgyud): dgyes pa'i chen po kun du longs spyod pa rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugs te/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po rdo rje'i gdon ma za ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir sna tshogs shin du dgyes pa chen/
