117b1(rgyud): pos rnam par gnon pa'i gar mdzad/ shin du dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje'i dbyangs kyis mgur len/ rdo rje rnam par rol pa chen pos rnam par rol/ shin du rnam pa chen po rdo rje'i bzhad pas bzhad cing nyid kyi/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje zla ba'i thug
117b2(rgyud): le'i dkyil nas/ oM ma hA su ka hUM zhes brjod nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag mo ye shes dbyis phyug ma phyung ngo // steng du zla gam ldan pa yi// gnyis pa'i yi ge ma lta bu// mtshan du thig le ldan byas pa// ye shes gsal ba rnal
117b3(rgyud): 'byor ma'o// a lA ki li 'dren byas te// dbus su ri mo rtag par bya// de yi mgo dang mjug dag du// khro bo gnyis pa mchog bsam bya// 'dri ni btsun mo'i rab gsol ba// dkyil 'khor rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i// 'di ni dran pa tsam gyis kyang // bsod
117b4(rgyud): nams kun gyis byin rlob 'gyur// a li gnyis bri'i mor bri// ldan par 'dren pa yang dag ldan// steng du thA gam thig le dag/ mgo mjug tu ni gzhan yang traM// 'di na don dam gsal ba ste// rin chen rnal 'byor ma dbang sbyin// dran pas bsod nams
117b5(rgyud): thob 'gyur te/ sdig pa rnams kyang 'jigs par byed// a li gnyis dang ldan pa ste// tshig drag yi gri gnyis su bshad// 'dir ni rab dga' kun du chags// chu srin ma zhes bstan pa yin// dang por bskal ba chen mo yi// tsheg drag po dang bcas pa ga
117b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi a la 'di// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed// bdag nyid la'am yang na gzhan// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste// bsgrub bya'i dkyil 'khor ba sgrub byed na// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// 'di ni dkyil 'khor rnams kyis
117b7(rgyud): mchog/ ya ge phyag rgya mngon gnas pa'i// 'dzin pa'i bsod nams tsa 'dra ba// bris pa yas kyang thob par 'gyur// a ma ho bde ba'i ye shes che// de yi ye shes tshe 'di la// 'dod byed bde ba sten byed cing // 'di yi tshul gyis chu thob par 'gyur// khams
117b8(rgyud): gsum mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'di las rgya chen mchog gzhan med// sgrub pa po'i sems can kun// tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'grub/ zla gsang thig le gsang ba'i rgyal po chen po shin du dgyes pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor// 
118a1(rgyud): chen po rgyas pa mchog tu mchogasang ba las// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis btsun mo rnams kyis gsang ba chen po rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug chen mo rnams kyis mchog tu gsang ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor te dang
118a2(rgyud): po'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar tu gyur te/ dgyes pa'i yid bde mgu ba dang / yad dga' ba skyes nas/ gar dang / shin du dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje'i bzhad pa mdzad cing // yang shin du dgyes pa chen
118a3(rgyud): po'i bde ba gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba 'du mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs par 'gyur ro// bde byed chen po bshad pa shod// bde ba chen po bshad pa shod// gsang ba chen po bshad pa shod// dgyes pa chen po/ 
118a4(rgyud): / bshad pa shod/ khyod las 'dod chags yang dag 'byung // khyod las zhes sdang rdo rje chen po ste// khyod las bde byed sdug bsngal dang // khyod las khams gsum thams cad 'byung // khyod las skyes pa ma ning dang // khyod las 'dod gzir bud/ 
118a5(rgyud): med dang / khyod las 'dod chags rnam grol dang // khyed las byang chub bla med 'byung // khyod las nam mkha' rlung dag dang // khyod las gzi brjid me yi rnams// khyod las de bzhin chu dang sa// khyod las spyod dang mo spyod kun// khyod las sangs// 
118a6(rgyud): rgyas dpa' chen po// yang nas yang du 'byung bar 'gyur// khyod las chos dang dge 'dun dang // khyod las pha rol phyin pa'i tshogs// byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang // ri dang skye bo thams cad 'byung // khyod las rdo rje sems dpa' dang // khyod las// 
118a7(rgyud): rin chen tshad med che// de bzhin rdo rje sna tshogs 'byung // khyod la phyag rgya sngags kyi rnams// khyod las rig pa stong nas 'byung // de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan mi 'dzums pas smin ma brkyang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang
118a8(rgyud): chub sems dpa' dang / pha rol phyin pa chen po la sogs pa dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i tshigs dang / rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / gzhan ya
118b1(rgyud): lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa kun 'das pa kun thams cad la skra cig du kun du gzigs nas brjid pa dang bcas pa'i phyag 'jamAM
118b2(rgyud): bos// nyid kyi snying kha'i rdo rje gsor zhing / nyid kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rdo rjes su chags pas rab tu rgyas pa chen po'i lte bas dkyil 'khor thams cad zil gyis mnan te/ nyid kyi thugs pad ma'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yi ge thig le'i dkyil na/ 
118b3(rgyud): phyung ste/ kun du snang bar byin gyis brlabs nas shin du dgyes pa gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsungs thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dang po yi ge bcu gsum pa// thig ler bcas pa bsam bya ste
118b4(rgyud): bde chen tshul bzhin bzhag byas la// gzhan gyis mi phyed thig ler bcas// yi ge drug pa 'dren pa ru// tshul bzhin 'og tu yongs su brtag/ 'don gsang ba'i chen po ste// rmad byung yi ge'i phyag rgya'o// bde chen bde ba bskyed pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kun gyis
118b5(rgyud): bsgrags pa yin// ye shes kyi ni phyag rgya 'di// skad cig snying po rgyas btab na// dkyil 'khor rnams kyis 'chad pa'o// ston pa rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur// bde ba chen po bskul byed pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtogs par byed// yi ge ye shes sgrub/ 
118b6(rgyud): pa yis// ye shes dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur// 'phrul gyis mig ni shes rab che// mi shes sdig pa 'joms par byed// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'dra bar// che 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// bde ba chen po reg pa che// sdug bsngal 'dod pa 'joms byed do// she/ 
118b7(rgyud): ra ba ye shes dngos grub che// byang chub myur du thob 'gyur te// rig ma 'bum phrag brgyas bskor ba cing // sems dpa' chen po de dag rtsen// rdo rje pad mo mnyam sbyor bas// thal mo brkyang nas rol pa yis// tshe dang leng 'tshe thob 'gyur te// 'dod pa yis ni
118b8(rgyud): dngos po rnams// myur ba nyid du 'grub 'gyur te// 'og dang steng ga nam mkha' la// bdag 'dod bzhin du 'gro 'ong byed// sa yang rnam par phug nas su// stobs chen de 'dir 'ong bar byed// sangs rgyas kun la gnod byed de// byang chub par ni gdon mi
119a1(rgyud): bde ba chen po nam mdzad pas// gzhom zhing de bzhin myang ba yi// rdo rdo blo yis bdud kyi rnams// rnam par 'gyur ba thams cad bsgral// bde ba chen po gtong ba yis// skad cig nyid du gsol bar bya// grub pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa che// 
119a2(rgyud): dpa' bo chen po dgug par bya// rnal 'byor ma rnams ca 'dod par// rnam gnon tshul gyis gnon par bya// dbang po nye dbang chen po dang // gnod byed stobs kyis mngon par na// bar du rnam gzhom gnon pa yis// gzhom pa'i tshul gyis bsgrub// 
119a3(rgyud): papar bya/ mtshon cha lnga yi rnam gnon pas// gzhan gyi bud med rtse bar bya// kye ma'o bde ba bde gnas pa'i// sems can chen po grol bya ste// byang chub sems ni bde 'byung bas// sems dpa' bdag nyid mchod par bya// dam tshig rjes su ldan
119a4(rgyud): pa la yis// rnal 'byor rtag pa'i ngo bor 'gyur// skad cig mtho ris 'gro bar byed// skad cig bde ldan 'gro bar byed// rdo rje shugs kyis thams cad du// sems can skad cig 'di ru 'ong // sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas su 'gyur// sems can
119a5(rgyud): rnams dang grags chen po// thams cad kyi no rigs rnams dang // pha rol du ni phyin rnams dang // pha rol phyin rnams kyis gnas te// de bzhin rig dang pha rol phyin// de dag 'di la rab du gnas// dbang por gyur pa brtan chen po// yon ta na
119a6(rgyud): chogs ni nam mkha' bzhin// de nyid dngos po thams cad la// thams cad dus gsum mnyam gnas te// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog du bde// sems dpa' thog ma mtha' med yin// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' shan du bde ba
119a7(rgyud): chen pos chos kyi yi ge zhes bgyi ba yi ge chen po'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so// bcu gsum gya na ya gi che// ye shes thag le ldan pa ste// rdo rje yad 'byung lhag ma ya// ha la rus brtags dbus bskor bya// 'dan yad las skyes pa ste// shin du
119a8(rgyud): dgyes che mdzes pa yi// yi ge'i phyag rgya phyag rgya che// gtso bo'i spyan sngar gnas pa'o// gsang ba'i snying kha'i pad ma la// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas bratab nas// de ni de ma theg nyid du// shin du dgos pa'i mnyes par 'gyur// gtso bo
119b1(rgyud): chen rdo rje sems dpa' la// de yi bde bas mnyes mdzad de// dbang po yi ni sbyor ba yis// de dang rol par myur du 'grub// de gnyis phan tshun dges pa las// shin du dgos pa'i gzhir gyur te// rigs 'dzin mchog gi gzugs ldan dang // lha
119b2(rgyud): ma kun gyi mchod par 'gyur// de dang lhan cig rol pa dang // lha chen tshangs pa rtogs 'dod rnams// phyag rgya sbyor ba'i tshul gnas pa'o// bdag nyid che la phyag byed do// nyes gsum du mi spangs pa yi// shin du sbyor ba'i rgyas btab pa// sems// 
119b3(rgyud): can gar ni byed pa dang // sems dpa' che la mnyes par byed// de ni sa dang nam mkha' la// bde bar gnas shing 'gro bar byed// sna tshogs lha mo bde che ba'i// sna tshogs bde bas nyerd spyod do// phyag rgya'i gar gyis gar byed cing // sems can
119b4(rgyud): myur du rtogs byed de// ral grir gyur pa gzi chen po// nam mkha'i kun du phan tshun 'gro// lha mo 'phrul gyi 'gro ba dang // lha min klu yaM bu mo dang // gzhan yang 'phrul ldan ma'i bu mo// de yis bud med kun bsgrub bya// phyag rgya ye shes rab gnas
119b5(rgyud): pas/ de nyid kun du 'gro byed de// ci tsam 'dod pa dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje sems pa'i tshe gnas so// sangs rgyas thams cad myur du 'grub// thams cad chos ni bde chen po// dge 'dun chags med thams cad rnams// de dag thams cad
119b6(rgyud): 'di yin no// dbang po nye dbang dbang chen gyi// thogs med stobs kyis bkug nas su// rdo rje sems dpa' thabs gnas pas// gzhan gyis bud med btson par bya// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa// phyag rgya ye shes bsgrub bya ste// skad
119b7(rgyud): cig skad cag bsten pa yi// bdag gi sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// gnyis med sbyor ba 'di yis ni// de ni dngos grub kun 'gyur te// bdag med nga rgyal med 'gyur te// snang ba med cing yi ge med// shin du dges pa chen po'i yid dang // rjes
119b8(rgyud): su mthun par mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so// lha mo rdo rje kau lI ki lI ni// dang por oM gis rnam par brgyan// bgegs mthar byed dang ldan pa ni// dbang mchog sbyin par mdzad pa ste// 'di yis bud med snying kha ru// bdag
120a1(rgyud): nyid kyis ni byin rlabs te// dbang po gnyis na sbyor ba yis// mkhas pas tshul bzhin bsgom par bya// de nas rnal 'byor chen po po// rnal 'byor dbang phyug byin brlabs pas// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor mtha'
120a2(rgyud): dag tu// mdzes pa'i spyan dang rol cing 'gro/ bdag gam 'on te gzhan dag la// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste// rdo rje pad mo phye ba yis// bsgrub pa pos ni myur sgrub// pad mo rnam par phye byas te// phyag rgya'i sbyor bas rol pa yis// phyag
120a3(rgyud): / rgya 'di yis rgyas btab nas// 'gro dang 'ong ba gdon mi za// g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul gyis ni// lag pa'i phyag rgyas bzung bya ste// sbyor ba chen po sgom byas na// de ma thag tu nam mkhar 'gro/ bdag nyid gan rgyal gnas byas te// nyid kyi steng
120a4(rgyud): du phyag rgya bzhag/ nyid kyis byin rlabs phyag rgya la// sngags pas tshul bzhin bskyed par bya// g.yas dang g.yon gyis glo dag du// dges dang mdza' gnyis rab bzhugs par// mi g.yeng phyag rgyar gzhag byas te// bdag nyid shin du dge
120a5(rgyud): par sgom// 'dis ni dngos grub thob 'gyur te// 'di dang lhan cig 'grogs pa yis// gzungs ma kun gyi dkyil 'khor du// sangs rgyas la sogs thams cad 'gyur// 'di dang lhan cig sbyar ba yis// nam mkha'i bdag po sangs rgyas
120a6(rgyud): bzhin// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin rlabs pas// de ni sangs rgyas ngo bor 'gyur// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas// nu ba gcig bdud rtsi 'byung bya ste// gzungs ma'i phyag rgya la brten nas// rmad byung nyid na thob ces bshad// mtsha
120a7(rgyud): gyigyi mtha' dang nyin gyi mthar// dang po gnyis ga 'dug byas nas// sngags kyis dbyings phyug gar 'gro ba// de dang lhan cig dngos grub 'gro/ phyed da ma yang na nam phyed na// rag ma'i dbyings su reg bya zhing // myur bas khros pa'i
120a8(rgyud): sgra thos par/ gyad kyi 'gyed par brtsam par bya// bkye ba'i 'jug du de ma thag/ 'o ma mchog ni btung byas na// da ni sa de ni rdo rje 'grub// zla gsang dkyil du 'gro bar byed// bya ba bzhin du zlog pa dang // ci bder bsnyen pa byas pa
120b1(rgyud): byang chub sems ni cher ma thag/ 'phrog pa yis ni dngos grub bo// 'odadi yis rin chen gtsug nyid du// mi gseng mtshan mo byas 'gyur na// sangs rgyas dngos grub 'brog byed de// sangs rgyas dngos grub nyis kyis thob// 'di yi snying kha
120b2(rgyud): zla gsang du/ thigri lI nyid du rtag byas na// de ni de ma thag tu yang // zla bzang thig le mchog 'dir 'gyur// 'di yis rig pa tsam gyis kyang // dngos grub gang dga' thob byed de// rdo rje phyag rgya gzi chen po// rgyal chen 'di ni rnam par rgyu// 'di
120b3(rgyud): ni sgrub pa'i dus dag du// rnam par rtog pa yang mi bya// drug tu mi rtog gyur pa yis// nan tan du ni bsgrub par bya// sdug bsngal ba'i sems can le// sbyin pa bzhin rtag tu sbyin// de la bde ba sbyin bya ste// mo nyam nam yang sbyin mi bya// shin
120b4(rgyud): du dgis ma'i sems me chen mo dpe med ma dang ldan ma zhes bya// rdo rje ki li kI li shin du dges pa'i bde ba chen po thob par byed pa'o// / thog mar oM ste 'dza' chen po// rdo rje shin du dgos dang 'brel// 'di na tshigs pa thams cad
120b5(rgyud): la/ 'dod tshogs bde byed snyoms par thob// rol pa'i sbyor bas bu med la// 'di ni rtag tu mnyes par byed// 'di yis 'gro ba gsum dag tu// dngos grub myur du thob par byed// pad mo kha bye ba rgyas pa'i spyan// sngags mkhan skad
120b6(rgyud): cig spyad par bya// gtso bo yi ni bde mchog gis// A li ka la mnyam sbyor bya// spyod pa'i phyag rgya rgyas btab ste// skad cig skad cig spyad par bya// dus tu dag tu ni reg pa dang // bzhugs pa yang na rtag tu bya// skyod dang mnye ba de bzhin
120b7(rgyud): dumanyam du 'grogs pa'i cho ga bya// bskyed pa dang ni sbyong ba dang // skad cig skad cig sten par bya// gar dang kun nas bskor ba dang // 'ji ba dang btung dang de bzhin te// the tsom med pa'i sems kyis ni// dam tshig dang ni bsgrub par
120b8(rgyud): bya phyag rgya 'ad yis rnal 'byor pa// mi g.yo tshe dngos grub ste// sangs rgyas byang chub dngos grub dang // bskal par gnas pa rmos ci dgos// 'di ni dngos grub thob pa dang // pad ma 'dzin pa'i rjer 'gyur// lag na pad mo 'bar kye/ 
121a1(rgyud): ning blo ldan ma g.yeng bskal par gnas// brjid pas dpal dges lan gcig tu// bde ldan ning du 'gro 'gyur te// rnal 'byor chen po phyin nas// bde ldan gyis ni mchog gtso bo'o// pad ma gzugs kyi
121a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du// de ni bde bar gnas par 'gyur// bde ldan rtag tu 'grogs 'gyur ba// dngos grub ye shes pade myong 'gyur// yi ge yis ni phyag rgya 'dis// pad mo las skyes gzugs gzung ste// byin gyis rlabs nas bde myangs
121a3(rgyud): nas/ pade mo bde ba'i bdag por 'gyur// gzhan gyi bud med bdag nyid kyis// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab te// bstan byas 'dod pa'i gzugs nyid du// sngags mkhan 'gyur ba gdon mi za// sdug cing lang chos brgyan pa yis// 
121a4(rgyud): nyi ma'i 'od zer gsar 'byung bzhin// dri med yangs pa'i lte ba yis// pad mo sems dpa'i rtse 'grub bo// ji tsam nam mkhar nye bar ni// dpa' chen po 'phur byed de// rig ma 'bum phrag rgya tshogs kyis// lha mo yis ni mchod par
121a5(rgyud): byed/ sangs rgyas sras dang bcas kun gyis// sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag nyid mchod// 'khor ba nyid na dpa' bo che// 'khor ba dri mas mi gos so// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na// rtag tu nyon mongs dag 'gyur te// sman gyis/ 
121a6(rgyud): phye ba sbyor ba yis// sbrul ga ni gsod par 'gyur ba yin// zla gsang thag le dga' byed 'di// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// 'di yi mthu yis ngo bo yis// dngos po thams cad dngos grub bo// gang 'dod dngos grub don 'dod pa// 
121a7(rgyud): 'khor ba 'di dang pha rol gyi// mthu chen phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis// dran pa tsam gyis de dngos grug/ shin du dges pa pad mo phreng ba zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so// dang por oM deng yang dag ldan// mtha' mer dbyings pa
121a8(rgyud): hUM nyid de// dbus su rab dgas rdo rje bzhag/ yi ge 'di ni slad 'byung ba'o// phyag rgya 'di yis brgyas btab pas// sdig pa skad cig med par 'gyur// khams gsum 'di na dngos grub che// dpal phyis dbyings pa thos par
121b1(rgyud): 'gyur/ bdud dang bdud las rjes su 'jug pa// mi thogs par ni rgyal byed do// sna tshogs rdo rje mnyam sbyor bas// de yis khams gsum 'phrog par byed// bdag gi mthu yis rnam rgyal te// de yas khams gsum longs spyod de// 
121b2(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab te// pad ma rdo rje rab ldan bya// phreng byed phreng ba'i tshul gyis su// phreng ba bskum ste 'dzin pa bzhin// 'di yis byin gyis brlabs byas te// bsnyen na myur du dngos grub bo// g.yas dngo g.yon gyi smin bsgyur
121b3(rgyud): bas chu skyes spyan na rgyas byas te// phyag rgya btib ste rol byas na// bla ma'i dngos grub thob par byed// rdo rje rnal 'byor nye ba yis// rdo rje bdag nyid mchod byed de// 'di dag kun gyi sgor byas ni// dkyil 'khor du ni dbang bskur ro// rdo rje seMs
121b4(rgyud): dang dpe'i blo yos// 'jigs shing skrag pas sbyin byed do// rang nyid kyis ni phyag rgya'i gzugs// nyid kyi dngos grub stobs par byed// gzhan ni yang dag pha rol phyin// sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan rgya// de yang de la 'jigs skrag
121b5(rgyud): nas rang gi dgegs mchog stobs par byed// bdag nyid chen por dmyigs gsum dang // che ba'i phan ngo bzhin nang // rdo rje 'dzin dang rtogs 'dod rnams// rang gi sdug pa stobs par byed// gshin tsA shwa ka rgyal po yang // rdo rje 'dzin rje
121b6(rgyud): dngos grub la/ 'ongs nas rang gi sdug pa rnams// srog gi phyir ni stobs par byed// gzhan yang 'phrul gyi lus kyi rnams// khams gsum lam la gnas pa dag/ myur du nye bar 'ongs nas kyang // bdag nyid dngos grub sbyin par byed// 
121b7(rgyud): sna tshogs gnyen ni rgyal po che// dbang phyug dam pa sna tshogs byed// de yang nye 'ongs gtsug gdugs te// rnal 'byor sna tshog ma byin byed// gnod sbyin srin po gzugs la sogs// sha za yi dgas bu mo'i rnams// sbyor ldan phyag
121b8(rgyud): rgyas blangs byas te// brtag pa mchog gis brtag par bya// thams cad las byed dge ba yis// 'di yis dngos grub myur du 'gyur// lha dang klu ya bu mo yang // lha min lha'i mngal skyes dpa'// phyag rgya 'di yos byin b.ras
122a1(rgyud): @na/ grub pa myur du dngos grub po// gzugs bzang yang na ngan yang rung // gang de bud med dbyangs byas te// rim pa 'di yis tshul gyis su// phyag rgya'i sbyor bas rtag par bya// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad
122a2(rgyud): dang / de bzhin dpa' bo nyid kun du// skad cig skad cag rgyas btab pa// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// shin du dgos pa chen po sna tshogs dpa' med pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i// yi ge'i phyag rgya ro bcu gsum steng nyid du// de ba ni/ 
122a3(rgyud): thig le'i rgyal po ste// rab dgos rdo rje blta ba bde// mtha' ni yi ge hi sbyar ba'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bde chen spyan ni dga' byed pas// phyag rgya'i yi ge 'di yis ni// mkhas pas byin gyis brlabs na ni// de ni de
122a4(rgyud): ma thag tu yang / bla med 'phrul gyi spyan du 'gyur// stong nyid ye shes gnas pa yi/ sa// sangs rgyas shin du phra ba thob// smin ma'i rnam 'gyur rgyas pa yi// lta ba'i phyag rgya gar byed cing // 'gugs byed sangs rgyas thams cad dang // 
122a5(rgyud): dpa' bo rdo rje 'dzin kun dang // pha rol phyin pa thams cad dang // de bzhin gzungs ma'i tshogs rnams dang // rnal 'byor ma dang nam mkhar 'gro// phyi dang nang gi tshogs rnams dang // lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo// lha men dngos
122a6(rgyud): grub lus kyi mchog/ grul bum ma 'am ya dgas dang // sha za 'phrul gya mi'i bu mo// 'di ni snying khar bzhag pa yis// rdo rje 'dzin du bdag nyid 'gyur// sangs rgyas yang na nyi ma dang // pad ma 'dra ba sna tshogs blo// lha dang lha min
122a7(rgyud): mi dag dang / gzhan yang gnod sbyin srin po dang // bdud dang bdud kyi tshogs rnams kyis// gzhan gyi 'phrog par yang mi nus// lha dang lha min gyis mchod cing // dngos grub rnam gsum 'gro bar byed// lha dang lha min bsteg byed
122a8(rgyud): ci ba skad cig nyid du 'ong bar byed// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mkhyen pa'i yul// sang+yas rnams kyis zhing kun du// rig pa'i rigs ni brgya dag dang // de ni rtsen zhing 'gro bar byed// 'jigs med yan lag kun spangs pa// thog ma
122b1(rgyud): ma med gyur te// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mkhyen sbyor bas// dges pa'i sman mchog cig tu 'gyur// rdo rje'i nang na rdo rjer 'gyur// rin chen nang na ranyin 'gyur// pad mo'i nang na pad mor 'gyur// sna tshogs nang na sna tshogs 'gyur// de
122b2(rgyud): la sogs pa mtha' yas pa// mnyam dang mi mnyam chos kyi dbyangs// phyag rgya'i ye shes byin brlabs pas// dam pa sna tshogs nyid du 'gyur// gzugs ma sdig pa gzugs mchog 'gyur// mig med pa yang mig rnyed 'gyur// rna
122b3(rgyud): 'on pa yang sgro thos te// glen pa yang ni yid rnor 'gyur// de la sogs pa dpag med pa// mig gi phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur// de yi lus la yon tan ni// yon tan dam pa mdangs cher 'gyur// ji tsam de ni nam mkha'i mthongs// 'du
122b4(rgyud): zhing 'og tu 'bab par byed// 'di ni ri yang phug nas 'gro/ sa dang sa'i 'og tu ni// sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul rnams byed pas// de ni skad cig 'gro bar byed// sna tshogs mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du// sngags mkhan dbyings pas gar byed
122b5(rgyud): pas/ bde ba chen po bskyed pa yi// sems can de ni 'jug par byed// mi g.yeng lta ba'i bsgyur ba yis// las rnams thams cad de yis byed// 'degs pa dang ni gdab pa dang // gang dang rnam par bskor ba dang // 'gro ba thams cad 'bab
122b6(rgyud): byed de/ rI dang sems can thams cad la// smra ba dang ni dgra 'byin dang // ci dga' bar ni mngag par byed// gdug pa'i lci ba srog chags rnams// brdeg pa dang ni bsgral byed de// gtum dang gdug dang 'jigs chen dang // khro bo lta bas bsgril bar
122b7(rgyud): byed/ shin du dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje can dang / ldan ma zhes bya ba/ 'dod pa'i don thams cad grub par byed pa'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ye shes kyi mthu chen po// dang por oM gos rnam par brgyan// tha mar 'brug gi sgra 'byin pa// rdo rje rab tu dges kyi/ 
122b8(rgyud): pa'i sku khade ba bskyed byed bshad pa yin// phyag brgya 'di ni phyag rgya che// sangs rgyas rdo rje dpa' bo yi// gang gis 'di ni bsgoms ma thag/ rdo rje gsum gyi byin rlob 'gyur// bdag gam yang na gzhan yang rung // 'di yis nyid kyi snying kha ru
123a1(rgyud): @bsgoms te gnyis med sbyor byas na// sangs rgyas sku ni rab tu 'grub// grub nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bud med kun dang rtsen byed de// a li ki li mnyam sbyor bas// sems can dman pa yang dngos
123a2(rgyud): / grub shan du skal ldan thams cad dang // sangs rgyas skal ldan thob 'gyur te// skal dang ldan pa thams cad kyis// chu skyes zhabs la mnyen par byed// lha dang lha min bu mo yi// rig mas mthong na dga' byed do// phyag rgya ye shes brgyan
123a3(rgyud): pa yis/ sna tshogs 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur// spyod dang mi spyod dag dang ni// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // mo 'om ci dang skyes bu yis// dngos grub kyis ni 'phrog mi nus// de la sogs pas bstod byed de// 'jigs pa ra
123a4(rgyud): gyur pa'i sems kyis ni// bla ma bzhin du mchod byed cing // kun gyi mchod pas bsti btang byed// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ nam mkha'i/ mtha' glags lha rnams// nyi ma bcu'i 'od zer bzhin// rnal 'byor chen
123a5(rgyud): po grub pas 'gro// sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing kun du// 'od kyis thams cad mnyes byed cing // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// zil gyis mnan te gnas par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid la// sras rnam
123a6(rgyud): bsdud cing phyag byed de// lha dang lha mni grul bum dang // tshangs pa rtogs 'dod lha chen po// phyag rgya ye shes byin brlabs der// 'jigs shing skrag par 'ong byer byed// bcom ldan dngos grub bka' stsal stsol// tsa ltar thug
123a7(rgyud): la dgongs pa bzhin// spyi bos bka' blangs rlangs 'dul dka' rnams// de dag thams cad bsgrub par bgyi// mdor sdus rnam pa bzhi po yis// dam tshigs rnams kyang bskyed par bgyi// zla bzang thig le mchod nyid kyis/ 
123a8(rgyud): dbang bskur ba yang blang bar bgyi// rigs lnga rnams kyi sdom pa nyid// rnam pa bzhi po thams cad blang // chu skye dngos grub khyed zhabs drung // 'tshe ba'i bar du bdag cag 'bangs// khyod kyi spyan sngar zhabs 'bring du// ci bde zhes
123b1(rgyud): te bka' nod do// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na// spyod bcas ma spyod dga' byed te// rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams kyi mchog/ shin du bde dang mdza' ba myong // rdo rje shin du dgyes pa'i sku chen mo'i bde ba dpe med pa dang / 
123b2(rgyud): ldan pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin to// dang po oM ni thig le ste// gzhan gyis mi phyed khror bcas pa// gnyis kyis dbus su bzhag pa ni// gsum gyi rdo rje shin du dges// bde gsung sangs rgyas thams
123b3(rgyud): cad kyi// mchog du ro ni myong byed pa'i// dam chos sgra yis gang byas pa'o// gsung gsal rna ba dga' bar byed// ye shes phyag rgya chen po 'di// byang chub chen por grub byed do// yon tan yon tan sdug mthong ba'i// tshad med yon
123b4(rgyud): tan 'dzin pa'o// dpal ldan phyag rgya 'dis btab na/ dpa' kun bdag po de ma thag/ bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin spangs pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid thob// phyag rgya 'di yis bdag gam gzhan// rgyas btab 'dod pa spyad
123b5(rgyud): byas na/ dngos grub rmed du 'byung ba yi// de bzhin myur tu theb par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// sgrub pa po'i bka' nyan te// ji ste rmongs pas 'da' byed na// de yi srog ni tha ma yin// de yi bsrung ba byas na dpal// tshe
123b6(rgyud): dang lang tshe bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje gsung gis bstan pa bzhin// gdon mi za bar thob par 'gyur// phyag brgya ye shes rjes bsdus pas// sgrub pa mi byed cung zad med// bdag nyid thams cad sprul par ni// mchog gi ye shes
123b7(rgyud): dngos grub 'gyur// phyag rgya ye shes byin brlabs la// sangs rgyas byang chub ma ldog dang // chos kyi dbyings mnyam par klas pa// dngos grub bdag nyid gshegs nas kyang // shin du 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// sems dpa'
123b8(rgyud): chen po der khrid do// rang gi ting 'dzin ldang ba'i tshe// dam tshig mchog tu bsrung bar bya// ji snyed nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du// 'dod pa thams cad de spyod do// rnal 'byor chen po mi 'da' zhing // ngan song du yang 'gro ma byed// de ni cung
124a1(rgyud): @zed 'og sdug bsngal// 'gro ba thams cad myong ba mi 'gyur// rdo rje gsum ste rmad byung bas// sangs rgyas kun gyis byed de// bag chags mtshams sbyor rnam grol nas// nam mkha'i rim par 'gro 'od byed// 
124a2(rgyud): de yis rtag du mchod byed do// mchod pa byas pa shin du mchod// sems dpa' chen po 'gro 'dug kyang // bde byed kun gyi bdag nyid dge/ gnas dang zas dang btung la sogs// nam mkha' las ni skad cig rnyed// bu
124a3(rgyud): med rin chen mchog mkha' las// bsam pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// las kyi dbyings phyug ma lus pa// de yis khams gsum thob par byed// rnal 'byor sbyor ba dngos grub gyis// rnal 'byor grub chen 'phrog
124a4(rgyud): par byed/ 'di las brtul zhugs grag pa med// dka' thub 'di dang 'dra med de// bud med mchog tu bde ba la// 'dod pa'i longs spyod spyad pas 'grub// dge ba pad me rogs kun du// sems dpa' chen po dag dbang 'gyur/ 
124a5(rgyud): gzungs ma rnams kyi bde che be// rgyal por de chen por de 'gyur ro// gsung thams cad kyi rdo rje dpe med pa dang ldan pa dang / rdo rje shin du dges chen po'o// bde ba thob par byed pa yi// khams gsum kun snang bar grags pa// pad
124a6(rgyud): me'i rigs kyi tshogs zhal gyis// gsung gis dgongs pa thams cad grub par byed pa'o// oM bcas mi phyed tha mar ste// rab tu sems ni bde ba dang // rdo rje rab dgyes bde byed phye// dbus su mang ni basbyar bar bya// phyag rgya 'di
124a7(rgyud): na dngos grub che// byang chub sems ni rab grub pa// 'di yis byin gyis brlabs ma thag/ bdud rtsi mchog ni thob par 'gyur// thams cad 'dod pas ldan byas na// de ste thams cad sems kyang rung // bde ba chen po sems thams/ 
124a8(rgyud): cad sngags mkhan reg pa'i rgyas btab na// de yi rdo rje 'dzin nyid dang // rdo rje dpa' bo nyid yang // lha mo phyag rgyas byin brlabs pas// skad cag tu ni thob par 'gyur// lha mo rnams dang gar byed cing // de ni rab dgas bdag pos khrid// 
124b1(rgyud): pho brang dga' byed rab dges che// rab dges rgyargyal po do 'thob 'gyur// seng gi gdan la 'jog byed de// bzhi nang bzhi yi mchog nyid kyis// rdo rje pad mo sbyor ba yis// de ni khrid nas dbang bskur ro// de nas rdzogs sangs tshe dpag
124b2(rgyud): med byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus che// yod dang med pa mi 'dod pas// de la phyag ni byed par 'gyur// rdo rje sems mchog 'jog byed de// rang gi spyod pa'i tshul gyis ni// pha rol phyin ma thams cad dang // sangs rgyas gyi mdun du bsko/ 
124b3(rgyud): sa gsum thams cad kun du ni// sems dpa' chen po ston byed pa// res 'ga' shin tu dka' spyod dang // res 'ga' khab nas byung ba dang // ris 'ga' byang chub res 'ga' lhums// res 'ga' skye dang res 'ga' 'pho// res 'ga'
124b4(rgyud): spyod tshe rol pa dang // res 'ga' bdud las rgyal bar byed// res 'ga' byang chub mngon byang chub// res 'ga' 'khor lo bskor mdzad de// res 'ga' sna tshogs 'jug par mdzad// res 'ga' dus su shin du mdzes// res 'ga' bud
124b5(rgyud): maud skyes pa dang // res 'ga' lha dang skyes dgu'i bdag/ res 'ga' 'dod dbang rgyal po ste// res 'ga' 'dod la rgyab kyis phyogs// re 'ga' zhi ba res 'ga' dag/ res 'ga' gdon chen bgegs mdzad de// de la sogs pa ma
124b6(rgyud): yas pas// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// ci dgar dngos grub 'dod pa la// bdag gi ngo bo ston par byed// mi byed cho ga sbyor ba yis// 'dren pa ma byed nye byas te// phan tshun nges pa chen po yis// rdo rje can gyi bde 'bigs na// gzung
124b7(rgyud): ma mang po tshogs kyi rnams// bde byed chen po gzhan ci smos// spyod bcas ma spyod bde dam pa// 'byed pa mi byed 'thob par 'gyur// brjid pas byang chub snying po ru// rtag pa ru ni gnas 'gyur te// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// 
124b8(rgyud): sbyor ba rje su dran pas so// thams cad cha ni rnam bral ba// byang chub sems ni mchog bzhin du// yi ge 'dis ni sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid chen por de 'gyur ro// rdo rje shin du dges pa chen me tshim pa yod las skyes pa dpe med pa dang / 
125a1(rgyud): ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ las thams cad grub par byed pa'o// dang po oM ni sbyor ba ste// tha mar gnyis pa rdza rnga'i sgra// rab dges rdo rje byin brlabs pa'i// lha mo dngar byed dbus su bzhag/ 'di ni sangs rgyas
125a2(rgyud): / thams cad kyi// rab dges thob rmongs byed ma// rdo rje ye shes thugs gnas pa'i// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// sngags ya mkhan yi ge phyag rgya 'dis// bdag gam gzhan la rgyas btab ste// rdo rje 'das skyes bcug byas na// de
125a3(rgyud): nas de myur dngos grub bo// thams cad las byed dpal dang ldan// tshe dang lang 'tshe skal ldan pa'i// rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra thob ste// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas rnams dang dpa' bo yi// sangs rgyas kun dang rtsen byed cing // sde
125a4(rgyud): / dbang rnams dang lha rnams kyis// 'phrul gyi bud med 'phrog byed do// rdo rje rab tu dges pa chen mo dang ra byed kun du myong ba me tog gi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ste// sgrub pa thams cad rnam par sel pa/ las thams cad
125a5(rgyud): byed pa chen mo gdon ma za ba gzhan gyis mi phyed ma'o// tshangs pa'i gsung gi nga ro bcas// thams cad dril bu'i nga ro gnyis// dbus su ming gi phreng ba ste// yi ge 'di ni chu 'dzin mchog/ 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// yid kyi
125a6(rgyud): / dngos grub thob byed do// 'dod pa yi na thams cad rnams// yi ges skad cig grub par byed// 'di yis rgyas btab bud med dam// bdag nyid rang gi slob ma'ang rung // de nyid sbyor bas bsten byas na// rdo rje 'dzin dpal 'dra bar 'gyur// rnan
125a7(rgyud): 'byor ma rnams bdag por ni// myur du mkha' la 'gro 'ong byed// tshangs pa gtogs 'dod dbang chen dang // lha rnams kyis ni mchod par 'gyur// lha mo'i tshigs dang rtsen byed cing // lha mo kun gyi bdag por 'gyur// 'phrog byed las// 
125a8(rgyud): bdag po che// 'jigs par byed deng rku byed dang // sems can kun gyi mchog dam par// sems dpa' chen por de 'gyur ro// stug po tshogs kyi dbus su na// brjed la sogs pa'i spyod pas 'gro/ brjod pa che pad mo chen po la// 
125b1(rgyud): thams cad du ni brjid pa yis// bde byed chen po myong byed do// rab tu dges pas bsgrags pa bzhin// rab tu skal ldan mgron mkhyud pas// rnal 'byor chen por de gnas te// 'di ni snying la bris pa yis// ci 'dod par ni 'dod pa thog// phyag
125b2(rgyud): rgyachu sres rgyas bdub te// de ltar byas na phyag rgya dges// rdo rje shin du dges pa stug po chen mo// dri ma med pa'i mdog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yi ge'i phyag rgya'o// dang po nyid du oM bya ste// thigi le rgyal pos nye bar brgyan// tsheg drag bcas pa/ 
125b3(rgyud): 'dren pa gnyis// ldan pa tha mar bzhag bya ste// rdo rje rab dges brgyan byas pa// rdo rje ston ka dbus su bsam// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ye shes snang ba rab sgrubs pa// yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'dris// nyid kyi snying khar rgyas btab na/ 
125b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas ye shes mchog byed pas// de yis ston ka ma dngos grub// bde dbang ltar bcas lha rnams dang // gnod sbyin srin po 'khor bcas dang // sbrul dang mi 'am ci gnas pa// thams cad 'di yis g.yog tu 'gyur// de ni 'od zer
125b5(rgyud): rab tu 'bar ba yis// sangs rgyas mchog gi thugs ldan de 'gre ste// sna tshogs shes rab 'byung dpal yang dag khyab// chos mchog dam pan byed pa gting byed cing // spyod bcas mi spyod 'jig rten snang byed do// sprin dang bral ba'i zla ba'i
125b6(rgyud): 'od mchog byed// mkha' dbyings rnam par bsgyings pas rab dga' bas// a li ka li pad ma bde mchog la// myong zhing mchod byas bskal par gnas par 'gyur// 'di yis sdig po 'phrog byed de// 'di yis myur du dga' bar 'gyur// 
125b7(rgyud): 'di yis bde ba'i ngo bo do// 'di yis dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// skye ba'i sdug bsngal rgyab phyogs pa// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa chen po'i thams cad kyi rdo rje shin du dges pa ye shes kyi snang ba dang ldan ma
125b8(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya chen po ste// thams cad mkhyen paSh+Ti ye shes grub par byed pa'o// dang po oM dang yang dag ldan// tha mar dges pa'i yi ge gnyis// rdo rje shin du dges pa che// dbus su gsal ba'i yi ge bsam// 'di ni sangs rgyas
126a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi// sna tshogs chen mo mdun du 'gro / sna tshogs chen mo 'di yis ni// sna tshogs ye shes dngos grub bo// sngags mkhan gnyis kyis byin brlabs nas// sna tshogs bdag po chen por 'gyur// sdig pa'i
126a2(rgyud): yan lag kun spangs te// bsod nams kun gyi bdag nyid dog/ kun du 'gro ba'i dngos grub ni// 'di nyid kyis ni rab tu grub// sna tshogs sgyu ma'i bde chen gyis// sna tshogs chen mo bskal par gnas// rdo rje bdag nyid brgyan pa yi// bud
126a3(rgyud): med kun dang rtsin par 'gyur// de nas de ni ches dbyings gnas// dbang phyug mchog ni dngos grub bo// pad ma'i mdun du thog ma'i lha// byas te rdo rje bsgrub par bya// mthe bo srin lag de phyung te// kha'i ni nang du gzhug par bya// 'chang bzhin myang bar
126a4(rgyud): byas na ni/ mod la 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur// a li ka li rab sbyor bas// bud med rnams dang rtsen par byed// blo ldan rdo rje sems dpa' 'di ni shin du dges shes bya// bsil ba dga' byed chen mo ste// sna tshogs 'di ni 'gro la gnas
126a5(rgyud): dang po oM ni gnas pa de// tra ta dang ldan tha mar bya// rdo rje shin du dges che ho// sgeg mo dbus su bskul ba'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sgeg par bya ba sprul pa ya ni// 'di dang mnyam par sbyor ba yi// sgeg mo sA ye shes bskyed
126a6(rgyud): par bya/ rdo rje blo ldan brtan pa yis// bde bar 'dod pa'i pad mor gzugs// 'dod pas 'dod pa'i 'dod pa spyod// myur du 'dod pas dngos grub bo// de nas rdo rje 'dod dpal de// bde byed thams cad nye bar bsgrub// sems can
126a7(rgyud): kun gyi 'dod bskyed pa// bde ba chen por de 'gyur ro// mthu yis pha rol phyin ma' mchog/ pad ma'i tshul du sgeg pa yis// rdo rje sbyor thabs la gnas pas// rdo rje chen por+ya de dngos grub// ca gar 'dod pa'i 'dod chags
126a8(rgyud): kyis/ rtag pa'i lam dang yang dag ldan// rtag pa'i chos kyis rjes mthun spyod// bsgrubs na rtag pa rtogs par 'gyur// 'di yis kun du bzang zhes bya// 'di ni dngos po kun yin te// dogs pa med cing nyon mong
126b1(rgyud): medas nga rgyal med cing 'dzin med pas// sangs rgyas mchog tu rtag pa yis// sangs rgyas chen po de yi dngos// dpa' ldan thogs med// chos rnams kun gyi rje mthun pa// 'di'i dngos po thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas bdag
126b2(rgyud): por bdag nyid 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dang // 'di la khyad par cung zad med// shin du dgyes pa chen po rdo rje'i bdag pa// dpal shin du dgos pa'o sgeg mo// dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i yi gri'i
126b3(rgyud): phyag rgya tshes sku'o// dang pon oM bcas lha mo yi// tha mar mi phyed tsheg drag gnyis// de gnyis dbus kyi phyogs dag tu// he zhes bya bas rnam par brgyan// shin du dgres pa'i rdo rje che// bzhad pa gnyis ni rab tu sbyar// yi ge/ 
126b4(rgyud): 'di yi phyag rgya 'dis// nyid kyi snying la rgyas btab na// phreng ba'i tshul gyis rnam brgyan par// dpal ldan de ma thag tu 'gyur// yid kyi ji ltar bsams pa bzhin// de ni sangs rgyas yul du 'gro// de ni der phyin sangs rgyas
126b5(rgyud): mthong / chu skyes de dang rtsen par byed// de nas 'dus pa dges pa che// sangs rgyas yang dag zhing nyid nas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bde ba che// dngos grub rnal 'byor de la sbyin// byed pa dang ni bzlog pa dang // bde ba chen po
126b6(rgyud): 'phrog pa yis// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i dbang phyug la// gsang ba chen pos mgu bar byed// tha bas bcas shes rab chen po la// rgyal ba nyid kyis stobs byed do// a li ka la mi nyam sbyor bas// bde ba chen po mgu bar/ 
126b7(rgyud): byed// bde ba'i thabs kyi dngos grub ni// sgyu ma'i tshul gyis bsgrub par bya// yi ge yis ni phyag rgya 'dis// shin du dngos grub mchog tu rtag/ rdo rje shin du dges pa bde ba'i phreng bas rgyas pa// dpe med pa dang ldan ma
126b8(rgyud): / zhes bya ba'i yo ge'i phyag rgya ste/ las thams cad kyi don gyi dngos grub sbyin ma'o// oM ni dang por gtsug tor bya// ti te skad snyan tha mar he// dbus su he dga' zhes bya ba// bde chen dga' ba rdo rje dbyangs// rdo rje shin du/ 
127a1(rgyud): dges pa che// phyag rgya 'di ni rab dgis 'brel// bris pa dang ni 'dzin pa dang // dran pa yis kyang dngos grub ste// sdig pa rnams las grol byed cing // bsod nams thams cad nye bar 'gro
127a2(rgyud): mi dge thams cad ma lus spong byed cing // sems ni phyag rgya'i ye shes brgyan de 'gro// 'jig rten thams cad kun gyis bkur sti byed// rigs ma stong gis mngon par rab mchod cing // reg 'dzin mu sman bud med/ 
127a3(rgyud): rnams kyis ni/ 96/ g.yog rnga dgar po tshogs kyis g.yob pa bzhin// 'jig rten dbang po bde mchog 'brel pa thob// blo ldan nam mkha'i ngos ni thams cad du// rdo rje 'dzin gyis dges pa'i rnal 'byor ma// yid du 'ong
127a4(rgyud): ba'i spyan ni rgyas pa dang // rnal 'byor spyod pa'i bde bas 'bigs pa yi// / mgul nas mkhyud pa'i rol pas rtsen par byed// pi waM gling bu sgra snyan ya mtshan gyis// glur blangs dngos grub rgya chen thob par byed// ji snyed
127a5(rgyud): yid du 'ong ba'i glu dag ni// 'jig rten grags pa'i bde ba'i bde ba dag/ bde ba'i sgra yis bskyed pa rnams bsgyur ba// de dang mthun pa'i dbyangs 'dis bskul bar byed// shing rnga ba dang gardzi'i dbyangs// glu ru byang
127a6(rgyud): pas pad mo'i gnas// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// 'di yis byin brlabs dag pa dang // 'di yi byin brlabs bde ba rnams// sbyor ba 'di yis sbyor ba yis// 'dod byed thams cad thob par gyur// shin
127a7(rgyud): du dgyes pa chen po rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu dges pa chen po'i dbyangs dpe med dang / ldan ma zhes bya ba yi gi'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhi nA oM ni dang por skye// dbus su he dgas bde ba che// rdo rje gar byed dpe gnyis/ 
127a8(rgyud): 'di ni thams cad bde byed de// sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab dgos nyid// rnal 'byor 'di yis rgyas btab na// bde ldan gar ni byed cing 'gro/ 'og min gyi gnas chen du// sangs rgyas rnams dang lhan
127b1(rgyud): cig 'grogs/ bde byed chen mo dbang chen dang // chos kyi rgyal po bde chen 'thob// ji snyed gar gyi gtsug lag les// sbyar bar byed pa bshad pa dag/ de snyed de snyed phyag rgya'i rnams// gnyis med 'dus pa 'di dngos
127b2(rgyud): grub/ kye ma'o dges pa bde byed che// kye ma'o bde ba bde chen go// kye ma'o 'dod pa 'dod chags che// kye ma'o sna tshogs bdag nyid che// de la sogs pa tshad med pa// 'jig rten gyi ni yo byad rnams// pad mo gsal la
127b3(rgyud): gar gyos ni// rnal 'byor gar byas dngos grub bo// sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag rgya 'dis// sna tshogs gar ni ston byed pa// myur du gar ni mang byas pas// gar gyi gtsug lag dngos grub bo// rdo rje shin du dgas bre chen po
127b4(rgyud): dpal bde ba chen mo/ dga' byed kyi gar zhes bya ba yi ge'i phyag rgya phan tshun bcu pa rgyal mtshan dang ldan ma ba dan gsum pa'o// bcu gsum yig dang po nyid// spyi bor thig le ldan byas pa// rdo rje shin du dogs pa che// rdo
127b5(rgyud): rje sku ni sna tshogs che// tha mar 'bar dang 'dra ba'i ji// nam mkha' zla dkar 'dra ba yi// phyag rgya ye shes rmad byung ba'o// 'di yis thabs kyis mnyam gzhag ste// bzung ba gsal bar bzung ba yi// che ba'i gser gyi sa/ 
127b6(rgyud): gzi brjid 'dzin ye shes snying khar bsam par bya// nam mkha' nyi ma 'bum 'dra bar// de ni de ma thag tu 'gyur// 'di yis rgyas thams cad nyid// shin tu rmad 'byung thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor kun gyi bder 'brel
127b7(rgyud): pa rdo rje blo mchog dngos grub bo// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin dge yis// sna tshogs chen po thob gyur nas// 'dod pa'i chos kyis mi gos blo// 'dod pa chen po bsnyen par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
127b8(rgyud): po shin du dges pa chen po dpal/ rdo rje sems dpa' ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i rdo rje'i sku// dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i yi ge chen po'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin oM ni bzhag bya ste// rdo rje shan du dges pa che// rdo rje dag
128a1(rgyud): / ni bde 'brel ba// tha mar khros bcas sbyor bar bya// phyag rgya di ni bde mchog ste// bar chad pa yang thos 'gyur te// khams gsum ngo bo thams cad na// sgra yi thos pa dngos grub bo// 'di yis sangs
128a2(rgyud): rgyas thams cad nyid// tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub ste// bud med pad mo ud dpal dang // ma lus rgyal ba rnams dang rtsen// rdo rje pad mo sbyor byas na// dga' byed myur du dngos grub bo// rab du dges pa chen po dpal rdo rje
128a3(rgyud): sems dpa'i tshad med pa'i yon tan gyi sgra dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba don gyi dpal thams cad grub par byed pa'o// oM yi spyi gtsug thig ler bcas// rab dges chen po rdo rje can// rdo rje de 'dir 'brel pa yis// 
128a4(rgyud): mtha' mar gnas shes rab sbyar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sna tshogs chen mo mdun du 'gro/ sna tshogs chen mo 'di yis ni// sna tshogs ye shes grub par 'gyur// bdag nyid rdo rje brgyan pa yi// de ni mtshan
128a5(rgyud): ldan kun dang rtson// de nas chos kyi dbyings gnas de// oM li ka lI rab sbyor bas// dga' byed lhan cig rtsen gyur na// dbang phyug dam pa dngos grub 'gyur// 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' yi// blo ldan rab tu dgas she se bya// 
128a6(rgyud): rdo rje dri dpe med pa dang // ldan ma zhes bya ba yi ge'i phyag rgya'o// oM mchog gtsug tor rnam byas te// shin du dges che dbus nyid du// rdo rje yi ni sbyor ba che ga/ tha mar he ste thig le gnyis// 'di yis rab tu dgos
128a7(rgyud): pAr 'gyur// dpal ldan dpe med bde ba dang // bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// sna tshogs skyo ba sna tshogs nyid// spangs rgyas kun gyi rol pa yis// mchod pa ma zad byed par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnas
128a8(rgyud): kyi gnas thams cad// nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid thob bo// rab tu dgyes pa'i dbang po shin du dgos pa chen po/ ro yi mchog gi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba sems can gyi don thams cad grub pa'o// de bzhi
128b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag po zla bsang thig le'i bshad pa'i rgyal po lngas/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor ste/  gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das shin du dges pa
128b2(rgyud): chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' kan de bzang po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las shin du dgos pa chen po gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di ni/ bshad nas cad mi gsung par bzhugs
128b3(rgyud): so// de nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rdu la phran dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsang ba'i gzungs dang / g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen
128b4(rgyud): po dang bcas pa rnams kyis mdun du byas pa/ mi lus lus pa med pa'i nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs rnams dang ldan pa/ phyi nang gi pho nya dang / pho nya mos rab tu rgyas pa rnams shin du ngo mtshar
128b5(rgyud): rmad du 'gyur te/ dges shing spyan ni rgyas pa yis// bzhengs nas dges pa chen po'o// brjid pa'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing // tha le mo sbyar nas gtsug nyid du// bzhag pa yis ni 'dug par byed// bskul ba'i dbyings
128b6(rgyud): 'di yis de dag gtse la mnyes par byed// kye ma'o chos ni ngo mtshar che// kye ma'o spyod pa ngo mtshar che// kye ma'o sbas pa ngo mtshar che// kye ma'o bde byed yang dag 'byung // kye ma'o kun du bzung ba'i don// kye mo'o rab dgas
128b7(rgyud): yang dag 'grogs// kye ma'o bde ba dag che// kye ma'o bde ba pado mchog ste// kye ma'o sngags kyi yang dag sbyor// kye ma'o snying po yang dag bsdus// kye ma'o phyag rgya mnyam par bzhugs// kye ma'o sgrub pa rmad 'byung ba'o// 
128b8(rgyud): kye ma'o pha rol phyin pa yis// kye ma'o ji ltar mthun rig ma'i// kye ma'o sna tshogs dgongs pa che// kye ma'o dag pa gsum sbyor ba// kye ma'i rdo rje mnyam sbyor ba'i// kye ma'o pad mo rnam phye bas// kye ma'o dbang po gnyis spyor
129a1(rgyud): /  ba'i kye ma'o mchog dang pa mnyam pa'o// kye ma'o gar ni dag pa ste// kye ma'o glu gar dri ma med// kye ma'o sil snyan rnam par 'brel// kye ma'o gdug pa rnam par sol// kye ma'o dag
129a2(rgyud): byed me tog 'phreng // kye ma'o bo gson dge ba ste// kye ma'o mar me mun pa sel// kye ma'o dri ni shin du bsal// kye ma'o rnal 'byor mnyam sbyor ba// kye ma'o sgyu ma nam mkha' 'dra// kye ma'o sangs rgyas rnga
129a3(rgyud): rje mchog/ kye ma'o rin chen bde mchog sbyin// kye ma'o sna tshogs pad mchog lda ni// kye ma'o sna tshogs sgyu ma mdzad// kye mo'o ngo mtshar sangs rgyas dang // kye ma'o ngo mtshar dpa' bo rnams// kye ma'o/ 
129a4(rgyud): ngo mtshar sems dpa' rnams// kye ma'o ngo mtshar lha yi rnams// shin du dges chen rdo rje la// rgyal ba kun gyis bstod byas ste// rdo rje sems dpa'i dbyings pa yis// dga' dang bde byed skyes par 'gyur/ 
129a5(rgyud): de nas pha rol phyin thams cad// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dges 'gyur te// sems dpa' che la phyag 'tshal byas nas// mchog gi dbyings kyis bstod par byed// chu skyes zhal na 'dzum bcas pa// yeng ba'i spyan
129a6(rgyud): gyis gar mdzad de// phyag dang zhabs ni sbyar ba yis// rab tu dges ldan smin ma bsgyur// yid tsam 'dzum pa'i spyan zur gzigs// sha rgyas brla ni nu mar 'dug/ rkeng pa'i dbyibs ni rnam par yangs// snabs ni
129a7(rgyud): ngos kyang che la mdzes// chags pa cung zad tshems kyis mnon// tshems kyi phreng ba ka ni da zla// mi drag zlos pa'i dbugs 'byin cing // rab tu dga' tshe mnyes par mdzod// bde bas bde la longs spyod mchog tu bde ba'i
129a8(rgyud): rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab bstan// dgongs pa'i dbang dang ldan pas 'gro ba ya mtshan chen po'i sgo nas 'dul mdzad cing // gsang ba'i thig le 'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni dngos grub gcor bstan te// thams cad
129b1(rgyud): mkhyen pa'i ye shes rtsen pas dga' spyod bdag la stsol// a la la ho// dam tshig rjes su chags pa'i bdag nyid sdug bsngal zhi mdzad cing // 'jig rten gsum po sbyang bar bya ba'i chos de bde gshegs don du mdzad/ 
129b2(rgyud): ngo mtshar yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab dam tshig de las byung // bde mdzod bde spyod dga' la rol pa tshul bzhin mdzad// thams cad dga' ba'i ding nyid thig le dkyil du bskyed mdzad de// byang chub snying por 'gro ba'i
129b3(rgyud): lam bde bas bskul te mnyan par mdzod// ngo mtshar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig rig pa la che lnga dges shing bzhugs// bdag cag 'du shes rnams dang bral ba nyid kyang zhugs spyod mdzes bcas pas// tshangs pa'i
129b4(rgyud): rgyal po dbang dang ldan pas kyang ni de la rang lus so// a la la ho// yangs pa'i sbyin can drangs shing bcug ster rol pa tshul bzhin mdzod// rnam dag ye shes chu des 'gro ba rnams kyi sdig pa khrus// byams ma'i
129b5(rgyud): gzung ma bdag nyid che dang rab tu rtsen mdzod la// thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin dga' ba'i chu des bdag cag dbang bskur cig/ mi g.yo mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ye shes thob 'dod phyir// dram tshig chen po gsum
129b6(rgyud): po 'di la gnas nas ni// zla gsang thig le dkyil du bdag cag dogs med 'gro bar gyis// dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'di smos ni// shin du srid la skyob pa yi// sangs rgyas kun dang 'dod pa bzhin// glu blangs myur
129b7(rgyud): du skal bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das la dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'dis bstod pas// shin du dgos te de bzhin gshegs pa dang // rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad ma dang / las kyi rigs rnams kyi btsun ma
129b8(rgyud): chen mo de dag rnams la/ shin du dges pa'i bde chen pos mnyes par mdzad nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i tshigs rnams la// byang chub sems dpa' dang
130a1(rgyud): bcas pa dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba ma'i tshogs su bcas pa rnams dang / phyi dang nang gi rdo rno'i rigs las skyes pa rnams la shin du dgos pa chen po'i
130a2(rgyud): gar dang / dbyangs dang / 'dud pa dang / zhi ba'i thal mo la sogs pa rnam par snang mdzad chen pos rab tu mdzad nas// dam tshig chen po rdo rje shin du dges pa'i dbang mo dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom
130a3(rgyud): bar zhugs ste/ bde bar cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to// de nas de dag kun dga' nas// shin du dges la phyag byas te// thal mo sbyar nas sra steng du// pus mo lha nga btsugs mdzad de// chos
130a4(rgyud): phyir ni gsol ba 'debs// dkyil 'khor dam tshig bdag nyid la// bcom ldan degs pas bshad du gsol// gang gis sems can 'di nyid kyis// de bas dkyil 'khor sgrub par bgyi// de nas bcom
130a5(rgyud): ldan 'das dam tshig/ 'dod pa nye bar longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dkyil 'khor 'khor 'di bshad par mdzad do// phyagro gnyis gar dang bcas pa yis// mdun
130a6(rgyud): du thal mo bzhag par bya// sor mo kun gyi rtse mo la// pha rol phyin pa'i tshigs bsam// de dag ming gis brda yis ni// sor mo thams cad brtag par bya// sbom po phan tshun bsnol bya ste// shes rab mchod
130a7(rgyud): rten du ni brtag/ rdo rje mchod rten sbyar bar bya// lha ma 'od bzhin 'phro bar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// shes rab pha rol phyin ma dge/ gang gi sna btsongs pa tsam gyis kyang // sangs rgyas byang chub
130a8(rgyud): byini rlob bo// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// rtag pa'i pho brang 'gro 'ong byed// sangs rgyas snang mdzad dpal dang ldan// gtso mo gser gyi kha dog 'dzin// shes rab sbyor ba'i sbyor byas na// 'di yis
130b1(rgyud): myur du dngos grub bo// skal ldan 'phrul gyi bu mo la// 'di yis byin brlabs gar bye ste// rdo rje pad mor ldan byas nas// sems ni sgrub pas gzhug byas la// de nas sems de blang byas te// tho ldan de yis btung byas
130b2(rgyud): ni grub pa gsungs kyi dkyil 'khor du// yang dag dngos grub 'gro bar byed// shes rab dang ni 'phrul gyi 'am// de bzhin gshegs dpel 'phrul rtag thog/ sangs rgyas rdo rje b+h+rUM ldan gyis// kun tu 'brog par ming
130b3(rgyud): mi nu sa/ shin du dgos pa kun du longs spyod pa'i bde ba zhes bya ba/ shos rab kyi pha rol du phyin ma'o// thal mo de nyid khros skyes pa// sbom po dkyil dkrung bzhag byas te// sna tshogs phreng ba 'bar byed pa// rnal
130b4(rgyud): 'byor can gyis lhag ma spro// 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi// shes rab pha rol phyin ma gsol// phyag rgya 'di yas rgyas btab pa// rdo rje ye shes bla na med// 'di yis myur du thob par 'gyur// phyag 'di yis rgyas
130b5(rgyud): btab pas// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // ring du sdig pa 'jig par byed// tshe dang dpral dang ye shes sku// rdo rje 'dzin gyis thob par 'gyur// 'di ni dbang bskur tsam gyis ni// rdo rje 'dzin rjer de 'gyur to// 
130b6(rgyud): / rdo rje dkyil 'khor mtshan btab pa// sa chen 'ong zhing 'gro bar byed// 'di ni dga' byed rdo rje'i rigs// rdo rje bud med 'grogs pa dang // rdo rje gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje sems nyid thob par 'gyur// dza
130b7(rgyud): ltar dngos grub dgug pa dang // sangs rgyas rdo rje dpa' bo rnams// skad cig gis ni 'dren par byed// bsgral dang mnyen par bya ba dang // rgyas btab de bzhin rmongs pa dang // gso bar byed dang thob pa dang // pan/ 
130b8(rgyud): tshun kun ni skyong bar byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba// rdo rje phreng ba zhes bya ba shin tu dges pa bde ba thob par byed pa dpe med pa'i rdo rje zhes kyi phyog rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo// 
131a1(rgyud): / de nyid las/ khra mo gnyis ni rtse mo sbyar// sor mo rgyag ma snga ma bzhin// phyag rgya 'dis na dbang bskur ba'o// rims dang gdon dang dug la sogs// de ma thag tu phrog par byed// 'di ni
131a2(rgyud): bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // sangs rgyas kyis na dgos pa thob// 'di nyid kyi ni dbang bskur dong // 'di nyid kyis ni bde dam pa// 'di nyid kyis na rgyal ba che// 'di nyid kyis ni dpal dam dpa'// 'di yi
131a3(rgyud): rtsen par byas pa yis// rab dga'i dgug par dngos grub thog/ ma la 'di yis byin brlabs te// nyi ma phyed na sbyod byas na// de ni da ma thag tu yang // dpal ldan rje rje gzi brjid 'dzin// nyi ma bcu gnyis 'od
131a4(rgyud): 'dra bar/ zhag bdun gyis 'gyur gzhan du man// ma rungs thams cad 'dul ba dang // dge ba thams cad dpal du byed// grol 'do rnams kyi mun pa sel// blo ldan phyag rgya mchog tu 'gyur// de bzhin/ 
131a5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi// bde ba chen po'i gzi brjid dpe med pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba'i phreng ba zhes bya ba/ ba don gsum pa'i 'jig rten gsum du bde ba chen po dam tshig phyag rgya chen po'o// pha rol
131a6(rgyud): phyin ma'i phyag rgya nyid// dge ba'i khro mo dang bral ba// pha rol phyin ma'i chos yin te// tshig dang tshig tu rnam bral ba'o// phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa ya si// chos kyi dbyings gnas rje ru 'gyur
131a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas gyis dbang bskur bas// dbang phyug dam par de 'gyur te// thams cad dag pa mos pa yis// pad mo dmar po mchog 'dzin 'gyur// pad mo'i sgyu ma rnam mdzad pas// sna tshogs chen
131a8(rgyud): por de 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog par byed// sems can kun la thams cad sbyin// 'dod chags chen po nye spangs te// de ni bdud rtsi 'dra bar 'gyur// de ni myur du gar byas pas/ 
131b1(rgyud): sgrib par mo byed cung zad med// de ni sa pad mo sbyar ba yis// bde mchog rtag pa thob par 'gyur// shin du dges pa chen po myos par byed pa'i dpal pad mo'i phreng ba zhes bya ba thams cad kyi don dpal
131b2(rgyud): shin du dges par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid gnyis pa spyi gtsug du// bsgyur nas bzhag pa byas nas ni// ma lus dri ma 'phrog byed pa// sna tshogs chen por de 'gyur ro// 'di yis dbang ni bskur
131b3(rgyud): ma thag/ khams gsum sna tshogs byed par 'gyur// sna tshogs dbang po rgyal po che// sna tshogs gzugs dang sna tshogs bdag/ sgrub pa thams cad bde dam pa// 'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug rgya le// 
131b4(rgyud): 'dod pa'i don kun grub byed pa// thams cad 'di yis dngos grub bo// bud med 'di ni byin brlabs na// sngo bsangs khur chos dkar po dang // de dang lhan cig gar byed pas// sna tshogs bdag po chen por
131b5(rgyud): 'gyur/ sngo bsangs zhir ma phreng ba dang // byin gyis brlabs nas dus gsum du// mtshan gyi mthar ni bsnyen byas na// las kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rigs ngan dang ni sme sha ma// gar mkhan de bzhin
131b6(rgyud): gar byed dang // phyag rgya ye shes byin brlabyas te// bsnyed na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// shin du dgos pa sna tshogs bde ba sbyin par byed pa zhes bya ba/ 'dod par byed pa zhes bya ba/ 'dod par byed pa thams
131b7(rgyud): cad kyi mchog sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de dag bstan pa'i rnams// gar gyi tshul gyis rang gi gnas// dam tshwa gro mchog gi dam tshig gis// dngos grub chen po'i mthur 'gyur ro// thal mo da/ 
131b8(rgyud): nyid sbyar byas te// rdo rje bcings pas bcing bar bya// de las dga' byed dbang bskyed de// mda'i tshul gyis bzung bar bya// 'di na rab dges gtso bo yi// pha rol phyin mchog sdug pa yis// sangs rgyas rnams/ 
132a1(rgyud): kye mos byed pa// dpa' bo thams cad rmongs par byed// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // ma shes byed pa 'jigs par byed// las kyi don ni bka' bzhin du// dga' nas bran
132a2(rgyud): bzhin byed par 'gyur// 'di po yis byin gyis brlabs pa yis// bde tshon rgyal po dran par 'gyur// dga' dang lhan cig gor byed cing // 'dod dbang sar ni 'gro bar byed// dpal rdo rje sems dpe'i
132a3(rgyud): shin du dogs pa/ kun du bzang po dge ba mo'i bde ba gnyis su med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba sbyor ba'i phyag rgya chen po'o// snying khar gzugs pa'i sbyor ba yas// 'di yis lus med kun 'gyur te// bdud rnam
132a4(rgyud): thams cad 'bigs par byed// rgyal ba 'dod chags bral spyod pa// bder gshegs mya ngan 'das kun dang // thams cad 'di yis slong byed de// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byas nas// myur du las la sbyor
132a5(rgyud): bar byed/ dbang po nya dbang dbang chen gyis// gdug pa thams cad 'joms byed de// 'jigs byed drag po chen po yi// gdug pa thams cad gdung bar byed// rdo rje pad mor bcug pa yis// mchi bas ma mchu bzung
132a6(rgyud): byas te/ sor mo phan tshun snol ba yis// dpung pa brkyang ste gar du bya// sna tshogs pad mo rab rgyas pas// bde ba chen po'i bde thob bo// 'dis ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// 'dod dang thar pa grub byed de// 
132a7(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di yis rgya sra btab na// 'dod pa bzhin du 'phur bar byed// rab dgas 'brel pas gar bya zhing // nam mkha' gzung ma thams cad kyis// phan tshun bcu pa'i gnon pa yis// bcings nas 'di 'dis
132a8(rgyud): dngos grub bo// de ni de ma thag tu yang // lha dang lha min mchod byed de// dbang po nye dbang dbang chen dang // nyi zla gshin rje chu dbang rnams// skye bo yis ni phyag byas nas// rang gi dpal mchog stobs par byed// 
132b1(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyang // nyid kyi dpal mchog stobs pa yis// brten pa de la mgu byed cing // sangs rgyas dgongs pa rab sgrub byed// 'di yis las kyi tshul gyi rnams// las dang rdzas su mthun gyur te// rnal
132b2(rgyud): 'byor dbang phyug rnam mdzad pas// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor te// gzungs dang gnyis med sbyor ba yis// yid la 'dod pa'i las kun byed// 'dzum dang gnas dang spras pa dang // sprod pa'i grwar gos
132b3(rgyud): phyag byas so// gzhan dag kyang ni dngos grub che// pad mo'i mdab ma kha phye nas// byang chub sems ni rab sgrub pa// sgrub pa po ni pad mo sgrub/ de bzhin gshegasas pa thams cad kyi bde ba gnyis su med pa'i dpal shan
132b4(rgyud): du dgos pa pad ma'i mdab ma zhes bya ba/ shin du dgos pa chen po'i bde ba thob par byed pa'o// thal mo de nyid bcings pa yi// bcings pa gyen du bzung bya ste// the'u chung gnyis ni bsgreng bar bya// de bzhin sbom po gnyis
132b5(rgyud): kyang bya/ phyag rgya 'di ni chu srin zhes// rgyal mtshan ldan mar bshad pa yin// rdo rje sems dpa' sprul pa ste// 'dod bral chags pas sgrubs pa yis// phyag rgya 'dri yiswa bde ldan gyis// pho brang chen por 'gro bar byed// 
132b6(rgyud): der phyin chos kyi 'khor lo dag/ bla med par na bskor bar byed// sangs rgyas pha rol phyin mas bskor// sdig spangs rnams bkug nas// spyod pa drag po tshul gyis na// bskal pa byed par mnyan par byed// yang dag
132b7(rgyud): byang chub rab gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas 'di yis mnyes par byed// de nas dges te sna tshogs che// sna tshogs ye shes skye ba yi// rang gdam tshig gsungs pa yis// sems dpo' chen po grub par byed// bla med dngos
132b8(rgyud): grub thams cad kyang // 'di yis thams cad grub par byed// sbyor dang ldan pas byin brlabs te// snying khar nye bar bsam par byas na// las kyi ngo bo tshul 'di yis// thams cad las ni byed du gzhug/ gar dang
133a1(rgyud): dbyangs kyi ro dga' yang // sil snyan brdung ba rnams byed dang // pi wang gling bu rdza rnga yi// phyag rgya 'di yis bsgrub par bya// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' shin du dges pa chen po'i thugs kyi dges pa
133a2(rgyud): chen po dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// thal mo de gnyis mnyam gzung nas// 'gyings zhing 'gyong pas gar bya ste// bcings pa chen po btsangs byas nas// sbyor ba chen po gnyis su bya// khu tshur gnyis po
133a3(rgyud): dku nyid du// g.yon du 'gyings pas bstan par bya// phyag rgya 'di ni rgyal lde sogs// bde ba dam pas mchod byed de// 'gying pa'i sbyor bas gar byas nas// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par byed// 'gying ba
133a4(rgyud): tsam gyis sbyor ba yis// 'gying pa thams 'phrog par byed// lha dang lha'i rig ma yi// 'bum phrag brgya yis mchod par byed// rab tu dges pa bde ba mchog/ kun du gar byas gnas par 'gyur// klu mo dang
133a5(rgyud): ni lha man dang // de bzhin mI 'am bdag por 'gyur// nam mkhar 'gro ba'i khyor 'gyur te// rnal 'byor ma kun bde ba che// gzungs ma rnams kyi dag pA ba dag/ gsang ba pha rol phyin pa'i rje/ 
133a6(rgyud): las kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni// thams cad las ni byed pa bshad// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba tshe// gseng chen sbyor bas dngos grub bo// dpal shin du dgos pa chen mo// sems can thams
133a7(rgyud): cad 'grelo mA sbas pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya thams cad 'grub pa'o// phyag rgya de nyid mnyam bzung ste te// lag pa'i mad ma ga ra dang bcas// myur bar steng du dor ba yis// mgyogs su 'gro ba dngos
133a8(rgyud): grub bo/ 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// rmad byung dam pa mchod byas pa// sbyor ba gang gi mchod pa yis// thams cad las byed dngos grub bo// gang dag dngos grub med pa mi dang // 
133b1(rgyud): gang dag bde ba med pa rnam// de dag phyag 'dis btab na// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor 'gro bar 'gyur// 'di yis thams cad las rnams ni// rmang byung dam pa 'grub par byed// btsun mo chen mod bzhin
133b2(rgyud): gshegs 'di yis de ni grub par byed// gzhan yang mchog tu rgya che ba/ mnyam dang mi mnyam chos kyi dbyangs// btsun mo chen mo de bzhin gshegs// phyag rgya sbyar bar dngos grub bo/ dpal badri ba n+dan
133b3(rgyud): mo rab tu dgos pa me tog gi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid 'og gangos su dor// steng du cung zad bsgyur ba bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bde mchog yid ni tshim byed pas// 'di ni btsa
133b4(rgyud): pa tsam gyis kyang // bdung rnams shin du ring por 'gyur// phyag rgya bcings te sngags pa yis// sngo sgeg nas dngos grub sbyin par byed// sangs rgyas dam chog gsum gnas pa// di yos mchod pa byas par
133b5(rgyud): 'gyur/ de nas gtso 'di minyes nas// mtshig gi thabs ni stobs par byed// phyag rgya bcings pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'dis ni thams cad byed par 'gyur// rgyun du byas na rnal 'byor pa'i// dgongs pa thams cad
133b6(rgyud): byed par 'gyur// sdig pa thams cad 'phrog byed de// bde ba dam pa thob byed cing // tshe 'di de ni pha rol tu// phyag rgya'i gnas su der 'gro'o// dpal shin du dgos pa chen po'i bde ba tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i
133b7(rgyud): phyog rgya ste/ dri ma thams cad spong ba dngul shin du dges ma'o// thal mo do nyid sbom po bsgreng // lhag ma gsal ba nyi ma bzhin// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kye// ye shes mchog tu snang byed pa'o// zlog ma
133b8(rgyud): med nas dri mas bsgoms// 'di yis gti mug 'phrog byed de// mnyam par gzhag pas bcings ma thag/ sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// mnyam nyid ye shes med pa dang // pad mo 'dra ba dag ga
134a1(rgyud): sde sna tshogs dra ba dpal chen po// bde byed chen po thob par 'gyur// rdo rje shin du dges pa chen po dpe med pa'i dpal dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i lag
134a2(rgyud): pa yis/ brjid pa'i gar gyis gar bya zhing // thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar to// g.yon gyi khu tshur spyi bong bzhag/ rgyal ba rnams kyi phyag rgya 'di// mchod pa thams cad 'grub byed de// thams cad don rnams
134a3(rgyud): grub par byed// bkra shis rnam rgyal thob par byed// gang gis btsangs pa tsam gyis kyang // mchod pa'i sprin na rgyas pa che// mtha' yas dri med gzi brjid dang // sangs rgyas zhing ni dngos grub bo// 
134a4(rgyud): phyag rgya sbyor bas rgyas btab ste// skad cig gcig gos gar byas nas// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang sras mchog drang // 'di yis thams cad 'beb par 'gyur// sna tshogs kyis ni sbyor ba yi// sna
134a5(rgyud): tshogs gor gyis gar byas na// dpa' bo thams cad kun du 'gro// phun sum tshogs pa 'di thob bo// dpal shan du dges pa chen po bde ba'i sems 'phel bar byed ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin
134a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi pi drag po// dpal kun du bzang po shin du dgyes pa chen po'o bde ba'i bdag nyid/ rnam par snang mdzad chen po bshad pa mthus klags pa
134a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba/ zla gsang thig le mchog tu pha rol du phyin pa gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor shin du dges pa/ rdo rje gdon mi
134a8(rgyud): za ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bskal pa'i mtha' klags pa zhes bya ba/ gsum pa rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po gsang ba'i pha rol du phyin ma'i
134b1(rgyud): dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad nas/ slar yang bde bar cang mi gsung bar gnas par gyur to// donas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / pha rol tu phyin ma
134b2(rgyud): gi rnams rnal 'byor chen mo'i tshig sa thams cad dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs thams cad ngo mtshar rmad du byung nas/ phyi nang gi rdo rje'i rigs su
134b3(rgyud): rtogs pa 'phrog par byed pa'i tshogs thams cad la slar dbugs phyung ste rdza/ de las bzhengs nas gar mdzad cing / rab tu dgyes pa'i spyan rgyas pas// bcom ldan 'das la yang
134b4(rgyud): dang yang du blta zhing / dbyangs kyi mchog gi bde pra glur blangs te/ dregs par byed do// rnam mang bde ba'i rol pas nyid chen po'i// skye dang ma spyi'i chos nyid ya mtshan rmad
134b5(rgyud): kha dag dpal bstan pa// shin du bde bas chub pa'i dkyil 'khror 'jig rten 'dir phyung ste/ rang bzhin dag pa'i chogazungs mA'i dkyil nas bskyed par mdzod// ngo mtshar
134b6(rgyud): rmad du byung ba yi chos nyid bde bas rol mdzad cing // bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin 'dus pa rnams la dbugs 'byin par/ gsang mkha'i thig le dngos nyid nam mkha' 'dra la rnam spyod de/ 
134b7(rgyud): bde ba phun sum tshegs pa'i longs spyod rgyun la dbang mdzad pas/ byang chub mchog gi lam 'di lam nyon mongs mtha' dang nam bral zhing // bde ba'i 'byung gi nas skye shi med pa'i
134b8(rgyud): sgo mor pad mo rnam dag pa// nyon mongs mo gos sgyur mar gnas pa'i chu blo'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// e ma'o kun du bzang po rig pa rgya che bsam gyis mi khyab pa// dngos nyid med pa'i/ 
135a1(rgyud): chos la dga' ba'i rol pas gzungs 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi bde mchog bdud rtsir sra yAn// ji ltar bde la bsnyen cing kun du snang mdzad// kye bde mchen
135a2(rgyud): bde bas rol pa tshul bzhin mdzod// sdug bsngal 'gro ba'i lam chen bde bas tshim par mdzad// byams pa'i spyan can thugs rje'i nyams 'gro ba kun la shar mdzad nas// gti mug thibs po'i/ 
135a3(rgyud): muna? nang byang chub sems kyis gasngal b.rI ston// de ni 'dus pa'i tshigs la bde sbyin rol pa'i rgyal pos gsungs// byang chub mchog gi sems des snying po'i mchog tu dbang bskur
135a4(rgyud): gcig/ dbyings kyi phyag rgya 'di yis ni// skad cig skad cig bskul byas na// rab tu dgyes pa'i bdag nyid kyi// mdun du gnas te dngos grub sbyin// de nas bcom ldan 'das
135a5(rgyud): shan du dge sa bo chen po// bde bdag po chen po kun du bzang po chen po// rdo rje'i zla gsang thig le chen po la// rdo rje mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo gseng po chen mo tshad med pa dang / mcho
135a6(rgyud): tu pha rol phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang // rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs chen mo de rnams kyis bstod cing bskul ba byas pa dang / gsang pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po shin du dges pa longs spyod
135a7(rgyud): kye dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di la snyoms par zhugs nA sa/ shin du dgos pa chen pa mo gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba/ rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po
135a8(rgyud): 'di rang gi sku dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs rnam pa bzhi yis brgyan// der dang dril bu chun po dang // nyi ma zla bso rnam par brgyan// 
135b1(rgyud): rin chen mu tig 'bras bus smras// do shal rkang gdub rnams kyis brgyan// sna tshogs gdugs ni rnam bris pa// sna tshogs phreng ba gos kyis brgyan// srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste/ 
135b2(rgyud): ka ba mchog brgyad yang dag gnas// dbus kyi dga' byed bstan pa ni// dngul la sogs pas rnam par brgyan// sna tshogs pad mo dar gyis g.yogs// thams cad stan+de de
135b3(rgyud): dag ces bya// dbus su rdo rje shin du dges// stun de la ni bzhag par bya// tshad med pad mo mar 'dra bar// sna tshogs brgyan gyis rnam par klubs// yid bzhin nor
135b4(rgyud): bu dbu rgyan ldan// rin chen gtsug ni rnam par mdze swa// tshad med dar ni dpyangs pa yI sa// dbu la chun po so mdzes par byas// sangs rgyas kun gyi sna tshogs bdag
135b5(rgyud): sna tshegs ye shes rab tu gnas// chu skyes spyan pa na yid tsam rgyas// dga' byed yid tsam g.yon du 'dud/ g.yas pa'i phyag gros rdo rje che// snying khar gsor lnga shin
135b6(rgyud): du brtson// de la sogs pa'i yon tan ldan// thog ma nyid du rnam par bzhag/ slob ma yang na gzhan yang rung // mtshan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan// tshul bzhin
135b7(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs bya ste/ dbus kyi dkyil du bzhag par bya// bdag nyid kyang ni mnyam bzhag ste// de la sogs pa yon tan gtso// dbus kyi bstan la 'dug pa na// bdag
135b8(rgyud): rab dwagos zhes su smra/ des ni slob ma byin brlabris te// thams cad las byed phun sum tshogs// rdo rje pad mo las byung ba'o// gsang ba yis kyang dbang bsku re ro// rab dge
136a1(rgyud): la sogs yon tan ldan// yid 'ong bu mo btsal bya ste// snying kha dpral ba mgrin spyi bor// lha la sogs pa'i 'bru bsgoms te// mtshan ma phyag
136a2(rgyud): rgya rab 'bar ba// rdo rje pad mo mnyam sbyor ba'i// rang la mkhyud pa'i phyag rgya yis// tshul bzhin thams cad bzhag par bya// mdun du lha mo mos byed ma// ma mchu
136a3(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i ro la dges// dkar dmar kha dog 'dres pa yis// thams cad rgyan dang yang dag ldan// lo ni bcu drug len pa'i mchog/ shes re bo can gyi mdun du bzhag/ 
136a4(rgyud): g.yas su lha mo gsad byed ma// mtshon cha'i mda' ni 'dren par ga brtson/ do shal rkang gdub rnam brgyan pa// lo grangs nyi shu lon pa ste// gser gyi ri bo zhu ba 'dra/ 
136a5(rgyud): chu skyes spyan ni yid tsam sgo// sems dpa' che la mnyes mdzad cing // 'di ni tshul bzhin bzhig par bya// rgyab du lha mo rmongs byed ma// pad mo dmar mo mdog gi 'od// 
136a6(rgyud): chu srin rgyal mtshan mdzes pa mo// sku che ched nyi shu gcig/ dga' byed 'dod pa'i ro la dges/ sna tshogs na bza' yang dag gsol// sna tshogs brgyan gyis yang dag
136a7(rgyud): klubs sna tshogs pad ma sbyor la sogs/ gar gyi bya ba rab blangs gzhug/ g.yon du sna tshogs chen mo ste// sna tshogs dgos pa rjes rlabs pa// sku tshe tshad
136a8(rgyud): ni bcu gnyis ldan// rnal 'byor sbyor la shin du brtson// lha dang lha ma ni mi yi rnams// 'bri ba thams cad myos mdzad ma// sna tshogs brgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ 
136b1(rgyud): sna tshogs dar gyis na bza' gsol// grwa rnams kyis ni thams cad du// gzugs sgra dri re reg rnams dang // bdug pa me tog gsung ldan pa// gzi brjid chen po'i 'od dang ldan// 
136b2(rgyud): ci rigs par ni bzhag par bya// sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rang gi las kyi phyag rgyar ldan// skal ldan dga' lnga rnam mos pa/ sgo srungs bzhi ni bzhag par bya/ 
136b3(rgyud): gzhan yang rnam pa sde tshogs rnams// pa waM gling bu brdab pa dang / rdza rnga rnga chen mu gu dang // mu ra rdza dang dar dang // gar dang dbyangs dang bzhed pa che// rol mo'i yi byangs
136b4(rgyud): tshogs rnams// dga' byed dkyil 'khor ba zhig par bya// phyi'i dkyil 'khor thams cad do// dkyil 'khor 'di'i phyi rol du// rdo rje nam mkha' 'gro ma bzhag/ yi dag so
136b5(rgyud): rgyal po yang dge bzhon// dpe'o 'jigs byed gdugs 'dzin to// skal ldan rang gi lag car ldan// gdug pa'i sems kyis sdigs byed cing // sh+ya khrag dang ni sgyu ma dang / 
136b6(rgyud): rkang dang tshil bu za byed pa// dkyil 'khor byas te gdug pa ni// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bzhag par bya// dga' byer byed dang 'dren par byed// gsod par byed dang spro bar
136b7(rgyud): byedardo rje mkha' 'gro tshogs kyi rnams/ shar gyi phyogs su bzhig par bya// gzi brjid tshe dang 'bar byed ma// 'jims byed bong bu'i lho ru skye// gtsug lag mthong
136b8(rgyud): ba'i rgyu yis ni// mkhas pas tshul bzhin bzhag par bya// tshogs pas chen po chags bral dang // 'khor lo mo dang rgyas 'debs ma// rab tu sbyor ba mchog byas te// ci
137a1(rgyud): nub du gzhag par bya// sna tshogs lus dang bsrung ba dang // gnod sbyin ma dang yang dag 'brog/ sngags dang phyag rgya byin brlabs te// sngags mkhan ci rigs
137a2(rgyud): byang du bzhag/ sharI gyi gr-i ru bzhag pa ni// bye rog gdong 'dra ning // 'jigs pa mig dang 'jigs pa'i gdong // ji ltar rjes su mthun byas te// yi dgas stan la
137a3(rgyud): yang dge 'dug/ sna tsheg sa mchog gis mchog 'dzin te// leg bar dri dang mkhar gzhong thogs// mchog tu sha dang khrag za'o// nub dang lho yi 'tshams gzhag pa// gzhag
137a4(rgyud): dang 'ug pa'i gdong rid ma// khros pa'i khyi dang phag gi gdong // gsus po che la lto 'phyang rnams// nub byang gi ni 'tshams dag tu// rnga mo bung bu'i gdong 'dzin pa// khra
137a5(rgyud): per dang byil ba'i gdong // rgyu ma'i mgo nas za byed rnams/ shaR+Sha dang byang gi 'tshams dag tu// keng rus dkar po 'dzin pa ste// khros pa rus pa'i phreng ba klubs// 
137a6(rgyud): 'phyangs po la bum pa 'dzin// phan tshun 'thab par btson pa yi// lce sbyang ga ni 'khor gyi rnams// 'jigs byed gdong na miche ba 'byin// rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs 'dzin pa'o// 
137a7(rgyud): sgo rnams kyi ni phyo gas kun du// sgo rnams su na bzhag bya ba// byang gi phyogs su 'bod 'grogs te// bum pa rna ni shar nyid du// nub tu rnam par 'jig pa'o// lhor ni gshin
137a8(rgyud): rje rgyal po bzhag/ de dang gzhan yang rgyal po'i mchog/ nam mkhar 'gro bas kun du bskor// bum pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// gser dang dngul las byas pa la// sna tsho gsad kyis yang
137b1(rgyud): dag ldan dkris/ me tog 'bras bu rnams kyis brgyan// bdud rtsi lnga yis gang byas pa// smon sna lnga dang yang dge ldan// rin chen lnga dang ldan byas pa// 'bru rnams lnga yis brgyan pa yi// bum pa/ 
137b2(rgyud): bcu drug bzhig bya ste// bcu gnyis brgyad dam yang na phyed// tha na chung ngu gcig tsum yang // ji ltar rim bzhin bzhag bya ba// dbus su bum pa ro yi mchog/ dam tshig chu yi sA gang byas pa// gse/ 
137b3(rgyud): ram dngul lam zangs kyang rung // lcags dang sa las byas pa dang // zla ba nyi ma dri chu dang // btung ba snam por ldan pa yi// dbang po kun las byung ba'i rnams// sha sdang gcig gis rab bslus
137b4(rgyud): ba kun las 'phags pa ro yi mchog/ tshogs kyi dbus su bsgrub bya ste// btung bra bzhin du myangs pa yis// rdo rje blo ldan ska lA par gnas// rnam pa sna tshogs nye ba'i zas// bza' ba dang na
137b5(rgyud): bca' bas mchod// mchod pa nye ba'i zas lnga dang // tshad med 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga// tshad med rnal 'byor ma tshogs la// skad cig skad cig mchod par bya// sngags mkhan tshul bzhin mnyam gzhag ste// 'byung
137b6(rgyud): po rnams la gtoT ma sbyin// lha rnams kyi na thams cad la// / rdo rje he ru ka'i phyag rgya yis// nyid kyi gtor ma byin brlabs te// spyan drangs gtsang ma byas pa dbul// gzugs kyi tshogs ni de rnams la// mnyas
137b7(rgyud): byas slar yang gshegs su gsol// rnal 'byor ma tshan dkyil 'khor du// slob ma'i mchog ni gzhug par bya// mtshungs par spyod par rab mdzes ma// sna tshogs gos kyi yang dag dkris// lag pa g.yo/ 
137b8(rgyud): gyis bzung bya ste// rab dgyes longs spyod phyag rgya yis// bcug nas sgo yi grwa nyid du// blo ldan dam tshig bsgrag par bya// 'di la bya ba cung zad med// thams cad bza' dang thams cad spyad// thabs dang / 
138a1(rgyud): shes rab sems nyid kyis// rtag tu dogs pa med byas te// 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan spyod// gzhan yang dam tshig nyams pa dang // skye bo gang dag dam la gnod// 
138a2(rgyud): btul zhugs can gyis de drangs te// khrag chen po na btung bar bya// gang dag slob dpon slod byed dang // gang dag dpa' rnams mi byed pa// de dag khros nas khrag chen po// blo ldan snying las
138a3(rgyud): btung bar bya// dkon mchog gsum lnga gnod byed pa// slob dpon la yang gnod byed pa// rdo rje khro bo bsdus pa yi// dam tshig bsgoms te bsgral bar bya// de nas dam tshig glung byas te/ 
138a4(rgyud): rje bdud rtsi ro yA mchog/ dung chen por ni bzhag byas pa// rdo rje bdud rtsi chu glud do// kye dmyalnga ba yin chu 'di ste// khyod kyi snying la kun du gnas// dam tshig bsrungs pas dngos grub ste// rdo rje
138a5(rgyud): bdud rtsi chu 'dis 'grub// oM badz+ra uda? ka ta thaM hUM tha// dam tshig la ni brgyar zlas pa/ byin gyis brlabs te 'thung du gzhug/ gzhan du dam tshig mi 'gyur te// dngos grub nyid du 'di
138a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro/  bdag ni dam tshig skal ldan zhes// slob ma sngags 'dzin brjod du bzhug/ sgo grar gnas nas dri bya ba// kye/ khyod ni dga' bre tsi le dang // 'jug pa yis kyang smra bya ba// bdag
138a7(rgyud): ni skal ldan pade chen la/ rab dges 'khrul la bdag dge'o// mchog tu dga' la dag dga'o// de nas rnal 'byor mi mchog go// dkyil 'khor du me tog der byas te// me tog gang
138a8(rgyud): la ltung ba so/ lha nyid du ni dngos grub bo// dbang bskur ba las phyag rgya yis// / de nas skye bor dbang bskur bya// bum pa rnam pa bzhi yis kyang // mnyam par bzhan/ 
138b1(rgyud): ste lnga pa yis//  brad mo'i dkyil 'khor bzhug byas ste// de na sa yang ni dbang bskur bya// ci rigs par ni gzungs ma'i rnams/ bdag ni bskal ldan zhes su smra// gang
138b2(rgyud): dag 'go bar 'gyur ba yi// lha de nyid ni bstan par bya// dga' bar byed pa'i gzungs ma 'dis// khyod kyis rtag tu sgrub par gyis// de nas rgyal dbang slob ma do/ nang gi
138b3(rgyud): sbas pa sdus pa yis// gsang bar mnyam par 'jug pa yi// sbyor dang ldan pas dbang bskur bya// rdo rje pad mo las drangs pa// sbom po dang ni dbang gis blang // rdo rje rkan
138b4(rgyud): du bzhag bya ste/ rA hA/ rtag pa dge ba bde ba che// kye ma dam tshig 'di brjod cing // kye ma'o bde ba myong bar bya// de ni gang zhes bya ba ste// dbang bskur ba'i thabs mchog go// rdo rje
138b5(rgyud): slob dpon bdag nyid che// rang gi khar ni rdo rje bzhag/ sems dpa' chen pos drang byas nas// sems kyis byang chub bde ba thob// 'di ni mchog tu bde ba ste// dpung bskur
138b6(rgyud): ba'i bde ba thog/ slob ma mi shes pa rnams la// 'di dag thams cad skrag mi bya// rdo rje slob dpon gyi bya ba/ yang nas yang du brtag par bya// 'di yi dbang ni bskur ma thag slob
138b7(rgyud): dpon tshegs kyi bdag por 'gyur// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa po// slob dpon nyid du bde bar 'gyur// gzungs ma rnams kyi dag pa'i bdag/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjer bshad/ 
138b8(rgyud): mkha' la 'gro ba'i khyer 'gyur te/ ra dang 'gro ba kun gyi bdag/ de nas shes rab ye shes dbang // slob ma'i mchog la sbyin par bya// gzungs ma de'i bdag nyid la// bla ma nyid
139a1(rgyud): zlum kyi byin brlabs te// dngos grub thams cad myur thob phyir// slob ma la ni sbyin par bya// / dbang bskur shin du smras pa yi// rdo rje slob dpon tshul ci
139a2(rgyud): bzhin// blo ldan the tsom med pa'i phyir// rnam pa bzhi pa 'di sbyin no// de tshun chad na slom ma la// rgyud kun las ni gang cung zad// yi ge'i tshul gyis smras pa'i rnams// gso
139a3(rgyud): ba mchog ni bstan par bya// de nas de nyid langs byas te// slob dpon rkang par gtugs byas nas// rgyal po dbang phyug bde dam pa// thams cad yon ni dbul bar bya// gzung
139a4(rgyud): ma de dag thams cad la// ci dag sa ni yan yang dbu'o// slob dpon cung zad gang 'dod pa// yid la bsam pa'i yon yang dbul// dam tshig ya 'dra' bas 'jig sa bo yi// 
139a5(rgyud): dag thams cad dbul bar bya// slob dpon la ni yon gyi mchog/ rigs kyi khyad par dbul byas te// seng ge'i gdan la nyid kyi ma// pra/ sangs rgyas phyir ni yon mchog yAn// glang
139a6(rgyud): rin chen gser dag dang // sring mo bla ma'i yon mchog ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs yin te/ yon de mchog gi go'i te// rin chen pad ma'i chung ma dang / shing rta rta ni shin du
139a7(rgyud): brgyan// sna tshogs rin chen rnam dag pas// me tog phreng ba shin du mdzes// nor bu rin chen 'dra ba yIs// rgyan te sna tshogros rdo rje la'o// rgyal po yi ni dbang phyug dang / 
139a8(rgyud): chung ma bla ma dbul bar bya// 'phrul gyis bzhon pa rnam sna tshogs// glang po rta ni shin du brgyan// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi rje/ nan tan bla ma dbul bar bya// bla ma yon gyi bya
139b1(rgyud): rgya 'di// rdo rje blo ldan slob ma yis// ci ste bde byed kun 'dod na// dga' dang mos pa'i sems kyis bya// de la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yis// dga' byed gdon mi za ba'i bde// gang gis
139b2(rgyud): myur du thob 'gyur te// slob dpon gtso mchog nyid du 'gyur// chos rnams kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal// rdo rje blo ldan nyid du 'gyur// rin chen kun gyi rigs kyi rgyal// de bzhin sna chog
139b3(rgyud): rigs can kun// pad mo'i rigs kun dpal dang ldani// rdo rje'i rigs kun bdag por de// sangs rgyas kyi ni rigs kun dang // rgyal ba'i gtso bo mchog tu 'gyur// dkyil 'khor gyi ni
139b4(rgyud): 'khor log re// nyid sleb pa'i tshogs gyur pas// rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba che// sems dpa' bdag nyid mchod par bya// phan tshun la sogs tshul gyis ni// shes rab mchod pa'i sbyor
139b5(rgyud): ba yis/ rdo rje che ba'i thabs gnas te// mkha' 'gro kun la mchod par bya// phyi yi sbas pa gsang la sogs// nang gi mchod pa mchog gi rnams// phyag rgya sbyor ba'i tshul gnas te// tshul bzhin rgyas
