139b6(rgyud): btab dbul bar bya// lus dang ngag sems bde byed kyi// mchod pa'i bdag nyid mchod par bya// 'dod pa'i rol pa'i ro myang ba'i// myangs ni mchod pa thob par 'gyur// mchod pa kun gyi cho ga
139b7(rgyud): yis/ rang rigs khyad par shes bya ste// sgrub pa thams cad sgrub byas na// dngos grub thams cad myur du thob// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'di mthong bas// dga' mgu rangs pa'i yid
139b8(rgyud): kyis ni// rdo rje sems la phyag byed cing // rang gi dkyil 'khor gsol ba 'debs// bde byed chen mo'i dkyil mo'o rgya// rigs kyi khyad par gi zhi lnga// lha rnams kyis ni re raM yang / 
140a1(rgyud): sems dpa' khyad par mchog mtha' yas// 'das pa'i dus na ma byung ba// mtha' yas chos ni yangs pa bstan// 'dod chags rnams kyis bkris pa yi// sdug bsngal
140a2(rgyud): gzir ba mtha' ya nas dgrol// 'dod pa mchog gi longs spyod rnams// myos pa'i rjes su zhugs shing spyad// kun du chags par mi 'gyur zhing // bde bas chags pa'i yid dang ldan// byang chub snying
140a3(rgyud): por grod pa ni// dam bcus rnams kyis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin du dgyes pa thams cad kyi bdag po// kun du bzang po chen po rab tu bzhad cing // spyan zur gris gzigs pa'i thugs shin du dgyes
140a4(rgyud): baHkun du longs spyod pa'i dkyil mo krung gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// dkyil mo dkrung chen po'i dpal zhes bya ba// rang gi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
140a5(rgyud): rdo rje lus phyung ngo // g.yas pa g.yon gyi tshul gyis no// rkang pa gnyis ka btag bya ste// bdag nyid brlan mi snang bar// rtsa ba'i dkyil mo bcing bar bya// sbyor ba ga ra mkhan tshul gyis na// gar gyi
140a6(rgyud): sbyor bas gar bya'o// rdo rje gdan gyi bdo ba che// de yis bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur// gdug pa dang ni dgra thams cad// skad cig gis kyang smos ci dgos// rab tu dgyes pa'i stan 'di yis/ 
140a7(rgyud): yang dag byang chub thob bur 'gyur// ma phyed par ni thig ler bcas// 'og phyogs su ni yi ge drug/ shes rab can gyis bskyed cing bzlas// 'byung ba'i tshe ni phaT ces bshad// pad mo mi phyed
140a8(rgyud): 'dren pa dang // thig ler bcas pa sbyor bor bya// mi phyed to dang yang dag ldan// tshig drag bcas pa bde 'byung na'o// bud med lan zhig bdun du// 'di yis brtson pa byas pa na// nam mkha' thams
140b1(rgyud): cad gang ba yi/ sangs rgyas rnal 'byor chen po mthong // rab dges longs spyod gnas pa yi// sems dpa' che la slong mdzad de// gzungs kyi pad mo las byu ba'i// bde byed mchog gis dbang
140b2(rgyud): bskur ro// de nas rab dga' bde thob pa// sems dpa' de ni dngos grub bo// thog ma dang ni tha med par// 'dod pa thams cad bde longs spyod// tshe dang dpal dang phun sum ldan// gdon da
140b3(rgyud): dug deng che ba'i nad// mkha' 'gros nye bar btses pa dang // sdig can 'khor ba las grol te// sa rnams kun las rnam par rgyu// gzi brjid nyi ma shor ba 'dra// sna tshogs 'dra ba 'bar byed pas// sna tshogs ca
140b4(rgyud): cad snang byed cing // de yis sems can thams cad kyi// nad dang mya ngan 'jig chen 'phrog/ phyag rgya 'di yi sbyor ba yis// ye shes lnga ni bsten par bya// rtsa ba'i dkyil mo zhes bya ba phyag rgya chen po las don
140b5(rgyud): thams cad grub par byed pa'o// bdag gri rkang pa dbus su bsdu// de yi rkang pa bcing bya ste// sems dpa'i dkyil mo bzhin du 'brel// 'di yis bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // khams gsum 'grub par
140b6(rgyud): bzhed pa yin// yi ge rnams ni snga ma bzhin// rang gi lha yi sbyor btson pas// bsgoms sam yang na bskyod kyang rung // sngags mkhan gyis ni dngos grub to// sngags kyi sems 'dzin gtsang ba yi/ 
140b7(rgyud): zhag bdun bsgom pa sgom byas nas// yang dag dngos po nyid du 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab te// sbyor ba shin du bsten byas nas// gdon mi zla ba rgyal po thob// yid bzhin dgos pa thams
140b8(rgyud): cad byed// rdo rje dkyil mo dkrungs gzungs ma bzung ste// bcing ba ni/ rin po che ltar sbyar bya ste// rong gi rkang pa mi snang bya// rin chen kun gyi dkyil mo dkrung // 'di ni rin chen thams cad kyi/ 
141a1(rgyud): @dbul zhing phongs pa 'dzem byed de// sdig pa thams cad 'phrog byed ma// gnod pa'i dug kun gcod par byed// gdug pa thams cad rmongs byed de// dgra rnams thams cad 'joms par byed// khro bo thams cad 'dzum
141a2(rgyud): byed de/  gdug pa rnams ni rgyas 'debs ma// mi g.yang zla ba gcig gis ni// 'di yos rgyal po dngos grub po// yid bzhin las rnams thams cad byed// ci ste bdag nyid rgyal po ru// mchog tu rmad 'byung sgrub 'dod na// ran chen seMs// 
141a3(rgyud): kyi rin chan mtshan// gsang ba'i phyag rgya tshul gnod pa// rgyal po khams gsum rgyal byed pa// zla phyed tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// rin po che yi dkyil mo dkrung // de bzhin rkang pa gnyis bzhag pa// pade me 'dra bar sbyar byas te
141a4(rgyud): bdag gam de bzhin gzhan yang rung // blo ldan pad mo bde sgrub bya// 'di yis sems can thams cad dang // mdor na sangs rgyas rnam dag dang // rdo rje nyi ma ma lus kyang // dbang du 'gyur ba gdon ma za// bde ldan po brang chen po yi// bde byed

141a7(rgyud): bla med dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sna tshogs dkyil ma'o// de nas mkha' 'gro'i dkyil me rgyas// thams cad khrag ni 'phrog byas te// gzugs ma yi ni rkang pa gnyis// nyid kyi gnya' bar rkang pa bdag/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro sbyor ba yis//

141b1(rgyud): can gyi lungs pa ste/ de ga da kyi / mas pa sus byed donam // ngas pa gtogs 'dod dang blo// dang can na chog 'phrog par byed// blug pa rnyeng pa'i rdus sbyi ni// mas gsu / 
141b2(rgyud): /  ni dzums ba da gyur / grob klu sa khyen mo par 'a /  sa bzhin du ma ldam pa// mi gam na cigs cings byas nas// dog pa'i smig rgyags lams med dang / gra dang pyod ces ma
141b3(rgyud): 'brog sras pa bzhin du mnyam gzhag s+ho// dkyil 'khor tshul gyis bskor bar bya// ma lus rnams kyang tshangs byed de// khams gsum rnams kyang rgal bar byed// gtogs 'dod kyin mnyam gzhag ste// sa gsum rnams ni rgyas
141b4(rgyud): btab bya/ gar dbang gi ni mnyam gzhag ste// sa gsum rnams ni gar byed gzhug/ dril bu ya na mnyam gzhag ste// sa gsum rnams ni gdab par bya// gzhon nu'i dkyil me bcings pa yis// sangs rgyas bde chen thob par byed// dkyil mo phyed mi
141b5(rgyud): mnyam gzhag ste// gnyis pa yin mnan par bya// khams gsum thams cad gnon 'gyur zhing // 'dod byed thams cad dngos grub po// dga' byed ma yi mnyam gzhag pas// dkyil mo rab tu dga' 'thob ste// dga' byed ma ya yid 'ong ma
141b6(rgyud): khams gsum thams cad dngos grub bo// rigs 'dzin rnam pa gzhag bya ste// khams gsum skra cig gnas par bya// dpal khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i// mdor sdus gzungs ma bcings pa yis// 'jig rten gsum ni rnam rgyal te/ 
141b7(rgyud): skra cig khams gsum bdag por 'gyur// rtag par phan tshun 'brel ba yis// dpung pa gnyis ni brkyang bya ste// thams cad sgron 'degs pa yis// mche ba sbom po rab tu byas// g.yas kyi brkyang bskum tshul gyis ni// gnod pa'i mnan pas
141b8(rgyud): / sdigs bya ste// mi phyed sbyor bas bsgral bya ba// khros pa'i sems kyis myang bar bya// g.yon gyi brkyang bskum sbyor ba yis// myur du gnas pas bteg bya zhing // mthe'u cung 'dod pa'i ljags sgyu yis// 'jug mo lce la rag byas te// sa bon tshig/ 
142a1(rgyud): drag hril ldan pa'i// thig le'i spyi bor brgyan byas pas// bdud rtsi 'am rig ma drang bar bya// lce ni thog mAr spro byas te// 'dren pa'i tshul gyis drang bar bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin mnyam gzhag ste// kha yi phyogasu mche ba yis// 
142a2(rgyud): sbom po lce dang 'ang byas te// khros pa che ba sbyor ba yis// sor mo thod pa bzhin byas nas// khrag meng po ni btung bar bya// yi ge dang pe o dang ldan// spyi bai raM thika lo ldan byas te// 'og gi phyog su ra yig bdag/ ur 'dren nga ros brgyan par bya/ 
142a3(rgyud): / 'di ni khro bo'i snying po sde// mchog tu thams cad las pa'o// gsod pa dang ni 'dren pa kun// dbang dang rnam par 'byed la sogs// de la sogs pa'i las gzhan yang // tshul bzhin sbyar bas dbye bar 'gyur// shi ba bzhin du mig btsums nas// rang
142a4(rgyud): gi lus ni bskum byas te// dum bu lnga mtha'i sbyor ba yis// sgra rnams thams cad bsad par bya// nga ro dang por yang dag ldan// bdag nyid ngo bo thams cad bya// sangs rgyas chen po sgom bya ste// zhi ba'i 'od zer sprin phung 'phro// de yi lus ni zhi bar
142a5(rgyud): 'gyur// 'di yos sems can thams cad ni// 'tshe ba'i gdon dang dug la sogs// sdug bsngal mkha' 'gro 'tshe ba dang // 'jigs pa thams cad bral bar byed// shes rab phra rol phyin mnyam gzhug/ bdag nyid kyis ni tshul bzhin du// 'di yis thas// 
142a6(rgyud): tsad nad kyis rnams// sdug bsngal ba ni 'breg par byed// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa// na mkha' sa stangs las kyi rnams// snying khar rdo rje sems dpa' bzhag/ yid bzhin thams cad byed pa 'grub// myur du rdo rje slob dpon la// sngags kyi
142a7(rgyud): dngos grub don 'dod pas// gus dang zhesar bcas pa yis// shin du lhag par phyogs par bya// nam yang rdo rje slob dpon gyi// sems ni bkrug par mi bya ste// ci skye shes rab 'chal bar byed// myur du na rag ltung bar 'gyur// nad dang 'tshe ba/ 
142a8(rgyud): dgra dag dang // gdon dang tsha bo'i ngag nyid kyis// slob dpon zhabs la smod byed pa// gti mug chen po de 'chi'o// bla ma las ni dngos grub thob// bla ma mtho ris bla ma bde// des na nan tan thams cad kyis// bla ma'i bka' las mi 'da'/ 
142b1(rgyud): byA de na gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag po rdzun po kun du bzang po chen go// pal shin du dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen po 'dzi rje sems dpa'i shin du dges pa chen po'i bdeg/ gdon ma/ 
142b2(rgyud): za bA'i rdo rje dam tshig dbang bskur ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i mchog tu gsang ba sbas pa chen po rdo rje rnal 'byor chen mo tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ste/ 
142b3(rgyud): bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i tshigs dang / rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro
142b4(rgyud): / ba dang / rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i g.yog gi tshogs rnams mchog gi dga' ba skyes te/ ca co 'byin cing dbyangs chen po bstod par 'gyur to// kye ma'i rdo rje sems dpa' yi// rdo rje shin du dgas pa chen// sna tshogs thabs ni bde byed che// sna
142b5(rgyud): tshogs ye shes bde ba che// kye ma'o kun du bzang po yi// dge ba'i ye shes bde ba tshe// gang bde'i phyir ni rig ma yi// pad mo la ni gnas par mdzod// kye ma'o rig mu shin du zag// shes rab pha rol phyin pa dag/ sems can kun la shes rab kyis// 
142b6(rgyud): mun pa thibs po sal bar mdzad// kye ma thams cad ngo mtshar che// mkha' 'gro'i dri thabs gar mdzad cing // rnam par mdzad dang myang ba dang // mnye ba dang ni 'phrog pa'i mchog/ kye ma'o shin du rab tu drags// skal ldan skal ba spyod pa dang // 
142b7(rgyud): sna tshogs skal bas bde byed che// sna tshogs rdo rje shin du mdzes// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen po shin du dgasu pa chen po kun du longs spyod pa'i 'dod pa'i lha shin du dreges pa'i bde ba chen po gnas pa la// rnal 'byor ma thas/ 
142b8(rgyud): cad dang / mchog gi pha rol du phyin ma la sogs pa/ rnal 'byor ma dbang chen mo thams cad rang gi gdon la bzhengs te/ shin du dgas pa bde bo chen po'i 'gying ba'i mdud pas phyag byas te/ shin du dgas pa chen po bde ba thob par byed pa dbyang/ 
143a1(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya chen po 'dis mnyes par mdzad// sgyu ma'i bde bas nam mkha' kun du gang ba yis// sprul pa'i rang bzhin mi skye mchog gi bde ston te// rje su chags pa'i pad ma dga' bas kun khyab cing // chos kyi bde ba nyid kyang
143a2(rgyud): kun btang btang snyoms mdzad// a ma'o lha yi gzungs ma bde mchog dpal dang rnam ldan ma// byams mas phyogs mi gtong ye shes nyid kyis 'jug/ 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan 'di dag chos nyid rnam par dag/ gsum pa dbang du
143a3(rgyud): mdzad cing mos pa rnams ma bskyod// ngo mtshar phyogs dang ma bral byang chub snying por bkod/ ho/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po chen pos 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i spyan rgyas pa la/ de dag thams cad la yud tsam yang
143a4(rgyud): tsam du gzigs te// rdo rje pad mo dang gnyisu med pa'i sbyor ba dpal chen mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ cang ma gsung bar mnyam par bzhugs te/ dbugs mi rngub dbugs mi 'byin/ dbugs rab tu gteng
143a5(rgyud): pabar mi mdzad/ kun du mi gzigs/ kun du rnam par mi gzigs/ bzhengs par mi mdzad/ gshegs par mi mdzad gsung bar mi mdzad bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das shin du dogs pa chen pas na mkha' dbyings thams cad du sha/ 
143a6(rgyud): du khyab par shin du dgas pa chen po'i bde ba las stsal te rgyas par mdzad pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad can drangs bcug/ bcings dbang du byed de 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan gyis mnyes par byas nas bzhags par gyur to// 
143a7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba mdzad nas/ yang dang yang du bcom ldan 'das la gzigs te/ bde ba chen po shin du dgas pa dang gnyisu med pa'i longs spyod pa'i dpal chen po zhes
143a8(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhags te/ bskul nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs khar zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems chen po la yang dag par thim par gyur pa na/ khams gsum 'dir dam pa'i chos ston pa dang / 'jug
143b1(rgyud): par byed pa dang / bstan pa la gnas par byed pa 'ga' yang medo// sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la 'jug par byed pa yang med/ khros pa gtum po dang rngam pa dang chen po dang / rab tu gdug pa chen por sems dpa' dang 'dod chag
143b2(rgyud): dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi mun pas bsgribs pa dang / gtum 'khrug chen po dang / gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa dang gzhon gyi sems 'phrog pa dang / gzhan gyi bud med kyi 'dzum pa dang / brdzun dang phra ma dang tshig rtsub po la sogs pa'i
143b3(rgyud): nyon mongs pa dang / de'i nyon mongs pas gzhan 'tsha ba dang / gcig gis sha cig za ba dang thabs med pa' lam la gnas pa rnams kyis/ kye ma'o 'jig rten gsum po 'di ni brlago zhes sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs la gnas pa'i
143b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gzig so// thabs dang shes rab kyi thugs rje'i smon lam chen po na mkha'i dbyings kun du 'jug pa'i yang dag par gnas pas/ 'di lta bur 'jig rten gyi khams brlag par gzigs nas/ de
143b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po// shin du dges pa chen po'i bad pa yang dag par zhugs pa kun du bzang po chen po// dpa li rdo rje sems dpa' la dbyangs kyi rgyal po chen po 'dis bskul ba mdzad do// ho rang bzhin dag pa'i pad ma bde
143b6(rgyud): ba'i mchog mnga' ba/ thugs rje yid bzhin rin chen gzhan la dgongs nas bzhengs mdzad de// bskal pa'i mtha' nas sgrub pa'i byams mas 'di 'i dang // byang chub snying po'i chu des 'gro ba rnams kyis rang bzhin khrus// a la la ho/ 
143b7(rgyud): pad mo'i 'byung gnas bde gshegs kun gyi skal ba mchog dang ldan// sdug bsngal kun sbal ba yi thugs rjes 'jig rten gsum la gzigs// dga' ba'i rol pas gar dang bcas bzhengs shing dbang du mdzod// a la la ho// sngon gyi
143b8(rgyud): / rgyal ba rnams kyis ma bsgrags gsang ba yi// 'gro ba kun gyis yid dang 'thad pa'i gsang chen 'dir phyung ste// rnam dag spyod yul gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs na mkha' la// dngos med rol mo gzhan las 'phags pa bzhengs shing man
144a1(rgyud): @du gsol// a la la ho// skad cig ma yi spyod yul 'dis// mun pa thams cad srel ba'i phyir// gzhan la thugs rjes dgongs nas// byin pa'i lha rnams slad du gsol// dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'di yis ni// dges mchog
144a2(rgyud): dam pa bskul byas na// pad mo'i 'dra ba rdo rje dang // bde bos sbyor bas bzhengasu gsol// bde ba chen po badra gnas pa// gtso la 'di yis bskul ba yis// sems can kun don bzhengs 'gyur te// rgyal ba thams cad 'don par
144a3(rgyud): mdzadadade nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po kun du bzang po dpal rdo rje 'dzin yang dag par ldan pa// bde ba chen pos brgyan pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te/ bzhengs nas phyogs bcu mtha'
144a4(rgyud): yas 'jam klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun du gzigs nas/ ngo mtshar du gyur te/ kye ma'o khams 'di ni stobaso// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po rnams dang bral bas gdug pa thams cad kyis/ 'di
144a5(rgyud): dag nye bar gtses/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dang / nad dang gnod pa chen po dang / nyon mongs pa dang de nye bar nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis kyang yang dag par zos shes dgongs pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen
144a6(rgyud): pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gtong ba'i rdo rje ye shes kyi bde ba chen po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes kyi bde ba chen po rang gi rdo rje dang pad mo las byang
144a7(rgyud): chub kyi sems nye bar bsdu bar bas te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ste// thog mar oM ni thig ler bcas pa yi// rdo rje sems dpar bcas pa 'brug gi sgra 'byin pa// ma phyed 'dren pa yang dag gnyis dang ldan pa
144a8(rgyud): ste 'di ni ston pa'i mchog ste rdo rje rigs nyid do// phyung nas na mkha'i dbyings thams cad du gang ba'i spro bas snang bar byas te/ slar yang 'dus nas rdo rje lta bur gnaso// yang spro ba dang bsdu ba byas nas slar yang 'dus pa la/ 
144b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sems dpa' lta bur gnas gyur nas/ sher gyi dkyil gyi dbusu bzhugs pa na/ hUM hUM hUM zhes bzhad pa chen por bzhad cing / a zhes brjod nas bzhugs te/ 
144b2(rgyud): rang gi sems dpa'i dkyil mos g.yon du 'gying bas 'dud pa/ g.yas kyi rdo rje gsor zhing 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i spyan rgyas pa'o che ba'i chen po dbu lnga pa/ phyag ni bcu drug rnams dang ldan// sna tshogs sku ni mtshig 'dzin
144b3(rgyud): gdapa' bo thams cad las byed pa'i// kha dog rnam lnga gzi brjid che// mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs 'dzin// rdo rje sgyu ma rab tu gnas// mkhas pa gang gis snying khe nyid// mnyam par gzhag nas 'dzin byas te// rdo rje pad mo bde tshe yi
144b4(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen thob// de nas bcom ldan 'das na mkha' 'gro ba kun du longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las mchog tu gsang ba da
144b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zla bzang thig le las/ nam mkha' shin du dgos pa thob par byed pa'i bde ba chen po zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di phyungango // oM ni gtsug tu thig le ste// mi phyed thig
144b6(rgyud): lar bcas pa yi// 'og tu gzi brjid yang dag bcas// mthar na tri ste tsheg drag bcas// 'di ni rlon chen thams cad kyi snying po mchog ste rmad byung ba'o// phyung ba yin na mkha' dang // sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing kun du// 'od zer sprin
144b7(rgyud): phung rgyas byas te// slar yang de nyid zhugs par gyur// de yi thugs khar zhugs nas kyang // lnga yi tshul du bzhugs par 'gyur// rgyal ba kun gyis dbang bskur nas// sems dpa'i tshul gyis sprul pa ni// kha dog rnam lnga yangs pa'i
144b8(rgyud): spyan chu skyes bzhad pa 'dzum dang bcas// nyi ma gzi brjid mdzes pa che// phyag rgya la sogs sna tshogs brgyan// dkyil mo gying ba g.yon du 'dud// g.yas kyi snying khar rin chen 'dzin// brgyad gnyis phyag rgyang ba yis// dri ma gsum
145a1(rgyud): / sbyangs brgyan pa ste// rang gi dkyil 'khor gang byas nas// sna tshogs lho ru gnas par 'gyur// rnam pa kun mkhyen mngon rig pa// nad kyis glongs pa 'jig par mdzad// 'dri ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// 
145a2(rgyud): gzi brjid chen po mdangs che ba// dbul dang nad dang gdon chen po// sems can kun gyi 'phrog par byed// nyi ma 'char ba'i dus nyid dang // nyi ma phyed pa'i dus nyid du// nyid kyi snying khar 'di byas te// nor bu rin chen bsgom
145a3(rgyud): byas na/ zhag bdun gyis ni nges par yang // dngos grub nor mang sbyin mdzad do// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yi// kye ma'o bde bas dbang bskur bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen po mchog tu bde ba chen po dpal
145a4(rgyud): rdo rje sems dra ba'i shin du dgos pa'i 'dod pa'i dbang gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ pad mo chen po kun du gzigs pa'i longs spyod pa'i dpal chen po zhes bya ba'i snying po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang / 
145a5(rgyud): thugs kyi ye shes mchog gsang ba/ zla bzang thig le las 'di phyung ngo // dang por oM dang ldan byas te// mi phyed ra sngags 'dren par bcas// tsheg drag pa ni sngags yin te// bsam pa thams cad yongasu skong // sngags mkhan
145a6(rgyud): gang zhig mnyam gzhag ste// snying khar 'di ni mnyam sbyar nas// bdag ni 'dod chags zhen sems shing // pad mo'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya// mtshan gyi mtha' ma'i dus dag tu// dam tshig 'di ni sgyid byas na// zla ba phyed kyi nang
145a7(rgyud): logasu dbang phyug mo yi dwangos grub 'thob// pad mo tshe las byung nas kyang // thams cad du na rgyas 'gyur te// 'di nyid du ni slar zhugs nas// bud mo'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur// kun du snang bas khyab byas nas// sems
145a8(rgyud): pa'i tshul gyis sprul pa ni// de nas 'dod chags bcas nas kyang // 'di nyid du ni slar zhugs te// pad mo'i dbu su bzhugs par gyur// dkyil 'khor du ni gang ba yis// rgyab nas rje su mnyis mdzad cing // 'dzum bcas
145b1(rgyud): pad me phye ba yis// thugs khwa'i dbus yid tsam 'dud// dpal dang ldan pa zhal lnga 'dzin// phyag ni nyi shur bzhis ma bltam// mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs ldan// sna tshogs rgyan gyis klubs pa yi// zla chen bzhin du rnam grol ba// 
145b2(rgyud): brjid pas gar ni mdzad cing bzhug so// 'di yis pad mo'i gnas nyid du// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// dpal ldan gar dbang thob 'gyur te// 'dod chags kun gyis thabs gnas pas// 'jam pa'i phyag ni stong rnams kyis/ 
145b3(rgyud): gar du mdzad cing 'gro ba 'dul// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin du dgas pa chen po'i bde ba kun du bzang pos yang sna tshogs chen pos kun du longs spyod pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
145b4(rgyud): prar zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i ye shes mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thog le las 'di phyung // sna tshogs chen po e chen po// steng du thig le yang dag ldan// de yi dbu su lte 'og khro// sngags kyi mchog ni
145b5(rgyud): bzhag par bya// sna tshogs 'di ni thugs khar grags// sna tshogs phyung nas kun snang bas// sangs rgyas tshul bzhin kun mnyes byas// de nyid slar 'khor rab zhugs te// sna tshogs rdo rje gzugs mchog gnas// skad cig sems
145b6(rgyud): dpa'i sku gnas pa// rnam pa sna tshogs bzhad par brgyan// 'gying bcas sna tshogs thugs khar 'dzin// sna tshogs gzi brjid 'bar ba stong // phyag ni brgyad gnyis gnyis kyi phyogs// mkha' byed sna tshogs mtshon cha gtong // 
145b7(rgyud): zhal lnga sna tshogs yangs che ba// bgegs spong thams cad dngos grub mdzad// dkyil 'khor gang bar mdzad nas byang du gnas// sna tshogs rdo rje'i bdag mor rdo rje yang dag kyis// thugs khar mdzad nas bde bar yang dag gnas
145b8(rgyud): sngags mkhan zhag bdun du ni bsgom byas na// sna tshogs gyur te sna tshogs bad la bab// sna tshogs las ni sna tshogs byed par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtshar du gyur te/ dbyang / 
146a1(rgyud): chen polan ci kyis khor chen po dgung kyis bcom ldan 'das la mnyes par mdzad do/ grwan btsun gyis bsgrub pa'i phyir// ye shes lnga yi ba dge/ rgyal ba nyid kyis bshang pa ma'o// sangs rgyas su
146a2(rgyud): na/ gas ga ng+ya r+b+ha'i lanas gabaca// sna mi nyid pa sa kyis/ dag gi de nyid tshogs so//  tshogs se shes no ga 'tshal/  jus kyi bdun meng dag ldas/ 'dod byed drugs kyi mchog yin no/ 
146a3(rgyud): rab pha rol byin sbyar ba// sbyor ba'i ye shes sngon phyug 'tshal// chos kyi don ni gnyis med tshul// stong pa nyid kyi lam rig pa// yangs pa'i spyan nos sor gzigs// me long ye shes yang dag 'byung // bye ba nan tan sems can do/ 
146a4(rgyud): rang gi yon ton mo mnyam shing // de nyid rig pas sems can kun// rdo rje gsum gyis byin byi rlabs pa// gang gis byin gyis brlabs ma thog// sangs rgyas gsum ni dbang du 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen
146a5(rgyud): po gnyisu med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'bru 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM b+h+rUM/ 
146a6(rgyud): stong pa chen po'i snying po// oM badz+ra tsat+ta hUM/ oM badz+ra ka ya hUM/ oM badz+ra waka aM/ oM badz+ra A b+hi shin tsa traM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ho// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad shin du mgu/ rab tu dgas pa'i yid kyis bcom ldan 'ad
146a7(rgyud): la phyag byas te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang rang gi snying po bcom ldan 'das la 'bul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
146a8(rgyud): dge 'ong bde ba chen po'i tshul gyis rab tu spro ba mdzad do// dge'o dga'o rgyal ba kun// dge'o dge'o rgyal ba'i mchog/ dge'o dga'o legs pa'i las// dge'o dga'i sngon 'gro ba// dge'o dga'o sna tshogs che// nyid kyi snying
146b1(rgyud): khor drangs bya ste// rang gi gsang ba bshad par mdzod// gang gis ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams// bde ba'i yid ni chung bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid kyis ye shes rdo rje chen po de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi
146b2(rgyud): snying po de nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sarA ta thAg ta ma hA shu n+ya ta dz+nyA na badz+ra sa b+ha wa id ma ko hi// dri nas bcom ldan 'das me long ga ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po sku dang
146b3(rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA a da ri sha dz+nyA na badz+ra sa b+he wa ad mu ko haM// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa so so kun du gzigs pa'i ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi
146b4(rgyud): snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM saR+Wa ta thA ga tA ma hA pra pe k+Sha na dz+nyA na badz+ra sa b+ha wa ad ma ko hUM// de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas
146b5(rgyud): rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM saR+Wa ta thA ga tA ma hA pra d+ya pra bi kA na dz+nyA na badz+ra sa b+hA wa ad ma ko haM// de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi
146b6(rgyud): snying po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sa man ta dz+nyA na badz+ra sa b+ha wa adra maM ko haM// de nas bcom ldan 'das bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / 
146b7(rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba ta thAg ta krid d+h+ya a nu sA na dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa adA ma ko ha~M// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen pos yang dag pa'i tshul sbyin par mdzad de// oM dge'i dge'o stong pa che// oM/ 
146b8(rgyud): dga'o dge'o thugs chen po// oM dge'o dge'o sku chen go// oM dge'i dga' gsung chen po// oM dge'o dga'o rin po che// oM dge'o dge'i sna tshogs che// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'du mdzad na/ 
147a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la rang gi dkyil 'khor bshad par gsol ba 'debs te// dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas rdo rje yi// dga' byed bcom ldan nyid kyis shod// gang gis sems can bde nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor rab tu thob
147a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor zhes bgyi ba// rgyal ba'i bdag pos gsang ba gsungs// gang gis dkyil 'khor myur bris nos// dkyil 'khor gyi ni rgyun du 'gyur// dkyil 'khor bde ba'i gzhi nyid ni// gsang ba'i dkyil
147a3(rgyud): 'khor zhes bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor brgyan pa'i bdag nyid de// gsang ba'i bcom ldan nyid kyis gsungs// dkyil 'khor mnyam pa'i ye shes ni// dkyil 'khor snying po zhes bgyi ba// dkyil 'khor gyi ni ci rigs par// gtso bo chen
147a4(rgyud): bo nyid kyis shod// dkyil 'khor mi mnyam ye shes ni// dkyil 'khor gsung ba'i pad me do// dkyil 'khor rab dgas thob byed pa// tshad med dkyil 'khor bshad par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po rab tu
147a5(rgyud): dga' ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i 'byung gnas zhes bgyi ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dram tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje
147a6(rgyud): las phyung ngo // gzugs dang lang 'tsho brgyan pa yi// bu mo mig yangs bzung bya ste// shes rab can gyis byin brlabs 'brus// mnyam par gzhag ste byin brlabs nas// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i bdag/ de bzhin gshen
147a7(rgyud): 'i btsun mo bzhag/ gnyis pa bdun du bzhag bya ba// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa'i gnas// rdo rje sems dpa'i btsun mo ste// thugs ni mnyes par byed pa yin// gsum pa lho ru bsam bye ba// dge ba sbyin pa'i bdag
147a8(rgyud): nyid bzhan/ rin chen 'byung ldan btsun mi ste// dbang bskur yon tan thob byed pa'o// bzhi pa tshul khrims chen mo ste// de nyid chos don yang dag gnas// rdo rje chos kyi btsun mo ste// de sbyin dga' byed ma yin no// 
147b1(rgyud): bzod pa chen mo byang du ste// gsod pa'i bdag nyid zad pa sbyin// btsun mo rje rje gdon mi za// dam tshig gnas ni skyon med ma'i// grwa drug tu ni thams cad du// sna ma bzhin du mchod la sogs// sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// 
147b2(rgyud): sgo srungs rnams ni rnam pa bzhi// ci 'dod par ni mchod bya ste// slob ma'i mchog ni gzhug par bya// phyag rgyas lag pa brgyan byas te// 'dzum dang bcas pa'i 'dod chags mig/ rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par klubs// spro ba che ba raM/ 
147b3(rgyud): gar byas zhing // lha yi 'gying bas 'dud pa yi// dga' byed dkyil 'khor gzhug par bya// mig ni drar gyi gos nyid kyis// g.yogs te lag pas bzung nas kyang // sgo yi grar yang bzhag bya ste// smon lam mchog ni sgra ru gzhug/ 
147b4(rgyud): rdo rje tshon mo bdag ces bgyi// rang gi lha rnams phyag bgyi ste// rab dgas gnas las byung ba yi// bde byed chen po mnyes par bgyi// ji lta bzhin du mnyam nyid 'thob// me tog phreng ba dor byas te// lha mo chen mos bzhes gsol// khyod kyi
147b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bdag 'tshalo// lha mo gang la ldang ba yi// de yi lag nas bskor ba bya// lha mo 'di ni khyod dang 'thun// sems che khyod kyis 'dod par gyis// de nas slob ma de yis ni// bdag ni rab dgas smra bya zhing // de la 'dod pa sprod pa
147b6(rgyud): mdzod khro bo rnams kyis mi byed phaT// mthu ra ni ho zhes sbyar bar bya// 'byung ba'i dusu bya ba ni/ a ho su ka bdi zhes sgra// de nas rdo rje byung ba yi// mkhas pas de ni blang byas nas// bde pa chen po dngos grub rdzas// blo ma la ni dang
147b7(rgyud): bor dbul// de nas de nyid kun la yang // ci bde bar ni dbul bar bya// spyi bo zhabs li gtugs byas te// bla ma la ni dbang blang bya// shin du sbas pa 'phags pa'i dbang // bcom ldan bdag la stsol bar mdzod// de nas sbyor ba chen
147b8(rgyud): bo yi snyoms par zhugs te de'i bde ba// slob dpon rdo rje phyung byas te// spyi bor rab tu bzhag par bya// lag pa yis ni ma reg par// kha la rab tu sbyin par bya// khyad par du ni drangs byas te// ci bde bar ni btung bar bya// gzung // 
148a1(rgyud): tum de dag thams cad la// rdo rje yis ni sbyin par bya// de nas skyob ma mchog nyid kyis// tha ma la ni dbul byu ga// ma dang sring mo bu mo dang // chung ma dang ni rang gi gu// bdag nyid dang ni rgyal srid dang // de bzhin
148a2(rgyud): longs spyod dbang phyug dang // rdzas dang nor dang gter rnams dang // glang po rta dang shing rta sngogs// bla ma la ni yon mchog ste// dga' ba'i yid 'gyur dbul bar bya// phyi yi sas pa gsang ba dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thas
148a3(rgyud): cad dang / rdo rje dang ni gzungs ma'i rnams// 'dod pa'i dngos grub bri bar bya// snying po yang dag shes 'gyur nas// dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// gsangadra ba yi ni dkyil 'khor 'di// 
148a4(rgyud): ji ste rmongs pas smras byas na// slob dpon dka' ni dam tshig nyams// myur du zla ba phyed tshun chad// bstan pas rnam par 'jig par byed// dang por dam tshig bzhag bya ste// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan par bya// 
148a5(rgyud): gzhan du byas na dbang po rnams// dmyal bar bskal pa grangs med sbyin// de bas blo ldan rdo rje yis// nan tan dam tshig bsgrags ma bya// gzhan du byas na sngags mkhan gyis// sngags la sogs pa'i don mi 'grub// lha rnas
148a6(rgyud): kyi ni dam tshig gi/ gsal yang bzhisu mi gnang ste// 'jig rten 'dir yang sdug bsngal che// 'jig rten pha rol dmyal ba rnams// dam tshig spyod pa 'das pa'o// rmongs pa'i bdag nyid des 'thob go// slob ma de yang de bzhi
148a7(rgyud): du blo zhan sdug bsngal thob 'gyur te// des na sngags kyi don mi smin// lha rnams kyis ni mchog tu bde// dam tshig med pa'i slob ma la// nam kyang sbyin par mi 'gyur ro// de bas dam tshig gtso yin te// thog mar dam
148a8(rgyud): tshig sbyin par bya// sngags rnams dang ni phyag rgya yang // de bzhin thabs dang shes rab rnams// dam tshig de rnams thams cad kyang // sngags pa gsang ba sbyor ba yis// dmyal ba ngan song zlog pa'i phyir// bu dang
148b1(rgyud): slob ma sbyin par bya// sngags kyi bsod nams dngos grub byed// gtsang sbra dogs pa med par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dam// dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin bri bya ste// gzhon nu tshad ni bcu drug ljon// dam tshig/ 
148b2(rgyud): slob ma dkyil 'khor du// bzhag nas cho ga 'dis gzhug bya// dam tshig rnams na 'di yin te/ sbrang rtsi sha dang dri chen po// zla ba nyi ma dri chu dang // rdo rje las byung chu bsgrubs rnams// dkyil 'khor lo sogs tshul bzhin bzhag/ dam
148b3(rgyud): tshig yi ge bzhag pa yisaM// myur du dam tshig bsgrubs byas nas// dga' byed dam tshig dngos grub ste// dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur// dam tshig 'di ni sna tshogs te// 'dzin pa ya ni mthu ru 'gyur// mA 'ongs sa
148b4(rgyud): rgyas chen po dang // rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po cher// blo ldan dbang bskur blangs pa yis// dbang bskur phun sum tshogs pa kun// sangs rgyas kun gyi thob 'gyur te// dbang bskur ba yi yid du 'gyur// de bzhin gsheg
148b5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje ye shes chen po zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor ste// lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog tu bde ba chen po'i yid bde bar
148b6(rgyud): gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'dibasdu so// gdug pa thams cad rnam 'dul ba// 'jigs par byed pa chen po 'di// rdo rje khro bo chen po 'i dkyil 'khor chen po rnam bshad phyir// 'jigs byed chen po rnam 'dul/ 
148b7(rgyud): ba dkyil 'khor rdo rje thams cad kyi// khro bo dam tshig ded dpon gyis// gsang ba chen po nyid kyis shod// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dren pa'i khro bo'i
148b8(rgyud): dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes las 'di phyung ngo // oM badz+ra ma hA tsan da saR+Wa du stan ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT// 'di phyung ma thag tu stong gsum gyi
149a1(rgyud): kaspong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad khro bo chen po'i mthus rnam pa drug tu g.yos// kun du g.yos lha dang klu dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang
149a2(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / sran po rnams thams cad 'khrugs pa chen por gyur to// de nas 'jigs pa chen pas nyan nas de dag brgya byin thad du lhags nas/ brgya byin bdag nyid kyang skyabs med par mthong nas tshangs po'i thad du
149a3(rgyud): byiphyin tshangs pa yang gtogs 'dod kyi gan du phyin// gtogs 'dod kyang dbang phyug chen po'i gan du phyin te// de nas dbang phyug chen po bdag nyid kyi mthus 'jigs byed chen po'i gzugs byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khrims 'di
149a4(rgyud): dog thams cad rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus kun du snang bar byas te/ lha rnams mA 'jigs shig/ klu rnams ma 'dzegs shig/ gnod sbyin rnams ma 'jigs shig/ lA ma yin rnams mAM 'dzegs shig/ dri za rnams ma 'jig
149a5(rgyud): shig/ lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa rnams ma 'jigs shig/ nga'i rdzu 'phrul gyi khyad par 'di lta bus gzhan 'gas kyang rab tu rdzi nus sam/ khyed rnams ci dgar spyod pas gnos shig ces dbugs phyu // de nas bcom
149a6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzi brjid chen po'o dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i khro gnyer chen po zhes bya ba/ khro ba
149a7(rgyud): chen po'i snying po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes las phyung // oM badz+ra b+h+r-i ku tA ma ha kro d+ha/ ha na ha na gr-i na grI na/ ma ra ma ra/ b+han tsa b+hAn tsa/ dra ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM/ b+hI b+h+r-i b+h+ra ma ya/ b+h+r-i ku tA na/ saR+Wa ma rAna?/ saR+YA du/ 
149a8(rgyud): shAn ma ta ma ta/ me ti ma te/ hu b+h+rU~M hU~M tr-itra nA da Tad/ b+h+r-i hU~M traM/ ta ta// 'od brjod ma thag tu de dag snga ma bzhin du skrag nas dbang phyug chen po'i thad du nye bar lhag so// de nas dbang phyug snga ma bzhin du bdag gi che banye bdi
149b1(rgyud): ston cing gtogs 'drod la smras pa/ khyod kyang mthu che ba'i chen po ste/ gdug pa thams cad kyi tshogs kyi bdag po yin na/ rang gi mthu chen po'i rdzu 'phrul nye bar ston la/ gdug pa de rnams dbugs byung bar mdzod cig
149b2(rgyud): de nas gtogs 'dod de ma thag tu rang gi mthu 'jigs byed kyi gzugs 'khor lo nug po chen por bsgyur nas/ rdo rje'i skad drag po chen po'i dag pe 'byin pas/ 'jig rten thams cad la nye bar ston cing gnas par gyur
149b3(rgyud): te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po yang / khro bo chen po pad mo 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms pa zhugs ma thag tu pad mo'i dra ba 'char ba'i khro bo thams cad slar log ste
149b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs khar zhug so// zhugs nas khro bo chen po'i snying por bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i thug kha nas phyung ngo // oM pad ma dza la~M ma hA kro d+haM/ b+ha
149b5(rgyud): d+ha ba mu khu kha bi saR+Wa du sh+tsa ne/ khaM hi khA hiM saR+YA du sh+tsa/ pra du shwA na ma/ da ma da mAHbadz+ra dang sh+tsA ka taM/ ma tA ma ta k+Sho da kro da/ badz+ra khe ru/ tsa pa la dur kha be ga/ tra sa tra sa/ ma hA badz+ra ba da ba mu/ pra ma ta ma tha/ hUM phaT hi ha ha ha ha/ hiM hi tsa dur
149b6(rgyud): mu khaM bi sha pra na sha na hU~M hriM hU~M hU hi ha// de nas 'di gsungs mi thag tu tshangs ris chen po 'dir bdapad de/ kha sbub du 'gyel te brdeg 'chos so// de nas chings pa ngo mtsher du gyur te/ dbang phyug chen po la dris pa/ lha 'di ni shin du
149b7(rgyud): de mtshar du snang ngo // de nas dab phyag chen pos tshangs pa la bskul ba/ khyod ni sems can kun gyi gtso bo lha'i tshigs thams cad kyi bdag po khyod na 'jig rten gsum na gtong ba dang byed pa'o// rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa de'i phyir
149b8(rgyud): khyod kyis gdug pa'i sems can dang / gdug pa'i lus can brlag par gyis shig/ de nas tshangs pa nyid kyi mthu tshangs pa chen po'i srin po'i gzugasu mngon par sprul nas/ 'jig byed chen po lta bu gdong bzhi gam+b+ha lce stong
150a1(rgyud): @gis gzi brjid can gyi lus mgul bu dang bcas pa/ dgad pa chen po 'byin pas lha'i tshogs kyi gdug pa thams cad la nye bar ston cing gnas// dri nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen po yang / lha thas
150a2(rgyud): cad rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba khro bo chen po'i ting 'dzin la yang dag par snyoms por zhugs te/ rdo rje chen po'i 'jig byed ces bya ba'i khro bo chen po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes kyi thugs kha nas
150a3(rgyud): byung ngo/ oM badz+ra be ra ba ma hA kro d+ha saR+Wa du stan/ sa ma pa kA ye hUM hUM phaT phaT/ badz+ra yakA ha na haM na hUM phaT// de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu brgya byin gyi khang pa 'di thams cad dum bu brgyar rnam par zhig ste/ ri rab kyi rtse mo yang cher
150a4(rgyud): 'gul zhing kun du 'khor nas gnas par gyur/ brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa yang kha sbub tu 'gyel te brgyal bar gyur to// de nas langs nas dbang phyug chen po la bltas pa dang / dbang phyug chen pos yang bskul ba/ 
150a5(rgyud): khyod ni lha'i tshogs thams cad kyi bdag po ste/ mthu che ba yin la/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad kyang khyod la mnyes par byed pa yin na/ da ltar bdag nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu nye bar ston cog/ de nas
150a6(rgyud): lha'i dbang po brgya byin de rang nyid kyi mtha gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gzugs nye bar ston cing / gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad la gdug pa dag ma 'jigs shig/ nga'i rdzu 'phral 'di lta bu mthong na// sus kyang zil gnon mi naso// 
150a7(rgyud): zhes dbugs 'byin par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen po yang sngags kyi lha thams cad 'dren pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ lha de dag thams cad nyid kyi sku dang gsung dring
150a8(rgyud): thugs rdo rje'i yo shes la zhugs par mdzad de/ bcug nas kyang khro bo chen po thams cad phyag rgya chen por mngon par sprul nas de dag nyid kyang khro bo thams cad 'byin pa'i khro bo chen po'i gzugs dmigs te/ mche ba chen
150b1(rgyud): po 'khyil ba'i zhal ma sdug pa spyan stong pa/ nyi ma chen po'i stong ga gzi brjid can rab tu mi bzad par byed pa'i me rlung gis bdas pa'i mdog sngon po'i sku/ dur khrod chen po'i dpal can gyi phyag rgya/ mi'i keng rus dang / khrag dang
150b2(rgyud): sha dang / klad pa dang / rkang dang / tshol rnams zasu gsol ga mI'i lpags pas rnam par g.yogs te/ bsdams pa/ mo'i mgo'i 'phreng bas dbul 'dzin pa/ seng ge dang / glang po che dang / bung buM dang rnga mo dang ma hai dang / phag dang / 
150b3(rgyud): lce sbyang dang / rwa dang khyi dang 'ug pa dang / bya rog dang gzhad dang / byi la dang / gzig dang / stag la sogs pa khro bo// byol song gi brgya stong mang po rang gi ba spu'i bu ga nas phyung ste/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis shar phyogs na 'jig
150b4(rgyud): byed chen po/ trai la gau rnam par bste rko ba'i 'jigs pa lta bu'i spyan dang zhal rdo rje mche ba chen po 'jigs pa/ 'jigs par byed pa'i khro bo chen po brgya stong gi g.yog dang / shar phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'khyil bar gyur te
150b5(rgyud): gnas so// lho'i dkyil 'a khor du yang rdo rje khro gnyer can gyi khro bo brgya stong mang po g.yog dang 'khyil bar gyur te gnas so// nub kyi dkyil 'khor du yang pad mo chen po rta gdong khro bo brgya stong mang po'i g.yog dang 'khyil bar
150b6(rgyud): gyur te gnas so// byang gi dkyil 'khor du yang rdo rje 'ur 'ur chen po'i khro bo brgya stod mang po g.yog dang 'khyal bar gyur te gnas so// bcom ldan 'das shin du dges pa khro bo chen po'i tshogs brgya stong mang po'i bskor nas
150b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi dbus bzhugs te/ khro bo tshun pa'i tshogs de dag dang shin du dgas pa'i ba ba chen pos kun du spyad cing / khro bo chen po'i rnam pa brgya stong mang po'o ri rab kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa de nyid byung nas/ nam
150b8(rgyud): mkha'i dbyings thams cad du gang bar gyur te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang gang bar byaso// de nas gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis de dag mthong nas 'jigs skrag skyab
151a1(rgyud): ma mthong nas/ rang rang gi bdag po'i thang du song ste/ rje gcig rje bdag cag la skyabs cig/ de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i bdag po de dag bdag nyid kyi mthus sprul nas/ ma 'jigs ma ma
151a2(rgyud): 'jigs shig ces dbugs 'byin par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin du dgas pa khro bo chen pos khro bo'i tshigs kun laM bka' stsal ba// na mo rod na tra ya ya/ ma hA tsAn+tiM badz+ra pa na ye/ ma hA yag kA swe na
151a3(rgyud): pa ta ye tad+ya thA oM bA bA ma hA b+ha baM/ da ra pI ma hA rIHha ra ha rA grIn+ta g+ha nA/ mA rA mA rA/ bAn dzA bA na dzaHshi g+hA na ma ha/ badz+ra tsan ta saR+YA dwe stan ta/ ka hA na da ha pa tsa ma tha ma tha hUM phaT// 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jigs byed chen
151a4(rgyud): po 'dul bar byed pas/ rnyong gi na mkha'i dbyings kyi tshad du bskyed do// khro bo brgya stong mang po rnam par bskor ba'i zhal mche ba gtsigs shing 'khyil te bsgyur ba/ phyag stong mang po la mtshon che sna tshogs bsnams pa/ zhal
151a5(rgyud): sna tshogs brgya stong pa ma lce bzhin du rab tu 'bar ba'i sku brgya stong rnams 'jigs byed chen po gang na ba dar song ste/ rdo rje drag po'i gad mo tshor 'byin pas bzhad cing mdun du gnas so// oM ma hA badz+ra he ru ka ad ta/ 
151a6(rgyud): ha sa hA sa ra hA hA hA hA/ hUM ho i ti// de nas dbang phyug chen pos rdo rje drag po'i bzhad pa de thos na/ g.yog dang bcas pa kha sbub 'gyel bar gyur/ de nas yang slar spangs te/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad yongs su
151a7(rgyud): skor du bcug nas/ 'jigs byed 'dug pa nga le skyabs song zhes bsgo yang skyabs 'gro ba mi len cing // slar yang rang gi rgyud kyi nga rgyal bskyed de// 'jigs byed chen po brgyad pa zhes bya ba phyung nas// ri rab tsam
151a8(rgyud): gyi bdag nyid chen po nye bar ston cing // dgad pa tshon po'i nga ro 'byin par byed do// oM ma hA be ra ba bA/ shIng shIng / Ta TA Ta ta Ta ta ha ha/ a ti// 'on kyang ba spu'i rtse mo cung zad tsam yang ma 'gul lo// de nas yang / 
151b1(rgyud): 'jigs byed chen po 'dul bar byed pa'i khro ba des/ he ru ka'i nga ro 'byin cing mgo bor mnan nas bsnun te/ rdo rje he ru ka'i bdag nyid kyi mthu chen pos 'jigs byed chen po'i nga ro 'byin cing / sgyu ma'i sbubs drangs nas
151b2(rgyud): khrag dang rus pa rkang rnams za zhing / chem chem mdzad pas de'i 'khor la rab tu ston par mdzad de/ u ma dang 'ga' yang rnam par bcom betsem mo// ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang sgren mor bya ste smra phe bA nas/ khreng
151b3(rgyud): bdag nyid kyi mthu chen po nyo bar sbrel zhing / 'khor thams cad kyang btul/ skyabs lan du yang bcug/ dam tshig la yang gnas par bya ste yang dag par zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin du dgas
151b4(rgyud): pa chen po khro bo'i chen po'i drag po'i bzhad pas bzhad cing / rdo rje khro gnyer khro bo chen po'i mgo la zhabs kyis bsnun te gtong bar mdzod do// oM badz+ra b+h+r-i kuM ti ha na ha na gri na gri na/ hUM ma ta ma ta/ kin tsa ra ya sa swa
151b5(rgyud): r+ye swA hA/ sra ha ti re ka ba su ra/ dza la lar rtsiHpra dza li taM/ ma ha mur ti/ a kaN+ya a kaN+ya/ a big tsakra ba ra ba d+hid ya na hUM b+hI// de nas rdo rje khro gnyer chen po'i bzhad pas bzhad cing / 'gro ba thams cad la khyab pa'i
151b6(rgyud): gzugasu mngon par sprul nas 'khor lo can gyi mdun ston to// de nas 'khor lo can gyi 'khor 'jigs pa chen pos nyen te/ kha sbub tu bsgral nas rab tu brgyal zhing rje gcig bdag cag skyobs shig ces smras
151b7(rgyud): zhing / bskyabs med par bdag nyid kyis mthong nas/ 'khor lo can la skyabasu song ngo // de nas byi sgrub kyang nyid kyi mthu mang po raM rab tsam du nye bar ston cing shin du dgas pa chen po'i mdun du gnas te rgya bra la
151b8(rgyud): zhugs so// kA kA'i gdug pa nya ba'i khro gnyer gyi snying bral te/ ji srid ma 'thungs kyi bar du/ de srid rang gi gnasu song shig/ de nas rdo rje khro gnyer chen po da rab tu 'khrugs gtum por gyur nas/ de drangs te/ 
152a1(rgyud): btabs nas snying bral te/ de'i khrag la nyi ma khro gnyer chen po'i gnod sbyin chen po'i gdon gyi bdag nyid yang dag par tshimu par mdzad do// oM badz+ra sur+ya b+h+ri ku ti/ kro ta ma hA gra ha ta ra pA ta ra gA/ s+ya
152a2(rgyud): d+hir mangs/ me dmad dzi na/ oM b+ha b+ha b+hI b+hA b+hA// de nas 'khor lo can de sems rab tu brlab par gyur te gnas so// de'i chung ma rug mi ni dang ma ha shri dang / lag smi dang g.yog dang bcas pa rnam par bcom ste/ 
152a3(rgyud): tshogs rnams rnam par brtul nas bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rta gdong chen po khro ba chen po'i rgyab tu gcig bsnun nas gtong bar mdzad do// oM badz+ra pa d+ha ba mu kha/ kha ga khA hi khA hi tsa dur
152a4(rgyud): ma kham phyi ba phyi ba/ a s+ya ruM d+hi ra ma e kad d+ya/ a kada? rta/ r+thi da yan tA na di hi/ badz+ra ba tA/ ba mu kha'i/ hi sha ha sha ma hA she she sha ra hi hi// de nas rdo rje gdong chen po rta dgad chen po mdzad cing tshangs pa'i mdun du gnas
152a5(rgyud): par gyur to// de nas tshangs po chen po'i 'khor kha sbub tu 'gyel nas/ rdza gcig skyobs shig ces smraso// de nas tshangs pa de tshangs pa'i srin po'i bdag nyid kyis na mkha' bkang nas brgyal bar byed do// ko ke'o gdug pa'i
152a6(rgyud): gdong myur du song song khyod kyi brgyab tu zhon te ma btul ro zhes smras so// de nas rdo rje rta gadrong chen po rab tu 'khrugs te gtum por gyur nas tshangs pa chen po de'i mgo bor brdzis te/ snying bral nas khrag 'thung ba la zhugs te/ 
152a7(rgyud): sha dang rus bai dung / tshil bu dang / rus pa rnams myangs nas phyogs bcur gtor ro// de'i chung ma shri dang / sa ra swa tI dang shr-in t+yA rnam kyang rnam par bcom/ de'i 'khor rnams kyang dam tshig gi sdom pa la gnas par bya ste
152a8(rgyud): bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin du dges po chen po khro bos khros pa dang / bcas pas lnga bas gzigs te// oM gu lu gu lu badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha/ a kar sha ya a kar sha ya sha kr-i hi da ya ma/ hU~M brag kwi ba shas
152b1(rgyud): krib de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin chen po'i sku chen pos na mkha'i ngos su kun gang ste/ brgya byin gyi mdun du gnas par gyur to// de nas brgya byin 'gying ba chen pos 'gying ste/ mi bzad par khros pa/ gnod sbyin chen po khyod su'i
152b2(rgyud): bran yin zhes de la smras so// de nas yang rdo rje gnod sbyin chen po khris/ 'khrugs rngam par gyur te/ snying nas gtsug gi nor bu phyung / snying yang bral te de'i khrag dang sha dang / klad pa dang tshal bu dang / rus po'i bza' rnams ze ba
152b3(rgyud): la zhugs so// de nas yang de'i 'khor rnams 'jigs shing stangs pa'i yid du gyur te/ skyabasu nye bar song ngo // de'i lha mo'i tshogs kyang rnam par bcom nas/ de'i gnas na gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
152b4(rgyud): rdo rje dogs pa chen pos rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams dang / rol cing rang gi shin du longs spyod khro bo chen po'i dkyil 'khor chen po na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dul ba
152b5(rgyud): mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskul ba mdzad do// o ma su ra Ta/ badz+ra ma ha kr-i da pa sang ha ra pa sang ha ra/ saR+Ya kro d+ha ma shra ma sha ma/ pra sha ma pra sha ma/ swaR+Wa kre dwe/ u ba kro d+ha swa sa ma ya ma ha ma d+hA la/ s+thA pa ya s+thA pra ya/ 
152b6(rgyud): saR+Wa du shA pra dush+ma kro d+ham/ bi tsa ya bi tsi ya sha kra/ b+ha ma b+hi ts+tsha rA/ maM ho bra ga bAn/ su ra Te/ so'u khyA kro d+ha/ saR+Wa ta thA ga ta/ sad t+ye na sa ya ya na tsa ho sa ra Ta sa ma ye a Ti// dwe nas bcom ldan 'das rde rje shin du dges pa chen po
152b7(rgyud): khro bo chen posaM/ khro bo thams cad 'dren pa dang gzhug pa dang / bcings pa dang / dbang du bya ba'i phyir nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM dz+nyo hU~M ba ho/ ta ki hUM dz+nyA/ tA ki hU~M tag kr-i hU~M dzA/ a ka raM sha ya pra b+he sha/ 
152b8(rgyud): ya b+han d+ha ya ba shing ku ru/ saR+Wa kro d+ha sa ma ya ma dzAM hUM ba~M ho tag ga hUM dza dza hU~M// de nas khro bo chen po'i tshogs de dag thams cad 'ongs nas/ rang gi 'khor chen po 'khor lor 'khyil bar gyur te/ kye bcom ldan 'das/ 
153a1(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal du gsol/ zhes smra zhing gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo thams cad kyi bka'i 'khor lo'i rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 
153a2(rgyud): bo thams cad kyi bka'i 'khor lo'o khro bo chen po phyung ngo // oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha na hU~M phaT// de nas de dag la khyod kyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gdug pa'i sems can rnams bsos shig ces bka' stsal te/ de dag
153a3(rgyud): gis bcom ldan 'das la nyid kyis rab tu gdug pa'i sems can rnams gas par gsol zhes nas/ de dag cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin du dge ba'i khro bo phyag
153a4(rgyud): bsnol te/ btsi rA nas rdo rje bdud rtsi'i khro mi dbang mo chen mo phyung ngo // oM badz+ra a mri ta ma ha kro d+he sha ri/ ud shr-i dza ud shri dzaM/ badz+ra a mr-i te hUM a// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje bdud rtsi chen mo kun du khro so te/ 
153a5(rgyud): smin ma bsgyur ba'i gzugs pa'i zhal bzhad pa pa ru lu ru lu zhes bya ba 'byin cing / rang gi pade ma la bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje bcug nas/ bdud rtsi yang dag par bsgrub pa'i rig ma 'ang phyung ngo // oM a mr-i ta san tsa ba
153a6(rgyud): na mi ha a mri ti su mu khe pra be sha pra be sha/ sa ban badz+ra pe daM maM sang yo gau ri ma ha bo daM tsi ta mur te a// de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gdug pa de dag thams cad snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid kyi lus sor chud par
153a7(rgyud): gyur te sems dran nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo 'khor lo thams cad mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das shin du dregs pa khro ba la skyabs dong nas/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du/ khro
153a8(rgyud): bye'i 'khor lo rnams gnas par gyur to// de nas de dag rab tu mgu ba'i yid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa byed de/ khyod ni sems can kun gyi yab// phan byed de bzhin yum yin te// gtso bo 'dus pa
153b1(rgyud): bdag cag rnams// 'jigs pa che las skyob pa ste// rje bo sdug bsngal thams cad sel// khyod ni 'gro ba'i dbang po rdo// khams gsum 'di ni byed dang gtong // che ba che khyod skye bo skyong // thog ma med khyod nga ro steng // nga ro'i
153b2(rgyud): steng na cha yang med// gtso bo yid med bdud rtsi yi// rab dgas bde ba gtong ba yis// 'khor la phan par mdzad pa'i phyir// de nas sangs rgyas thams ca rnams// rab dgas 'gro la bde ba'i phyir// mgon po khyod kyis
153b3(rgyud): gtong bar mdzod// sems can 'dam gyis mi gos shing // bla na med pa'i byang chub lam// sna tshogs sdug bsngal zhi mdzad cing // sems can skom pa ngoms mdzad cing // 'khor ba rba rlong grol mdzad de// myur du bde la
153b4(rgyud): dgod par mdzad// dngos grub kun gyis thams cad du// rgyal ba kun gyis mi dpogs te// zhi ba'i rnam pa zhi gyur pa// sdug bsngal bral ba 'dzum pa spangs// nam mkha' sgom las rnam 'das pa// rnam rtog dri ma maM gos
153b5(rgyud): te sgyu ma kun las yang dag 'das// 'dod pa kun las rgyab phyogs pa// gtso bo kun la bdag phyag 'tshal// grags pa med pa 'jigs pa med// byang chub mchog ni thob pa'i bar// bdag cag skyabasu rab tu mchi// ji srid
153b6(rgyud): 'tshe ba mchis pa dang // dmyal ba rtsub mo'i 'jigs rten du// ltung bar 'gyur ba ji srid du// khyod kyi dam tshig bskyang bar bgyi// byang chub mchog tu bdag cag kyang // dri med bskal bar gyur pa yi// gtso bo bdag cag
153b7(rgyud): dbang bskur ba'i// bde ba chen pos stsal du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin du dwags pa chen pos// de dag gsol ba'i tshig nye bar gsan nas// mnyam pa nyid kyi bde ba'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
153b8(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs nas/ zhags ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba dang / yid byed pa bsgrubs pa'i thabs mang po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ste// bde ba chen po spro ba'i cho 'phrul chen
154a1(rgyud): / bos lha yi dkyil 'khor thams cad la bskur ro// de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa// lha chen de dag bde ba chen po spros pa'i cho 'phrul gyis dbang bskur bas/ yid bde bar gyur te/ 
154a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yang dang yang du gtugs nas bskor ba byas te/ ji lta ba bzhin du kun du yongs su bskor nas gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin du dges pa chen po de bzhin gshegs
154a3(rgyud): pas yang rdo rje gzugs ma shin du dgyes pa bde ba chen po'i dam tshig dang sbyor ba'i thabs shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ cang mi gsung bar zhugs nas de ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa
154a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdo rje khro mo'i dbang mo chen mo zhes bya ba nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM swaR+Ya ta thA ga tA ma hA badz+ra kI dwe sha ri/ saR+Wa du ta ni/ mud dra nI/ ma hA pra la/ ya na la/ s+tha sha na bi sha ne/ 
154a5(rgyud): ma hA badz+ra kro da daM sh+tsa ka ra laHbi krid ta/ ba da nai/ saR+Wa sha drung pra sha ma ni/ dahU~M hUM ma hA kr-i d+hA sha ri hU~M phaT phaT// 'dis ji lta ba bzhin du byin gyis brlabs nas/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du bzhag ste/ dpung pa bcu
154a6(rgyud): drug la phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa/ zhal gsum pa gdong in tra ni la'i 'od 'bar ba 'dra ba/ rdo rje dang thod pa'i khang pa dang / thod pa dang mdung star dang / zhags pa dang rtse gsum pa dang / ba~M
154a7(rgyud): tsun dang / mu su ra dang / 'khor lo dang / ka na ya dang / to ma ra dang / gzhu dang mda' dang / sha ga ti dang gri rnams phyag na 'dzin pa/ thod pa'i phreng bas dbu brgyan byas pa/ nyi ma brgya dang / mo'i 'od 'dra ba'o// 
154a8(rgyud): de'i mdun du rdo rje khrag 'thung chen po de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang cha lugs 'dzin par rig pa 'dis bzhag par bya'o// oM ma hA badz+ra da ra ma hA tro to sha ri ma hA skr-i sha na/ b+hi sha ne ni la dza la sa ha sra pra dza li ta/ 
154b1(rgyud): mur ti ha re ga po lA ma la b+hu shi ta ma ku te/ ra hu tI ra rI tra pa ri pu ri/ ta ka ba la/ u sa ha ste/ kha T+wAM ka badz+ra tri shu la/ gyen te/ maha kro d+hi ni/ huM hUM hu~M hUM hUM hUM/ he he run ta mun ta pre ye hUM phaT// de nas bcom ldan
154b2(rgyud): 'das kyis rdo rje shin du dgos pa khro bo chen po'i gzi brjid chen po'i mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje nyi ma khri ma dbang mtshan ma nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // 
154b3(rgyud): oM hUM traM/ ma hA sur+ya badz+re kro d+ha sha ri/ b+hi d+ha ma b+hi d+ha ma/ ma tha ma tha/ gra swa gra saHsaR+Wa dush+tsa br-i dusta me hUM phaT/ oM hU traM/ tra tra tra// khro mo chen mo 'dis/ lho phyogs kyi rin chen 'byung ldan gyis dkyil 'khor du bzhag par
154b4(rgyud): bya ste/ gzi brjid chen mo rab gtong zhing // shin du 'jigs pa med bzhin 'bar// dpung pa bcu drug bsnol ba che// dbu brgyan thod pas bsags par byas// spyan ni rab dmar sngo bsangs mdog/ mtshon cha sna tshogs bsdus
154b5(rgyud): parA brtson// gdug pa thams cad 'pho byed cing // yi dgas chen po'i stan la zhon// rang gi g.yig gis mdun du bskor// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad mo'i 'byung gnas bkod pa 'od kyi phreng ba chen mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge
154b6(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ pad mo'i dra ba khro mo'i dbang mo chen mo nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM hri badz+ra pad ma ma hA ba d+ha bA mu kha ga ga bA/ khA hi khA hi/ ma hA ma ho/ d+hA ra bI ko be hUM/ he hUM hUM he haM/ 
154b7(rgyud): / hu hUM hriHhi sha hi shaHma hA badz+ra bA ta ba ne la ma ho// two t+ye hUM hUM/ hi hi ho hi hU~M// dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du// 'di yi rgyab tu bzhag par bya// rno ba chen po zhal gsum pa// stag gdong gyen du ston pa ste// khro mo che ni mo dpung
154b8(rgyud): bcu drug/ rnam par bsgyur ba mi sdug gdong // ma ri'i ston la yang dge zhon// khrag mang po la 'thung byed pa// mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste// khros pa'i dbu rgyan thod pas gtsigs// 'od zer rnon po gtong byed cing // 
155a1(rgyud): g.yog nas dkyil 'khor brgyan te gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'dus ma gdon miza pa'i ye shes/ rlom gnyis med per 'dra ba'i thabyas zhes bya ba'i dang nge 'dzin sa skyems pa
155a2(rgyud): zhugs te/ gdon mu za ba'i drag po dang ldan ma khro mo zhes bya ba khros pa'i dbang mo chen mo// 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM saR+Wa A mo g+ha ma hA bi shwa sha ri hU~M hUM hUM/ haM haM haHma hA kro d+hi
155a3(rgyud): gre me khe ma hA bi sha ru pa de ri ni saR+Wa du sta pa sha ma ni huM hUM phaT// 'di nyid kyis ni ci rigs par// rdo rje gdon mi za ba yi// dkyil 'khor g.yog bcas rnam pa bzhi// sna tshogs dam tshige bzhag bya ste// sna tshog/ 
155a4(rgyud): gzugs dang khyad par ldan// kun du yongasu bsgo nas gnas// bsnyer ba dang ni btsums pa'i gdong // rab tu drag la ro myang zhing // gdong bsnyer thod pa rtse mo byas// dpung pa bcu drug gis brgyan pa'i/ 
155a5(rgyud): khro mo chen mo gdong gsum pa// zad byed ma bzhin lta ba yi// de yi ngo bo thams cad kyis// g.yog ni rnam pa bzhi rnams kyiso// bskor bar shes rab can gyis po zhig/ rang gi phyag rgya mtshan mar ldan/ 
155a6(rgyud): dpung pa brgyad dang ldan pa yi// de ni cho ga ji bzhin du// 'byung ba'i phyag rgya mang dag zhon// dur khrod bzhin du 'jigs byed pa// phyi yi rnal 'byor ma tshogs rnams// de dag kun du yongasu bskor// bzhag
155a7(rgyud): gam yang na dri yang rung // de ni dri lta stan la gnas// gzhan mi sdug la dpung bzhi mo// dgug pa'i khro mor rnam bsgyur bcas// de la sogs pa'i rim par ldan// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar byed// 
155a8(rgyud): de nas rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo de dag bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ yang dang yang rang rang gis mngon par mchod nas gsol ba 'debs so// rnal 'byor ma yi sngags tshogs dang // 
155b1(rgyud): gad+hA ma ni ci rigs bur// gsang ba'i gar ni bde chen po// bcom ldan de bzhin nyid kyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor ma thams cad rnam par spro ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
155b2(rgyud): sgo snyoms par zhugs te/ rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi sngags dang phyag rgya dang / sbas pa dang / de kho na nyid dang / gsang ba rnams nyid kyi sgo dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba badz+ras
155b3(rgyud): a nu rag na mi hi kre d+he hU~M phaH/ oM sauR+Wa badz+ra d+ha ra a kAr shu nI ma hA k+ko d+h+r-i shwa ra~M/ hUM hUM dza dza hU~MhU~M/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+hi ra ku la/ a nu ra k+ki ni/ ma hA kr-i d+hi ni hU~M hi he/ hU~M phaT hU~M hU~M/ dza dz+dza/ hU~M hUM/ oM saR+Wa badz+rA d+ha rog/ 
155b4(rgyud): grA ma ha kro d+he hU~M sa sa/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma te dza/ i bA she kuM hU~M tra~M hU~M// oM sar+b+ba badz+rI d+ha ra ma hU~M sur+ya ka ro ka/ tra ta tra ta hU~M phaT tra ti/ oM saR+Wa badz+ra d+ha ra ma ma ha ka du kr-i d+hi shi ra~M ma hA bi dza yo daM dra ya hU~M hU~M tra~M tra~M phaT phar+tha
155b5(rgyud): oM saR+Wa badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra ma hA krod d+ha/ ad ta a si hUM hU~M tr-i tr-i/ tr-i ta ya tro ta ya hUM phaT/ oM sauR+Wa badz+ra d+ha ra ma ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha ga shi ka ni hUM hUM b+ha ga sha b+ha ga sha hU~M hriM/ oM saR+Wa badz+ra d+ha re ma hA ti gau sna kro d+he sha
155b6(rgyud): ri tshin d+hi tshin d+hA/ hUM badz+ra tig sne he sne tsha da ya hu~M hU~M ma ta mai taM/ oM saR+Wa badz+re d+ha ra tsakr-i d+ha ra ni ma ho ga tuM bi ni hu hUM/ pa ta ya pa ta ya/ ma hA badz+ra tsakr-i ne tsu ra nA ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM saR+Wa badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA she ga pra b+hi no dza hU~M hUM ma
155b7(rgyud): ta ma ta phaT/ oM saR+Wa badz+ra d+ha ra mi hA b+hi sha mu khi hU~M hUM maM phuT phaT/ oM saR+Wa badz+ra d+ha rA ma hA badz+ra pa te hU~M hUM haM haM phaT phaT/ oM saR+Wa badz+rA d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra ya k+Sha ni hUM hU~M/ kha kha khA hi khA haM/ a bi bI a pri bA hUM phaT/ oM sa~MR+Wa
155b8(rgyud): badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra b+han d+ha ni/ ma ha de ki b+han d+hi ni/ mi hA da ki b+han phaT ya/ pi ta ya pa ti ya bi ti ya hU~M phaTe/ oM saR+Wa badz+ra d+ha ra ha lA da ni dub ma kro d+hi/ shi ri hU~M hU~M/ oM saR+Wa badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA bus p+ta mi li ni hU~M hu gr-I g+haM g+h+na/ 
156a1(rgyud): oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ri hU~M a lo ka ma hA kro d+ha shA ri ma ho la kA d+he rI nri d+hi bi gra rti bay+YA hU~M nA~M/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma k+Sho d+hA g+h+nAn+na d+ha ba ti tsug g+hi/ mo saR+Wa badz+ra d+har mAta kro d+ha sha rI la s+ye hUM/ oM sar+b+ba byAdz+dza
156a2(rgyud): d+ha ra mad kro dI ma le d+ha ra ni hU~M/ oM saR+Wa badz+rI d+ha ra mA hA kro d+hAr ma ha kro d+ha ra ma ha kro dA g+hi di ne hUM hi he/ oM siR+Wa badz+rA d+hA ra ma ha kro d+ha ra ma hAkr-i d+hA nr-i rti ku hU~M hU~M/ oM saR+Wa badz+ra d+ha ra ma ha kro d+ha a kar sha ni d+hA dzI hU~M hUM dzA/ oM sar+b+ba
156a3(rgyud): badz+ra d+ha ra ma ha kro d+ha ma hA badz+ra pa sha pra be sha nA~M hUM hUM hUM/ oM swaR+Wa badz+ra d+hA ra ma hi kro d+ha badz+ra banr-i d+he ban d+ha hUM baM/ oM saR+Wa badz+ra d+ha rA ma hA kro d+ha sh+ye sh+ye hU~M haM/ oM hU~M tra~M hr-i a// // de nas rnal 'byor ma tshwan mau de dag mgu
156a4(rgyud): rangs dga' bar gyur te/ yang dbyangs 'dis gsol ba 'debs so// bde mchog rgyal chen dgongasu gsol// bsam gyis mi khyab bde ba mchog dbyings ldan// mi g.yo gsung dang bral ba'i dbyangs snyan pa'o// 
156a5(rgyud): gzungs la rol cing ba la bzhe su gsol// ngo mtshar che ba'i cho 'phrul snang mdzad cing // snying po byang chub 'gro ba rnams kyi lam ston pa// rgyud rnams yang dag gang la'ang mi rten par// bde mchog gzugs kyi
156a6(rgyud): grol bar mdzod// ra ma 'u ma ha su hu dze hi ni dza la su hu/ ba'u ma 'ulu ma ha su hu/ dzo i ni/ dza la su hu bau bI dzi'u ma ha su hu dzerA a na dza la su d+hu/ u dza a'u ma ha sa hu dze/ i ni dza su hu/ a la la ho// ma hA suM hu rA mA
156a7(rgyud): rA ma ma hA su hu/ a la la he mya su tr-i ni// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje na mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ti 'dzin lnga snyom sde bar zhugs te/ rdo rje na mkha' la 'gro ma thams cad kyi snying po 'di nyid
156a8(rgyud): kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM saR+Ye ta thA ga ta ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra/ oM badz+re kro d+ha gi ni hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra DA kri ni ma hA he ma b+ha ti hUM phaTaM/ oM badz+ra DaM ki ni ku ma ra bri yi hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra TaM ki ni ti shwa ma
156b1(rgyud): ra ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+rA De ki nr-i ma hA badz+ra ma shwa pi Da ya pI Da ya/ su b+ha ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki ni ma ha kro DA ra la li hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra Da ki ni mu hA tsakra ne na tshin d+ha tshin dA hUM phaT/ oM badz+rA DA kri ni ma hA mrid tod pa dri ke hUM
156b2(rgyud): phaT/ oM badz+ra Da ki ni me hA saM mya kro d+he hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Da ki ni ma~M hA badz+re Du Ne DA hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Da kaM ne mA hA mA ra ni hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra Da ki nI ma hA mr-i te ka pa la ha sne hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra Da ki ni ma hA se mya kro dI sha rI hUM
156b3(rgyud): phaT/ oM badz+ra Da ki ni ma hA mrid pu drA na Da d+ha ri ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+rA DA ki ni pA gra la hU~M phaT/ oM badz+rA Da ki ni bI pA baM pA ru d+hi raM mu hA badz+ra ba li hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Da ki nI mA hA badz+ra sha ni bak+Sha pa k+Sha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki na~M
156b4(rgyud): ma hA badz+ra sha ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Da ka~M ni ma hA badz+ra ba sha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Da ki ni A na ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Da ki ni ma hA badz+ra ba ge ni g+ha gA ma ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+re Da ki ni ma hA badz+ra dz+wa la ye ba smai ku ru hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra
156b5(rgyud): DA ki ni mA hA badz+ra big+ha te hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki ni mA hA drang sh+ye hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra Da ki ni mya hA badz+ra ka lI pra pI shwa hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki na~M ma hA pu ta maM se shra ni hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra Da ki nri ma hA ma ka ra badz+ro DaM ki na~M ma hA ka ra
156b6(rgyud): baM badz+ra ra ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+rI Da ka ni ka ra shaM ni ma hA bi kI ra l-i ma~M ku hUM dzA dzA hUM phaT/ oM badz+re Da ki ni a bi shri ne hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra Da ki nI ma hA ban te hUM baM baM hUM/ oM badz+ra Da ka ni ma hA to sha na sa ma ye hUM hUM aM A/ 
156b7(rgyud): oM badz+ra rAk+Sha sa ma s+ya sa ru d+hir myed pra ya/ ma hA kuM byA ker+ha huM hU~M hU~M hU~M k+Sha/ oM badz+ra ma hA rak+Sha saM u gad d+hA/ pre be shr-i siR+Wa ma hA badz+ra ka laM pa shi na b+han d+hu hU~M hU~M hU~M phaTaM/ oM badz+ra rak+Sha swa ban da yA/ b+hi sha ya b+hai shi ya/ 
156b8(rgyud): bi b+hi sha ni sa~MrAn tu hU~M To/ oM badz+ri ma hA ra k+Sha sa bin da ya~M/ sauR+Wa ni ma hA bi kr-i ta nan/ da shaM grib hU~M 'acoM// / de nas rdo rje na mkha' la 'gro ma rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mi de dag thams cad rab tu mgunas
157a1(rgyud): yid dga' bar gyur te// dbyangs chen po 'byin par gyur to// kye ma'o rdo rje sems dpa' yi// rdo rje sbyor ba rab bstan pas// mkha' la 'gro ba sangs rgyas nyid// ci bde bas ni sgrub par bya// 
157a2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen pos/ yang rdo rje na mkha' la 'gro ma de dag mgu ba dang sgrub par bya ba'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM ti ka a kar sha ya pra bi sha bin d+ha ya/ 
157a3(rgyud): tro sha ya saR+Wa na Da ka hr-i d+ha ye hUM dzAM/ dzA hUM baM ho/ ta ki hUM dzAHau he ru ma hA badz+ra a kad d+hA/ pr-i baM sha ye pra be sha yA/ d+han d+he yA b+han d+ha ye/ to sha yA to sha yA/ hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra pad ma mA hA/ ba Da bra mu kha/ a hra da d+h+ya pra
157a4(rgyud): be sha yang b+han dA ya/ mo ha yaH to shra ya/ ha ha hi// khros pa'i sngags kyi tshig 'di yis// rdo rje rnalnga 'byor ma dang / mkha' la 'gro ba dang mkha' la 'gro ma rdo rje 'phrog par byed ma la sogs pa de dag dgug pa dang / gzhug/ 
157a5(rgyud): pa dang / dbang du bya ba la sogs pa'i las bya ste/ gtor ma'i mchod pa la sogs pa'i dam pa'i tshig dpal he ru ka'i phyag rgya dang / ka ti rgyal po'i phyag rgya dang / ta mgrin gyi phyag rgya byin te/ lAs thams cad la sbyar ro// 
157a6(rgyud): rdo rje thal mo dzA lci bzhin bcings te/ khro mo gnyis lcags kyu ltar bya/ sbom po gnyis phan tshun rtse sbyar/ zhi ba gnyis kyang rab tu sbyar te/ lhag ma rnams brkyang ste/ 'od zer ltar btang ba 'di ni phyag rgya'i mchog yin no// 
157a7(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di ni gzi brjid che// lha dang lha min phyag byas pa// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs// bsngags shing mchod pa bya ba yin// bcings pa tsam gyi 'bebs pa dang // thams cad tshegs ni 'dzud par byed/ 
157a8(rgyud): gdug pa thams cad gsod byed ma// sran mo thams cad za bar byed// rnal 'byor dam la gnas pa yis// 'di yis las rnams thams cad rab byed de// las rnams thams cad grub pa po// mi ldan dngos grub
157b1(rgyud): mi 'gyur te// 'dod chags ni sdang gti mug rnams// bsnyen pas dngos grub myur du thob// rdo rje bcing ba gnyisu byas te rgyab kyis rgyab sbyar// mthe'u cung gnyis brkyangs te/ phan tshun bsnol khros pa gnyis gyen du bsgreng ste
157b2(rgyud): snying khar bsnun nas brkyang bskum gyi tshul du gnas pa 'di ni las thams cad byed pa'o// 'di yis thams cad las kyi rnams// ji tsam yid 'dod byed par 'gyur// tshe 'dir sdig pa gang byas pa// 'di yis thams cad
157b3(rgyud): 'phrog par byed// de dag thams cad myur 'gyur 'gyur te// dngos grub rin chen yod bzhin no// ji snyed na mkha'i lam dag tu// rnal 'byor 'di yis 'phur bar byed// rigs 'dzin mchog ni mtshan mor yang // tshe
157b4(rgyud): gla grub par slar yang 'ong // thal mo mnyam par sbyar te/ sbom po gnyis dbusu sbyar/ lhag ma'i pad ma'i mdab ma kha bye ba lhar byas pa ni pad ma'i stan no// sgom pa gnyis rtse mo thur du bstan pa ni rta gdong
157b5(rgyud): gri'o// gang gis sbyor byas skad cig tu// de yis dngos grub chen por 'gyur// bcings ma thag tu 'phur 'gyur ba// 'dod pa bzhin du nye bar 'gro/ sa la sogs pa 'dod pa bzhin// myur du slar yang ldog par 'gyur// 
157b6(rgyud): de la sogs pa mtho' yas pa// phyag rgya yi ni sbyor ba dge/ nga yis bstan te rgyal ba'i rnams// rnal 'byor pa yis drang bar bya// rnal 'byor ma rnams thams cad kyang // phyag rgya'i yin lag mchog des sbyar/ 
157b7(rgyud): du nas rdo rje na mkha' lnga 'gro ba chen mo de dag 'dod pas gzir ba'i rnams te/ rang gi gzugs ni bsgyur ba yis// bzhengs twa gar ni rab mdzad cing // dur khrod kyis ni sna chen du// mgu ba chen pos rtag par
157b8(rgyud): byed/ phyag rgya thod pa gri dag dang // rdo rje laTi rnam par 'dzin// skal ldan rang gi phyag rgyas mtshan// dbu sdug rnam par gnyer bya'i zhal// bde ba'i cha lugs sbyor ba yis// bde ba dam pa longs spyod myong // 
158a1(rgyud): rab tu rmongs pas bsnyen byed cing // rab dges khyod la gsol ba 'debs// zla ba dri med stod pas shin du rdzogs spyan mnga'// thugs rjes dbyings rum nyid du bdag cag bskyed// 
158a2(rgyud): 'gro ba sdug bsngal tsha bas gdungs pa la// byang chub chus ni kun du tshim par mdzod// a lA la ho// mchog gi rol pas yang dag sgo 'byed cing // byang chub mchog gi lam 'di nyid kyis ston// gsang ba'i bdag
158a3(rgyud): nyid bde ba zil mnan te// rmongs shing bying ba rnams la thugs rjes sbrul// a la la ho// che ba'i ye shes lhun gyis mngar ldan pa// phyogs kyi thugs rjes ma zi ni snyoms par dgongs// bde ba mchog gis gsang ba gnas/ 
158a4(rgyud): nyid du/ mya ngan 'dab lnga longs spyod bsten pas 'grub// 'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni dngos grub gtsor+ya bstan yang // rmugs pa'i 'gro bas bdud rtsi dngos ma mthong // e ma ho ma skyes chos de snying po las/ 
158a5(rgyud): byung ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab na mkha' dbyings dang mnyam// rab tu dgas pa'i bde mchog 'brar ba'i gtso// rin chen sna tshogs kun du 'dus pa 'di las gzigs// sngon med rol mo 'di la rol mdzad cing / 
158a6(rgyud): dur khrod chen po'i dngos grub stsal bar mdzod// 'dul ba'i dbang gis grub pa'i cha lugs mi mdzad ma// rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro gzi brjid 'bar ba 'dis// sdug bsngal gsum pos 'thoms shing rmongs
158a7(rgyud): pa las te bde ba'i spyod pas gnas nas bskyod mdzad do// thugs rje phrad mo'i dbyings nas bskyed par mdzod// a l-i la ho// ji ltar pad ma 'di la chags pa meng pa bzhin// sdug pa'i bcings pas ma zin rnam
158a8(rgyud): grol te/ rol pas tshob pa'i sa la gnas shing rnam mdzad pa'i// 'jig rten mgon po 'di la gzigs nas rol mo mdzod// bdag cag dam tshig 'di la 'dus shing snang ba'i rnams// mnyam mdzod nyid du bde
158b1(rgyud): la zhengasu gsol// 'gal ba'i yid dang ma chags rdo rje la// nam mkha' ji bzhin mi 'gyur tshul bzhin gnas// khams kyi rang bzhin mnabs shing nam khro yang // byams pa'i thugs rje kun gyis gnas khyab/ 
158b2(rgyud): mdzod oM ma ho bde bas bde sbyin dri la phyag 'tshal lo// rang bzhin grub pa'i dngos grub bdag la stsol// chags med chags dang ldan pa'i longs spyod kyis// dam tshig skyon med bdag cag rol pa mdzad// 
158b3(rgyud): thugs rje gsang ba'i byang chub sems chen dris// 'gro ba rnams kyi bag chags rnam par sbyangs// rgyu dang rkyen la ma brten rang bzhin grub de ma chags dri med yongasu gsal bar zla ba nya ba bzhin// 'jig rten gsum
158b4(rgyud): ba 'di ni mdzad de thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bde bas kun du bde bar mdzod// 'di yis gtso la bskul byas nas// dkyil 'khor nyid du dngos grub bo// yid gdung snyan pa'i nga ro yis// dpyid kyi rgyal po'i glu blang
158b5(rgyud): nas mkha' 'gro 'dra ba'i dri med pa'i// dgos pa thams cad ston par bya// rdo rje pad+ma mo yid 'ong ba'i// dngos grub thams cad sbyar bar bya// bde byed chen po 'di yis ni// bskul ba dwags pa sbyin par byed/ 
158b6(rgyud): rdo rje can gyi yi ger ldan// dusu rab tu sbyin par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba thams cad kyi shin du dogs pa chen po'i longs spyod dpal gyi bde ba zhes bya bya'i ting nge 'dzin la
158b7(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs te/ de dag thams cad lnga rje suM mgu bar mdzad do// g.yon gyi lag pas bzung bya ste// gsang skyes pad mo phye ba las// rdo rje chen po g.yas nyid kyis// bcug na mchod pa thob 'gyur te/ 
158b8(rgyud): mkha' la 'gro ba drang ba 'dis// mnyes pas de dag dngos grub 'thob// oM dang ha dang mi phyed rdo rje bde// mtha' ru phaT stobs rab tu sbyor ba yis// kye ma'o bde ba mkha' 'gro dra ba che// rab dges dbang mo bde
159a1(rgyud): byed dag tu mdzod rnal 'byor ma tshogs gas pa rnams lnga// 'di yis brtson 'grus rnams byas nas// badre che bde ba dgyes pa yi// rang dges dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// rna la ma
159a2(rgyud): ma'i che ba'i che ba rje suM mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes so// mgo bo thal mo phyed kyis sbyin// chu skyes la ni yongasu rdzogs// rdo rje bcings pa yang dgra ldan// pad mo'i dkyil mo bcing bar bya// 'di yas brtson pa
159a3(rgyud): byas na ni// bud med mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur// bde ba chen pos gar byed cing // rab dgos bde byed gnod byed dang // kun du mkhyud dang sprod byed dang // sna tshogs gar gyis gar bya ste// thams cad zas dang
159a4(rgyud): r-i dngos grub/ mchog ni bde bas 'grub par 'gyur// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya btsong bya ste// sangs rgyas sbyor ba bde chen po// myur po'i thal mos bsgrub par bya// srings rgyas sbyor ba bde chen po// gsum gyi mtshams
159a5(rgyud): su sbyar bya zhing // mkhur tshos so yis btab byas te// ma mchu yang nas yang du bzung // 'o ma 'dzin pa phyir zhing gnye// g.ya'i byed so sor rnam bzhi bya// prad me phyi phyir rab gnye zhing // ze ba chan pas rab
159a6(rgyud): tu sbyor/ sen mo mchan khung sum mdo dang // rno ba gnyis su rab tu gzugs// del nas rdo rje gzhug bya zhing // khros rgyal pos skyod par bya// g.yas kyis shin du spyod byas nas// g.yon pa yis ni btang bar
159a7(rgyud): byad sbyor ba 'di yis btsun par yis// mkha' 'gro'i 'khor lo mchod pa bya// a ho su ka zhes brjod// bde ba chen po dbyangs kyis bskul// yang dang yang du 'dzin pa na// blo ldan sgrub pa sgrub par bya'o// 
159a8(rgyud): rnol 'byor ma thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po spro ba'i ye shes so// de nas de dog rab tu gnas nas ni// rdo rje 'dzin la gsol ba 'a bas// mnyes pa'i zas ni thams cad dang // de bzhin nye ba'i yo byad
159b1(rgyud): / rnams/ bde ba sgrub pa sgrub pa'o// sna tshogs chen po bsgo bar gsol// sgrub pa thams cad sgrub byed pas// gdon mi za dka' brtag bgyid pa// gang gis myur du mnyam sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor rab tu mnyam sbyor bgyid// 
159b2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye ba'i yo byad kha zas thams cad kyi phyag rgya gsungs pa// yo byad phyi yi thams cad dang // gos dang rgyan la sogs pa'o// nye ba'i kha zas rnams dang ni// sha dang khrag las yang dag sgrub/ 'bras
159b3(rgyud): bu'i rtsa ba tshad med do// mchog tu bde ba yid tsam pa// 'di yis mchod pa byas pa ni// mkha' 'gro ma ni dngos grub 'gyur// bus pa'i shwa la swa rabs bsgrubs pa'i// 'o ma dam pas thod pa gang // mkha' 'gro ma ku ni dbul byas na// 
159b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'dir ni dngos grub 'grub// gtor ma'i mchod pa'i yo byad kyi ye shes so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad bzhengs te phyag 'tshal nas// yang gcig tu stug por 'du ba mdzad// 
159b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debaso// rnal 'byor kun gyi ye shes mtshan// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis// thams cad brda rnams dran 'gyur ba// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das
159b6(rgyud): shin du dgas pa chen po ro myang ba dang / 'brel po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje na mkha' la 'gro ba dang / na mkha' la 'gro ma thams cad kyi brda'i phyag rgya 'di gsungaso// ka ni 'dod pa
159b7(rgyud): khyod 'dod phyir// bdag gi 'dod pa smras yin te// gti mug mdongs pas ma byin na// myur du dam tshig de nyams so// dam tshig dam tshig can mthong na// lag pa g.yas pa brkyang byas te// des kyang g.yon pa brkyang
159b8(rgyud): bo yi rang gi nu mar rab bsdams nas// mgo bos g.yon du bdud byas pa// phyag byed bde bye dris pa yin// lag pa g.yon pa skur bsten na// de yis phyag ni byas par 'gyur// g.yon pa mgo la gzhag pa yi// 
160a1(rgyud): g.yon du bdud pas phyag lan no// g.yon gyi sprin ma spyod pa yis// myur ni phyag ni byas par 'gyur// sbyor ba shin du btson pa yis// g.yas kyi smin mas phyag lun bya// g.yas kyi lag pas
160a2(rgyud): snying kha rung sbyor dang ldan pas me nye byas ni// 'di ni rdo rje slob dpon mchog/ de yi mtshan mar shes par bya// g.yon gyi khro mo bsgreng ba yi// nam zhig de ltar bstan byas na// lus chu de ni khros 'gyur zhes// rnal
160a3(rgyud): 'byor pa yas rtags shes bya// g.yon du 'gying ba'i bsgyings pa yi// lag pa snying khar brkyang bya ste// dbang po gyen du rnam bstan na// de tshe badz+ra bar du brtag/ chu dur rtse mor byas pa yi// nam zhig bskyod par
160a4(rgyud): mthong ba na// de tshe rig ma rnal 'byor dbang // rdo rje padad+ma mo btson par 'dod// sbom po nam zhog mthong gyur na// de la ston mo sbyin par bya// gang tshe shin du mthor ston na// mngon pa'i nga rgyal rab tu brtag
160a5(rgyud): khro mo lcags kyu 'dra bya ste// gang tsha bsngags mkhan gyis bstan na// de tshe nges par 'ong byas te// gzhan du na ni dmyal bar ltung // de nyid rnam par bzlog pa ltar// sngags mkhan gyis ni ma bstan na// de tshe// 
160a6(rgyud): myur du 'gro bya ste// gzhan du byas na dam chog nyams// gzhan rnams kyi ni phyag rgya yis// rnal 'byor pa yis rnam sprul na// las kyi sbyor ba shes pa yis// las de dag ni btsam par bya// brda'i phyag rgya'i ya/ 
160a7(rgyud): shes so// 'dren pa med pa'i yig kun// rnal 'byor pa yis rab tu brtag/ rtag tu tsheg drug rnam bral ba// 'dre ni tshul rnal 'byor mo yi go// oM ni TIg ler bcas pa'i brda// sbyor ba sngags rig rnal 'byor
160a8(rgyud): rtag/ de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor brtag par bya// rdo rje pad mo mnyam sbyor bas// rje su mnyes por byed pa dpal dam tshig ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so// 
160b1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun du bzang po chen po yang / kun du rgyas 'debs pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje pha rol du phyin
160b2(rgyud): ma'i gsang ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // rdo rje thal mo mnyam gzhag ste// sbom po dkyil mo bcing bar bya// khro mo gnyis ni sbyar
160b3(rgyud): bya ste/ lhag ma 'od bzhin gtang bar bya// snying kha rI phyag rgya 'di gzhag nas// thams cad lngas ni rab sbyar te// sna tshogs mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du// gdon mi za ba'i dngos grub byeng // thal mo de nyid mnya
160b4(rgyud): sbyor te/ mchog dang rdo rje mnyam du sbyar// chu du gnyis kyang gdong sprad de// snying khar de bzhin sbom po sbyar// 'dri yis rdo rje thams cad rnams// dam tshig 'dzags byed rab byed tsong // sems can thams/ 
160b5(rgyud): cad phan mdzad ma// de ni dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid las na rdo rje dang // mchog nyid bsgreng ba'i tshul byas te// rdo rje thal mo gnas pa yis// drang ba'i tshul gyis drang bas na// mi g.yeng
160b6(rgyud): de nas dngos grub po// gnod byed yang dag ldan pa 'dis// rgyal ba mchog kyang 'dren gyur na// lha dang mi yi bu mo dag/ lha mni la sogs smos ci dgos// ji ltar yid la 'dod pa bzhin// 'di nyid kyis
160b7(rgyud): ni dngos grub ste// sngags kyi bzlas pa mnyam sbyor bas// mchog tu myur du 'dren par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid las byung khro// rtse mo yid tsam bkug bya ste// lhag ma 'od zer rtse mo bzhin// de ni mos byed thob pa yin/ 
160b8(rgyud): 'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang // bde bar gshegs kyang dbang bsgyur ro// yid las skyes pa 'dod chags can// gti mug chos gnas smos ci dges// ci dgar 'dod chags sbyor ba yis// do ya~M las rnams
