161a1(rgyud): byed 'gyur te// yang dag sbyor ba thams cad 'grub// sbyor ba de dang mi ldan dngos grub med// snying khar 'di nyid kyis byas te// mgu ba'i bde ba bde chen pos// rgyal ba mchog ni mnyes par
161a2(rgyud): 'gyur/ mchog gi bcings pa 'di kun dang // 'di yis las rnams thams cod dang // yid la bsams pa byed pa 'thob// phan tshun du ni mgu byed cing // mgu bas dngos grub myur du 'thob// rdo rje thal mo mnyam
161a3(rgyud): sbyar te/ rdo rje bkug nas sbom por sbyar// lhag ma 'od kyi tshul du gtang // dga' byed mchog ni phyag rgya 'di// sangs rgyas 'bras bu dngos grub 'thob// rgyal srid nor dang 'bru yi rnams// de bzhin nor bu 'di dngos
161a4(rgyud): grub de ni dri ma thag tu yang // lha dang lha min mchod par 'gyur// bdag nyid kyis ni 'di bcings te// mkhas pa yis ni dus 'tshams bzhir// gnas lngar rab tu sbyor ba yis// spyi bor dbang ni bskur byas
161a5(rgyud): nu/ rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi dbang // de nas de ni nges par 'gyur// lo gcig tsam du mnyam sbyor bas// phan tshun du ni dbang bskur bas// khams gsum rab dgas bdag po ru// blo ldan rdo rje mi g.yeng 'gyur// 
161a6(rgyud): de nyid 'khor los bskor bya ste// snying khar 'khor lo bzhin du bskor// zla ba gcig tsam mnyam sbyor bas// 'khor lo bskor ba rab tu sgrub// de nyid g.yon par rab sbyar te// rgyal mtshan tshul du yang dag spro/ 
161a7(rgyud): zhag bdun du ni mnyam gzhog pas// 'jig rten du ni rgyal por 'gyur// de nyid kha nas dgad par sbyor// mnyam gzhag zla ba gcig tsam gyis// las rnams thams cod rab grub pa// dgad pa tsam gyis byed
161a8(rgyud): par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid mnyam gzhag ste// rtse mo kha byed rnam bsgyur bas// sbom po 'od zer rnam byas te// lo ma lhag ma rgyas par bya// rnal 'byor 'di ni bcings pa yis// sdig pa kun las rib/ 
161b1(rgyud): tu grol/ bsod nams chen pos byin rlob ste// bde byed thams cad grub par 'gyur// thal me de nyid snying khar sbyar// mchog drang khro mo gnyis sbyar te// de gnyis tshig gsum rab tu dgug/ sbom po dkyil mo
161b2(rgyud): tshul du bya rnal 'byor dag tu sbyor ba yiswa// 'di yis zla bA gcig byas ni// 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal rje ro// dpa' bo chen por de 'gyur ro// thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te// rang gi snying khar bskor bar bya/ 
161b3(rgyud): de nas sngags mkhan chos ston par// mi g.yang sems kyis de 'gyur ro// sbom po lce yi tshul gzhag pas// de nyid khar ni rnam gzhag na// 'jig rten kun gyi thams cad dag/ mdor na zhag bdun tsam gyis kyi
161b4(rgyud): dbyug dang gser dang gos la sogs// bdud rtsi btung ba mchog gi rnams// 'dri yis thams cad 'phrog byed de// 'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyor te// mchog rab gnyis ni 'og tu
161b5(rgyud): gzhug/ chung ngu gnyis dang sbom po gnyis// sbyar te snying khar rab tu bzhag/ yid la dga' ba'i las rnams thams cad byed// sgyu ma'i mthu dang srid pa mthar byed pa// rtag tu blo ldan lo ni phyed gnyis kyis/ 
161b6(rgyud): khams gsum rgyal srid mthu chen thams cad thob par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te// rang gi ma mcha dbus nyid nas// sbom po ro 'thob tshul gyis ni// khro mo 'khor lo yang dug spro// zhag bdun du
161b7(rgyud): ni bsgrims pa yis// 'di yus khrag 'dren dngos grub ste// sha zas bza' ba las kun byed// thal mo de nyid bcings byas nas// rdo rje gnyis ni padad+ma mor sbyor// sbom po'i zur ni bsgrengs nas kyang // chu
161b8(rgyud): gnyis kyang de bzhin te// mgrin pa nas ni rtse mo brgyad // thams cad las ni sbyar byas to// 'di yis gdug pa thams cad dag/ rab tu sbyar bas 'jigs par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid mnyam gzhag naso// 
162a1(rgyud): bcing ba dam po bcings par bya// sbom po gnyis ni nang du gzhug/ khro mo gnyis kyang skul bar bya// 'di yis gdug pa thams cad dag/ 'dzums par rab tu byas par 'gyur// skad
162a2(rgyud): cig tu ni gnod byed de// de bzhin bsdus dang btsir bar 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// de nas dngos grub thams cad dag/ dngos grub chen po bdag po dang // thams cad las don 'grub par
162a3(rgyud): 'gyur/ phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// rim par myur du 'gro 'ang byed// lo gcig gi ni sbyor ba yis// las rnams thams cad sgrub par byed// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kun gyi lus thams
162a4(rgyud): cad byed po'i phyag rgya'o// de nas rnal 'byor mu de dag thams cad rab tu mgu nas ngo mtshar du gyur te// rnam par 'gyur bas gar mdzad cing // hi hi zhes pas g+hu ru len// hai ha zhes pas rab tu
162a5(rgyud): mguSh+Tahe ho zhes pas mnyes par byed// he he zhes pas 'bod par byed// hUM hUM zhes pas gang bar byed// hA hA zhes pas skyong bar byed// phaT phaT zhes pas gsol bar byed// hUM hUM zhes pas phur bus 'debs/ 
162a6(rgyud): dz+nyAdzA dz+haiM zhes pas 'dren par byed// sa so zhes pas dam par byed// dge bo dbang phyug nga ro mchog/ hU~M b+h+rU~M zhes pas gsod par byed// hU~M b+h+rU~M hUM guM/ hUM hU~M zhes pas 'bar bar byed// hUM hU~M zhes pas gzi brjid byed// tra~M traM
162a7(rgyud): zhes pas 'dren par byed// tre tr-i zhes pas mchod par byed// dngos grub thams cad 'bras bu smin// hriM hr-i zhes pas rmongs par byed// nr-i nr-i zhes pas 'jungs par byed// hriM hr-i zhes pas 'dren par byed// hU~M hU~M zhes
162a8(rgyud): pas 'phyan par byed// hri hr-i zhes pas rmongs par byed// hra hra zhes pas gnod par byed// he ho zhes pas mnyes par byed// haM haM zhes pas bsrung bar byed// hU~M hU~M zhes pas gsod par byed// hu hu zhes pas
162b1(rgyud): mgu bar byed// g+haM g+hA zhes pas 'phreng bar byed// gaM ga zhes pas dri ru byed// ra raM zhes pas rgyal bar byed// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i tshogs rnams ngo mtshar cher gyur// rmad du byung ba
162b2(rgyud): chen por gyur te/ rang gi sems mgu bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po kun du bzang
162b3(rgyud): bopo chen po la phyag 'tshal te// gsol ba 'debs so// gnyis med mchog tu rmad byung ba// bcom ldan 'di nyid bshad du gsol// gang gis sems can grub pa 'di// gsang rgyud cho ga'i rim pa rnams// gsang
162b4(rgyud): basbas pa 'grub par 'gyur// gar dang glu dang bzhad pa che// sgeg mo rol pa bde ba mchog/ sil snyan gling bu rnam sna tshogs// brdab dang rgyud rnams rab 'byor pa// gsung rgyud cho ga'i rim pa rnams// rdzu
162b5(rgyud): 'phrul blo yi che ba che// dngos grub thams cad grub pa yi// sngags rgyal khyod kyis bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan sangs rgyas rnams// thams cad bdag po rgyal po che// thog ma med nas spyod
162b6(rgyud): rmad byung // sna tshogs chen po rnam mi rtog/ sna tshogs ye shes yon tan che// bla med chos kun dbang po ste// rig dang sngags kyi bdag po che// de nyid chen po snying po mchog/ blo rmongs phyag rgya rgyas 'debs
162b7(rgyud): te/ rgyas 'debs rmongs byed zab pa po// gtong dang byed pa khyab pa che// skyong ba sdig pa 'phrog par byed// sdig pa'i chos rnams sel bar byed// dus ngan 'dod byed khros pa po// gti mug chos rjes 'debs
162b8(rgyud): par byed// sa dang bar snang de sbyin bde// de bzhin rnal 'byor dang ba sbyin// tshangs dang gtogs 'dod dbang chen pos// de la phyag dang mchod pa byed// de nyid skyong byed skyob pa po// gsang ba'i gas
163a1(rgyud): ba 'di che// thugs cig sde lus byung ba'i// sbas pa chen po gsang bskon// nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje// de bachen po byin mdzad de// skyel ldan nye bar longs snod kun/ 
163a2(rgyud): bud med thams cad dbang byed pa// rang byung mtshan du thig le ste// bcu gsum dra ba dbu ru ldan// 'dri yis bud med bskyed byi ste// sa bon gyi ni rgyal pos 'du// 'od zer rab brjid 'bar ba can/ dkor los/ 
163a3(rgyud): myu gur 'dra ba yis// 'og gi phyogs su gzhag pa ni// hri byas myur du drang por bya// ding pi drang ba gnyis drang bas// tshig drag des ni lcags kyu byas// lha dang lha min mchog gi bdag/ khams gsum
163a4(rgyud): thams cad drang bar byed/ 'di yi tshul gyis sbyor bas ni// pha ni tshun du ni sgrub byas nas// rmad byung rnam pa sna tshogs kyi// dngos grub byed pa sbyin par byed// bdug nyid rang bzhin mthong bar bya// sbyor ldan zla
163a5(rgyud): ba'i gzugs nyid du// da steng sa bon bzhag par bya// de nyid de nyid thabs kyis gnas// sngags kyi sbyor ba rab sbyor bas// de nas sngags mkhan der 'grub po// de nyid sngags dang snying po dang // phyag rgya rig
163a6(rgyud): dang mig ldan pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpo' yang // 'grub pa nyid du yongs mi 'gyur// de nyid nang du sbyar byas na// snying po snying khar sbyor ba yos// phyag rgya phyag rgyas sbyar bar bya// gsang ba sngag
163a7(rgyud): kyi 'bru bsgoms te// rig ma rig ma nyid du sbyar// 'di yis myur du drangos grub ste// mgyogs par 'gro ba rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas kun gyi sa chen por// 'byung dang 'byung las 'gyur ba nye// rnal
163a8(rgyud): 'byor 'byor don sgrub pa po// dpa' bo chen po 'gro 'ong byed// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu mgo rangs par gyur nas// rdo rje'i dbyangs 'di bsgrogs te// e ma'o kun du bzang po yi// 
163b1(rgyud): rdorje theg pa bla na med// bshad pa gsung ba zhes bgyi ba// de nyid don kun sgrub pa ste// snying po phyag rgya dam tshig 'di// sngags rig rang gi lha nyid de// bdag gi de nyid de bzhin pa// gsang ba rgyal ba mchog gi//

163b4(rgyud): dgas bdag nyid bskul ba dang // sdig pa thams cad sbyang ba dang // bud med thams cad 'dod byed dang // bdud rnams thams cad drang bya dang // rdo rje kun du gzhug bya dang // pad mo'i gnas ni dged bya dang /

163b8(rgyud): phyag rgya bzhi pa ste// phyag rgya chen pos rjes su bsgrubs// rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed mdzad de// kye ma'o bde ba rnam par 'byung // snying po ye shes zhes bya ste// ye shes bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ 
164a1(rgyud): / 9/ phyag rgya'i shes phyag rgya che// dam tshig mchog ni rig ma'o// sngags kyiye shes tshul 'drag/ yig ge'i phyag rgya don chen sbyin// 'di yis bsgrub pa bya ba'i gzugs// bdag gi de nyid lta de nyid// de dgra de nyid ci

164b4(rgyud): dgas ro myang bde dam pa// lha dang lha nyid yang dag sbyor// 'di ni gnyis su med ces bya// snyibang phyug rgya sngags rig kyis// nyid kyi gzugs ni bsgrub bya ste// bdag nyid sems dpa' zhes brtsams na// 'di ni gnyis med myur du 'gyur//

166b8(rgyud): dgongs pa ngos par 'grel pa chen po phyag mdzod de mngon du yang dag par bskul nas dris pa/ sur ta sti mas to// gang gis 'dod pa bde che la// gang gis 'dod pa byang chub 'gyur// 'dod chags bral na ci ltar bde// gang / 
167a1(rgyud): @/ gis zhes sdang rdo rje che// gang gis gti mug rgyal ba che// gang gis 'dod chags pad mor 'gyur// gang gis nga rgyal nam mkha'i bdag/ gang gis phrag dog gdon mi za// byang chub sems ni ji ltar bde// gang
167a2(rgyud): gis bde byed mchod par 'gyur// mchod pa yis ni rtam grub// ji ltar gzungs dang mnyam sbyor bas// yi ge'i mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur// ji ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga// bstan pa yis ni myur du 'grub// ji ltar gsod
167a3(rgyud): pa mnyam sbyor bas// rmad du byung ba'i dbang bskur 'gyur// ji ltar pad mo mnyam sbyor bar// dkyil 'khor rab tu 'jug pa'i 'gyur// ji ltar de chu byang chub dang // dmar dang snang mdzad chen po yis// dam tshig nyid du ji ltar 'gyur// ji
167a4(rgyud): ltar btung ba rab tu brtag/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shin du dgas pa chen po'i kun du bzang pos/ rdo rje pha rol du phyin pa'i gsang ba chen mo de dag thams cad la/ rang gi bde bas mnyes par byas te/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i
167a5(rgyud): spras pa chen po// shin du sbas pa mchog tu gsang ba'i dris lan chen po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // ngan song gsum gyi 'jigs byed du/ sems can nyon mongs sdang byed pas// de yi phyir na rdo rje che// zhe sdang
167a6(rgyud): zhes ni bsgrags pa yini// ngan song 'jigs pa chen po ru// sems can thams cad rmongs byed pas// de yi phyir ni gti mug che// rtag pa thub pa mchog yin no// thabs dang shes rab tshul nyid kyis// 'gro ba thams cad dga'
167a7(rgyud): byed cing // khad mos pad+ma mo phye ba'i phyir// de bI 'dod chags zhes bya'o// bde chen sbyin pa'i sprin gyis ni// sems can thams cad dang rgyal bskyed// nam mkha' bde ba bsdus pa'i phyir// dpyir mkhan chen rgyum
167a8(rgyud): don chom sogs pa'i mnyes gyu bapa// khrag dgi rdo rngogadon mog/ sna tshogs pad ma nga 'dug byed// de byer de na sa tshogs che// 'did chags bras pa dga' med phyir// bdag ni rab dgas sbas pa chen 'dod/ 
167b1(rgyud): ma rtogs bde byed med// bde byed 'dod pa nga yin no// 'dod chags med par byang chub med// byang chub med na'ang 'dod chags med// sdig pa'i nang na chags bral med// sangs rgyas bde mchog mnyes byed pas// 'dod chags
167b2(rgyud): 'di las bde byed kyi// bde byed chen po rmad byung 'gyur// byang chub sems med bai de byed gzhan// 'jig rten gsum po 'dir mad do// thams cad byang chub sems ngo'o// bde byed thams cad thob par 'gyur// po zhes pa ni rdo
167b3(rgyud): rjer bshad// d+hi zhes pas ni gzungs ma mchog/ ci zhes pas ni zag par bshad// ta zhes pas ni bde ba che// mchod pa med pas bde byed med// bde ba med pas mgu ba med// mgu bas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// grub
167b4(rgyud): ni bde byed rtag pa yin// phyag na rdo rje bde ba tshe// 'dod pa'i mchod pas bde byed cing // tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// bde byed thams cad mnyam gzhag pas// chos kyi dbyings ni rnam par 'dzin// rdo rje 'dzin phyir gzug
167b5(rgyud): ma ste \u0f7fha zhes pas ni pad mo 'dzin// 'di dang mnyam par sbyor ba yis// yi ge myur du 'grub par 'gyur// 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan kun// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa ste// sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje 'dzin// 'khor/ 
167b6(rgyud): lo bsgyur ba'i longs spyod do// de phyir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga// de yis bsnyen na 'grub par 'gyur// sngags kyi sku 'dzin dpal dang ldan// dbang phyug gis ni sngags bshad do// rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs las skyes/ 
167b7(rgyud): mtshan can mchog tu spros par bshad// de dang mnyam du sbyor ba yis// mchog gi dbang ni 'grub par 'gyur// pad mo dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par byed// blo ldan de ru zhugs gyur/ 
167b8(rgyud): ni// dam tshig sbas pa tshogs kyi rnams// dri chu byang chub dmar po mchog/ sha chen sbrang rdzi mar nyid kyis// lus la kun du khyab gnas te// de yi phyir na dam tshig che// dam tshig 'di ni dngos grub ste// dam tshigs// 
168a1(rgyud): / ger ldan pa gyis// sbyor chen sbyar dang spyod byas nas// chos dang byung chub thob par 'gyur// de nas pa ros byin mthun// da mo rgyas pa gzigs pa yi// 'dus bcas gnon nas gar mang cing/ dag
168a2(rgyud): pa la ni yang gsol ba// rigs ni rnam pa du ru bshod// ji ltar sbas pa gsum zhes bgyi// sna tshogs chen pos de dag kun// bde la gnas pas bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
168a3(rgyud): gnyis su med pa'i mnye ba nyid bde ba chen mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'di nyid las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchog tu gsang ba pha rol du phyin pa'i de
168a4(rgyud): kho na nyid ratu phyung ngo // nga nyid sbyor ba bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' don chen sbyin// rigs kyi khyad par lnga rnams kyi// spyod bcas mi spyod rnam par rol// rtag pa mi bskyod rin chen 'byung // 'jigs dbang gdon mi za
168a5(rgyud): grub rnams// rigs ni rnam pa rgyo bstan te// mdo ru sdus na rnam pa lnga// lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyi// khyad par theg pa rnam po gsum// rdo rje nga nyid de nyid gsum// bde ba'i gnas la rab tu rol// de nas bcom ldan 'das
168a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te/ rang gi sdom pa gsol ba 'debs so// sdom pa dngos grub kun sbyin pa// brtul zhugs dka' thub sngags mkhan gyi// dam tshig mchog tu bsrung ba rnams// bcom ldan gas/ 
168a7(rgyud): ba nyid kyis gsung // de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen po mchog tu dgos pa'i bde bas/ bde ba la mngon par chags pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab par mkhyen te/ zhal rab tu
168a8(rgyud): ba'ad pas rgyas nis nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo // sku dang gsung dang thugs sbas pa// nan tan du ni bsrung bar bya// bsrungs pa yis ni bsod nams che// dngos grub shin du skye bar 'gyur/ deni
168b1(rgyud): de'i rgyu che ba'i// yid kyi kha dog dbyibs rten gyis// phyag rgya bcings la sogs pas gdag/ smras pa'i spu ni rab bsgrub bya// rdo rje gsung dur ba sbyor bas// chos kyi nga bo phyag rgya brjod// ngag sbas gsang bar brjod pa ni/ nga ro spangs
168b2(rgyud): ba rdo rje'i gsung // rang sems rab tu 'jigs pa yi// zla ba rdo rje rnam par sgom// rang gi ba gsum gcig sgom// 'di ni yid sras chen po yin// 'di ni de yi rgya chen mchog/ rgyun du sgom pa rnam byas te// gsum sbyor bas ni 'grus
168b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur// gzhan min rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs// sbas gsum la stsogs cho ga yis// phyag rgya thams cad rgyas btab ste// de nas nan tan thams cad kyis// sbas pa gsum rnams sba bar bya// rdo rje mchog 'dzin chen po dang // 
168b4(rgyud): gtso bo chen pos byin gyis rlob// blun po gang zhig 'das byas na// rdo rje 'dzin pa'ang skad cig 'jig/ sems dpa' che dang bral gyur na// ngan song gsum du yang dang yang // ji tsam nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ba// shin du mi
168b5(rgyud): bzad smin par 'gyur// de nas dam tshig de dag kun// rdo rje 'dzin la mgu bar 'gyur// 'jam pa'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing // g.yon gyis phyag byas slar gsol pa// gar dbang rnams gdon gar mdzad cing // 
168b6(rgyud): mtha' yas phyag ni bcu yi 'gyings pa yis// bud mi'i lo ma 'jam po brgyad phyin// gnyis med bde ba rdo rje 'jog mdzad de// spras pa de nyid mi mnyam gsang bar 'gyur// rdo rje 'dam skyes zla ba yang dag tu// thabs dang
168b7(rgyud): shes rab dges pa bde byed la sogs pa// bde gshegs rnams kyi smras pa nyid kyis shod// sbyor dang sbyor dang yang dag sbyor// zhi ba'i thal mo mchog tu bde// 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan 'grub// sangs rgyas
168b8(rgyud): byang chub bsgrub pa'o// de nas bcom ldan ma tshig rgyal// rdo rje sems dpa' bde cheg// nyid kyi smras pa bskul ba yis// sras pa ma lus mchad par mdzad// rdo rje pang mo mnyam sbyor bas// chog ldan sa
169a1(rgyud): 'ang dbang bskur// bde bar 'dod pa'i slob dpon gyis// de nyid de ni de la bstan// 'di la khrus byed nges pa med// dka' thub med de dka' ba'ang med// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// nga
169a2(rgyud): nyid sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// rdo rje dbab pa skyes gyur na// ji tsam 'dod par nam mkhar 'gyur// snying khar rdo rje khu tshur bcing // rdo rje blta bas rnam ltas
169a3(rgyud): te// dgos pa'i tshul gyis mnyes byas na// rdo rje sems dpa'ang skad cig 'gyur// rnam basmyig dges pa'i rnam gnon pas// rab dgos par ni 'gro byed do// sangs rgyas bde ba chen po dang // grub pa yis kyang mchod byed
169a4(rgyud): mthong // rdo rje sems dpa' rgya chen mchog/ 'gying pa'i longs pas gar byed pas// bde byed zla ba'i 'od 'dra zhing // las kyi khyab par la sogs gnod// sbas pa'i gar gyis gar bya ste// sbas dang sbyor ba'i bdag nyid 'grub/ 
169a5(rgyud): sna tshogs dkyil 'khor gar bya dang // lag pa mang po rnam bsgyur dang // spyir brkyang dbyibs su ldan pa dang // khro 'bar dri med lta ba yis// gdul dka' gnod pa'i 'jigs byed pa'i// 'jig rten gsum po rgyal bar
169a6(rgyud): 'gyur// me 'bar nyi ma'i dbus nyid du// khro bo hUM mdzad bsgom byas na// myur du 'jig rten don sgrub phyir// 'jig rten gsum po rnam rgyal 'gyur// lha mo bzhi dang mnyam sbyor bas// su ra ta s+t+waM spu bya zhing // ha ra thig le'i
169a7(rgyud): tshul sbyar ni// rab dges de mi thag tu 'gyur// rab dges mchog tu rtag pa yis// sa chen rnal 'byor gtsor 'gyur te// lha mo bzhi dang 'gro ba yis// sems can kun gyi don kun byed// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
169a8(rgyud): cad bde ba chen po la phyag bzhes nas gsol pa// thal mo yang dag sbyar bya ste// phyag rgya de dag nyid kyis shod// rdo rje mchog la gsol ba 'debs// bde ba bdag nyid mchod pashod// gzugs dang sgra dang dri chen dang / 
169b1(rgyud): 'grub thag don mi za bar che 'di nyid la// rtag pa 'dra ba thob par byed// g.yon gyi de nyid snying khar gzhag/ g.yas pa sa la reg byas pa// sa la bde bar rol pa yis// 'di yis mi bzad thob par 'gyur// de bzhin snying khar gson/ 
169b2(rgyud): pa gzhug/ rtag pa 'dra ba thob par 'gyur// g.yas pa mchog ni rab sbyin pa// 'di yis rin chen skal ldan srogs// nam mkha' nye bar 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin g.yon pa snying khar bzhag/ g.yas pa bkan te ting 'dzin gnas// 
169b3(rgyud): de yis tshe dpag med pa nyid// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// de bzhin g.yon pa snying khar bzhag/ lag pa g.yas kyis mi 'jigs sbyin// 'jigs pa ma lus rab sgrol ba// sdig pa gdug pa 'jigs pa ste// de yis thams cad
169b4(rgyud): 'phrog par byed// gdon mi za ba'i nges pa'i tshe// 'di ni chen po'i chen por 'gyur// de bzhin bcing ba gnyis byas te// g.yon pa g.yon du sbyar bas bya// g.yas ni snying khar bzung byas te// brjid pas rab tu bzhad cing gnas// bde
169b5(rgyud): ba chen po thabs gnas pas// 'di yis rab dgas nyid 'gyur te// bde mchog nyid du sgrub pa po// tshe 'di nyid la the tsom med// de bzhin bcing ba gnyis byas te// sbyor dang ldan pas gtan paraba~M po rtse mor pad mo gnas// 
169b6(rgyud): g.yon gyi khro bo rtse mor sbyor// g.yas pa yis ni sbom po yis// mngon sum rdo rje sbyor ba yis// bcug nas bde ba bskyod bya zhing // skad cig skad cig bsdam par bya// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dgos pa dges mchog/ 
169b7(rgyud): sgrub pa po// 'di ni bcing ba tsam gyis kyang // yang dag rdo rje dges pa 'thog/ rab dges longs spyod bde mchog gis// btsun mo dngos grub de nyid 'gyur// g.yas kyi mtshan ni drangs byas te// lcags kyu'i tshul du bzhag par bya// 
169b8(rgyud): rdo rje 'dod pa'i lcags kyu ste// rdo rje 'dod byed btsun mo yi// rnal 'byor 'di yis bcings pa yis// rab dges la sngogs ma lus ma// rab dgas rol pas bgyings pa yis// skad cig tu ni 'dren par 'gyur// de bzhin
171a1(rgyud): / sbom po'i rtse mor sbyar// tsA pa chen por der bzhag pa// bskal ba chen po rdo rje'i stan// de nyid don kun skyon byed ma// 'don mang dag bcings pa yis// rdo rje drug pa'i sman du 'gyur// da dang med pa rnams
171a2(rgyud): spangs pa// dngos po thams cad mthong bar 'gyur// rdo rje thal sbyar bstan byas te// khro ma rtse mo rnam pa yis// mthon por mtshan dang 'dra byas te// sbom por rdo rje bstan pa ste// de 'di bcom ldan 'das ma mchog/ rdo rje pangs
171a3(rgyud): bde thob byed// rnal 'byor 'di ni bcings pa yis// sbas pa chen po dges pa 'thob// de nas lha mo chen mo dag/ spro ba chen pos gar mdzad cing // rdo rje bde byed bdag nyid la// bdud dang bcas pas phyag byas te// chos kyi yi ga
171a4(rgyud): thabs gnas nas// de nyid kyis ni gsol ba 'debs// chos kyi phyag rgya bde ba che// rdo rje bcom ldan bshad du gsol// sgrub pa po yis rab bsgrims na// gang gis lha ni sgrub par 'gyur// gang gis myur du byon brlabs nas// sangs/ 
171a5(rgyud): rgyas byang chub rab bsgrubs te// bde byad kun gyi spro ba che// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas 'jug 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo thams cad kyis gsol ba gtab par mkhyen nas/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung
171a6(rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje sbas pa las chos kyi rgyal po phyag rgya chen po'i tshig 'di phyung ngo // bcu gsum bdag nyid 'dren pa che// thig le ltar ni yang dag ldan// tha mar ha ra thig le gnas// rab tu dge ba'i rdo rje dgas// snying khar phyag
171a7(rgyud): rgya 'di byas na// rab dgas lhan cig rtsen byed cing // spyod dang mi spyod 'grub 'gyur te// rnal 'byor bde ba chen por 'gro// de bzhin 'dren pa thog mar bya// rdo rje 'dod pa kyo bar mchog/ ha ra thig le yang dgu ldan// cha gnyis
171a8(rgyud): gsum pa sbyar byas te// 'di ni snying khar bzhag byas na// de bas nam mkhar 'gro 'gyur te// bde ba shin du rtag pa yi// 'di yis mchog tu dngos grub bo// 'dren pa de nyid thog mar bzhag/ ltos ltos zhes pa hUM dang ldan// 
171b1(rgyud): bskal pa chen po rdo rje'i spyan// dbus su bskul bas 'grub par 'gyur// 'phrul gyi spyan mnga' nor che ba// 'di yis rnal 'byor 'grub 'gyur te// rdo rje byang chub dges pa che// sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur// 
171b2(rgyud): dang por 'dren par de nyid bzhag/ tha mar har thig le bya// rdo rje rab dges bde thob byed// mang ni dbus su bri bar bya// 'di yis snying khar byas pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i mchog 'gro// phyag rgya bzhi dang 'grogs pa yis// 
171b3(rgyud): lus 'dis tshe 'dis 'grub par 'gyur// rab dges sbyor ba yang dag zhon// phyag rgya bzhi dang mnyam 'grogs shing // rdo rje 'gying la sogs sprod pas// bcom ldan 'dod ma 'grub par 'gyur// chos kyi de kho na nyid kyi don gyi ye shes kyi/ 
171b4(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// de nas bcom ldan sbyor ba che// thog ma tha ma med pa mchog/ gdug pa thams cad gdul ba'i phyir// rdo rje khro bor rab 'gyur ro// mdun du thog ma'i lha nyid kyi// rdo rje hUM mdzad nyi ma 'bar// nyi ma bcu gnyis gzi brjid che/ 
171b5(rgyud): me bzhin rab tu 'bar bar ldan// 'khor gyi 'khor lo de dag kun// dur khrod kyi ni rgyan mchog gis// brgyan te gdug pa'i tshogs rnams dang // de ni yang dag rol pa mdzad// khro chen mchog 'dul phyag rgya 'di// sngags rig rang gi snying / 
171b6(rgyud): khar sgom// khro mo'i bu mo bdun du bskor// khro chen mo ni de 'grub bo// 'di ni gdug pa thams cad rnams// hUM byas myur du brgyal bar byed// de nas gdug pa gdug pa che// 'jigs shing 'khrugs te rab tu 'jigs// skyobs shig skyobs
171b7(rgyud): shig ces smra zhing // rdo rje gtso la dran par byed// phyag rgya 'di ni mnyam gzhag nas// 'gro ba thams cad dbab byas te// las mchog thams cad sgrub pa pos// dgra yi rnams ni gzhig par bya// sbyor dang ldan pas 'bum bzlas te// las
171b8(rgyud): rnams thams cad byed pa na// gdon mi za bar kun 'gyur te// rdo rje sems dpar sgrub par nus// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// khro bo'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so// // de nas sangs rgyas che de dag
172a1(rgyud): // sangs rgyas nyid kyi thams cad mchog// gzungs ma rnal 'byor ma thams cad// rang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tshogs// pan tshun bde bar ldan pa yi// dga' bar 'khor rnams 'phags gyur te// rang gi
172a2(rgyud): bde byed skyes par 'brel// skal ba chen po brtson par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin du dgas pa chen pos/ rang gi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i tshigs rnams la/ yang dang yang du gzigs te/ de bzhin gshegs
172a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi 'dren pa'i rig ma'i snying po 'dis bsdud par mdzad do// oM badz+ra a g+hu sha du ru du ruM/ a h+ye hi/ d+ha/ da d+hi ga d+hi/ da p+ta sa rA par shad tsa kra san tsa ya/ badz+ra a g+hu sha hUM phaT// 'di'i phyag rgya rdo rje yi// bcing ba
172a4(rgyud): gnyis ni dam byas te// rdo rje khro mo dkrol bar bya// rdo rje kyo bar rab sbyor ba// rdo rje kyo baM zhes bya'o// 'gro dang ri bro sems can rnams// 'di yis de dag kun 'gugs te// 'dod pas 'gying ba'i yid rtag rnams// mi yi bu
172a5(rgyud): mo smos ci dgos// rdo rje bcing ba mnyam gzhag ste// g.yon gyi steng du de dag bzhag/ dbus su sbom po bzhag par bya// rdo rje 'dren pa gzi brjid che// rdo rje bcings pa bsdam bya ste// rdo rje sbom po rtse mo sprad// bdag ni rdo rje zhe
172a6(rgyud): sgom zhing // btsang ba de ni dgrol bar bya// de nyid bcing bdam byas te// dbang dang chu ngu'i rtsa ba'i mtshams// rdo rje sbom po nub byas te// rab dgas bdag nyid bskyod par bya// de las rdo rje mchog nyid bskyod// 'dud pa'i chus/ 
172a7(rgyud): du sbyar bar bya// gzhug pa dang ni 'dren pa mchog/ 'di yis thams cad dngos grub pas// rnal 'byor phyag rgya 'di nyid kyi// drangs te bcug nas bcing byas te// dbang du byas nas bsgrub par bya// de nas de dag thams cad
172a8(rgyud): drangos// bcug pa bcings pa dga' bskyed nas// rang gi dgos pa bde chen pos// rang gi rgyal srid rjes skyong zhing // rdo rje chos la bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshul chen po// dga' byed zla gsang thig le yi// rab dge
172b1(rgyud): bdag nyid gsang ba 'di// sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis zung // de nas gdan las myur bzhengs nas// thal mo sbyar te phyag bzhes nas// chos kyi ngo bo'i tshig smra ba// bde ba chen po bdag gis blang // rab bde longs spyod gar byas te// 
172b2(rgyud): / rdorje tshe yis 'di skad sbas// rdo rje chos ni sna tshogs che// sna tshogs pad mo gar rab byed// de nas pha rol phyin de kun// rab dges longs spyod gar byed cing // bde byed chen po bdag nyid rje// legs pa zhes pa sbyin byin te// leg/ 
172b3(rgyud): so legs so bde ba che// legs so legs so ye shes tshe// legs so legs so sna tshogs che// legs so le gas so dges pa che// bcom ldan 'das dges pa'i thugs kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// pha rol phyin
172b4(rgyud): ma'i 'khor de dag/ mngon par dga' bar gyur to// rgyud kyi rgyal po zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po mchog tu gsang ba yongs su rdzogs s+ho// // gsung rabs don rtogs slob dpon gyis// lhag
172b5(rgyud): par bkrol te bstan pa la// ci rigs bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyis// sems can bde ba thob par smon// / @#/ 1/ rgya gar skad du/ shr-i ma hA kA la a b+hu d+hA ya tan+ta ra dza na ma/ bod skad du/ dpal mgon
172b6(rgyud): po nag po mngon par 'byung ba/ zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig ni/ bcom ldan 'das sku dang
172b7(rgyud): gsung dang thugs btsun mo'i bA ga la bzhugs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ rdo rje'i lus nges par mnyam par 'dod pa la/ tshig gang dang gang gis de kho na nyid de bzhin nyid du bsnyen pa byas nas/ sa stengs
172b8(rgyud): ci'i phyir mi 'grub// lha mos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das ci'i don du gsungs pa lags/ nges par sems can rnams yang dag pa'i rmongs pa'i don du 'am/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi mchog
173a1(rgyud): 1/ thob pa dang / bral bas nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis med par smra ba'i sa de'i lus rnams ji ltar thob/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ rdo rje bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu rmongs/ lha mo dngos spangs
173a2(rgyud): dngos po med pa med de/ bden pa zhes bya ba gang yang med gang de nyid dam pa dang bral ba/ lus dang sems dang sems las byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mos pa'o// lha mos zhus pang / kye bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi
173a3(rgyud): mtshan nyid ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ ngas sems can gyi don yongs su brtags nas/ dang po nyan thos la sogs pa la brten nas/ phyi nas rim gyis theg pa chen po bstan te/ sems med sems
173a4(rgyud): las byung ba yang med/ kun gzhi yang med/ don ji lta ba 'di spangs pa yang med/ skye ba'i gnas ni ji ltar 'gyur/ lha mos zhus pa/ skye bar 'gyur ba ga la yod/ lha mo de'i phyir/ ro gcig par 'dus pa/ ji ltar gnyis ka
173a5(rgyud): yang thabs ston pa'i don du 'gyur ba/ ji ltar thabs gang 'gyur ba bskyod pa'i gzhi ni gnas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ gal te lha mo sems can gyi phyir zhus pa/ de nyid bskyed pa'i gzhi ni bshad par bya/ kye
173a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gleng pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i ngag la spro ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ sgom pa sgom du med pa la ji ltar nyams su myong bar yod/ sgrar med pa la de'i lus su 'gyur ba yin/ yid
173a7(rgyud): la mi byed pa mnyam bsngo ba ji ltar gnas pa'i rnal 'byor du 'gyur/ kun du ru med par 'gyur na/ thabs dbye ba med pas thabs su ji ltar 'gyur ba yin/ sems dang sems las byung ba yang / seng ge dang stag gis dbang
173a8(rgyud): du byed pa ltar byed pa'o// lha mos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das lus la rtsa du mchis// ji ltar phung po la sogs pa'i rtsa lags/ gal te de ltar gyur na de bzhin du rdul phra rab kyi rdul du 'gyur ro// lus su rnam
173b1(rgyud): ban+d+ha rtog pa med pas rmongs par nges pa rtogs/ brtags pas chos kyi 'khor lo dang / sprul pa'i 'khor lo dang / longs spyod dang / mgrin pa gnyis 'byung ngo // lus kyi 'khor lo rnams su 'gro bar byed pa'o// rtswa'i na na
173b2(rgyud): lo rnam par gzhag pa'i rims pas yang dag par 'phrogs pa la/ ji ltar mgon po nag por 'gyur/ chen po ni mtha' ste dus so// gang gi lus 'jig par 'gyur ba'o// de ni mgon po nag po'i dus kyi grangs ni de bzhin du/ 
173b3(rgyud): bgrang ba'i zhes pa'i don to// de 'di ltar ni mgon po nag po'o// de ltar byed pa rnams thams cad du rab tu gnas pa'o// 'di byed pa ji ltar sbyor ba byed pa'i gnas/ gang gis rtogs par bya ba rtogs par byed pa'o// rtog
173b4(rgyud): pa'i lus rjes su gnas pa'i go 'phang du 'gyur bas/ de bzhin 'khor lo rnam par gnas zhes pa'o// mi phyed pas rdo rje bum par mnyam sbyar bas sgrub par 'gyur ba'i dngos po med pa'i rtag pa de nyid ji lta ba'i rim par
173b5(rgyud): sbyor ba'i lha mo yongs su rdzogs pa'i lha mi brgyad/ 'khor lo'i rim pas rnam par gzhag pas/ thabs dang shes rab 'od 'dus pas/ dri ma med pa gang las skyes pa'i mi de sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ro// lha mo pad
173b6(rgyud): myo'i nang gi tshul zhes pa ni/ lha mos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis grangs su bgrang bar bya/ shin du phra ba'i rdul rnams la de rol pa'i de nyid skye bo med pa'i gnas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
173b7(rgyud): pa gal te 'di ngas smras pa/ lha mo dang mnyam pa dang tshul gyis phyogs pas so// lha mos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das dang por sgom pa'i ming tsam mang po yin dngos grub rjes su lhag par gnas pa'o// ji ltar
173b8(rgyud): de nyid de bzhin du 'gyur ba'i sgom par bya ba nyid bsgoms paso// thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa'i dus su mnyam par 'gyur ba ni ji ltar sdig pa bu bzhin du 'dod chags chen po rjes su chags pas
174a1(rgyud): zhugs par 'gyur ba'o// thabs kyi gnas su 'khor mo'i rim pas rnam par gzhag pa yang dag par sbyor ba byed pa de nyid la spro ba'o// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig sems dpa' dam tshig gi mdang / 
174a2(rgyud): bdag zhes byas sems rjes su gnas pa'o// nag po chen po'i rgyud las lha mo kha sbyor zhus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // dri nas yang sngags kyi le'u bshad par bya ste/ 'gro ba rnams bsrung ba'i don du bgegs kyi lha
174a3(rgyud): log par 'dren pa yang dag par bstan pa 'di byas pas/ nag po chen po'i gtor ma bstan pas// oM in da dzA lA sa ma ka pe D+ha bA d+hi sa ma ku laM dza le tsa sAM ga rak+ShaHmo ha saM pu D+ha ma hA ka la ti tri bu ba na/ rak+Sha Thi Ta sa d+ha ka/ 
174a4(rgyud): / dzA sa hiHi d+hi ba li phu la du pa dzaM pu ti maM sha ra ka ta ka tha ri sa tsa ma Da Ni d+ha me pha ha/ bag+na a DA ma ra swA hA/ oM saR+Ya mu kha ma hA ka la a hUM phaT swA hA// gtor ma 'di gnod sbyin thams cad dang 'byung po rnams la nye bar mchod
174a5(rgyud): sa rnal 'byor pa bkra shis par 'gyur ba'o// de nas de nyid 'dod pa'i gtor ma ni gnod sbyin dang 'gro ba rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba ste/ dbang dang mngon spyod dgra'i sde rnams bsad pa dang skrod par byed pa/ zhi ba dang
174a6(rgyud): rgyas par byed par 'gyur ro// gtor ma byin nas gal te gnod sbyin gyi tshogs rnams thams cad la lha mos gsol pa/ ser sgyu ma'i phyag rgya dang mgon po'i phyag rgya dang / tsa ra tsi ka'i phyag rgya gang ni lags/ bcom ldan
174a7(rgyud): 'das mtho che la lags na/ bdag la gsal bar bshad du gsil// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sku dang gsung dong thugs kyi dbye ba yis/ 'khor lho'i dbus su rab tu gsang ba'i chad pa dang dag pa ni
174a8(rgyud): dbus su gnas pa rnams 'khor lo'i dbus su gnas pa rnams 'khor lo'i dbus su rnam par gzhog pa ser skya ma'i lus kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba'o// tsar tsi rdo rje mo'i dag 'dod chags kyi phyag rgya'i thugs / 
174b1(rgyud): rje nyid du 'gyur ro// lha mos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das lha mo rnams kyi sngags kyi sa bon/ bag chags rtog pa'i dra ba rnams kyis ji ltar du 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ lha mo nyon cig sngags rnams
174b2(rgyud): ji ltar 'gyur ba sems can gyi don du snying rjes bdag gi gsum pa/ bdag gis ser skya ma la stsogs pa'i sa bon ni// oM po ga li ma hA ka li ni li hriM phaT swA hA// yig phyed dang bcu bzhi dang bcas pas sa stengs na mi 'grub
174b3(rgyud): pa gang yang med do// rengs pa la dkar po sgom mo// bsad pa la kha dog nag po/ bskrad po la kha dog ser po// dbang la kha dog dmar po// lhag ma rnams kyi nges par ser skya ma'i sngags so// oM tsa ra tsi ka badz+ra ni saR+Wa sid
174b4(rgyud): d+hi pra sA drA ye ta tsa ma ka li ka ra li tsuM hri swA hA/ yi ge nyi shu rtsa bdun po 'das thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// ji ltar ser skya ma yang 'dir yang bya'o// lha mos gsol pa/ mnga' bdag khyod bdag rnams kyis nus pa ji
174b5(rgyud): sbyar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ lho mo nyid 'di ltar bshad par bya ste/ nga'i ngag rnams thams cad las thams cad byed pa'o// sems can rnams la rab tu bsgrubs shig/ 'bad pa chen
174b6(rgyud): pos nges par sngags thos nas rgyud gang gis byin gyis brlabs na bde ba thams cad kyang rig pa'o// lha mo bde ba chen por nges par ngas bstan gyis/ gang dang gang sems can thams cad kyi rgyu nges so// oM ma hU~M hU~M dz+dza hU~M/ 
174b7(rgyud): TaswahA// ya~M ge bcubs phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten skyong ba'o// lha dang snyam sen dang / miding mi'am ci dang / srin po dang / 'byung po rnams dang / mi rnams kyis rab tu sgrub pas nus pa dang bcas pa de nyid
174b8(rgyud): byug pani pab nag pa chen papo'-i rdzogs so// mdu hU~M AThA// mig byed dang bdun gyis ba dpa chen sa rab tus seng ga sa grub thams cad 'thung gi/ phyag gnyis pa'in ga chen po po sngags med ma/ 
175a1(rgyud): martag pa dang namo tams/  d+hA thung sa m+b+ha ra sadu/ mig sum bcun gsum pa 'do ma bu thobs kyis bdas pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / dka byung / 
175a2(rgyud): dang / ngas steng gi dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// lha mos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das dus ji tsam na sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs dang / bsam gtan lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
175a3(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ skad cig me bzhi dang dga' ba bzhi'o// lha mo rnams kun gyis dus dang mkhyud pa'i dus kun du blta ba lags par gnas pa/ skad cig ma med par legs par gnas pa dngos po'i skyon med do// 
175a4(rgyud): ci'i phyir skad cig med par rab tu rtag par byed/ lha mos gsol pa/ sngags rnams smra bar 'dod pa thams cad ngas brjod par 'gyur/ gtum pa'i dbang phyug ma'i lha mo'i sngags so// oM tsaN Da a k+Shi ma hA kaM/ 
175a5(rgyud): ka li hri hUM phaT swA hA// yi ge phyed dang bcu bzhi pa 'di nyid yongs su bsgoms pa dang rab ldan pas bzlas pa'o// oM ma hA nan ti na ko so ra hUM phaT swA hA// mgon po nag po phyag drug pa'i sngags so// oM AHma raM hUM phaT/ 
175a6(rgyud): yi ge bdun pa dpa' bo chen po dkyil dkrung phyed pa mgon po nag po phyag gnyis pa'i sngags so// oM a maM hUM phaT phaT// yi ge drug pa 'di phyag bcu pa mgon po nag po'i sngags so// oM hUM hI maM yaM ba pe hUM phaT/ 
175a7(rgyud): yi ge dgu pa'i dbang po 'di ni phyag bcu gnyis pa mgon po nag po'i sngags so// oM hU~M hri hU~M hri laM haM skaM pheM tsaM d+haM khaM yaM ha~M na ha na g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya ho phaT swA hA// yi ge nyi shu rtsa bdun po 'dis ni rgyal po chen pos byin gyis/ 
175a8(rgyud): brlabs pa'i dpal mgon po phyag bcu drug pa'i sngags so// oM AHhUM sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so// oM me shud d+hi ku ru ku ru saR+Yan sa na hU~M phaT swA hA// chang sbyang ba'i sngags so// mo pa/ 
175b1(rgyud): b+h+rUM swA hA/ sha la sogs pa'i kha zas sbyang ba'i sngags so// oM k+ShaM bi da hi bdud rtsi sbyang ba'i sngags so// mo ra hUM btung ba'i khrag sbyang ba'i sngags so// oM sar+b+ba sa d+ha ni hri hUM phaT gAyo byad sna tshogs sbyang ba'i sngags
175b2(rgyud): so/ oM hri hri ka li dI bi maM raM ra ti mo ha badz+re ni sa ma ya pa la ya Di Do me b+ha be su to Sho mi b+ha ba/ saR+Wa ku ru hri ha ha ha ha ho phaT swA hA// dam tshig byin gyis brlabs pa shes rab la la mkhyud pa'i sngags so// oM sar+b+ba b+ha li pus/ 
175b3(rgyud): pa du ba gan da ma sa pur na de yaM raM hUM phaT swA hA// mkhyud pa'i dus su gtor ma gtong ba'i sngags so// oM a hUM pha rak+Sha rak+Sha pa la ya pa la ya bud+d+ha sha sa na a pa ka ri na kha khe khA hi khA haM phaT hUM shaM ta kr-i ma ra ya ma ra ye/ te ta ya
175b4(rgyud): ta d+ha yaHna sha ya na sha ya/ paM tsi mr-i ma hA ka la ya swA hA// me tog dang / smos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / bdud rtsi lnga dang / go ku da ha na la sogs pa ros yongs su gang ba nye bar spyod pa longs spyod pa thams cad sha
175b5(rgyud): da tsam bu ka ji srid du sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la phan pa'i phyir thun re la re re sbyin par bya'o// oM tsan Da a k+ShA me ta na na ti ni saR+Wa sha shaM na ku ru ku ru d+ha ho// hUM phaT swA hA// dam tshig rigs lnga la mkhyud par byin gyis/ 
175b6(rgyud): brlab pa'o// oM maM ma hA ti shwa ya hUM/ dam tshig yum la mkhyud par byin gyis brlab pa'i sa sngags so// oM b+h+r-i da na sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya hraM hUM hU~M phaT/ dam tshig sring mo la mkhyud cing byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so// oM
175b7(rgyud): ga mo ha sho d+ha ka li hUM phaT swAhA// dam tshig cha mo la mkhyud pa'i sngags so// oM gri pheM mahA a kra ma hA bin d+ha g+ho la ke/ bud med thams cad sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab bo// mnga' bdag mgon po nag po yis// 'gro
175b8(rgyud): rnams bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir// bdag gis gang gang gzugs 'gyur ba// bgegs rnams ngal nyan par gyis// snying rje chags dang ldan pa yis// byams pa'i sems ni srid pa yis// lus ni dngos po bzhi gnas pa/ 
176a1(rgyud): gang gi yan lag gru bzhi gran// rnam thar brgyad ni phyag bcad do// song pa bcu drug phyag bcu drug/ klu brgyad kyis ni brgyan pa ni// sangs rgyas lnga yi bdag nyid can// khro bo gdug pa thams
176a2(rgyud): cad 'dul// sku ni sar sbya ru ni bya// khrag ni tsar tsir ka ru brtags// khu ba gtum pa'i dbang phyug gnas// lha mo rkang gi zhag yin no// lha mos gsol pa// sngags rnams btu ba ji ltar blta// bde ba chen pos
176a3(rgyud): bshad du gsol// skye bo rnams sngags gang rnams dang ldan na las ji ltar 'grub par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa// rdo rje rdo rje snying por sku/ rdo rje can chen po'i lha mos nyon cig/ sngags kyi mtha' ji ltar
176a4(rgyud): 'gyur ba shes rab chen mos bshad do// sngags ni gsang ba gnyis 'dus pa ste/ rdo rje dang pad ma mnyam par sbyor ba bde ba chen po'i rnam par gsal bar rtogs par bya ba'o// oM yang dag par bsdus pa a hUM ngo // 'di/ 
176a5(rgyud): ni mgon po nag po'i sngags kyi le'u zhes bya ste// / gnyis pa'o// / de nas sngags kyi le'u bshad par bya ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba chos rnams thams cad mgon po nag po nyid de// lha mo le'o byas
176a6(rgyud): nas/ bzlas pa'i cho ga gsal bar bstan par bya ste/ dbang la tsan dan dmar pos bzlas par bya'o// rengs par byed pa la ni shel gyi phreng ba'o// mngon spyod dang dbye ba ni lung dang ngam mi'i rus pas bya'o// bskrad pa
176a7(rgyud): la rta'i mche ba'o// dgug pa la ni bram ze'i rus pa'o// char pa la ni glang po che'i rus pa'o// bslad pa la ma he'i rus pa 'am/ stag gi mche ba'o// rengs pa'i dus su 'o ma'i btung ba'o// dbang du bya ba la rang
176a8(rgyud): gang 'dod pa'o// dgug pa'i dus su ni gzhi mnyam mo// bsad pa la ni si ha la'o// dbye ba la ni sa li dza'o// bskrad pa ni gla rtsi'o// de nas rnam pa gzhag na ma swA hA la sogs pa blo dang ldan pas bskul bar bya'o// 
176b1(rgyud): bzlas pa'i cho ga bshad pa yid kyis cho ga sgom pa/ mi sgom pa rnam pa gnyis phyag rgya'i don nim pa'i shing la ri lu bya ma bya'i blun gyi sa la mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan par byas nas ri lu bya/ 
176b2(rgyud): dngos grub 'dod pas sgra chen pos bsgrubs na sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nyid gsungs pa mi gang byin gyis brlabs so// ma hi'i so blangs nas/ gza' mig dmar dang tshe sra brgyad la nges par 'chi par 'gyur
176b3(rgyud): ro&rta'i so tshes bcu bzhi gza' nyi ma 'am lhag pa'am phur bu la blangs na nges par bgrod par 'gyur ro// / bram ze'i rus pa nag po'i bcu bzhi'am/ tshes drug la ri lu byas pa bdud rtsi lnga dang / byi bru gyis la
176b4(rgyud): zla ba tshes gcig gi gaunam stong la glang po che'i so chos lnga gza' ba ba sangs sam spen pa la/ nyi ma gzes zin pa la blangs na ji lta bzhin du thams cad 'gyur ro// de kho na nyid bzhin du thams cad bzung nas su ste
176b5(rgyud): thams cad du 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'di ni yun mi ring byar nges par phyag rgyar 'grub pa'o// gzhan du ni nam yang ma yin no// mgon po nag po'i rgyud las bzlas pa'i le'u ste// gsum pa'o// / de nas/ 
176b6(rgyud): lha mos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das ji ltar du dga' ba grags pa bshad du gsol/ rim pa zhes bya ba ji ltar grags pa bdag nyan par mtshal lo// ji ltar longs spyod pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das
176b7(rgyud): kyis gsungs pa/ dga' ba dang po sna tshogs kyi skad gcig dang mchog tu dga' ba rnam par smin pa dang / rnam par nyed par dang / dga' bral dang / mtshan nyid dang / lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya'o// gsang
176b8(rgyud): ba spyod pa spyad byas pas// de ltar de bzhin yang bzhi pa// dga' ba la sogs pa rnams so// mkhyud pa'am bzhi'i grangs kyi rim pa'o// dgod pa dag pa slob dpon nyid// bral ba'i mtshan nyid de bzhin 'dir/ 
177a1(rgyud): gsang pa'i dbang bskur rnam pa bzhir grags pa'o// sems can rnams la dngos grub kyi rgyu'i phyin ro// lus la gtor ba dang / 'khrud pa dang / yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bya'o// 'dir brjod pas
177a2(rgyud): yang dag par brjod pas bya'o// rab tu sbyin pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ro// lag pa gnyis kyis bcu drug ma mkhyud pa'i spyod pa dang / rdo rje dril bu rab tu sbyor ba rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang zhes bya bar 'dod de/ gzugs
177a3(rgyud): dang lang tshe dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i bla ma las mthe bo dang ming med kyis/ slob dpon gyis khar yang dag par glugs par bya'o// rab tu mchod pa'i shes rab ma bla ma la gdas
177a4(rgyud): ba bul nas ston pas/ sems dpa' chen po bde ba'i don du phyag rgya zung shig/ slob mas cho ga 'di 'og nas slob ma bltas nas ngo mtshar chen gyur nas spro ba bskyed de/ de nas ston pas slob ma la rjes su snang ba
177a5(rgyud): byin te/ rdo rje dang pad ma mnyam par sbyor gyis shig ces brjod nas slob ma rdo rje 'chang du byas nas/ gsol ba bshad par bya ste/ ji ltar dbang gi don du gsol ba btab pa dang / phyag rgya dang ldan par bltas nas
177a6(rgyud): bstod pa dang mchod pa byas nas/ ji ltar nus pa'i don gyis so// lha mos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das mnyam par sbyor ba'i don de kho na nyid la ched du byed pas thams cad kyi mchog rnams su 'gyur ba'o// 
177a7(rgyud): de'i phyir na de'i dbang la 'bad pas nges par bla ma la mchod pa dang / ji ltar rigs pas mchod par bya'o// khyod ji ltar dpe yin po bdag nyid rnam par rtog par thams cad nyams par bya'o// khyod ni ji lta ba dang
177a8(rgyud): ldan pas gang sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rnams nyams par gyis/ bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba lam rnams don ji lta bar 'gyur ba bstan du gsol/ sngar gyi dbang bskur rim pa zhes bya ba'i rim pa
177b1(rgyud): dus dang dus min zhes bya'o// 'dir ni mgon po nag po'i rgyud las rdo rje dbang bskur ba rim par phye ba ste// / bzhi pa'o// de nas yang lha rnams kyis dbang bskur bya bshad par bya'o// dang
177b2(rgyud): po lha mo laM sogs pa rnams kyis bum pa'i dbang bskur bar bya'o// lha mo brgyad rnams kyis ni bdud rtsis so// mchod yon dang zhabs bsil byin nas/ stod pa dang sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / oM
177b3(rgyud): ka la sha a bi na ya na snu nam/ oM bud d+hAny+tsa ta ma to ta shrI swA hA/ chu'i dbang bskur ba byin pa dang / gad sarkyen dang snya ma kyis yol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gla rtsi dang dri zhim po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyun
177b4(rgyud): ro// sred med kyi bu la sogs pas byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro// lha rnams thams cad kyis dam tshig gis stong zhing srog la bab kyang stong par mi 'gyur ro// mgon po nag po'i rgyud las/ dbang bskur ba'i/

177b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das the tsom 'di rnams bsal du gsol/ 'di ltar bshad pa'i gar gyi nyams dang / glus 'grub par 'gyur ba the tsom mchis na/ glu 'am gar gyi don ji ltar lags/ lha dang dbang bskur
177b7(rgyud): nye bar bskur nye bar spyod pa ji ltar 'gyur ba lags zhes sdang la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas 'debs par 'gyur ba lags/ gang gis sa bon thams cad sngags kyi le'u la brjod nas/ lha mo'i sa bon gang rtog
177b8(rgyud): pa med pas skyes pa'o// gang ci gzugs can rnams kyi sa bon gyi mthu'am dam tshig rnams kyi spyod pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa// oM kr-i a g+ha Na pi Tha i ri ha ha ka re ma hA ka la u tsa
178a1(rgyud): myug d+hA swA mu sargyu sa / nardzo na du lag sa / 
178a2(rgyud): pu ra si h+la ka thu ri tsa su sa ma la saM so ma/ sha ra b+ha ra ma ko ta daM kha ma sa sa~M/ na tog ti sa kon mu rje sa saM/ ni raM shud mA la/ b+ha ra sa sa~M ta hi pa ni ma maM se ras tha na kun du rung mo a oM/ d+ha ma ru pad+hA tha lis ma// 
178a3(rgyud): rtag tu dpal mgon po nag po rnal 'byor gyis ji ltar bde ba sbyor bas skya reng shar ba dang bsam la chags pa'i sems kyis so// goms ni sems ni sngar rgyas pa dang / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rnam
178a4(rgyud): 'byor gyi ma'o// gzhan du ni ma yin no// glu 'di la goms pa'i glus mchog tu badre ba skye bar 'gyur ro// 'di nyid bdag bsrung ba dang / tshogs bsrung ba dang / bdud rtsi lnga dang / 'dis mchog tu gang dri
178a5(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur ba'i sngags bzlas pa 'di 'jig rten gyi 'bad pa 'jug pa 'bad pa med pa de'i phyir dngos grub rtag tu blang bar bya'o// rtag tu gar yang bya'o// yang dang yang du tshogs kyi 'khor lo de nyid la yang da
178a6(rgyud): por bya rgod kyi dri dang / gnyis pa dpal nyid kyi bu'i dri sna'i nye bar dmigs par 'gyur ro// gsum pa dri gla rtsi'i dri dang / gur gum la sogs pa'i dri sna tshogs mnyam par spyod par 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor/ 
178a7(rgyud): dbang phyug gi sa'o// de'i rjes la glus byin gyis brlabs pas bung ba'i sgra nyan pa dang / ngang pa dang / khu byug dang / go ma yu dang / gal te gor byed na thams cad dgra bzhin no// de nas glu'i tshogs
178a8(rgyud): byin gyis brlab pa ni/ phyi'i mi 'am ci dang / srad med kyi bu la sogs pa dag tshogs rnams kun du spyod par bya'o// grong khyer gyi mtha' 'am/ bskyed mos tshol lam/ nags tshal du nges par mtshon par bya'o// 
178b1(rgyud): ga rgyams ca sa ngas chub du gyur ro// sa mos gsoso pa/ bcom ldan das pa rnam pa g+h+ri pa'i sems can myi don byed par 'dod pa dang / bcud len byed par 'dod pa nums/ de bzhin du dum ma// 
178b2(rgyud): pade rnams kyis thabs ji ltar 'gyur ba po stan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'i stsal pa/ lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgyab ni ji ltar shes par bya/ de'i rjes su thams cad bstan du gsol// yang lha mos gsol pa/ 
178b3(rgyud): rim pa rnams ji ltar yid ches par bshad par bya/ gal te sems can gyi don thob pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ lha mongs le'u bshad par bya'o// rigs rnam pa lnga la zhugs nas gang
178b4(rgyud): ma re re 'bras bu dngos grub nges par thob par 'gyur ro// 'di ni mgon po nag po'i rgyud las/ yongs su spyod pa'i le'u ste// // drug pa'o// / thog mar nye bar mkho ba'i mchod pa dang / sdig pa/ 
178b5(rgyud): bshags pa la sogs pa tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi bsgoms nas/ oM shu ny+tsa ta dz+nyA n+yA badz+ra swa b+ha at+ma ko hUM/ byas nas sgyu ma'i spyod pa thams cad spyi ngas nas/ mgon po nag po zhal gsum dbu skra ser po 'dra
178b6(rgyud): ba gyen du brdzes pa/ sma ra smin ma 'bar ba/ mche ba gtsigs shing dgod pas 'jigs par mdzad pa shin du 'jigs zhal dang po gnag pa/ g.yon gyi dmar po// g.yas kyi zhal ljang khru/ stag gi
178b7(rgyud): sham thabs gos su gyon pa/ mi'i mgo bo'i phreng ba nye bar 'phyang ba/ thung zhing gsus pa 'phyang ba/ klu brgyad kyis gdebs kas brgyan pa'o// phyag brgyad pa g.yas g.yon gyi dang po gnyis kyi lha mo la
178b8(rgyud): mkhyud par gnyis pa gr-i gug/ gsum pa rdo rje/ bzhi pa Da mA ru/ phyag g.yon gyi gnyis pa na khrag gis gang bre'i thod pa/ gsum pa na ci gsum pa/ bzhi pa na dril bu/ rol zhon pa// zhabs g.yas/ 
179a1(rgyud): brkyang bar gnas pa// rnal 'byor ma bzhis yongs su basbyor ba/ shar du gtum pa'i dbang drug ma/ drug na gri gug dang thod pa bsdams pa/ kha dog dkar po sgo grol gam
179a2(rgyud): tha gaN+DIgs shing 'jigs por mdzad pa'o// lho'-i'i sgyum bu la tsar cag mdog nag mo gcer bu sa si sr-i buM/ lag pas thod pa dang gri gug bsdams pa/ nabs g.yon pa brkyang bas gnas pa/ 
179a3(rgyud): ba gtsigs pa la sogs pas 'jigs par mdzad do'o// nub kyi 'bar ma la ka ling ka kha dog nag mo// mdung rtse gsum pa bsnams pa/ swa sil bu/ thams cad sngar spros pa bzhin no// byang du
179a4(rgyud): rigs kyi dbang phyug ma lag pa gyen du brkyang ste/ g.yon pa na thod pa kha dog ljang khu/ lhagu ma snga ma bzhin no// lcug ma thams cad spyan gsum pa/ lha mo bzhis yongs su bskor ba'i bcom
179a5(rgyud): ldan 'das yum la mkhyud pa/ lhan cig skyes pa'i kha sbyor mngon par gnas pa'o// sbyor ba de dge spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ phyag brgyad pa bzhengs pa ni/ dang po hU~M las 'od byung bas
179a6(rgyud): khams gsum na gnas pa'i lha dang / bla ma dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams spyan drangs la/ oM shu n+ya ta la sngogs 'gro ba rnams thams cad rang bzhin med par sgoms
179a7(rgyud): nas/ hUM gis sa bon las 'od zer byung nas/ des bkug pa'o// phyi nas rdo rje dra ba rnams bsgom par bya'o// rtag tu rnal 'byor pa zhal bzhi pa dang po nag po// g.yas pa dmar po// g.yon pa
179a8(rgyud): dkar po// gsum brgyab phag gi gdong pa dang // zhabs bzhi pa/ g.yon brkyang bas gnas pa/ kha dog nag po gsus po 'chang ba/ zhal re ri la spyan gsum/ dbu skra ag chom gyen du brjes
179b1(rgyud): pa/ lha mo snga ma bzhin no// phyag bcu gnyis pa/ phyag g.yas g.yon dang po gnyis kyis lha mo la mkhyud pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mchengs lha mo'i mchu 'dzin pa/ g.yon gyi gnyis pa na rngam dkar po/ 
179b2(rgyud): gsum pa ni gsum pa/ bzhi pa thod pa/ lnga pa na glang po che'i lpags pa/ drug pa na log 'drin gyi mchi ba/ g.yas kyi gnyis pa na gri gug/ gsum pa na rdo rje rtse gsum pa/ bzhig thod pa/ 
179b3(rgyud): pa na glang po che'i lpags pa/ drug pa rdo rje ma he la zhon pa/ bdud thams cad zhabs kyis munan pa/ ljags 'dril ba/ khrug 'dzag pa/ zhal kha sbyor du byed pas gnas pa/ lhag ma snga ma bzhin no// 
179b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma bzhis yongs su bskor ba/ glu mi mchod pa nye bar longs spyod pa gnas shing po gyi sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ gad mo chen mo rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba'i lha/ mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin
179b5(rgyud): can gyi kI li ki li'i sgra dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten pa rab tu zhi ba'i don du 'gro ba'i 'da' rnams dga' ba chen po'i mgon no// hi li kaM'i sngags kyi phreng ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba'i
179b6(rgyud): mgon po phyag bzhi dang ldan par bshad par bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das dngos grub thams cad kyi don du/ bgegs nye bar zhi bar byed pa gcig phyag bzhi pa sku mdog nag po mche ba rnams gtsigs
179b7(rgyud): shing 'jigs par byed pa/ lto ba 'phyang ba dbu skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa/ ag chom kham sar/ klu brgyad kyi brgyan gyis brgyan pa// / ro'i gdan le bzhugs pa/ rgyab nas la brnyes
179b8(rgyud): pa/ hUM las skyes pa phyog bzhi pa/ g.yos na gri gug dang ral gri/ g.yon na thod pa dang rtsi gsum pa/ phyed kyi sgra 'byin pa/ phyogs gnyis su rnal 'byor ma gnyis gnas pa bsgom par bya'o// 
180a1(rgyud): bgegs thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i don du/ phyag drug pa bzhengs pa bshad pa/ gsum pa mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin can/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la nye bar phan par byed pa/ 
180a2(rgyud): sdig pa la sogs pa yongs su spong ba/ dang po stong pa nyid la sogs pa yongs su bsgoms nas/ rnal 'byor pa dang po rdo rje ra ba gur gyi sbyor ba bya'o// de dang dus mnyam du hr-i'i sa bon las langs pa'i lha/ seng
180a3(rgyud): gi'i stan las gnas pa/ zhal gsum dang po sprin nag mdog g.yas dkar la g.yon ldang ba/ ji lta ba'i yan lag mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs pa/ dbu skye dmar po gyen du brdzes pa/ spyan mraHgsum
180a4(rgyud): paHklu brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas na gri gug tho ba dang / Da ma ru dang / g.yon na thod pa dang rtse gsum ral gri'o// gtum pa'i dbang phyug dang / ka ling ka dang / rigs kyi dbang phyug dang / tsa ra tsi/ 
180a5(rgyud): ka rnam pa bzhis bskor ba ni kha sbyor gyis gnas pa/ 'byung ba lnga las yang dag par bzhengs pa/ klu thams cad kyis yang dag par bskor ba'o// lha mos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba'i
180a6(rgyud): dpal dngos grub kyi mtshan nyid ji ltar shes rang gi lha'i gzugs kyis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ lha mo dbu ma'i rnal 'byor gyi bdag nyid do// dpal mgon po nag po'i skye ba la sogs
180a7(rgyud): pa'i don du skad cig dang gcig shos gzhan gzhan du brtag pa bgag pas gang bkag pas dngos grub 'dod pa'o// dang po goms pa'i dus su dngos grub mchog gnas parabartag par bya'o// gang du
180a8(rgyud): grub par bye ba'i gnas de'am/ sngags pa rang khyim 'am/ thang steng ngag/ phyi rol blag ba med pa'am/ dben pa'i sa phyogs de ri mnyam par gzhag ste/ khang stong rtag tu bsgom par bya'o// phyag
180b1(rgyud): drug pa/ rnal 'byor ma brgyad kyis bskor ba/ yang dag par ldan pa/ de'i 'khor rnams sred med kyi bu la sogs pas yongs su gang bar bsgom par bya'o// dngos grub pa zhes bya bar bsam par
180b2(rgyud): byi'o// rigs lnga la bzhugs pa/ shes rab kyis kyang mnyam par sbyor ba rnal 'byor pabs rtag tu bza' ba ni/ sha chen dang / ba lang dang / khyi dang / mi dang / rta dang / bdud rtsi lnga rnams
180b3(rgyud): rtag tu bza' bar bya'o// 'di'i dngos grub 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams/ gang rigs lnga la gnas pa yis/ ser skya'i sha'i bza' bar bya'o// de nas bdag gi sems kyis mgon po nag
180b4(rgyud): po bsgom par bya'o// rnal 'byor sa phyag bcu drug pa/ rtag tu de nyid kyis byed pa brjod par bya'o// gang dang gang du phyag gnyis pa bsgoms pas dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya ba'i
180b5(rgyud): don ni phyag rgya sgrub pa rab tu 'bod pa yis/ phyi nas dngos grub dus 'dir dngos grub thams cad nges pa'o// dngos po sgom pa med pa'o// rtog tu dngos grub kyi nges par thob pa'o// 
180b6(rgyud): gang dngos grub thob par rnams ji ltar 'gyur/ de nas dang po na mchod pa nye bar bya ste/ dri sna tshogs pa la sogs pa/ spos dang / me tog phreng ba la sogs pa'o// snying kha ra hUM yig bltas
180b7(rgyud): ba la mchod pa la sngogs pa byas nas mdun du blta bar bya'o// sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas nas/ tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o// lag pa la sngogs dgod pa
180b8(rgyud): la sogs pa byas te/ log pa g.yas pa la maM/ g.yon pa la yang aM/ gnas rnams su byin gyis brlab pa ni/ oM gyi tshogs A hU~M/ mig tu khi/ rna ba g.yon pa las
181a1(rgyud): rlub gas pas na/ swAH//  kA hA/  / rkyenas sa ga/ da kyi rnaMs brgyub par na// man/ 
181a2(rgyud): mgrin par mo// hU~M gtsug tu te/ gnas sa khang dang bas pa'i dang ldan pa/ gru ba ni pa/ seng gi'i gdon yongs su bsgom par bya'o// mi stong pa nyid du bsgos par bya'o// man
181a3(rgyud): tidz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha wa ang ma go ti/ 'di'i stobs kyis so// ji ltar gyur pa des nas blta bar bya ste/ pi wang dang / rnga bran dang / gling bu dang / ting tang shag dang / gar dang / gru dang / 
181a4(rgyud): dza sde dang / sred med kyi bu la sogs pas/ hU~M gi yi ga bsam par bya'o// rdo rje gur bcing ba la sogs pa ma lus pa sngar bzhin bya'o// lha mos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das bzhengs
181a5(rgyud): la sems can gyi don mdzod cig/ ci'i phyir stong pa nyid la sems/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la dazhengs pas gang sems can 'dzam bu gling ba rnams la gzigs shig dngos
181a6(rgyud): grub sna tshogs pa rnams kyis/ de nas bcom ldan 'das TI kyis lha mo ma lus pa la gsungs pa/ lha mo chen po'i bdag nyid ltos shig ltos shig/ dpal mgon po nag po mchog tu
181a7(rgyud): dga' ba'i rang bzhin nam mkha'i rang bzhin can/ zhal bzhi pa/ hUM las skyes pa/ rtsa zhal nag po/ lag g.yon ljang khu/ g.yas dmar po// rgyab ma he phag gdong can/ mchi ba

181b1(rgyud): gsug/ nas gtsugs/ shin du 'grong ba/ 'od par dang ldan pa/ klu 'jog pas thongad byas pa// zhabs bzhipa/ rnam ne 'og tu ma nan pa/ daphyag bcu drug pa/ gsas g.yon rgyu
181b2(rgyud): dang po gnyis kyis lha mo la mkhyud pa/ zhabs g.yon brkyang bas gnas pa/ bdud bzhi yang dag par mnan pa/ g.yas kyi gnyis pa na gri gug/ gsum pa na thod pa/ bzhi pa na rnga ma dkar po/ 
181b3(rgyud): lnga pa na gshin rje'i dbyug pa/ drug pa na rdo rje/ bdun pa na ldog 'dren gyi mcho ga/ brgyad pa na glang po che'i lhags pa/ g.yon gyi gnyis pa na khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa/ gsum
181b4(rgyud): pan rtse gsum pa/ bizhi pa na rnga'u chung // lnga pa na rdo rje mdud pa/ drug pa na dril bu/ bdun pa na ma he'i mgo/ brgyad pa na glang po che'i lpags pa/ lto ba 'phyang ba/ stag gi lpags
181b5(rgyud): pas rkyad pa dkris pa/ rigs ldan gyis dpung pa brgyan pa/ mgo bo'i phreng ba'i do shal 'phyang ba/ dga' bos ske regs byas pa/ mgrin pa nor rgyas kyis brgyan pa/ lhag ma gzhan gyis
181b6(rgyud): nacha byos pa dung skyong gis lag gdub byas pa/ yongs su bkris pa/ klu thams cad kyis brtson pa/ mkha' 'gro ma brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba/ sred med kyi bu la sogs pa rnams kyis na dzu
181b7(rgyud): la 'jus pas phyag byed pa/ phaT kr-i sgra chen pos yongs su sgrog pa/ ki li ki li'i sgra dang ldan pa/ 'brug gi sgra sgrogs pa/ ha hi he he hi hi ska rab tu byung ba/ shar gyi pad ma la gaH
181b8(rgyud): gtum pa'i dbang phyug ma tsam gyi sa bon las byung ba phyag gnyis kyis gri gug dang / thod pa 'dzin pa/ mgo bo'i phreng ba'i do shal/ kha dog dkar po/ mche rnam par gtsigs shing / 'jigs
182a1(rgyud): par byed pa'o// lho'i 'bar ma la tsa ra tsi ka kha dog nag mo// kaM gi sa bon las skyes pa/ phyag gnyis na gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa/ lhag ma snga ma bzhin no// 
182a2(rgyud): nub kyi 'phar ma la ka ling ka lam gyi sa bon las skyes pa/ g.yas g.yon na rtse gsum dang thod pa 'dzin pa/ lhag ma snga ma bzhin no// byang du rigs kyi dbang phyug ma/ raM gyi
182a3(rgyud): sa bon las skyes pa/ kha dog ser mo g.yas pa gyon du bsgreng ba/ g.yon na thod pa thogs pa/ lhag ma snga ma bzhin no// lha mo thams cad spyan gsum ma/ mgo bo'i phreng
182a4(rgyud): be rab tu 'phyang ba/ klu brgyad kyis yang dag par brgyan pa/ ro'i steng na zhabs g.yon brkyang bas gnas pa/ de bzhin du gcer bu/ skra sil bu 'jigs par byed pa'o// phyi'i shar
182a5(rgyud): gyi snam bu la chom rkun ma/ lag pas rnga mya bzung ba/ kha dog nag mo rtsam gyi sa byon lngasa? skyes pa/ lhag ma swa mra bzhin ro// lho'i sbrum+b+ha bu la ra rI ts+ya ri/ lan tsha rar/ kha dog lang khA
182a6(rgyud): tsam gyi sa bon las byung ba/ lag pas spos bzung ba'o// nub tu dga' ba chen mo maM gi yi ge las skyes pa/ kha dog dmar mo lag pa rdo rje dril bu thogs pa'o// byang du dga' ba'i dbang
182a7(rgyud): phyog ma naM gi yi ge las byung ba yongs su rdzogs pa/ kha dog sir mo snga ma bzhin no// lha mo dbu mas gtso bo la mkhyud pa'i dbang phyug ma/ kha dog dkar mo phyag bzhi ma/ dga' ba chen
182a8(rgyud): pos gnas pa de bzhin du mche ba gtsigs pa/ lhag ma snga ma bzhin no// phyag rgya snga ma shin du dga' ba gnas pa/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis sngags das bar bshad par bya ste/ dngos grub sna
182b1(rgyud): tshogs mchog tu ster ba'i phyir dpal sems can rnams la chags pas/ sems can rnams lnga phyin pa dang / mi phan pa rnam par mi spyad pa/ dga' chen pos gnas pa'i sgrub pa
182b2(rgyud): pos/ brgyad dang bcu 'am bcu bzhi la bsgom par bya'o// gang rnal 'byor pa chang dang gro ku d+hA na la sogs pa bdud rtsi lnga dang / yang dag par ldan pas spyad par bya'o// rtag tu btung ba
182b3(rgyud): khrag gis bya'o// gal te the tsom za na skye bar mi 'gyur ro// gang gi'i bde pa chen pos bsnyen par byas na/ dngos grub nges par 'byung zhing sdes yun mi ring bar 'joms
182b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// gsang ba'i rigs lnga lo gnas de bzhin du las bya'o// ji ltar gsal bar mi 'gyur ro// gal te gang gis gsal bar byas nas ni/ de dngos grub mi 'gyur
182b5(rgyud): ro// chen por mi gsal bar bsam par bya'o// lha mos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa'i skad ni ji ltar du gsungs/ de kho na nyid ji lta ba bzhin nyan par 'tshal
182b6(rgyud): lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dgongs pa'i skad ni ji ltar bgyi/ chang la stobs can zhes bya'o// sha la b+ha laM'o// skad chen gzhan gyis rtogs byang chub/ dngos grub
182b7(rgyud): thob pa shes par bya ba'i phyir/ rigs can lnga rab tu gsal bar bshad par bya ste/ g.yung mo rdo rje rigs las byung ba dang / chos mkhan ma las kyi rigs las yang dag par skyes pa
182b8(rgyud): dang po phyag brgya 'di ni ji ltar lags/ rang gi dngos grub ster ba dang / de 'di dag rnams la bud med kyis/ rdo rje las rtag tu nges par 'byung ngo // de yis rab tu mchod pa
183a1(rgyud): dang / sngags pas rtag tu btung bar bya'o// 'di ji ltar rtogs par bya zhe na/ 'di ltar khyod gang snying rje dang ldan pas/ thams cad du gus pa chen po'i bdag nyid
183a2(rgyud): kyis yongs su gzung bar bya'o// skad gzhan gyis ngo mtshar po dang / mi gang dbang ma bskur ba dang / skad 'dis dpal mgon po nag po// dbang ma bskur ba la rab tu bshad na/ de nyi ma
183a3(rgyud): bdun gyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro// gal te ma shi na yang na ba dang / tshe thung bar yang 'gyur ro// dbang ma bskur ba dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / mi gus pa'o mi des rnal 'byor ma dang / mkha'
183a4(rgyud): 'gro ma thams cad dang / lha de rnams 'khrug par 'gyur ro// lha mo gang dang gang du ma bshad pa'i thams cad ma lu das byin gyis rlob bo// dngos grub chen po thams cad kyi gleng gzhi/ 
183a5(rgyud): rgyud 'di smras pa/ de'i phyir dbang ma bskur ba'i klog pa'am/ 'dri ba 'am/ dngos grub sgrub pa'i phyir/ de la yang rje btsun bri bar bya'o// sor sum bcu rtsa drug tsam gyis tshad tsam
183a6(rgyud): rgya skyegs kyi khu ba 'am/ sen tse dang mu zi bsres te/ nim pa'i shing gi smyu gus/ gro ga la gzugs brnyan ji lta ba bris nas/ ras dmar po dang / dur khrod kyi ras sam/ 'od zer gyi
183a7(rgyud): tshogs dag par ldan pa yang dag par bsgom par bya ste/ rtag tu yang dag par bsam par bya'o// lha mos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das khyed ston cig bzhengs shig/ bdag gis
183a8(rgyud): bskul nas/ mgon po nag po chen po'i bdag nyid// ud Sha b+ha ra Do ka ru Na ma nu/ na tsa mi ha~M ya Te bi e tan thA Ti ka~M sa ka ri ba me i ba yi tuM u pu tshwa mi kr-idz+dzi/ Ta khe na hU~Ms wa ra/ 
183b1(rgyud): ana? tsa saM e ke wa d+hA ra tiH/ ba b+hU ba ne ka ri ma k+She T+Te/ su su pu tsa t+te ka mi D+hom nA ma tsa de sA ri/ kA la~M kin b+h+ye d+hA ri la e g+ne/ trA sa~M ka sun bu tsis lo d+ha ma// su oM an nu no NA hi rI e ka b+hA ni ka ra
183b2(rgyud): ya siM sa t+ya pa Tha/ e hUM shu nya sa ma A i/ a taM ka ri a shau g+ha dzA/ ji ltar bskul ba'i dus su/ bcom ldan 'das skad cig nyid la rdzogs par langs pa'o// yid kyi 'gyur ba gsal
183b3(rgyud): bos phyag bcu drug pa la sogs pa 'di nas bzung nas phyag gnyis pa'i bar du lta bar bya'o// gang sems can rnams sdug bsngal bar 'dod pa'i don du ji ltar phan par bsams pa tsam
183b4(rgyud): gyis sdug bsngal thams cad las yang dag par 'don po'i lte ba'i rigs bsam par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa dang por hUM yig bsam par bya ba dang / phyi nas rdo mchod pa dang / 
183b5(rgyud): bsnyen bskur la sogs pa byas nas/ dngos grub 'dod pas bsgom par bya'o// zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas gri gug g.yon thod pa nag po// skra ser po gyon du brdzes pa/ ro'i
183b6(rgyud): steng na gnas pa/ klu brgyad kyi brgyan pa/ phyag bcu bzhi pa'am/ gtum pa'i dbang phyug ma la sogs pa dang ldan pa/ lto ba 'phyang ba/ bong ge thung ba/ rnal 'byor mas
183b7(rgyud): yongs su bskor ba dang / thabs gcig tu bsgom par bya'o// char sbyin gyi mdog lta bu/ 'brug gi smre sgrogs pa/ rab tu sgra bsnyen pa'i bde ba nyams su myong ba dran par bya'o// nyi
183b8(rgyud): nade nyid la ma grub na/ nye bar spyod pa ci dgos pa spyod/ lha mos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug da / gal te drim lnga la gnas pa'i mi/ kye
184a1(rgyud): chen po khyed yang dag par ldan pas/ bde ba chen po ma bsgrubs na/ yan lag stong gi yan lag gcig tu gyur te/ ji ltar yan lag bzhi yis yang dag par spyod pa
184a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ sa gsum dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i don du nges pa'i yongs su bsgrub par bya'o// 'di ni mgon
184a3(rgyud): po nag po'i rgyud las lha rnams bzhengs pa'i le'u ste// // bdun pa'o// // / lha mos gsol pa/ 'on kyang mnyam par spyod pa'o/ sems can rnams kyis rjes
184a4(rgyud): su gzhan pa la thabs de nyid zhi ba nyid gang ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ ji ltar 'dzam bu gling pa'i dngos grub sna tshogs nye bar longs spyod pa zhes bya ba bshad
184a5(rgyud): par bya'o// rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pas/ sa stengs kyi dngos grub rnams sgrub pa'o// mtshan mo'i chu la rdo rje'i khyim du sna tshogs pa'i nya dang chang dang bcas
184a6(rgyud): pa bza' bar bya'o// bgegs nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i sngags kyi le'u las bshad pa ji ltar sgra rnams btsir ba ur ga'i mad ba ma la bzlas sngags bris la/ sa 'og

184b1(rgyud): ji ltar rnal 'byor pas sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig bzang bar bya'o// de'i lus su 'gyur ba'i rim pa gnyis pa ni/ de'i rigs pa dang phyi nas snying po la rab tu sbyor ba dang ldan pas byang chub kyi shing gi khu ba/ 
184b2(rgyud): a ru ra gcig goms pas so// lto ba me zhan pa rgyas par bya ba ni de nas de nyid tsi tra ka dmar po drang pi pi ling gi rtsa ba legs mthong gi rtsa ba dang / tsha ba'i mar khu yang dug par ldan pas
184b3(rgyud): byang chub kyi shing gi khu ga/ a ru ra bcos pa tshwa dang lhan cig tu bza' bar bya'o// ri lu nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig dang ldan par byas pas sngar gzugs bzhin du 'gyur ro// me'i drod chen po dang
184b4(rgyud): ldan par 'gyur ro// lus brtan pa'i dngos grub rtsam par bya ste/ dang po ba ru ra dang / !ka taM ra'i rtsa ba dang / skyu ru ra dang / ti laM taM la dang / da dang de mnyam por ldan pa sa
184b5(rgyud): mchog tu kha'i nang du bcug nas na ga ma ra dza na'i mig gnyis dang / srin bya'i khrag gis 'og gi bug pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// gzhan gyi sbrul gyis kha ra se he d+ha be'i mdab me'i
184b6(rgyud): khu ba dang / dngul chu bcing ba'i sman dang / khrag dang ldan pa'i bcug na ga pur dang ldan pa mig sman bskus nas sa 'og gi bug pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// mgon po nag po'i 'bras bu dang sku da
184b7(rgyud): lan te dang / saM ba'i 'brum bu dang / sa 'bru dang / 'di rnams bsres nas/ tsha ba gsum dang sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa btses nas til nag po dang / lus rnam par dag par byas na/ ji ltar
184b8(rgyud): goms pa'i man cha nges par byas nas zos na nyi ma ldan sa'i bug pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'bad de lus la byugs na gangs ti si la sogs pa mthar thug pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// cong gzi'i
185a1(rgyud): chus khrus byas na/ sngar bzhin du legs par gnas mthong byar 'gyur ro// tsa la ta'i khu ba dang bya rgod kyi sha dang / til nag po'i mar khu dang rab tu zos na nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig
185a2(rgyud): tu zos na phyi nas rang gi chu mig sman byas nas sa 'og gi gter mthong bar 'gyur ro// sbrul dug med kyi tshul dang gi haM dang ldan pas tsha ba mnyam por byas te/ tsong gzi'i chu dang bsres te mig gnyis
185a3(rgyud): la mig sman byas nas khru lnga tsam na yod pa'i sa 'og gi gter rnams rtag tu nges par mthong bar 'gyur ro// aM ba ro li'i khu ba dang / khrag dang / gi haM dang / lpags pa 'dul byed kyi sman dang /

185a7(rgyud): gsum pa la khyi'i tshil bu bcos nas/ gzhan yang mi'i tshil bus ma he'i mar dang / phyi nas ri lu byas nas khar bcug nas nyi ma gsum du sbyang bar gnas na/ rang gi mchil mas rang gi
185a8(rgyud): mig sman byas nas 'og gi bug pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// dang por lto dag par bya ba ni nyi ma gcig zas mi za ba ru sa'i lcug ma'i mar khu dang / sgog skye bcos nas ri lu bcu bzhi byas nas nyi
185b1(rgyud): ma dang po zos na/ nyi ma gsum pa la nyi shu rtsa gcig bza' bar bya'o// nyi ma bzhi pa la sum bcu rtsa gsum bza' bar bya'o// nyi ma lnga pa la sum bcu rtsa lnga bza' bar bya'o// drug pa dang bdun pa la yang
185b2(rgyud): sum bcu rtsa lnga'o// nyi ma re re le la btung bar bya'o// nyi ma brgyad pa la ra'i 'o ma btung bar bya'o// dang po dang gnyis pa la ma he'i 'o ma btung bar bya'o// nyi ma gsum pa la ser skya'i 'o ma btung bar bya'o//

185b4(rgyud): gsum dang gu gul dang / ba lang gi chu dang / yud dkar gyi mar dang / sbrang dang / bu ram dang / tsha ba gsum dang / sgog skya dang / mer dang zos nas ra'i 'o ma dang 'thungs na/ ji srid nyi ma bdun
185b5(rgyud): gyi pha rol du til nag po'i mar dang / sa'i lcug ma bcos nas zos la/ lcug ma lnga'i tshad tsam lkog ma nyi ma bdun pa la til gyi mar khu dang / so ba'i zan zos na nyi shu rtsa gnyis na nyin mo dang
185b6(rgyud): mtshan mo le nges par sa'i 'og bug pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// tshes brgyud la phyag bzhi pa'i mgon po nag po'i sngags bzlas na/ stong phrag lnga ru chang dang sha dang nya dang / lcags kyu lha la stsogs pa/

186a1(rgyud): tsha ba gsum dang pa la sha'i shun pa dang / ka ma tsi bi dang / bcos nas ku man ti sha dang ldan bdun btso bas rims kyis 'dis/ til nag po'i mar khu dang / lto dag par
