232a7(rgyud): pa zhi ba dang / dam tshig gso dang lha rnams 'gro/ dngos pa grub thams cad 'byung ba yi// phyir na ga tor me rA nges pa ste// rgyu rnams nyes pa re zhi ba dang // lus lus 'byung phyir lha yin te// phyi yi dkyil lwa
232a8(rgyud): lha ma yin// lus dang yan lag lha ma yin// kha mig la sogs lha ma yin// lus las ma byung g.yeng ba'i phyir// dbang po'i sgo bsdug yeng ba dgag/ rang gi lus dang ring las byung // sgo gsum zhi phyir/ 
232b1(rgyud): lha zhes brjod/ yid skyob phyir na sngags yin te// rang sems la su su rung ba dang // rnam rtog gdon rnams las skyob phyir// 'di ni sngags kyi rgyal por gsungs// gzhan yang dngo rtsa 'dod pa ste// thams cad bla ma'i nam/ 
232b2(rgyud): nus rlu rgyud 'di ga da kyis nan tan gyis// de yi che rgyud kyi doni la thams cad rjes su yid rang bar gyur to// dngol gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// / pan Ti Ta g+hA sad+ha ra dang / dge slong shA
232b3(rgyud): ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o// @#// rgya gar skad du/ shri ra ka te na tra rA dzA/ bod skad du/ dpral chags pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo// 
232b4(rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun mo bA ga la bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen pos// spros
232b5(rgyud): dang me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pas mchod nas// he ha dpa' bo 'jigs pa che// sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin no// mtshan dang dpe byad gang dang grang // stong dang de bzhin rnam par dang // rdzus skyes/ 
232b6(rgyud): mngal skyes sgong skyes dang // dro dag she ra gnyis gsum bzhi tshwar ming // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// A ni dbu'i gtsug to rA te// A ni dbu skra g.yas su 'khyil// i sa ni dpral ba'i
232b7(rgyud): dbyes mnyam pa// I ni smin mtshams mdzod spus te// uM ni spyan mig mthon mthing la// ba yi rdzi ma lta bu'o// U tshams bzhi bcu mnga' ba ste// dz+ha la kyai tshems thags bzang // li lI tshems dkar ro bro mchog/ 
232b8(rgyud): i ni 'gram pa seng ge 'dra// A lpags shin du srab pa ste// o ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan// I ni dpung mgo shin du zlum// aM ni bdun mtho ba ru gsungs// aHni thal gong rgyas po ste// 'di dag bcu
233a1(rgyud): / drug g.yas bskor ro// de nas gzhon pa skor mtshan rnams kyang // a ni lpags srab mdog gser 'dra// a ni bzhengs bzhin ma btud par// phrag gnyis bus mo sgrib pa// 
233a2(rgyud): i ni ro stod seng ge 'dra// I ni shing n+ya gro lta bus// chu zheng grub cing rgyas pa'o// u ni mdzod spu g.yas su 'khyil// U ni sku gsung gyen du phyogs// ri 'doms lba ba sbubs su nub// rI brla legs
233a3(rgyud): par zlum pa'o// li ni zhabs longs tshigs mi mngon// lI ni phyag dang zhabs kyi 'thil// 'jam zhing gzhon shu rgyas pa'o// ai ni phyag zhags dra bras 'phel// e ni sor mo ring ba ste// oM ni phyag dang
233a4(rgyud): zhabs 'thil la// 'khor lo dang ldan pa yin ste/ A ni zhabs ni shin du gnas// aM zhabs rting pa yangs pa ste// a ni byin pa ri dgas ni// e na ya yi lta bu ste// spyi bo mi shigs snying po haM// ston
233a5(rgyud): ba sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan// ka ni srin mo zangs mdog 'dra// kha ni rna mo mdog snum pa// gA ni sen mo mtho ba ste// g+ha ni sor mo rnam zlum pa// nga ni sor mo rnam rgyas po// tsa ni sor mo byin gyis pra/ 
233a6(rgyud): tshwanr-i rtsa ni me mngon pa// dza ni rtsa mdud med pa yin// dz+nyA ni long bu mi mngon pa// nyani zhabs mi mnyam pa med// Ta ni seng ge'i stabs su gshegs// thA ni glang po'i stabs su gshegs// Da ni dang
233a7(rgyud): ba'i stabs su gshegs// D+ha ni khyu mchog stabs su gshegs// NA ni g.yon phyogs ldog cing gshegs// ta ni mdzes par gshegs pa ste// tha ni mi g.yo bar gshegs pa// da ni skul 'khril
233a8(rgyud): bag chags// d+has+yA byi dor byas pa 'dra// na sku rim par 'tsham pa'o// pa ni sku gtsang ba sku mchog/ bsku rnam par dag pa'o// b+ha ni mtshan rdzogs ngo bo yin// ma sku kho lag yangs
233b1(rgyud): shing bzang ya ni goms bsgoms pa'o// ra sku shin du gzhon mdog can// la ni sku la zhum pa med// wa ni sku lus rgyas pa ste// sha ni shin du grims pa ste// Sha ni yan lag gnyis
233b2(rgyud): lag des// sa gzigs rab rib med cing dag/ he sku zlum pa nyid yin te// k+ka ni sku skabs phyin pa'o// ya sku ma rnyongs pa yin te// ra ni phya le phye me yin// la ni lte ba zab pa ste// ba ni
233b3(rgyud): skye ba g.yas su 'khyil// da ni kun nas mdzes pa yin// d+hi ni kun spyod gtsang ma ste// 'di dag thabs kyi rang bzhin gyis// bskor ba g.yas nas bzhi bcu yin// de nas g.yon gyi bzhi bcu
233b4(rgyud): yin/ dre ka ni sku sIn+da bag med// kha ni shing bal ltar 'jam phyag/ ga phyag ri mo mdangs yod pa// gA phyag ri mo zab pa dang // dbyug rim ring ba'o// tsa zhal ha cang mi ring ba// tsha zhal gzugs
233b5(rgyud): kyi gzugs rnyan snang // dza dzA ljags mnyen ljags srab pa// nyi ni ljags dmar dro bo ste// glang po nga ro 'brug sma Ta// tra ni gsung snyan monyen 'jam pa// Da D+ha mtsham bzlum dang rno// Na ta mche ba dkar
233b6(rgyud): dang mnyam// tha ni mche ba byin gyis phra// da d+ha shangs mtho shangs gtsang ba// na ni spyan ni rnam par dag/ pa pha spyan bzangs dzi ma stug/ dkar nag dbye ba pad ma yi// 'dab ma'i mdangs 'dra bar
233b7(rgyud): ma'i spyan// ba ni de bzhin 'tshams ring b+ha// ma ya smin 'jam smin spu mnyam// ra ni de bzhin smin ma bsdum// la ni snyan shel stug cing ring // de bzhin wa ni snyan mnyam pa// stan gyi dbang po
233b8(rgyud): ma nyams pa'o// dpral ba lags par dbyes pa Sha// sa ni dpral ba'i dbyes che ba// ha ni dbu dag shin du rgyas// dbu skra bung ba ltar nag k+Sha/ dbu skra stug pa ya yin te// de bzhin bu skra 'dzem par/ dbu skra ma/ 
234a1(rgyud): @/ 'dzings pa ni la// dbu skra mi shor ba ni wa// dbu s+thA dri zhim dA yin te// phyag g.yas dpal gyi be'u dang ni// bkra shis g.yung drung 'khyil pas brgyan/ ldong ros lta bud yin te// lte basprul pa'i snying po a// gtso bo dpe byad brgya bcur
234a2(rgyud): / ldan a ni phyi nang stong pa nyid// A ni stong pa nyid stong pa// i ni chen po stong pa nyid// I ni don dam stong pa nyid// u ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid// u ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid// rin mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid// rI ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa
234a3(rgyud): stong pa nyid// li dor ba med pa stong pa nyid// lA ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid// e ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid// A ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid// oM ni mi dmyigs stong pa nyid// oM ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid// aM ni ngo bo nyid stong pa// dngos
234a4(rgyud): ma ngo bo nyid stong pa e// mgrin pa longs spyod snying po oM// shes rab stong pa bcu drug pa'o// gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba// rnam par thar pa dang po a// nang gzugs med par 'du shes pa// phyi rol gzug nas la lta ba// rnam thar
234a5(rgyud): gnyis pa ka yin no// sdug pa rnam par thar po'i lus// mngon sum du rdzogs par byas nas gnas// de dag rnam thar gsum pa tsa// gzugs kyi 'du shes las 'das nas// sna tshogs 'du shes yid mi byed// nam mkha' mtha' yas la
234a6(rgyud): gnas shing // nam mkha' mtha' yas rdzogs pa Ta// nam mkha' mtha' yas las 'das nas// rnam shes mtha' yas la gnas shing // rnam shes mtha' yas rdzogs pa te// rnam shes mtha' yas las 'das nas// ci yang med min
234a7(rgyud): la gnas te// de nyid rdzogs pa pa yin no// ci yang med pa las 'das te// du shes med min pa gnas te/ du shwe da gi khro ba lu du shes med min la gnas te// 'du shes tshor ba 'gog pa'i lus// mngon sum 'dus byas rdzogs pa dang // rnam par thar pa
234a8(rgyud): brgyad pa / snying chos kyi 'khor lo hU~M// gtso nam par brgyad dang ldan// 'di dag rtsa la rnam par gnas// 'khor lo brgyad ni sor gsum ste// sems can kun larang bzhin gnas// de byer sems can sangs rgyas yin/ 
234b1(rgyud): tshogs 'dul ba'i mtshan nyid kyang // ring du 'byung zhing thung du gnas// smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu bzhin// chos kyi 'byung gnas lte ba la// g.yas g.yon bu ga lnga lnga la// steng 'og kha'i bar nas byung // ro ma shar du rnam par phyogs// brkyang
234b2(rgyud): ma bum te 'og gi char// ro ma brkyang ma la mkhyud cing // g.yas pa'achi ru zung 'jug cing // brkyang me ro ma la mkhyud cing // g.yon gyi cha ru zung 'jug nyid// g.yas g.yon rtsa mo sku gsung thugs// de sgra sngags su rab tu grogs// sngags dang rgyu dang
234b3(rgyud): dngos grub stsogs// de nyid las ni byung bas na// sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin no// skye ba bzhi yi rim pa yang // snod bcud yab yum la thim ste// yab yum nyi ma zla bar 'gyur// snang ba'i thig le yang dag bcas// 'di dag nang gi mkha' skyes
234b4(rgyud): tshul/ a li ka li nyi zla ste// sems ni thig le'i nga bor gnas// nang gi sgong skyes yin par 'dod// ka dang ma las nyi zla ste// rang 'byung thig le drod gsher yin// de yi ska cig skyon med las// rang bzhin 'byung ba rdzus skyes so// rkyen med sbyor ba spong
234b5(rgyud): sogs las// bde ba bskyed dang bde ba'i rgyud// thams cad drang ba gsang ba yi// mngal nas skye ba'i tshul yin no// yar la bsreg dang mar lagaso// gnas gsum nyi shu bzhir 'pho yin// phyi nang 'dod pa'i mtshan ma yis// rtsa rgyas bde ba ster ba
234b6(rgyud): dang / rin po che yi pho brang du// sems 'dzin gsang ba'i sgong skyes yin// nang gi 'dod pa mtshon cha yin// bde ba bskyed pa drod gsher tshul// gang gi rkyen gyis ma skyes par// gdod nas bde ba'i rgyu skyes la// bde ba skyes pa brdzus skyes so// gtum
234b7(rgyud): mo go bzlog rkyen gyis sbar// gtum memo rkyen dang sbyar ba dang // gtum mo go bzlog sbar ba dang // gtum mo rang bzhin sbar ba dang // mngal skyes spong skyes drod gsher skyes// brdzus skyes rim par sbyar bar bya// du ma yi ni gzhi bcas dang // gzhi
234b8(rgyud): med shin du gzhi med de// mngal skyes sgong skyes drod gsher skyes// brdzus skyes bzhi tshar rim par sbyar// rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu kun// skye ba bzhi'i ngo bor cig/ de phyir sems can sangs rgyas gnyis// dngos por ro mnyam gyur pa la
235a1(rgyud): log rtogs sgyu ma gnyis su 'khrul// rdo rje snying po snying rje che// nang dang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yang // nga yis bshad kyis legs par nyon// sku yi dkyil 'khor spyi bor sgom// gsung ni mgrin par thugs ni snying // yon
235a2(rgyud): tan lte bar phrin las ni// snga rtse dag tu bsam par bya// 'bar ba bzhi yi a la yang // rdo rje phag mor rab tu grags// haM ni bde mchog he ru ka/ dpa' bo gcig pa yin par 'dod// bdun pa yong ni dag pa dag/ gsum pa hU~M las rab tu grags// 
235a3(rgyud): bcu gsum pa dang bco lnga pa// bcu dag oM las rab tu grags// nyi shu rtsa lnga nyi shu dgu/ haM gi ngo bor yang dag gnas// sum bcu gsum dang drug bcu bzhi// a yi dkyil 'khor yin par nges// rtsa ni rdo rje phag me ste// g.yas g.yon phyag la dngu
235a4(rgyud): ma zhal/ dpa' bo byang chub sems yin te// skye mched bcu gnyis dngas ma yang // bcu gnyis phyag tu rab tu grags// 'byung bzhi dang sa ma zhal bzhir nges// mdzes pa'i phyir na rgyan du bshad// gsung tshogs bla ma'i zhal nas blang // g.yas
235a5(rgyud): g.yon steng 'og sgo bzhi ste// 'dom gang mnyam pa gru bzhi ste// bdud rtsi lnga ni tshon rtsi lnga// rtsa ni thig gi rang bzhin ste// ka ba brgyad ni rkang brgyad do// so sen pas sU tar sogs// mkhas pas rtag cing shes par bya// 'di dag rang bzhin dkyil
235a6(rgyud): 'khor te/ dper na rang 'byung gser dang 'dra// 'di ni bcos ma me yin ste// rang rig ye shes gzugs brnyan ni// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor sgom pa min// rdul tshon la sogs bri ba med// spos la sogs pa mchod pa min// rdo shing
235a7(rgyud): lha la phyag mi bya// rang bzhin gnas pa'i sangs rgyas la// rang bzhin mchod pas rtag tu mchod// sku ni rgun dus rang bzhin ste// 'bar ba'i sku gsung thugs rdza gsum// gsung ni sgyid dus ngo bo ste// 'jug pa'i sku gsung zla ba
235a8(rgyud): gsum thugs ni dbyar dus ngo bo'o// ye shes ston ngo dus yin te// sku gsung thugs ni zla ba gsum// dang po'i rgyu yi sa bon yin// 'khor lo'i chags pa dmar po la// yi ge rnamos ni dkar por gnas// lam gyis pa rnam pa gnyis
235b1(rgyud): ring ba dang ni nye ba'o// 'khor lo mang dag gnas pa ste// 'khor lo de rnams thams cad kyang // sku mdog phyag mtshan kun dang bral// rang bzhin gsal ba dri ma med// shel ltar gsal ba dri ma med// mi mthong mthong ba'i ngo bo can// zab cing
235b2(rgyud): phra ba'i rang bzhin can// byi ru sku mdog phyag mtshan lha// nang gi shin du phra ba'i gzugs// gsang bar bde ba lha ru ngas// de nas bzlog pa zhi ba'i lha// lus las 'byung shing lha zhes 'am// rgyud rnams dag byed phyir na // chags pa'i phyir na
235b3(rgyud): yin te/ rgyal po shes rab rang bzhin ste// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid kyi// chags pa chen po'i rgyud gsungs so// de nas sa chen po yang g.yos par gyur to// mchod pa'i sprin gyis char chen po yang 'beb par gyur to// de nas dpa' bo dang mkha
235b4(rgyud): 'gro ma kun kyang rgyud kyi don la dga' zhing mgu ste// rjes su yi rang nas mi snang bar gyur to// dpal chags pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// rnal 'byor ma rad ma le dang // lo tsU wa shakya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du// shrid+d+ha
235b5(rgyud): ki ni g+hA hU~M tan+ta rA dza// bod skad du// dpal mkha' 'gro ma gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal sde pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// kye a la la ho// kye a la la ho// mkha' 'gro gang lags gang me lags// gsang ba rgyud dang rgyal po gang // nyon cig
235b6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' khyod// mkha' 'gro bzhi ste ma ni gsum// gsang ba drug ste rgyud brgyad de// rgyal po bcu dgu dag tu bstan// dang po mkha' 'gro dbye ba yang // rags pa'i rtog pa spangs pa'i phyir// bum pa'i dbang dang 'brel pa yi// sku
235b7(rgyud): mdog phyag mtshan dang po'o// sku mdog phyag mtshan spang ba'i phyir// gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel pa yi// rlung dang rtse sogs tsan Da li// 'di dag mkha' 'gro gnyis pa ste// dman pa rnams la sku dang phyag/ rlung dang rtsa sogs kha dog dbyib
235b8(rgyud): de nyid spangs par bya ba'i phyir// shes rab ye shes dang 'brel ba'i// lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ro// 'di dag gsang ba'i 'gro ba ste// dman pa rnams ni phra ba'i gzugs// lus sems tshor ba bde ba las// 'das pa'i bde ba chen po/ 
236a1(rgyud): / de spang phyir rang rig ye shes kyi// sems kyi de nyid stong pa'i ro// de nyid mkha' 'gro bzhi pa ste// shes brjod kun gyi yul ma yin// de nyid lnga la sogs pa yi// mkha' 'gro 'di rnams rim pa yang // sku mngon/ 
236a2(rgyud): phyag mtshan rags pa'i gnyen// rlung dang rtsa sogs bum dbang sgom// de bas rlung dang rtsa sogs spong // rang rig stong pa'i bde bas spong // gzugs sku gnyis kyis stong pa spangs// de phyir gong ma gnyen por bshad// rags pa'i
236a3(rgyud): phung sogs bum dbang rgyu// bum dbang gsang dbang rgyu yin te// gsang dbang gsum pa'i rgyu ru nges// bde ba'i rang rig bskyed pa yi// rgyu dang 'bras bu nges pa ste// 'bras bu bzhi dang mi mthun pa 'i// mkha' 'gro rnams kyi rig pa'o// 
236a4(rgyud): ma ni rnam pa gsum yin te// 'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das// zhe sdang chen po bcom ldan 'das// gti mug chen po bcom ldan 'das// nga rgyal la sogs de dang 'dra// thun mong ma yin sgra 'byung bas// ma zhes gsungs
236a5(rgyud): pa'i na bar 'dod// snod min gsang ba'i sgra thos par// skrag pa thun mong ma yin bskyed// bskyed pa'i phyir na ma zhes bya// bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas pas// sras rnams thun mong ma yin bskyed// de yi phyir na ma zhes bshad// 
236a6(rgyud): thun mong bla ma'i zhal nas shes// de nas gsang ba bshad bya ste// bdud rtsi drug ni gsang bas te// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro// reg bya de bzhin chos yin te// gsang ba bzhi yi ngo bo ste// brjod bya brjod byed brgyad du gsungs
236a7(rgyud): gsang ba ni lnga rgyal po lnga// lta ba spyod pa zung 'jug lam// rgyu dang 'bras bu sa la sogs// bcu dgu rgyal po bzhi par gsungs// kye dpa' bo 'jigs pa che// rgyu ni gnod sbyin gzugs dang srin po'i gzugs// gzhan
236a8(rgyud): yang bdud la sogs pa'i gzugs// sna tshogs ston na ji ltar bgyi// lha 'am klu la sogs pa'i gzugs// sdug ma ston pa ji ltar bgyi// gnod sbyin sgra dang srin po'i sgra// shin du 'jigs pa'i sgra grags na// de la bdag gis ji ltar
236b1(rgyud): bgyi/ tshangs pa'i sgra dang ngang pa'i sgra// sgra snyan byung na ji ltar bgyi// bya rgod dri dang gla rtsi dri// ngan skyugs la sogs dri byung na// de la bdag gis ji ltar bgyi// gur gum tsan tan ga bur sogs// dri zhim byung na ji ltar bgyi// bdud rtsi la sog/ 
236b2(rgyud): drug bcu sogs// bzang po ston na ji ltar bgyi// ngan skyugs la sogs dman pa'o// sna tshogs ston na ji ltar bgyi// reg bya lcags kyi spu gri sogs// rtsub pa ston na ji ltar bgyi// dar men la sogs lus kyi reg/ 'jam pa byung na dza~M/ 
236b3(rgyud): ltar bgyi// 'jig rten chos rnams sna tshogs dang // 'jig rten 'das pa'i chos rnams ston// de la bdag gis ji ltar bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gzugs ngan khong khro mi bskyed cing // gzugs bzang 'dod pa
236b4(rgyud): mi bskyed cing // de la lus kyi phyag rgya bstan// lan byed pa ni mkha' 'gro'o// don grub sprul pa yin par nges// brtul zhugs can gyis dngos grub blangs// bdud sprul ba'i tshig stsal// kun las mkhas pas sbyar bar bya// sgra snyan
236b5(rgyud): 'dod pa mi bskyed cing // 'jigs pa'i sgra la khong mi khro// de la btang snyoms sems bya skye// rdo rje glu yis brten par bya// de bzhin dri zhim mi chags shing // dri nga khong khro mi bya zhing // mnyam par dmigs pa brtag par bya// dri yi
236b6(rgyud): phyag rgya de la bstan// lan byed mkha' 'gro'i sprul pa ste// lan med bdud kyi sprul pa'o// ro bzangs bza' bar mi bya ste// ro ngan dor bar mi bya ste// mnyam par gzhag la brtag par bya// de la ro'i phyag rgya bstan// de bzhin bye brag
236b7(rgyud): shes par bya// de bzhin chos la chos phyag rgya// brtag te bdud ni gsang bar bya// lus kyi 'byung ba'i bdud rnams kyang // kha dog dbyibs las shes par bya// dang po dngos grub blang ba yang // mig gis gzugs la rna bas sgra// / 
236b8(rgyud): sna yis dril lce'i ro// lus kyis reg la yid kyis chos// brtul zhugs can gyis dngos grub blang // de nas bdud ni gsal byas te// yang na stong pa'i rdzong na gnas// yang na 'phrin las bzhi yis bsal// chung na bde byams// 
237a1(rgyud): @la sogs pas// nad kyi bdud ni bsal ba'o// bda' khris rlung ste 'dus pa'i bar// rlung can mgo'i sgo ru ste// rgyud 'di btad gyi legs par zung // de ltar byas na dngos grub 'thob// dpal mkha' 'grogs/ 
237a2(rgyud): ba rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad du// sar+b+ba burnas ma yo ka/ kani rnaM shem par nam s+yA drA ra tan+ta// bod skad de// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba
237a3(rgyud): 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i rgyud phyi ma// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad
237a4(rgyud): bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// 'di ni rang 'byung bcom ldan 'das gcig pu rab tu che ba'i lha// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma 'de ba'i mchog/ chags med chags dang bral ba min// dbu mar yang
237a5(rgyud): ni mi dmigs so// bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgya// 'di ni gnyis med theg pa'i mchog/ sgyu ma dag ni thams cad pas// bud med sgyu ma khyad par che// ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag gis// rang bzhin gyis ni de grub pa'o// 'jig rten
237a6(rgyud): gsum 'dir bud med 'dis// gus par byed pa dag tu 'gyur// rnyed dang bde dang dga'i kun gyis// ngan pa spyod pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur// rang gi ngo bo yongs bsgyur na// bud med kun gyi sgyu ma 'grub// ngo mtshar sgyu ma'i
237a7(rgyud): phyag rgya ni// mkha' 'gro ma zhes brdas bstan to// Da na ni mkha' 'gro ba zhes// khams las mngon du brtags po ste// nam mkha' kun du spyod 'grub pas// mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yi// thaMs
237a8(rgyud): cad ma lus bde mchog gis// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags// de ni nam mkha' 'gro ba zhis// sangs rgyas khams las rnam par brtags// kun du 'gro ba grub pa ni// sangs rgyas kun
237b1(rgyud): bdag mkha' 'gro ma'o// shem zhes bya ba bde bar bshad// sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen yin// sgyu ma thams cad rab sbyor ba// mchog tu bde bas bde ba'i mchog/ kun du kun nas thams cad ni// bdag nyid rtag tu thams cad kun// sangs rgyas
237b2(rgyud): la sogs brtan g.yo kun// kun gyi dngos por bdag gyur to// sems dang sems dpa'i ting 'dzin kun// byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs nyid// de bzhin bdud dang bdud las rgyal// de ni byang chub sangs rgyas yin// rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin nyid dang // de
237b3(rgyud): bzhin pad mo pad mo 'chang // nor bu nor bu 'dzin nyid dang // de dag gi yang rigs yin no// de nyid 'dod chags 'dod chags bral// 'dod pa dang ni grol ba'ang yin// dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum dang // 'jig rten gsum dang khaMs
237b4(rgyud): gsum dang // rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa yi// gnas pa thams cad de nyid do// 'gro ba dag ni ma lus kun// thams cad du ni 'di 'gyur ro// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi
237b5(rgyud): mtha' klas pas// dngos po thams cad de yin te// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// nam mkha' sgyum bde mchog go// bskal pa bye ba grangs med par// 
237b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad ma thob pa'i// phyag rgya'i cho ga dang dag pa'o// tshe 'di nyid kyis thob 'gyur ba// de ni bdag gis brtag par bya// sangs rgyas kun bdag bode ba'i mchog/ bdag nyid shin du bsgrub pa las// sangs rgyas kun bdag
237b7(rgyud): bde ba'i mchog/ rnal 'byor yang dag ma yin sems// lha la dmigs par byed pa dag/ rnal 'byor gzugs brnyan rang bzhin te// lugs ma la sogs rnal 'byor skye// yang dag mchog sems rnal 'byor pa// lha la dmigs par byed pa
237b8(rgyud): dag/ rang gi dam tshig bdag sbyor ba// mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// gzugs brnyan lugs ma la sogs la// rnal 'byor 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi// byang chub sems la rab brtson no// de las rnal 'byor lhar 'gyur ro// 
238a1(rgyud): byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin// de bas thams cad gdan sbyor bas// sangs rgyas thams cad 'thob par 'gyur// bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams ca dang // dpa' bo thams
238a2(rgyud): cad bdag yin no// de bas bdag nyid ltar sbyor bas// bdag nyid rab tu bsgrub par bya// de yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dpa' bo rnams kyang thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du// tshe 'di nyid la sgrub par 'gyur// 
238a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog lngas// de kho na nyid snang ba dam pa'i yul la 'jug pa ye shes kyi phyag rgya brtag
238a4(rgyud): pa ste/ dang po'o// // 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyi ma sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpar bdag sbyor bas// dbab pa
238a5(rgyud): thams cad rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde ba che// de bas bde ba nyid kyis ni// sangs rgyas thams cad bde ba kun 'thob pas// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rnal
238a6(rgyud): 'byor dbang phyug bde chen po// 'di la khrus dang bsdam mi dgos// dka' thub dka' bar spyad mi dgos// dka' thub sdom pa med pa dang // bde ba dang ni dga' bas 'grub// de ltas ji ltar 'dod spyod cing // kun ze de bzhin
238a7(rgyud): thams cad spyod// spyod pa ci gar 'dod par byed// g.yo ba dag kyang ci dgar byed// langs pa dang ni 'dug pa dang // 'chag gam ji ltar gnas kyang rung // dgod dam rab tu smra yang rung // gang na ji ltar spyod kyang rung // dkyil 'khor
238a8(rgyud): du yang ma zhugs pa'am// sgrib pa kun dang ldan pa'ang rung // rang gi lhar ni bdag sbyor na// bsod nams chung rang grub par 'gyur// de nyid rnal 'byor 'di yis ni// thams cad 'grub par byed pa na// ngan zos ngan spyod thams cad kyis
238b1(rgyud): nyes pa dag tu yong mi 'gyur// bskal pa bye bar mi thob pa// sangs rgyas dam pa thams cad de// phyag rgya'i cho ga gang dag gis// bsgrubs na kun nas 'thob 'gyur ba// bdag nyid sgrub par byed pa'i mchog/ de ni bdag gis brtag par bya// sangs rgya
238b2(rgyud): thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpar bdag sbyor ba// cha lugs ji bzhin bsgyur ba yis// thams cad sna tshogs phyag rgya'i bdag/ bsod nams chung yang 'grub par 'gyur// rgya 'di 'grub pa tsam// 
238b3(rgyud): gyis ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob// shin du byin gyis brlabs na ni// sangs rgyas thams cad 'du bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam
238b4(rgyud): pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// gang gis ldan pa 'di mthong zhing // rnam pa kun du mchod byed na// de yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // mthong zhing mchod pa byas par 'gyur// 'di dang sangs rgyas thams cad la// 
238b5(rgyud): mthong ba dang ni reg pa yis// dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa'ang // bden pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur// mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang // thos pa dang ni dran pa yis// sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing // sangs rgyas dngos grub thams cad
238b6(rgyud): / 'grub/ 'di dang sangs rgyas thams cad la// rnal 'byor thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// bud med dag dang rnam grol zhing // sangs rgyas byang chub reg par 'gyur// kun du kun nis thams cad ni// bdag nyid rtag par thams cad du// sangs rgyu
238b7(rgyud): thams cad dngos grub par// de yis bdag nyid mthong bar 'gyur// 'di ni bdog nyid kun na gnas// mchod pa'i sprin chen thams cad kyis// bkod pa rab 'byam tshogs dag gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchod mdzad pa// thams cad bdag
238b8(rgyud): nyid sbyor mchod dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog nyid ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te// bde ba'i mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor thams cad nyer sbyor bas// dpal ni bzhir gyur 'grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor kun na
239a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// de yi nye bar sbyor ba ni// khams gsum ma lus thams cad do// rnal 'byor kun gyi longs spyod kyis// ji ltar bde ba bsnyen byed cing // 
239a2(rgyud): gi lha'i rnal 'byor gyis// bdag nyid rab tu mchod par bya// rjes su sbyor bas mchod byed cing // rnal 'byor kun gyi bde ba dag/ bdag nyid kun du myang byed na// shin du sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag
239a3(rgyud): nyid kyi/ ra sa ya na bde ba 'dis// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal tshe dang // lang tsho nad med bde mchog 'grub// kun du kun nas thams cad du// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor po// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ rtag tu de ni 'grub
239a4(rgyud): par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyus re ba'i mchog las// dpal rdo rje sems dpar kan du sbyor ba'i brtag pa ste gnyis pa'o// 
239a5(rgyud): 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pa// dpal ldan rang nyid dam tshig bde/ 
239a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde ba che// dpal rdo rje sems dpar sbyor ba yi// mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du// phyag rgya bde ba chen po kun// so so rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur// dpal rdo rje sems
239a7(rgyud): dpa' sbyor ba yi// mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du// rnal 'byor bde ba mos pa kun// so sor rjes su rong 'grub 'gyur// dpal rdo rje sems dper sbyor ba yis// mthu nyid kyis na thams cad du// bde ba mos pa'i dngos grub kun
239a8(rgyud): so so rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur// dpal rdo rje sems dpar sbyor ba yi// mthu nyid kyis na thams cad du// bde ba mos pa'i dbang phyug kun// so so rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur// dpal rdo rje sems dpar sbyor ba yis// mthu nyid
239b1(rgyud): kyis na thams cad du// nam mkha'i dbyings nas mtha' klas pa'i// bud med mchog rnams skye bar 'gyur// de yi dam tshig de byung ba// sdug pa dam tshig bdag rjes 'brang // shin du sbyor dang sbyor chen pos// thams cad dad / 
239b2(rgyud): nyid dam tshig mchog/ gcig bzhin du ni gcig spyod pa// lhan cig spyod pa rjes spyod sdug/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma mchog tu 'bar// thams cad dga' ba ma lus pa'i// phyag rgya thams cad
239b3(rgyud): bde ba che/ rtag pa dam pa lha mo yi// rgyal mos mchod pa thams cad mchog/ dpal rdo rje sems dpar sbyor ba dang // thams cad lha mo 'dus pas ni// ma lus bskal pa bzang po kun// bde bar so sor rjes su 'grub/ phyag
239b4(rgyud): / rgya 'di yis btag pa las// rdo rje sems dpa' che ba'i lha// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa// lha mo bode ba chen po kun// thams cad rnal 'byor bde bas myos// sdig med stobs kyi ngo thon du// phan tshun du ni rab dga' ba// 
239b5(rgyud): skyes bu'i tshul gyis dga' bar byed// dbang po kun las byung ba yi// mchod pa'i sprin chen thams cad kyis// bkod pa rab 'byams sna tshogs kyis// thams cad bdag nyid mchod pa byed// rnal 'byor bde ba thams cad kyi// dpa
239b6(rgyud): bskur bde tshon las byung ba// rin chen tshogs rnams thams cad kyi// rab tu rmongs pas dbang bskur 'gyur// lha mo kun gyi longs spyod la// ci bde bar ni bsnyen bya ba// bdag ni che ba'i lhar sbyor bas// bdag la bdag gis ra/ 
239b7(rgyud): tu mchod/ rnal 'byor thams cad bde ba yis// rjes su sbyor bas mchod byed cing // rtog tu myang bar byed pa na// shin du sbyor bas 'grubo 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid kyi// ra so ya na bde ba des// dpal rdo rje seMs
239b8(rgyud): dpa'i tshe 'grub cing // lang 'tsho nad med bde mchog 'grub// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung snyan pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che// sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal chen po// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun
240a1(rgyud): gyi bdag 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi gtso// rin chen dbang phyug kun gyi bdag/ de dag dang ni dga' sprod na// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong ldang // lha mo thams cad grub chen po// 'khor los bsgyur ba rab tu 'grub// 
240a2(rgyud): chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa// dngos grub kun gyi pad mos pa// de la rgya che mchog gzhan med// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde chen des// 'di la tshe 'di nyid
240a3(rgyud): kyis ni/ rnam pa kun du mi 'grub pa'i// dngos grub kun gyi bde mos pa// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa// dbang phyug kun gyi bde mos pa// dam pa rgya chen gang yang med// sangs rgyas thams
240a4(rgyud): cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog des// 'di la tshe 'di nyid kyis ni// rnam pa kun du mi 'grub med// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba
240a5(rgyud): mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde ba'i mchog las// lha mo thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba// bskal pa bzang po dpal rdo rje dam tshig gi rtag pa ste gsum pa'o// / 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs
240a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ lha mo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// bskal pa bzang mchog 'dod pa ste// yang dag sbyor ba'i bde myong ba// 'dod chags ther zug brtan pa can// sangs
240a7(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi gzugs chen dang // dbyangs dang dri dang ri dag dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi reg bde mchog/ rang gi spyad par de spyod do// sangs rgyas pha rol phyin grub pa// gzugs dang sa rnams de bzhin du// dga' bar spyod na lha dang
240a8(rgyud): mo'i/ skal bzang bud med ci zhig smos// lha'i dngos grub dga' ba dang // sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po// bskal pa bzong po bde myong bas// so so rjes su rang 'grub gyur// dngos grub thams cad las byung ba// de bzhin/ 
240b1(rgyud): gshegs pa kun gyi dpal// bskal pa bzang po'i longs spyod kun// rang gi spyad par de spyad do// rdo rje can gyi grub mchog dang // 'jig rten dbang po mchog gi dpal// sangs rgyas dag las bde dam pa// phrogs nas nye bar spyod
240b2(rgyud): par byed/ khams gsum dag na ma lus pa'i// sangs rgyas rgyal srid chen po kun// stsal gyi stobs kyis 'o thon du// phrogs nas nye bar spod par byed// sangs rgyas kun gyi grub chen po// mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa dag/ kun nas
240b3(rgyud): phrogs te de sprod na// longs spyod gzhan lta ci smos ci dgos// mthu chen las ni bkra shis brtan// 'phrog las 'grub dang dran las dga'// ngo 'thon stobs kyis phrogs nas kyang // de ni dad la sbyin par byed// ma lus 'jig rten gsum
240b4(rgyud): rgyal srid/ 'jig rten dbang phyug kun dang bcas// ngo 'thon stobs kyis phrogs nas kyang // de ni dad la sbyin par byed// tshangs pa 'jug sel dbang chen gyi// mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa dag/ kun nas phrogs te myur sbyin na// longs spyod
240b5(rgyud): gzhan lta ci zhig smos// de yi mi sbyin ci yang med// sangs rgyas don du bya ba kun// mi bya ba ni gang yang med// sbyin pa dang ni byed pa'ang yin// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang // phrogs nas kyang ni sbyin byed na// las mchog dag
240b6(rgyud): ni rab 'byams dang // dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos// dngos grub mchog ni gdon mi za// sde rnams thams cad rab 'joms pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi grub chen po// 'khor lo bsgyur ba rab 'grub po// sangs rgyas thams cad
240b7(rgyud): mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi 'phrul che// rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu 'jug/ la lar byang chub sems chen po// la lar spyod pa 'thun par 'gro// la lar dga' ldan lnga dag las// dam pa shin
240b8(rgyud): du 'pho ba'o// la lar skye ba rnam par dag/ la lar nges par 'byung bar gsal// la lar byang chub chen por gshegs// la lar bdud las rab tu rgyal// la lar byang chub mngon 'tshang rgya// la lar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// la/ 
241a1(rgyud): / lar pha rol mu stegs rnams// chos dang 'thun par tshar gcod do// la lar 'jig rten gsum rgyal ba// grub pa kun gyi dbang phyug nyid// la lar rtog pa thams cad mchog/ grub pa'i dbang phyug bla na med/ 
241a2(rgyud): de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog gis// 'dul ba'i thabs su nges pa'i gar// rnam par 'phrul pas dges shing rol// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ brtan pa dbang phyug che ba'i
241a3(rgyud): bdag/ gzugs dang tshe dang kha dog stobs// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin// 'gro ba dag gis bsnyen bya zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mchod// lha mo kun gyi dpal ldan mchog/ rdo rje sems dpar rab
241a4(rgyud): tu 'grub/ sems can khams ni du ma dag/ ma lus par ni phyag rgyas 'debs// lha dang byang chub dka' ba dag/ brtan par sems can rnams la sbyin// sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog gis// sems can kun gyi don
241a5(rgyud): byed cing / ma lus lus pa med pa yi// bskal pa kun du srid par gnas// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma'i bde ba'o mchog la/ 
241a6(rgyud): sna tshogs thams cad kyi bskal pa bzang po mchog gi dngos grub ces bya ste// dpal dam tshig gi brtag pa ste bzhi pa'o// // phrogs nas nye bar spyod par byed// khams gsum dgon ma lus pa'i// sangs rgyas rgyal srid chen po/ 
241a7(rgyud): kun/ rtsal gyi stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ yang dag sgrub pa gcig pu nyid
241a8(rgyud): ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyar ba// rtog pa'i cho ga thams cad la// grub pa dam pa mchog gi mchog/ sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba yis// cho ga sna tshogs 'dod pa yi// sems can rnams ni 'dul ba dang // bde ba thams cad 'grub pa'i/ 
241b1(rgyud): phyir bcom ldan rnal 'byor de nyid ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul pas// sems can don kun rnam sprul na// myur du shin du 'grub par 'gyur// nyin re 'am yang na zla re 'am// yang na de bzhin lce ror ni// ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs
241b2(rgyud): nas kyang / sangs rgyas bde mchog gar bya'o// khams kyi ngo bo thams cad dang // de bzhin srog dang rtsa lngas byung // rang gi lha'i cha lugs su// grub pa'i phyag rgyar rab tu bya// dkyil 'khor gang dang gang bsten pa// sna tshogs phyag rgya'i
241b3(rgyud): mchod pa yis// slob ma'i tshogs kun de dang de ru// mchod pa byas nas der 'grub po// de las gzhan yang rtog kun gyi// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam sprul pa// ci rigs par ni sprul byas pa'i// gtam dag rab tu bshad par bya// 
241b4(rgyud): sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu zhugs// 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rtag pa dam pa brtan pa ste// rtag
241b5(rgyud): tu da ltar byung ba bzhin// ngo bo nyid ni 'da' bar dka'// cho ga sna tshogs 'dod rnams la// las kyi sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs/ dul ba'i phyir byis pa yin/ rang rgyas 'aso nga rtan gamo kun kun gyi do ba ni sngod/ sangs rgyan thams cad mnye
241b6(rgyud): sbyor ba/ mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ sgyu ma'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rnam pa sna tshogs kun gyi mchog/ sems can kun gyi don mchog rnams// sangs rgyas la sogs 'dul bas 'grub// dpal rdo rje sems dpas dbug phyung
241b7(rgyud): po'o// 'das pa'i dus ni sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin du stong pa nyid la brtson// 'gog pa'i chos nyid
241b8(rgyud): la sbyor bas// 'gegs shing yongs su mya ngan 'das// rnal 'byor de bzhin bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// 'gro ba thams cad rnam sbyang phyir// sangs rgyas sprul pa kun du bskyed// stong pa ma yin/ 
242a1(rgyud): mi stong min/ dbu mar yang na mi dmigs te// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// thabs kyi snying rje bdag nyid rnams// de bas ni snying rje'i thabs// shes rab pha rol phyin par gas lo// rtog pa med pa'i chos
242a2(rgyud): / rnams la/ sems can do du yongs brtag pa// rnam dA ma rtog la mos pas// thams cad rtogs pas brtag par bya// brag cha yi ni sgra 'dra ba// chos kyi tshig tu de gyur te// de las theg pa chen po yi// yang dag yon tan
242a3(rgyud): rgyas pa'i klus// dus gsum pa'i dam tshig gsum// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bstod// mnyam nyid mi g.yo mnyam nyid mchog gi chos nyid can// thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar
242a4(rgyud): mdzad/ yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa// dri med mi g.yo mnyam med dam pa'i mchog chos can// yon tan shin du phra ba'i cha la'ang tshad med de// dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang bskrun du yod pa min// dngos
242a5(rgyud): grub mtha' yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams// sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par rtsol// rtag tu dri ma med pa'i thugs rje'i shugs las byung // smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can// 
242a6(rgyud): 'gro ba'i don grub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa// thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang // tshad med tshad dang bral bar shin du yongs rdzogs pa'i// bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa rnyes gyur kyang / khams ga
242a7(rgyud): rnams la dngos grub mchog sprul mdzad pa yi// thugs rje'i spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yong mi 'gyur// e ma'o shin du bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan// mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang na go 'phang mchog brnyes na// khams
242a8(rgyud): gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad// mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen pa// dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol// 'dis ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// yang dag yon
242b1(rgyud): tan rgya chen te/ lan cig tsam ni brjod pas kyang // sangs rgyas thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid sbyor bas// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di nyid kyis// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi// dam tshig gsuM
242b2(rgyud): po 'grub par 'gyur// sku yi lta bas mngoms pa// thams cad bdag nyid bstan nas kyang // legs so zhes ni grub pa yi// mchog rnams kun ni rab bzhin mdzad// thams cad bdag nyid 'grub dga' dang // bsam pa tham
242b3(rgyud): cad yongs su rdzogs// sangs rgyas 'grub pa mchog kun dang // rnal 'byor dam pa'ang sbyin par mdzad// de nas de yi bsgrub pa dang // shin du rtag pa'i dngos grub dag/ gang gis srid pa 'di nyid la// dngos grub shin du rtag
242b4(rgyud): thob bshad/ rdo rje se gol rtogs pa yi// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya// thal me le pa sbyor ba'i// thal mo lan gsum rnam par bdab// dbang po gang dang gang lam sbyar// de dag de yi ngo bor bya// shin du mnyam gzhag sbyor ba yi/ 
242b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// ji ltar dga' mos chags pa dang // shad pa la sogs pa yis// ci nas yongs su ma skyo bar// rtag tu tshad med bzlas par bya// kun du kun nas thams cad ni// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa
242b6(rgyud): kun/ sangs rgyas kun dang dngos grub pa// rab tu mthong zhing mchog 'grub po// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang // de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du// tshe 'di nyid kyis 'grub par
242b7(rgyud): 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan bsngags pa rgya che ba// bstod pa'i rgyal po mchog ni lan cig glur blangs pas// kun du 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor rtag pa'i mchog/ dngos grub mi zad bde ba thob par 'gyur// bstod pa
242b8(rgyud): rgyal po 'di yis ni// thams cad bdag nyid dbang phyug mchog/ sna tshogs kun gyi rnam 'dul ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun 'grub ste// de bas dam tshig gsum la sogs// rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis// nam
243a1(rgyud): @/ mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sems can khams ni rnam par grol// dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbugs phyung ba'o// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshe/ 
243a2(rgyud): pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin du khro gtum gtum gdug par 'gyur// shin du gdug cing khro ba yis// 'o dod 'bod par ldang bar 'gyur// de nas 'phos nas
243a3(rgyud): sems can de// bag chags kyis ni mtshams sbyor ba/ shin du gdug pa chen por gyur// blo ni bdud kyis byin brlabs nas// rims dang dag dang dbyig dug nad// 'phro men ma dang gnod byed gdon// bdud dang rnam par log
243a4(rgyud): 'dren nyid/ shin du gdug pa chen por 'gyur// gonas gsum po ni 'jidzeg byed cing // sgrub pa po ni rnams la'ang za// lha la sogs pa'ang 'pho bar byed// bstan pa dag kyang 'jig par byed// de nas dbang por bcas pa'i lha// 
243a5(rgyud): tshangs pa'i drung du nye bar dong // tshangs pa'ang lha dang dbang por bcas// 'jug sel la ni skyabs su dong // tshangs pa 'jug sel lha rnams kyang // lha chen drung du nye bar dong // tshangs pa 'jug sel dbang chen yang // rdo rje rtsa/ 
243a6(rgyud): la skyabs su dong // de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje se gol phyag rgya ni// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar mdzad// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yi// dpung pa gnyis ni rdo rjer bcings// rdo/ 
243a7(rgyud): rjese gol brdabs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu mdzad pa// de yi bka' tsam gyis skrag nas// 'khor dang 'khor lo'i tshogs bcas pa// sangs rgyas thams cad gshegs gyur pa// gzhan lta smos nas ci
243a8(rgyud): zhig dgos// rdo rje se gol togs pa yis// 'jig rten gsum ni ma lus par// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa// kun gyis til 'bru bzhin du rgyas// shin du gdug pa'i gtum po la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur/ 
243b1(rgyud): shes rab thabs kyis ngo bo yi// khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang // 'jig rten gsum po bsreg byed na// sangs rgyas thams cad khros pa yis// khams gsum ma lus smos
243b2(rgyud): ci dgos// de bas sna yi rtse mo la// yid ni brtan par yang dag gzung // sna'i dbugs ni dro ba las// rgyal bas phyag rgya'i sbyor ba phyung // bcom ldan de nyid rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje khro bor gyur nas phyung // dpal rdo rje chen po he
243b3(rgyud): ru ka/ 'bar bas thal bar rab tu 'jig/ sems dpa' sngon por bar ba'i ngang // 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po 'bar// 'jig pa chen po'i dus ltar drag/ dur khrod kyi ni me dang 'dra// 'bar ba chen po sgra 'bar ba// thod pa mang
243b4(rgyud): be 'od dbu brgyan can// 'jigs pa chen po'i dus ltar drag/ dur khrod bzhin du rab 'jigs pa// khro bo la sogs pa'i tshul ldan pa// zhal rnams sna tshogs 'gyur ba dang // sbyin ma khro gnyer bcas pas bsgyur// 'bar
243b5(rgyud): ba'i lta bas gar byas pas// gu lang dbang chen nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs par bcas// gnas gsum dag ni 'bar byas nas// thal ba bzhin du rab tu 'jig/ rdo rje rdo rje kha Te ka/ dril bu sgra ni bsil
243b6(rgyud): bu yis/ thams cad phab nas slar yang ni// thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// de yi 'bar ba nyi ma las// byung ba'i grib ma mi bzad pa// bskyed nas ma lus bdud la stsogs// gdug pa rnams kyis khrag za nus
243b7(rgyud): rgyal po de ni dag dang // lhan cig dur khrod rnam par rol// thams cad rdo rje mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor 'bar ba yis// shin du gdug cing khro drag pa'i// sems can khams ni rnam spangs nas/ 
243b8(rgyud): dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing rnams su// sangs rgyas byang chub dag la dkod// rdo rje 'dod khro la sogs kyi// rtog pa bla med thams cad kyi// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sems can rnams ni rnam par
244a1(rgyud): sbyang / dpal he ru kas dbugs byung ba'o// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon
244a2(rgyud): byung ba de tshe sems con thams cad ni// log par lta la gnas par 'gyur// shin du lte ba ngan pa yis// 'o dod 'bod pa chen por ltung // rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// byang chub sems ni rnam
244a3(rgyud): sbyang phyir// pad mo chags par sbyar ba yi// rdo rje chos su gnas par 'gyur// ji ltar pad mo dmar po 'di// 'dam gyi nyes pas mi gos pas// de bzhin bag chags khams gsum gyi// nyes pa sna
244a4(rgyud): tshogs rnam par dag/ 'dis ni kun du gzigs pas na// rgyal ba'ang dbang phyug nyid du gyur// dpal ldan spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// 'dod chags thams
244a5(rgyud): cad dag pas na// mchod sbyin dam pa bcom ldan 'das// 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs kyis// sna tshogs pa'i 'dul bar spro// kun du spyan ras gzigs dbang rgyal// pad mo gar gi dbang phyug gyur// 
244a6(rgyud): pad me'i sgyu ma mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog des// pad mo gar dbang la sogs kyi// rtog pa bla med thams cad kyi// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sems can khams ni
244a7(rgyud): rnam par sbyang // dpalo pad mo gar gyi dbang phyug gis dbugs phyung ba'o// / 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/ 
244a8(rgyud): 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin du gdug cing bskam par 'gyur// shin du 'jungs par gyur pa yis// yi dgas rnams kyi dmyal bar ltung // de nas 'phos
244b1(rgyud): nas slar yang ni// shin du dbul por skye bar 'gyur// bkres dang skom pa'i skyon rnams kyis// de dag phan tshun gsod par byed// shin du gdug pa sbyang ba'i phyir// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan
244b2(rgyud): 'das/ dam pa'i dron gyi nor chen po// rdo rje nyi ma shar bar gyur// nam mkha'i snying po thams cad phyogs// kun gyi re ba yongs rdzogs mdzad// bud me byo la sogs rin chen mchog/ mkha' las rin/ 
244b3(rgyud): chen thams cad 'bebs// shin du gdug cing khro ba las// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi nyi ma ni// rab tu gdung bas kun bsgrubs pas// bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang // dbrog
244b4(rgyud): pas dang ni khyad par du// rgyal bar byas nas gnas gsum gyi// nor gyi tshogs kun bsdud par byed// 'jig rten gsum rgyal la sogs kyi// rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis// nam mkha'i
244b5(rgyud): dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sems can khams ni rab tu bkrol// dpal rdo rje nyi mas dbugs phyung ba'o// // 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin
244b6(rgyud): ga shegs pa'i gsu ba las// 'gro ba'i tshul du snod byung ba// Sh+Te tshe segs rla bas 'ani/ 'jod lu pa 'i zhe gu/ kri na grul su / 
244b7(rgyud): pa yi dmyal bar ltung // rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// drag shul sbyor ba'i tshul dag tu// rta mchog dpal ni byung bar gyur// thams cad
244b8(rgyud): dag par mos pa yis// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// pha rol gnon pa'i rtsal dag gis// shin du gdug cing khro gtum pa'i// sems can rnam pa mang po'i khams// 'jig rten
245a1(rgyud): thams cad rab tu 'jig/ byi ba chom po rkun po yis// thams cad rnam par sbyor bar byed// brid pa dang ni sgyu dag dang // ngo 'thon stobs kyis de bzhin du// dgra cha lnga yis brgal
245a2(rgyud): nas ni/ de tshe 'jig rten kun las rgyal// skye 'gro gnas dang 'gro ba rnams// mtha' dag po tul nas 'grub par 'gyur// gdul ba'i thabs rnams sna tshogs kyis// rang gi rgyal srid rtag
245a3(rgyud): tu skyong / g.yem pa rnams la g.yem par 'gyuraro// khro bo rnams la khro ba'i mchog/ zhi ba rnams la zhi ba'i mchog/ drag shul can la drag po gnon// sdig ming stobs kyi ngo 'thon du// dbang phyug dam par
245a4(rgyud): rab mnan nas// lha mo b+hI mo 'phrogs nas ni// de tshe longs spyod rang gir spyod// sdig med stobs kyi ngo 'thon du// mthu bo che ni rab mnan nas// rug ma yang ni phrogs nas ni// de tshe longs spyod rang gir/ 
245a5(rgyud): spyod/ sdig med stobs kyi ngo 'thon du// skye dgu bdag po rab mnan nas// lho mo rab tu zhi ba phrogs// de tshe longs spyod rang gir spyod// sdig med stobs kyi ngo thon du// 'dod pa'i lha ni rab man no nas// dga'
245a6(rgyud): sdug mi yi dbang phyug ma// phrogs nas de che nye bar spyod// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnya mo dang mi mnyamo pa// nam mkha'i dbyings ni mtha' klas par// rdo rje'i las mchog rnams gno/ 
245a7(rgyud): pa/ nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpar rab tu gnas// thabs dang rtsal gyi sgrub pa yis// drag shul sbyor ba sa bsgrubs nas ni// khams gsum rgyal srid ma lus par// rdo rje
245a8(rgyud): 'dzin pa de thob nas// byang chub sems ni mtha' yas mchog/ dral shul sbyor bas sgrub par byed// thams cad dag par mos pa yis// sdig med stobs kyi ngo 'thon du// rtsal gyis pha rol gnon pa
245b1(rgyud): yis/ sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu 'grel// lha yi dngos grub dka' ba dang // sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po// go 'bang mchog ni rtag pa dang // rang gi rnal 'byor gyis thob nas// sems can khams
245b2(rgyud): ni du ma dag/ ma lus pa ni rgyas 'dobs shing // 'chi med byang chub dka' ba dag/ sems can rnams la brtan par sbyin// rta mchog rnam par sprul pa yi// ma lus lus pa med pa yis// bskal pa kun
245b3(rgyud): tu srid par gnas// sems can kun gyi don yang byed// de ltar rta mchog dpal la sogs// rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sems can khams rnams rab tu
245b4(rgyud): tu bsgrub// dpal rta mchog gis dbugs phyung ba'o// // de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// rang byung rnams
245b5(rgyud): kyi gtam gyi rtags// nam mkha'i kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gnas// grub pa'i dbang phyug rab sgrub pas// thams cad bdag nyid 'jug par byed// sangs rgyas thams cad
245b6(rgyud): mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las// gtam gyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i brtag pa ste// lnga pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang thams cad du// rnam pa sna tshogs mchog 'gyur
245b7(rgyud): ba'i/ sangaso rgyas thams cad minyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog bshad// dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde 'byung ba// gsang ba mchog gi dges pa na// 
245b8(rgyud): thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' snang ba bde// de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rdzas mchog/ rin chen rgyal la sogs pas sbas// dril
246a1(rgyud): @/ bu rgyal mchog ldan pa yi// bla re dam pa bres pas na// rdo rje tshig dang mchod la sogs// glu dang sil bstan rnam par 'phrul// me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba dang // mar me
246a2(rgyud): dri la sogs ldan par// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog sgrub// yang na bdag gi gnas dag gam// bskyed mos tshal la sogs pas smra'o// de ni dang por gnas
246a3(rgyud): bshams te/ 'jam zhing reg na bde 'gyur ba// sna tshogos pad mo ras kyis g.yogs// de ni thams cad dag pa'i gdan// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// sbyor ba'i dbang phyug rnam 'phrul pas// 
246a4(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha// de nas rnam par 'phrul par mdzad// stan de dag ni thams cad la// ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du dgod// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta bab so bzhi yis mdzes par byas// rdo
246a5(rgyud): rje rin chen pad mo sogs// sgo srungs dang ni ldan par bya// rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yi// bud med dag ni legs bsgrubs pa// bskal bzangs rang gi phyag rgya mtshan// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor brtag par bya/ 
246a6(rgyud): mi yi 'tshal ni grub pa la// dmar chen po zhes bya bar bshad// ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag dang // rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub pa'o// rdo rje chu dang rdo rje bcas// mtshal chen po dang bsgrubs pa ni// mthu yis rab
246a7(rgyud): tu grub pa ste/ pad mo snod kyi nang du bzhag/ chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i thugs// dam tshig 'di ni 'da' bar dka'// de
246a8(rgyud): yaM mtshal dang khu ba dang // mtshal chen po ni bsgrubs pa dag/ chags pa chen po las byung bas// dmar chen po zhes bya ba shad/ dmar chen po dgapung bca/ tsan dan dmar po sbyar ba dag/ chos kyi dbus su gzhag pa ni// ra sa
246b1(rgyud): yan kun slong ba// rang gi lha ni sbyor ldan pas// srin lag mthe bo so yi rtses// zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin byas nas// rtag pa yi ni dngos grub 'thob// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyis// ra sa ya na bde ba 'dis// 
246b2(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe dang gzhon// nad med pa dang bde mchog 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis// 'dus pa der ni zhugs pa dag/ 'dod pa bzhin du
246b3(rgyud): 'gro 'ong ldang // kun du kun nas thams cad ni// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun// sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun// kun gyi dngos por 'di 'gyur ro// 'dis ni bsrung ba byas pas dpal// dze/ 
246b4(rgyud): rje sems dpa' bzhin du 'gyur// rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro bde mchog gis// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid 'grub// de nas khrus byas dri zhim lus// ci 'byor pa yi gos dang rgyan// 
246b5(rgyud): sna tshogs gos/ dgos nas ni// me tog phreng rgyan kha dri zhim// sna tshogs kun gyi bskal bzang pos// slong bas dal gyis dal gyis su// gos dgab pa yi sbyor ba yis// bdag gi 'byung ba bskul
246b6(rgyud): bar bya/  rdzogs par sangs rgyas nyi zla rnams// shar pa dag ni mthong ba yis// sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing // bsod nams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// nges pa'i lam dang kun ldan pa// / 
246b7(rgyud): rnam par 'das pas rnam par brgyan// brtan zhing grub slong byed pa// kun nas slong ba'i bde ba ni// stong pa shin du rnal 'byor yod med mthus// nam mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gshegs// bder
246b8(rgyud): gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhengs su gsol// rdo rje sems dpa' bskal bzangs dpal khyod bdag/ 'di dag nyid ni glur blangs nas// shin du mya ngan yongs 'das par// shing 'a
247a1(rgyud): 'ang slar ni slong 'gyur na// yang srid pa lta ci zhig smos// lam bzhi dang ni mnyam ldan pa// rnam par 'das pas mdzes par byas// sna tshogs 'brang ba rab tu 'grub// 'jig
247a2(rgyud): rten gsum po rab bsgrubs pa// 'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas pas// 'jig rten gsum gyi ston pa po// 'jig rten gsum la sgyid sbyin pa// 'jig rten gsum po bdag laM bsgrubs// rje
247a3(rgyud): rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// lha mo kun dang 'grogs pa yis// sna tshogs kun gyi bskal bzangs po// a ra li ni kun 'grub 'gyur// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// lha mo kun dang
247a4(rgyud): bde mos pa// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag rdzogs// nyi ma zla ba gsal bar 'char// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' yang sbyor// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog 'byung // lan gcig dmigs pa tsam gyis
247a5(rgyud): kyang / bde ba'i dngos grub kun 'byung ba// brtan zhing grub pa slong byed pa// sna tshogs 'brang bas de bzhin du// gan d+ha ra ba dang shad pa'i// glu blang sna tshogs glus grub po// de nas de nyid
247a6(rgyud): dam pa yis// thar pa thams cad rmongs pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid la// glu 'di yis ni bskul bar bya// rjes su chags pa'i rnam meng dga' bo'i pad mo rnam dag pa'i// 
247a7(rgyud): mchod pa'i gsal bar rjes su mchod byas pa// mchog tu rtag pa'i rnal 'byor bde bas bde ba grub par mdzod// kye mo mchog tu bde ba'i dam tshig ngo bo nyid// mchog tu bde ba shin du rnal 'byor
247a8(rgyud): bskal bzang mchog dges pa// rang gi dam tshig skyon mod rtag la rol cig rol ci// kye ma mchog tu gsang ba'i bdag po rang gi dam tshig yin pa'i phyir// rab tu gsang ba'i lha mo mchog rnams
247b1(rgyud): so/ 'gro ba'i rgyud ni rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul ba gsal bar mkhyen// dam tshig thams cad dngos po brtan g.yo kun gyi ngo bor gyur// rgyal ba kun gyi bdag nyid rnal 'byor bde ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma
247b2(rgyud): ho/ kye ma dam pa rtag pa'i dngos grub chen po rab tu bsgrubs la ston// dza hUM baM ho// e ma bde mchog bde bas drongs// rnam par sprul hU~M snang bar mdzod// a la la ho// de bzhin gshegs pa
247b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs kyis// slob ma dag ni gzhug tu gsol// klu yi rgyal po 'di dag ni// rdo rje sems dpe'i dpal gyi gnas// kun gyi sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog
247b4(rgyud): ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// glu 'di dag ni len pa na// dkyil 'khor sna tshogs thams cad du// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam 'phrul pa// ma lus lus pa med par snang // rnam pa mang
247b5(rgyud): po'i 'dod chags rgyud kyi sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab tu sbrel pa rnam par sprul// ten te// 
247b6(rgyud): te hUM/ rnam pa mang po'i rab tu dga' ba'i rgyud kyi sems can ma lus lus pa med pa'i 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sbrul rnam par sprul/ 
247b7(rgyud): hUM hUM hUM// rnam pa mang po khro bo'i rgyud kyi sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu mas thams cad rab sbrel rnam par sprul// ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ 
247b8(rgyud): rna mi pi mang po srog gi rgyud kyi sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sbrul rnam par sprul// hA shau Sh+ye be shi hUM// 
248a1(rgyud): de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa// rang byung rnams kyi glu yi rgya// nam mkha'i kun gyi
248a2(rgyud): skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la ni gnas// grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas// thams cad bdag nyid grub par 'gyur// glu 'di dag ni blangs pa dang // lha mo kun gyis rab bskul
248a3(rgyud): nas/  mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'grub// dbang po kun las byung ba yi// mchod pa'i sprin chen rnam bkod pa// rab 'byam tshogs rnams thams cad
248a4(rgyud): kyis/ kun gyi bdag nyid mchod par byed// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis// dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid lus// ma lus lus pa med par
248a5(rgyud): 'grub/ ston pa'i phyag rgya phab pa yis// bud med dag kyang bsgrubs nas ni// rdo rjer bcas pa'i mtshan ma 'dzin// rnal 'byor mar ni rab tu 'gyur// de dag rang gi lha rnams dang // 'dra
248a6(rgyud): bar byin gyis brlabs bsgrubs nas// sngon med rol mo'i sil snyan ga ra// rnam par sprul pas 'grub par 'gyur// lha yi gzugs dang sgra dang dri// ro dang reg pa bde mos pas// bdag
248a7(rgyud): nyid rang gi ltar mthong zhing // mchod pa dag kyang byed par 'gyur// lha yi mchod pa mnyami sbyor ba// bskal bzang mchog gi 'dod chags can// rnam pa kun du bskal bzang po// 
248a8(rgyud): bde ba yang dag sgrub par byed// sangs rgyas sgyu mo byin brlabs pas// rdo rje sems dpa ro mnyam sbyor ba'i// dngos grub kun gyi bde ba rnams// dkyil 'khor mthong dka' myong
248b1(rgyud): bar 'gyur/  rdo rje sems dpar sbyor yis// mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du// sna tshogs kun gyi bskal bzang po// rang gi bde ba nyid kyis 'grub// sangs rgyas kun gyi
248b2(rgyud): gzugs chen dang // dbyangs dang dri dang ro bde bas// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid kyi// de yis rab mthong mchod par byed// mchod pa thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// bskal bzang
248b3(rgyud): mchog gi 'dod chags can// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid kyi// dngos grub ma lus lus med 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkho' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde
248b4(rgyud): mchog gis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid gar/ rnam par rol pa mchog tu snang // de nas yang dag rang gsang bas// bud med dag ni bzhi rnams dang // gar gyi phyag rgya mchod pa
248b5(rgyud): yis// mchod pa thams cad de 'bul bar bya// rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dam par grub par mdzod// oM ai hUM// de bzhin gshegs pa
248b6(rgyud): dam pa grub par mdzod// oM ai hUM// dam tshig dam pa grub par mdzad du gsol// mchod pa chen po thams cad/ par mdzod// oM aM hUM// mchod pa chen po thams cad grub par
248b7(rgyud): mdzod/ oM aM hUM// glu yaM phyag rgya 'di ni dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te// mchod pa ma lus lus med pa'i// rab 'byam la sel sbyang du rung // gang dag grub par ma
248b8(rgyud): gyur dang // mchod pa dge ni mi 'byor pa// phyag rgya 'di yis mchod byas na// mchod pa thams cad myur du 'grub// mchod pa'i sbyor ba 'di dag dang // lha mo bzhi po dag gis ni// 
249a1(rgyud): me tog la sogs mchod byas nas// slob ma thams cad gzud par bya// dngos grub 'dod pas ci 'dod par// snyim pa'i gar ni kun bskyod nas// de dag gdong ni mdzes pa yi// ras
249a2(rgyud): kyis g.yogs nas gzung bar bya// dngos grub ji ltar thob 'dod par// slob ma me tog 'dor du gzhug/ lha mo gang la ltung ba yi// lha de de la 'grub pararo 'gyur// de nas gdong ni bkrol nas kyang // 
249a3(rgyud): yon gyi mchog ni blang bar gyi// sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur bas// ji ltar bar ni dbang bskur ro// dmar chen po de dag pur bcas// tsan dan dmar po sbyar ba rnams// tshogs kyi dbus su
249a4(rgyud): bzhag pa las// g.yon pa mtshan 'dzin rdo rjer bcas// rang gi lha ni rnal 'byor ldan// srin lag dang ni 'the bo'i rtses// zhi ba'i gtung ba bzhin myangs na// rtag po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// 
249a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i tshogs kyis kyang // rgyas mi thebs shing mi rmongs te// de la gnod par mi 'gyur ro// de nas gnas ni bgegs byas nas/ 
249a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad 'thun pa'os// mchog tu rtag pa'i bka' stsal pa// dam tshig sdom pa sbyin par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// sdom pa nyams pa khyed byed pa// ji snyed
249a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin// lha dag dang ni mi rnams dang // de bzhin rnal 'byor grub pa po// de dag la ni snying rings nas// snying la khrag chen 'thung ba zhig/ 
249a8(rgyud): sems can khams ni ma lus don// srid pa shin du dag bya'i phyir// ma 'gog chos nyid sbyor ba yis// rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya// bdag gi ngo bo yang spangs shing // dka' thub kyis ni gzir
249b1(rgyud): mi bya/ ci bde bdag ni bde bar spyad// 'di ni phyi dus sangs rgyas yin// rnal 'byor longs spyod thams cad la// cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis// sdig pa med kyis khyod mi 'jigs// 
249b2(rgyud): dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o// grub pa gcig pu gcig la spyod// lhan cig spyod dang rje so spyod sdug/ sangs rgyas byang chub bla med yin// yang dag nyid kyis rtag tu sten// rdo rje sems
249b3(rgyud): dang 'dre bzhin gshegs// de skad bka' stsal dpal ldan gyis// yang dag rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas dang // rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor bcas dang gsang bcas pa'i// bdag
249b4(rgyud): gi ye shes rgyas bsgrubs nas// ji lta'i tshul bzhin gar byed pas// skyob ma rnams la bde ba sbyin// slob ma dam pas de phyin cad// phyag rgya'i ye shes rjes bzung bas// rnam pa snang mdzad
249b5(rgyud): mchog bzhin du// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'grub// de nas ro dang zas dang gnas// glu dang sel snyan la sogs pa// de dag mgon po rnams la 'bul// rdo rje bla me chen po dang // 
249b6(rgyud): bdag dang gzhan la 'dod dgus mchod// de nas bdag nyid rab bsgrubs nas// kun gyi slob dpon rab gnas pa// ji lta'i tshul gyis 'jug pa yis// bden pa'i chos ni brjod par/ 
249b7(rgyud): bya/ rdo rje sdems dpa' dpal gyi tshul// rtog pa thams cad rab sgrub cing // rtog pa kun la rab sbyor ba'i// ngo bo nyid phyir chen po'i mchog/ sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba dang // 'dul
249b8(rgyud): nga'i bdag nyid sna tshogs pas// sems can rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir// de las gzhan pa'i tshul du bstan// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// 
250a1(rgyud): thar pa thams cad rnam sbyang phyir// grol ba'i mkha' 'gro byung bar 'gyur// rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yi// rang gi byin brlabs bsgrubs pa'i rgya// phyag rgya ji bzhin
250a2(rgyud): rjes 'thun pa'i// sangs rgyas sprul pa bslob por bya// gzhan yang rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// dam tshig la ni sdang rnam phyir// thams cad rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog/ rdo rje man
250a3(rgyud): 'gro 'byung bar 'gyur// gzhan yang shin du rnal 'byor pa// ma lus pad mos rnam sbyang phyir// bskal bzang dam pa mi 'gyur ba// pad mo sgyu ma byung bar 'gyur// gzhan yang rnal 'byor bco
250a4(rgyud): ldan 'das nor gyi mchog ni rnam sbyad phyir// nam mkha' kun gyi bdag po chen// rdo rje nyi ma dpal 'byung 'gyur// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// drag shul sbyor ba sbyangs pa'i phyir// 
250a5(rgyud): rta mgrin pha rol rab gnon pa// rto mchog rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur// rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yi// rang gi byin brlabs sgrub pa'i phyir// gzugs brnyan ngo bore sbyor ba yi// phyag rgya'i
250a6(rgyud): sbyor bas gar bya'o// dam tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// de ltar rnam par spyad na ni// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog 'grug/ kun du kun
250a7(rgyud): nos thams cad ni// sangs rgyas 'phrul pa thams cad kyis// bdag nyid rtog tu rnam pa kun// sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun// kun gyi dngos por de 'gyur ro// kun du
250a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// sangs rgyas 'phrul pa thams cad kyis// bdag nyid rnam par 'phrul pa ston// lha mo kun dang 'dus pa yos// sangs rgyas zhing ni ma lus par// 
250b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas sprul pa 'grub par byed// sangs rgyas sprul pa sgyu ma yis// sangs rgyas rnams kyis mdzad pa ston// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma gar byed pa// 
250b2(rgyud): khams gsum dag las ma lus par// dngos po kun du dri 'gyur ro// pad mo sgyu ma rnam 'phrul pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs// sna tshogs gzugs byed rim pa yis// 'gro
250b3(rgyud): ba thams cad mgu bar byed// khams gsum yi rgyal srid che// 'jil sdums g.yul 'gyed grub pa dag/ rgyal srid sgyu ma rnam sprul pas// bya ba thams cad ston par byed// khams gsuM
250b4(rgyud): pa yi rgyal srid che// bdog rtul phod pas mnan nas ni// 'gro ba thams cad rab 'joms pas// rta yi ger gyis ston par byed// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings
250b5(rgyud): mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha' dbyings kyis mtha' klas pa'i// sna tshogs kun gyi bde mchog gis// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gsheg
250b6(rgyud): dpal dgyes rol pa rnam 'phrul pa// sna tshogs kun gyis rnam par rol// rnam pa sna tshogs bskal bzang po// rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog gis// 'dul ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ 
250b7(rgyud): sems can khams ni rab tu sgrub// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sangs rgyas thams cad
250b8(rgyud): byung ba'i mchog/ nam mkha'i kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te// grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas// thams cad bdag nyid grub par byed// bcom ldan/ 
251a1(rgyud): 'das dpal rdo rje sems drapas de skad gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba
251a2(rgyud): mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor rtog pa ste// / drug pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha'i// rnam pa sna tshogs kun gyi mchog/ 'khor
251a3(rgyud): lo thams cad rnam sprul pa'o// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa ni// thams cad bdag nyid rjes su sprug/ dben pa yi ni gnas dag gam// rang gi bskyed mos tshul sogs pa// kun du sna tshogs bskal
251a4(rgyud): bzang po/ kun du sna tshogs bde mchog gis// kun du sna tshogs dgos pa rnams// ci bde bar ni bsgrub par bya// rten dang dgon pa gtsug lag khang // ri yi rtse rnams thams cad du// rnam pa
251a5(rgyud): du ma sna tshogs po'o// sangs rgyas dgos pa bsgrib par bya// dur khrod dang ni lha rten dang // ma mo'i gnas la sogs 'dug na// dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dgos pa dge/ rnam pa du mar grub par 'gyur// 
251a6(rgyud): pad mi skye ba'i tshal dga' dang // chu bo dag ni mdo dag tu// dpal pad mo 'dzin pa'i dgos pa rnams// yang dag par ni 'grib par 'gyur// rgyal po'i pho brang dga' ba dang // rgyal po'i bskyed mos
251a7(rgyud): tshal dag tu/ rnam pa sna tshogs du ma yi// rgyal po'i dgos pa sgrub par bya// mkhar na rnam pa sna tshogs dang // de bzhin chu bo'i 'gram dag gam// rgyal khams gzhan las grub pa ru// rdo rje
251a8(rgyud): rta ni bsgrub par bya// cha lugs rnam pa sna tshogs dang // sgrub po rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dgos pa la// dkyil 'khor la sogs rab tu bsgrub// sangs rgyas rnams
251b1(rgyud): kyi pad mo dmar// phyag na rdo rje sna tshogs pa// 'jig rten dbang gi kha dog dkar// rdo rje nyi ma dpal gyi ber// kha dog kun dang ci 'byor pa// bla re rgyal mtshan rgyan gyi rnams// thams cad rab tu
251b2(rgyud): bsgrub pa dpal// rta mchog rdo rje can gyi'o// gnas dang 'khor rnams ci 'dra dang // bkod dang 'gro ba ci 'dra dang // 'khor rnams bkod pa ci 'dra bar// de 'dra'i 'khor lo mchog gis mdzad/ 
251b3(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' lha rnams kyi// 'khor lo mngon sum mthong ba las// bsod nams rtag pa ci 'dra ba// phyis bris pa yang de bzhin no// dkyil 'khor thig gdab shes rab can// phyogs
251b4(rgyud): kun mnyam pa nyid sgrub pa// shar nub byang gi phyogs dag tu// thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad// dkyil 'khor yang dag ji lta bar// rab tu brtag pa su zhig nus// rang gi lha yi
251b5(rgyud): rang bzhin gyis// dkyil 'khor brtag par 'grub par 'gyur// bdag nyid gi lhar sbyor bas// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// cho ga lhag ga ma chad na'ang // nyes pa med par 'grub par
251b6(rgyud): 'gyur/ kun du sna tshogs bskal bzang po// kun du sna tshogs 'khor lo can// kun du sna tshogs grub pa'i phyir// dkyil de ba kun du gas pad dkyil ga'or zlum po da rgyal gyi// rdo rje can gyi zla gam bzhin/ 
251b7(rgyud): pad mo dbang gi pade mo dbyibs// rin chen mchog go rlan chen dbyibs// ji ltar 'dod pa ci 'byor pa// ci lta'i dus dang ci bde bar// dkyil 'khor kun du gnas par dpal// rta mchog phyag rgya
251b8(rgyud): rdo rje'i'o/ dkyil 'khoro nI ma zhugs shing // dam tshig rnams ni spang ba dag/ gsang ba yang dag mi shes pas// bsgrub pa ci yang mi 'grub po// srog chags bsad par mi bya'o// dkon
252a1(rgyud): mchog gsum ni yongs mi spang // byang chub sems kyang mi gnas te// slob dpon bskal bzang yang mi gtang // kun du sna tshogs bskal bzang por// bdag dang sgrub pas
252a2(rgyud): bskal ba bzang // bdag med chos nyid dang ldan pa// dam tshig la sdang bskal pa ngan// srid pa shin du bsgrubs pas na// skal bzang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// skal ngan nyan thos
252a3(rgyud): 'jig rten na// shin du yongs su mya ngan 'das// rtog pa thams cad sgrub pa'i phyir// skal bzang phyag ni rdo rje dpal// stong pa nyid la rab 'byor pas// rang rgyal rnams ni skal ba ngan// 'dod
252a4(rgyud): chags thams cad rnam dag pas// skal bzang spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // log par lta dang ldan pas na// skal ngan mu stegs 'jig rten no// dam pa'i nor mchog bsdud pa'i phyir// skal
252a5(rgyud): bzang rdo rje nyi ma'i dpal// bdag gi bu la'ang ma chagos pas// skal ngan dka' thub spyod pa kun// rgyal srid mchog rnams kun bsdus pas// rta mchog dpal ni bskal pa bzang // bdag
252a6(rgyud): med yongs su 'dzin med pas// thub pa thams cad skal ba ngan// bde ba thams cad bdog sgrub phyir// kun gyi slob dpon bskal ba bzang // lta ngan dam tshig la sdang bas// slob ma thams cad
252a7(rgyud): bskal ba ngan// gsang ba'i don ni yang dag nyid// 'dir ni gsal bar shes pa yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bka' bzhin du// sangs rgyas kun du 'grub par 'gyur// kun gyi slob dpon la gnas
252a8(rgyud): bas/ 'khor lo 'jug par byed pa na// dkyil 'khor 'dod pa'i slob ma la// gsang ba yang dag mtha' yas mchog/ thog ma nyid du gsal brjod pa// kye khyod ci la dga' zhes dri// skal ba bzang / 
252b1(rgyud): la bdag dga' zhes// 'jug pa bas kyang smra bar bya// gsang ba'i yan lag 'di shes na// ji ltar 'dod par rab tu gzhug/ gsang ba'i yang dag mi shes na// g.yas pa yis ni gzhug par bya// de ltar dkyil
252b2(rgyud): 'khor de zhugs nas// de bzhin shin du yon phul te// gsang ba'i cho ga nyid ces pas// mi 'gyur ba yi mchog 'grub po// kun du sna tshogs bla ma la// yon mchog dag ni dbul bar nges// gang la yongs
252b3(rgyud): su gtang dka' gang // de ni mchog tu bshad pa yin// gang dang gang gi sdug pa'i mchog/ yang na shin du khyad par can// de dang de ni bla mo la// de nyid mi bzad 'dod pas dbul// yang na de nyid 'dod gyur pa 'am/ 
252b4(rgyud): 'on te sems la dgos pa dag/ de sbyin yang na dgos par bya// de ni chung yang mchog yin no// de ni gal te mchog bdog la// de yang ngan pa'i yon dbul na// kun gyi slob dpon brnyas pas na// de nyid
252b5(rgyud): rtag tu sdug bsngal 'thob// bu mo shin du brgyan pa 'am// de bzhin chung ma sdug pa dag/ dbul nas rin gyis blu ba ni// sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi yon// mi chen bdag gis phul nas su// slar yang
252b6(rgyud): rin gyis blu ba ni// rdo rje 'dzin dpal sbyor ba yi// yon de mchog gi yon yin no// mu tig bzang dang nor bu dang // shin du dkar ba'i rwas zung dang // de bzhin rta ni dkar po dag/ pad mo can gyi yon mchog
252b7(rgyud): yin/ rgyal srid longs spyod gter rnams dang // gos dang rgyan gyi tshogs rnams dang // de bzhin mchod pa thams cad ni// rdo rje nyi ma'i yon yin no// shin du brgyan pa'i rta dag dang // glang po
252b8(rgyud): shin du brgyan pa dang // shing rta shin du gang ba dag/ rta'i rgyal po'i yon yin no// khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dang // srog dang rtsa ba'i de bzhin te// sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur ba/ 
253a1(rgyud): mkhas pas rnam pa sna tshogs brtag/ spyi bo drang ni dpral ba dang // glan pa gnyis dang lhag pa ru// sangs rgyas rin chen thams cad kyi// dbu rgyan mi 'gyur dam pa'o// 
253a2(rgyud): khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dam// srog dang rtsa ba'i de bzhin te// thod pa rin chen dbu rgyan nam// sangs rgyasragatsug gi nor bu dag/ kun du sna tshogs bla mar ni// kun gyi slob dpon kun la bya/ 
253a3(rgyud): rgyal srid thams cad rnam dag pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rin chen ngo mtshar gcig las byas// de bzhin sna tshogs kyis sbas pa// sangs rgyas pad mo dbang bskur bas// slob
253a4(rgyud): ma thams cad dbang bskur ro// sangs rgyas rin chen rdo rje phyed// rdo rje'i rigs la rdo rje yin// spyan ras gzigs kyi rdo rje sku// nor bu 'dzin gyi nor bu yin// sangs rgyas rin chen pad mo
253a5(rgyud): dang / rdo rje nor bu de bzhin du// thams cad mchog ni rta mchog la// rang gis dbang bskur bsduso pa'o// blug pa'am ni byis pa'am// brdungs pa 'am ni bris kyang rung // sna tshogs rab
253a6(rgyud): tu legs pa yi/ mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rab tu brtag/ kun du sna tshogs skal bzang po// rang byung rnams kyi mtshan ma'i rgya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// lha mo rnams kyi bde ba
253a7(rgyud): mchog/ gzhu dang mda' dang de bzhin du// skal bzang de bzhin bskal pa bzang // thod pa dang ni kha Te ka/ rdo rje rgya gram de bzhin no// pad mo rgya gram dpag med tshe'i// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe sgrub pa// 
253a8(rgyud): lha mo tshogs rnams thams cad kyi// mtshon ma'i phyag rgya tshogs sgrub bzhin// mda' dang de bzhin tshangs pa'i mgo/ de bzhin 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang // rdo rje tri shul phyag rgya'i mtshan// dpag bsam
253b1(rgyud): shing dang lcug ma dang // pad mo rta mgrin 'phang 'thog/ rta mgrin ldang ku de bzhin no// phag mgo mche ba grub pa dang // zla ba nyi ma de bzhin no// rin chen sna tshogs snod chen du// sangs rgyas gzugs kyi mu
253b2(rgyud): yan/ thams cad bdag nyid myong bskul bzang // mtshan ma'i phyag rgya sna tshogs gzhan// gling bu dang ni pi wang kun// ku mu da dang mur dza// me tog bdug pa mar me dang // sna tshogs dri rnams de bzhin no// 
253b3(rgyud): de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' yas pa'o// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya dam pa'i tshogs// nam mkha'i kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje
253b4(rgyud): sems dpa' nyid la gnas// grub pa'i dbang phyug rab sgrub pas// thams cad bdag nyid grub par 'gyur// chos gos dang ni lhung bzed dang // de bzhin du ni khar sil dang // dam pa'i chos kyi glegs
253b5(rgyud): bam dag/ mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan no// de bzhin lce'i phyag rgya dang // cha lang dang ni dza dag dang // rdo rje dang ni rin chen snod// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya tshegs gzhan no// de bzhin sangs rgyas
253b6(rgyud): gzugs brnyan dang // me long dang ni rlung yab dang // rdo rje ser ba'i srin dang bcas// de bzhin mig gi phyag rgya dang // rdo rje 'bar dang kha Te kha// thod pa kham par de bzhin no// dmar chen dang ni snying rje
253b7(rgyud): dang / sha chen po yang de bzhin te// rnon po mda' dang de bzhin 'dren// chang dang chu dang de bzhin te// lcug ma rlung gis bskyod pa dang // ras dang de bzhin me dag ni// rdo rje khro bo rgyal po'i dpal// gdug pa thas
253b8(rgyud): cad za ba yi/ mtshan ma'i phyag rgya grub pa'i tshogs// rnal 'byor dngos grub ba bsgrub pa// pad mo sna tshigs dmar po dang // ljang gu de bzhin dkar po dang // mthing ka ser po le ba rgan dag/ pad mon
254a1(rgyud): mtshan mchog rnam pa bdun// pad ma snying po bud med rgya// de bzhin chos kyi 'khor lo dang // gsal shing dpal bskyed rdo rje dag/ par mo mtshan ma'i tsho/ sa gzhan no// 
254a2(rgyud): gzhu dang mda' dang ral gri dang // de bzhin du ni 'bar ba'i me// dbang bskur gter dang rgyal mtshan dag/ mchod pa'i mtshan ma bsdus pa'o// de bzhin sna tsho snyam pad mo dang // 
254a3(rgyud): rgya gra ma de bzhin te// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya grub pa gnyis// rgyal srid thams cad 'joms pa ste// sangs rgyas thams cad la sogs pa// dngos po brten g.yo ma lus kun// rang byung
254a4(rgyud): rnams ni mtshan ma'i rgya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'o// de skad bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyis gsungs// sangs rgyas thams cad many+dzum
254a5(rgyud): bar sbyor ba/ mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'i rtog pa ste// bdun pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni// rdo rje
254a6(rgyud): sems dpa' dpal gyi lha// rnam pa kun du sna tshogs mchog/ mchod pa thams cad rnam sprul pa'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis drag gis// 'dzub mo the cung mdzes par bsgyur/ 
254a7(rgyud): dpal ldan g.yon pa 'gying ba'i thabs// g.yas pa bdan gsum par bya// sri zhur bcas pa stegs pa'i mchog/ bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' drapal// 'dzum dang bcas pa'i
254a8(rgyud): mig gis blta// bsam pa g.yos pa'i phyag rgya'o// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad mo 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pas// skad cig gis kyang phyag byed na// khengs pa gzhan lha
254b1(rgyud): zhig smos/ drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs par bcas// bdud de rab tu phyag 'tshal nas// las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur// rdo rje dpal gyi
254b2(rgyud): thal mo bsgyur// bsam pa g.yos pas phyag byas pa'i// sangs rgyas mchod pa legs byas na// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// smin ma g.yon pa bdeg tshul gyis// ru lu ru
254b3(rgyud): lur btsas bgad na// tshangs pa nye dbang drag po bcas// khams gsum pa rnams phyag byed 'gyur// thal mo pad mo kha 'bus bzhin// rang gi sbyor ldan snying khar bcing // mthe bo mthe'u
254b4(rgyud): cung mdab ma bzhi// rgyas pa btud pa'i phyag kyang bya// lus kyi yan lag thams cad ni// sa la bsnyil te phyag bya ba// snying kha dang ni spyi gtsug tu// thol mo sbyar te phyag bya'o// dpal ldan rdo rje
254b5(rgyud): 'gying ba'i thibs// 'dzum pa'i mig gis phyag byas nas// khams gsum pa yang phyag byed na// mthu bsnyems gzhan lta ci zhig smroso// phyag 'tshal phyag rgya shes pa'o// gar gyi rgyud rnams rdza
254b6(rgyud): snyed pa/ de bzhin bya ba'i tshul ston kun// de dag rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya// rang gi don rnams 'grub byed pa'o// 'gying dang bcas pa'i tshul byas nas// ji lta tshul bzhin gar byed cing // skor ba'i
254b7(rgyud): gar rnams sna tshogs kyis// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// sha ga shago gnyis dag gis// 'dzub mo mthe cung mdzes bsgyur te// g.yon pa'i 'dzub mo khu tshur bcang // g.yas pa ba dan
254b8(rgyud): gsum par bya// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// sangs rgyas kun dang 'grogs pa dang // dngos grub chen po mchog kun gyis// dbang phyug chen po 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad
255a1(rgyud): @dang 'grogs pa// dpal bskal pa bzang po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// // snyems 'dzin chen por bcas pa yis// sbyor ba de ni teganas su// 'gram pa'i phyogs su yongs bsgyur
255a2(rgyud): nas/ spyi bo 'tshem su bzhag par bya// thams cad 'bebs pa'i gar byed pas// gar bcas de ni phab nas su// bskal bzang hUM zhes bya ba'i glus// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// sangs rgyas
255a3(rgyud): thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// dpal bskal pa bzang po bde ba chen po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gi/ 'dzub mo mthe cung mdzes bsgyur ba'i// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su/ 
255a4(rgyud): de bzhin g.yon du basbyor bar bya// de ni sbyar bas bteg nas ni// spyi bo'i mtshams su gzhag par bya// bskal bzang o zhes bya ba'i glus// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// dpal rdo rje thal mo
255a5(rgyud): bsgyur sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa'o// log pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// 'dzub mo mthe'u cung mdzes bsgyur te// rdo rje thal mo gyen du dgrol// mchod pa'i gtor ma kun gyi tshul// dur khrod cha/
