255a6(rgyud): lugs gar byed pa// phyag rgya 'di yis gar byed cing // bskal bzang rdo rje drag por dgod// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya/ dang rdo rje he ru ka'i thal mo ste// mchod pa'i gtor ma thams cad
255a7(rgyud): kyi cho ga'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// 'dzub mo mthe'u cung mdzes bsgyur te// g.yas g.yon thal mo rngubs pa yis// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// dpal padra mo
255a8(rgyud): gar gyi dbang phyug thal mo'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// 'dzub mo 'the'u cung mdzes bsgyur te// rdo rje rin chen thal sbyar nas// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// re ba
255b1(rgyud): thams cad yongs su rdzogs byed// dpal rdo rje rin chen zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// gyen du 'thor zhing thur du 'bebs// bskor zhing de bzhin nyug ma dong // me tog bdug pa'i mar me mchog/ dri yi
255b2(rgyud): mchod pa 'byung ba'o// gang ba 'am 'on te stong pa'ang rung // yang na ci 'byor pa yis kyang // dam tshig mnyam par bsgrub pa yis// mchod pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di rnams
255b3(rgyud): bcings nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par 'gyur// dngos grub dbang phyug grub pas kyang // kun gyi bdag nyid mchod par 'gyur// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam
255b4(rgyud): mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// rang byung rnams kyi mchod pa kun// gang dag de yis ma byas shing // spel bar yang ni ma gyur pa'i// brlabs chen dam pa gang yang med// sangs rgyas
255b5(rgyud): thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// 'byor pa'i dbang phyug bde chen dang // dngos grub las dang bde ba dag/ 'di yis mi 'grub gang yang med// mchod pa rab 'byam grub pa rnams// ma lus
255b6(rgyud): lus med grub ces dpal// / bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba da/ mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las// mchod pa thams cad
255b7(rgyud): mnyam par sbyor ba// dpal bskal pa bzang po'i dam tshig gi rtog pa ste// brgyad pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha// kun du sna tshogs
255b8(rgyud): mchog rnams kyi// phyag rgya thams cad rnam sprul pa'o// sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gi dges pas ni// thams
256a1(rgyud): cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// bde ba kun la zhen pa dang // dngos grub thams cad rnam dag phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ zla ba nya ltar rtsa dmar sku// 
256a2(rgyud): 'dod chags kun las chags pa'i phyir// chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das// dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya 'di// dmar po sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// khams gsum dag pa rin chen
256a3(rgyud): gzhan/ sangs rgyas rin/ chen lta bu med// sangs rgyas kun gyi rin chen che// dbu rgyan de ni de bas mchog/ gzhan gyi nor min mi 'phrogs pa// lha'i chu yis dag pa ste// mthu dang ngo bo nyid
256a4(rgyud): dag dang / rang bzhin gyis ni grub pa'o// thod pa'i phreng bas dbu rgyan dang // sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu can// kun nas nyon mongs 'jig rten dbang // mi mjed la sogs de grub pa'o// 
256a5(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// lha mo kun dang 'dus pa yis// kun du sna tshogs bskal bzang po// mkha' 'gro ma ni thams cad 'grub// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad mo bzhin// rdo rje nyi ma khams
256a6(rgyud): gsum pa/ rgyas bta bo rmongs byas bslang nas ni// las rnams kun la sbyor bar byed// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong ldang // lha mo kun mchog dpal dang ldan// 
256a7(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// mchog tu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor ba bskol ba bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// / g.yas
256a8(rgyud): dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis// bde ba'i cha lugs gar byed cing // sems dpa' dkyil mo dkrung bcas nas/ dpung rnams thams cad rab tu 'joms// dpal rdo rje
256b1(rgyud): sems dnga'i dkyil mo bkrung ngo // zla ba'i kha dog 'dzum pa'i zhal// dngos grub thams cad dag pa dang // pad ma'i 'dod chags rnams dag phyir/ brla'i dbus ni dmar la
256b2(rgyud): dka ra/ phyag mchog lo ma sngon po 'dra// de bzhin pa yi dbang phyug dang // bde bar rig pa'i dbang phyug pas// dkar zhing ser ba'i brla dang ldan// lha rdzas sna tshogs kha dog mchog
256b3(rgyud): 'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrug pa'i 'od// pad ma sna tshogs la gnas pa// thams cad dag par rab tu gnas/ sangs rgyas pad mo la sogs mchog/ rin chen sna tshogs rgyan
256b4(rgyud): dang gos/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis/ mi mjed la sogs brgya byin bzhin// bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang // 'phrog pa dag kyang lhag par mdzad// bdagu la mkhyud
256b5(rgyud): pa'i phyag brgya yis/ yan lag thams cad 'phrog par 'grub// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong ldang // dpal ldan 'dod pa kun la dbang // rdo rje sems
256b6(rgyud): dpa' mchog tu 'grub// mchog tu dga' la rab sbyor ba// bskal pa bzang po dpal rdo rje mda' bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// / rnam pa sna tshogs dam
256b7(rgyud): tshig chags/ bde ba 'bar ba'i gar byed pa so// bdag la mkhyud pa'i phyag rgya mchog/ dbus kyi lha mchog chen po'o// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro
256b8(rgyud): 'ong ldang / bde chen dbang phyug dpal dang ldan// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// mchog tu dga' ba rab sbyor ba// skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhe bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// 
257a1(rgyud): @#se ra ga pa yi tshul dag tu// rdo rje kha T+wAM ka bzung ste// bdag la mkhyud pa'i phyag rgya ni// bad bcas rdo rje brgya gram mchog/ phyag rgya 'di yis btab nas ni// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong ldang// rnal 'byor kun gyi dbang
257a2(rgyud): phyag rgyal/ rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// mchog tu dga' ba la sbyor ba// bskal pa bzang po dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kham po grub// bdag la
257a3(rgyud): mkhyud pa'i phyag rgya yis// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// dbus kyi lha mchog chen po'o// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong ldang // dpal ldan tshe dang gzhon grub pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub/ 
257a4(rgyud): mchog tu dga' ba rab tu sbyor ba bskal pa bzang po dpal rdo rje che bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'o// rang
257a5(rgyud): byung phyag rgya sna tshogs rnams// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te// grub pa'i dbang phyug rab bsgrubs pas// thams cad bdag nyid 'bar bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba'i
257a6(rgyud): mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog gi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so// gtsug lag ci ltar rjes 'thun par// dpal rdzogs rgya chen gar dag gis// mad ni 'ong du 'ang sa pa ni// chung zhing 'arab cug// tshangs pa chen po'i mgo dpal rdo rje mda' zhes bya
257a7(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya'o/ rkang pa bteg cing phab pa dang // gshegs te mchongs pa'i stabs dag gis// 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas bstod na ni// khams gsum dag la mchongs par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje mthu bo che zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// bya ba dang ni
257a8(rgyud): / bzlog pa dang // phrogs pa dag ni khyad par du// sna tshogs khyad par gar byed cing // khams gsum dag ni bsdu bar bya// dpal rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// lcug ma gang dang gang bzung nas// bdag la mkhyud pa'i phyag
257b1(rgyud): / rgya yis/ bud med thams cad rtsed nas ni// dpag bsam shing dag rab tu 'grub// dpal rdo rje 'dod pa'i lha mo zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// myang ba rngub pa ltar byas pas// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs pa yi// 
257b2(rgyud): / 'jig rten gsum dag skams par byed// dpal rdo rje rta gdong zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// sna yi myang ba'i rngub pa yis// drag po dbang po nyo dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs pa yi// khams gsum yang ni sdud par byed// dpal rdo rje
257b3(rgyud): phag mo zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// mig tshugs zhen par lta ba yis// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs pa yi// 'jig rten gsum yang za bar byed// dpal rdo rje spyan nyi zla me zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// thams cad
257b4(rgyud): bdag nyid myang ba yi// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs par bcas// thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// dpal rdo rje kun gyi bdag nyid khams gsum slar 'tshe ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// gling bu len pa'i
257b5(rgyud): tshul ston cing / ci ltar babs pa'i gar byed pas// tshangs pa nye dbang drag por bcas// 'gro ba gsum dag dbang du byed// dpal rdo rje gling bu dbang byed ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// pi wang len pa'i tshul ston cing // ci ltar babs pa'i gar
257b6(rgyud): byed pas/ las rnams 'grub par rab 'byam dang // dngos grub ma lus myur du 'grub// dpal rdo rje pi wang bde bas rmongs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// cang te'u tshul ston rnal 'byor pas// ci ltar babs pa'i gar byed pas/ 
257b7(rgyud): rims dang gdon dang dug zhen pa'i// sdug bsngal thams cad myur du sel// dpal rdo rje cang te'u sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdza rnga'i tshul ston rnal 'byor pa// ci ltar babs pa'i gar byed pas// gnas
257b8(rgyud): gsum dag ni ma lus pa// skad cig tsam gyis 'bebs par byed// dpal rdo rje rdza rnga'i myos par byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya'i gar gyi mchod pa yis// mchod pa thams cad byas na ni// rang byung gar gyi mchod pa/ 
258a1(rgyud): rnams/ ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rims dang dug dang dbyig dug byed// 'dra men gdon gyi gnod pa rnams// skor ba'i gar rnams sna tshogs kyis// skad cig tsam gyis zhi bar 'gyur// drag po
258a2(rgyud): dbang po nyo dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa// rgyas btab myos byas zos pa dang // skad cig tsam gyis 'tshe bar byed// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dpyid
258a3(rgyud): kyi mthas klas pa'i// rang byung lha mo'i phyag rgya rnams// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas de// dngos grub dbang phyug rab grub pas// thams cad bdag nyid 'bab par 'gyur// sangs rgyas
258a4(rgyud): / thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis// rab tu 'grub pa'i glu rnams kyis// bla na med pa'i dngos grub 'thob// de nas phyag rgya'i ye shes 'di// dpal ldan rdo rje mchog gi glu// las rnams thams cad rab
258a5(rgyud): sgrub cing / srid pa shin du grub pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen skal bzang dpal khyod bdag legs bsgrubs la rtogs par mdzad du gsol// kye de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bde ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs bde ba'i
258a6(rgyud): mchog/ 'gro ba'i rgyud rnams rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mchog 'grub pa bdag la grub par mdzad du gsol// a l-i la la ho/ de bzhin gshegs pa sbyor ba rnam pa sna tshogs gar rnams bstan du gsol// dza hUM baM ho/ kye bde
258a7(rgyud): / mchog bde bas zung rnam par sprul/ hUM/ snang bar mdzad du gsol// a la la la ho/ de bzhin gshegs kun sna tshogs mkha' 'gro sgyu mas gzung du gsol// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde
258a8(rgyud): ba'i mchog/ kun du kun nas thams cad ni// 'di nyid kyis ni myur du 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro ma'i rnal 'byor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ 
258b1(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// thar pa thams cad rnam dag phyir// sangs rgyas phyag rgya dpal du gnas// don dam rnam par dag pa'i phyir// btso ma'i gser gyi kha dog bzhin// chags med la sogs chags chen phyir// dkar
258b2(rgyud): zhing sna tshogs gsal ba'i mdangs// chos kyi rgyal srid rab sgrub pa// rin chen chos las lhag pa med// de bas theg chen byang chub sems// rgyal ba rdo rje rin chen can// g.yas pa'i mthe bong gung mo gnyis// g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcas pa yi// 
258b3(rgyud): / so sor kun las reg pa ni// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya yin par grags// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab pha rol phyin gsol yin// byang chub sems chen skye ba dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// shes rab
258b4(rgyud): pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'o// rab tu bsgrubs par 'gyur ba yin// byang chub sems can bskyed pa dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste// sangs rgyas nyid du rig par byed// mchog tu rtag pa'i sangs
258b5(rgyud): rgyas so// gang gis ldan pa 'di mthong zhing // rnam pa kun du mchod byed pa// de yis sangs rgyas rtag pa'i mchog/ mthong zhing mchod pa byas par 'gyur// sems ni bskyed ma thag tu yang // chos kyi 'khor lo legs par bskor// dpal
258b6(rgyud): dam tshig gcig ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas pa'i yan lag gnon pa yis// g.yon pa'i yan lag kun las rgyal// sems dpa'i dkyil mo dkrung bcas na// bdud rnams thams cad rab tu 'joms// dpal rdo rje'i dkyil mo
258b7(rgyud): dkrung ngo // rdo rje khu tshur bcas nas su// lag pa g.yon pas bkab nas ni// sangs rgyas kun blo dngos grub rnams// ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub// de bzhin dpal ldan he ru ka'i// rdo rje khu tshur chen po dga'// dpa' bo blod pa'i
258b8(rgyud): dngos grub rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// pad mo'i khu tshur bcas nas ni// de bzhin g.yon pas bkab na yang // byang chub spyod pa rab 'grub rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rin chen 'dzin pa'i khu tshur
259a1(rgyud): @#kyang / lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni// sangs rgyas nor kun dngos grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// sangs rgyas khu tshur bcas nas su// lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe
259a2(rgyud): 'grub pa/ ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub// bud med phyag rgya bcings nas su// lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni// dngos grub thams cad myur 'grub pa// ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub// rta mchog dpal gyi khu tshur kyang / 
259a3(rgyud): lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni// thams cad mgugs pa rab 'grub pa// ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub// dpal grub spyan gyi khu tshur yang // lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni// nang pa thams cad rab 'grub pa// ma lus
259a4(rgyud): lus pa med pa 'grub// dang po sangs rgyas kun blod pa// gnyis pa de bzhin dpa' bo yin// gsum pa kun du bzang me'o// bzhi pa mi bzad snod yin no// sangs rgyas yang dag kun ldan dpal// de bzhin zhal bzangs gzung
259a5(rgyud): ma yin/ srin mo chen mo bdun pa ste// brgyad pa nam mkha' spyan yin no// gzungs thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya shes pa 'di dag gi/ sangs rgyas sprul pa'i glu mchog ni// 'grub par 'gyur ba byed pa'i mchog/ las rnas/ 
259a6(rgyud): thams cad rab bsgrub pa// slong bar byed pa brtan sgrub pa// de bzhin sna tshogs rgyas pa dag/ shi rje'i dbyings kyi glu blangs nas// d+he pa ta yi glu blang ngo // 'jig rten khams mang rdul rnams ni// grangs snyed khyab par 'bros pa
259a7(rgyud): yi/ rgyal ba'i don rnams rab tu phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs snyed pa// sprul pa'i sku rnams rab tu phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs snyed ni// srid pa bde chen de bzhin gshegs kun rnam 'phrul sna tshogs kyis// rdul phran grangs snyed de bzhin
259a8(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul pa mdzod// ho dpal rnam par snang mdzad sbyor ba// a la la la ho/ di ring grub par mdzod// glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// nam mkha' thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i
259b1(rgyud): mchog/ 'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// de nas bud med pa ni rnams dang // rang gi yang dag gsang ba yis// cho ga rgyas pa'i tshul bzhin du// me tog la sogs mchod pa bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// rnal
259b2(rgyud): 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dam tshig la sdang rnam sbyang phyir// dur khrod dpal gyi phyag rgyar gnas// shin du gdug cing gtum pa la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab
259b3(rgyud): thabs kyi rnal 'byor gyi// rnal 'byor bde mchog dam par 'gyur// sangs rgyas khros byung khro bo ni// thal bar 'jig pa mchog yin te// sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba can// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor dmar po snang // 
259b4(rgyud): gzhan gyi ma yin mi 'phrogs pa// lha rdzas chu yis dag pa ste// de bzhin rang bzhin nyid dag dang // mthu dang ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub// gos chen po dang klubs pa che// sha chen po dang sbrang rtsi che// dur khrod kun gyi 'byung po yin// phyag
259b5(rgyud): rgya dpal ldan dbang phyug mchog/ shin du khro gdug gtum po yis// sems can khams rnams rnam sbyang phyir// 'di ni dpal ldan he ru ka'i// rdo rje rgya chen dbang phyug mchog/ thod pa'i phreng ba dbu brgyan can// sangs rgyas gtsug
259b6(rgyud): gi nor bu dag/ rgyal srid thams cad rab 'grub pa// ma lus lus pa med por 'grub// rdo rje kha T+wAM rdo rjer bcas// dril bu dkrol ba'i dgrar bcas pa// dpal ldan he ru ka babs pa'i// phyag rgya sna tshogs rnam sprul pas// sangs rgyas
259b7(rgyud): rdo rje pad mo 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// rgyas btab rmongs byas de zos nas// thal bar gyur na'ang 'tsho bar byed// dpal rdo rje he ru ka rdo rje dbab pa rnam 'phrul pa// pad ma gar gyi dbang zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// se ral kha
259b8(rgyud): yi tshul dag tu/ kha T+wA~M ka la rgyab rten byas// lag pa g.yon pa thod pa thogs// g.yas pa ba dan gsum par byas// nam mkha'i phyag rgya rnal 'byor pa// nam mkha' kun du 'gro bar 'gyur// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ 
260a1(rgyud): #/ dngos po thams cad mkhas las 'byin// phyag rgya 'di yis yongs btab nas// bde bar ljags pa'i tshul ston pas// nam mkha' las ni kun klags te// bdag gi spyad par de spyad do// drag po dbang po
260a2(rgyud): nye dbang bcas/ nyi zla mkha' 'gro mi bzad tshegs// mkha' las sgyu ma kun klags nas// lus pa med par des za'o// nam mkha' thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i mchog ces bya
260a3(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis// bde bar 'bor ba'i gar byed pas// dkyil mo dkrung ni phyed bcas la// rkang par rang gi brlas mnan na// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs
260a4(rgyud): bcas pa/ rgyas btab rmongs byas bslang nas su// gar dag byed cing des ze'o// de nyid kyis ni sbyor ba yis// de nas bde bar brla bsdams pas// legs par bsdams te phyir btags nas// rab tu bkram ste btang
260a5(rgyud): bar bya/ sgyu ma de dag nyid kyis ni// de nas brla phrag bskyod pa yis// skal bzang lnga dang mi rnams kyi// bud med kun la de bskyod do// bde bar reg pa mnyam par sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpa la rdo rje drag po gnas pa zhes
260a6(rgyud): bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du// dpal ldan he ru ka 'bab pa'o// phyag rgya sna tshogs gnas pa'o// zhi dang drag po'i rmongs pa'i mchog/ dga' ba'i gar
260a7(rgyud): byed 'gyur bar bcas// shi ba ldang pa'i sbyor ba yis// bde ba'i phyag rgya rab tu gnas// zhi dang drag de'i rmongs byed dang // gyen du dbugs 'byin gar byed lus// lta ba'i phyag rgya dngos grub mchog/ gsang ba'i sbyor ba bde
260a8(rgyud): mchog gis/ me tog bdug pa sbyor ba'i mchog/ chang dang chu dang lcug ma dang // ras dang me tog 'grub pa yis// khyad par du ni rgyas 'debs so// rtse gcig mnyam par sbyor ba yis// sbyor ba'i gnyer ba bde ba sbyin// 
260b1(rgyud): mngon par gtong zhing se gol gdog// dal bus gyen du dbugs 'byin pas// g.yon du lta zhing lag pas drang // 'o byed mkhyud pa de bzhin te// gar byed rab tu rmongs pa dang // za dang gsang ba'i lus rnams dang // tshangs
260b2(rgyud): chen po'i mgo dang ni// de bzhin 'jig rten gsum las rgal// de bzhin sa las 'dren pa dang // rang gi phyag rgya'i tshul ston dang // dur khrod dag gi gar byed dang // de bzhin rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang // rab tu 'jig pa bsreg
260b3(rgyud): pa'i me/ las kyi phyag rgya rab tu gnas// dang por rgyas 'debs ma yi rgya// snying 'dren ma yi gnyis pa'o// gsum pa shin du rmongs byed ma'o// de bzhin bzhi pa 'dag byed ma'i// lnga pa gar byed ma yi rgya// drug pa gsod
260b4(rgyud): ma'i yin par bshad// bdun pa za ba mo yi rgya// brgyad pa las kyi phyag rgya yin// de nas phyag rgya 'di kun gyi// phyag rgya'i las rnams bla na med// phyag rgya'i bdag nyid kun 'joms pa// khyad par du ni bshad par bya// dpal
260b5(rgyud): ldan rdo rje pad ma slong // gar dag byed cing byas na ni// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang // thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// de nas phyag rgya zhes pa 'di// dpal ldan rdo rje sbyor ba'i glu// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa// khyad
260b6(rgyud): bar du ni bshad par bya// gzigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i rgyas thob la// rnam pa sna tshogs 'o byad mkhyud pas rmongs mdzad de// rnam pa sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog ston kun gsol la// rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog ngo mtsha
260b7(rgyud): bstan du gsol// rgyas btab rmongs byas mnabs su gsol// bde mchog ngo mtshar bde bzhugs// hUM a la la la ho snang bar mdzod// rnal 'byor bde mchog sgyu mas sprul// dam tshig bdag la 'jug du gsol// nyon mongs kun
260b8(rgyud): las rgyal bar mdzod// ma lus pa dag mnabs su gsol// nyon mongs thams cad bsal bar mdzod// glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// rdo rje thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ gdon mi za bar
261a1(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur/ dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// 'dod chags thams cad rnam dag phyir// pad mor
261a2(rgyud): phyag rgya dpal du gnas// mi 'gyur dam pa dag pa'i phyir// shel sgong shin du dag pa 'dra// 'dod chags thams cad bsal ba'i phyir// 'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrigs pa'i 'od// sangs rgyas che yi rin chen sras// gos
261a3(rgyud): dang sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dra ba yis// bde ba can bzhin dam par 'gyur// gar thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// yongs su bsgyur zhing gar byas pa// pad mo'i mtshan mchog pad mor
261a4(rgyud): bcas/ phyag ni rgya rnams 'khor lo bskor// sangs rgyas rdo rje pang mor 'dzin// rdo rje ni ma khams gsum po// pad mo sgyums rnam sbyangs nas// sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa mdzad// 'dul ba'i thabs sna tshogs
261a5(rgyud): skal ba bzang po dpal pad mo gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis// dkyil mo dkrung ni phyed mor gnas// rgyal po'i dkyil mo dkrung bcas na// sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar
261a6(rgyud): byed/ dpal pad mo rgyal po'i gnas zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// snyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad mo dmar po ci bder gzung // rang gi snying khar 'dren pa'i tshul// pad mo mdab ma kha 'byed pa'i// snyems pa'i lag pa
261a7(rgyud): g.yon pa yis/ pad mo sngon po bde bar gzung // rang gi snying khar 'dren tshul gyis// bud med phyag rgya bcing bar bya// snyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad mo dkar po ci bder gzung // 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ 
261a8(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// snyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad mo 'thing ka tsaM bder gzung // g.yas pa rab tu gar byed pa// dpal gyi phyag rgya ba dan gsum// snyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad mo ser rtse
261b1(rgyud): ci bder gzung / g.yas pas rab tu gang byed pas// chu srin tshul du bsgreng bar bya// snyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad mo le ba rgan mchog bzung ste// rang gi snying khar 'dren tshul gyis// rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya// rnam
261b2(rgyud): par gzigs pa'i rnam dag dpal// sgrol mo'i byang chub mchog yin no// rgya chen mo yi 'khor lo bskor// khro gnyer mra yi phyag rgya'i lan// pad mor gnas pa'i dpal chen yin// 'dod pa'i dbang mo 'gro ba gsum// dpal pad mo rgyal
261b3(rgyud): po'i rig pa'i lha mo chen mo rnams so// de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di// pad mo'i rgyal po dpal gyi glu// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa// khyad par du ni bshad par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa kun la sogs pa'i gzungs mchog sna
261b4(rgyud): tshogs 'dzin/ sems can rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mchog dngos grub mchog mnga' ba// sems dpa' pad mo dag mchog sgyu ma'i dga' ba bstan du gsol// a la la la ho kyi gar dbang thar dga'i gar mdzod cig/ sangs rgyas
261b5(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag/ tshangs pa 'jug sal dbang phyug bdag/ nyi zla bdag legs/ a la la la ho/ pad mo sgyu ma dpal/ rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mdzad dag pa'i tshul gyis gar mdzad pa// pad mo dam tshig dbang phyug sangs
261b6(rgyud): rgyas gar rnams mdzad du gsol// 'dod chags rnam par sbyong ba thams cad da dung rnam par sbyongs// pad mo 'dzin pa de yi spyan sngar gar mkhan gar mdzod cig/ glu 'odi dag ni blangs pa yis// sna tshogs pad mo mnyam sbyor ba// 
261b7(rgyud): mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ gdon mi za bar 'grub por 'gyur// dpal pad mo dbang phyug gi phyag rgya shes pa'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// nor mchog rnam par
261b8(rgyud): sbyang ba'i phyir/ dpal ldan nyi ma phyag rgyar gnas// nam mkha'i snying po thams cad phyogs// re ba thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ rin chen thams cad mkha' las phebs// shin du gdug cing
262a1(rgyud): khro ba la zhibs phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi nyi ma ni// dam pa'i don du drag por 'gyur// drag pos 'dul bas 'jig rten rnams// drag pa nyid kyis sgrub par byed// nyi ma'i gzugs dang snod lam/ 
262a2(rgyud): dang / tshul dang gzi brjid chen por ston// rdo rje gzhu dang mda' mchog dag/ shin du legs par 'gengs pa ste// mdangs gsal 'dzum dang bcas pa'i spyan// g.yon pa 'byed cing gyen du 'degs// drag po dbang po
262a3(rgyud): dbang bcas/ nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// 'jig rten gsum po ma lus pur// drag shul nyid kyis 'dul bar mdzad// dpal khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje pus mo gnyis
262a4(rgyud): bcings te/ rdo rje dkyil mo dkrung bcas nas// bdag gi stan la 'dug nas ni// bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya// dpal rdo rje dkyil mo dkrung ngo // dbang bskur ba dang gter dag dang // rgyal mtshan mchog
262a5(rgyud): ldan mchod pa che// ci lta'i tshul dag ston pa dag/ rang gi don rnams thams cad sgrub// de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di// rgyal po'i sgyu ma mchog gi glu// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa// khyad par du ni bshad par
262a6(rgyud): bye/ khams gsum kun gyi rgyal srid sna tshogs mchog gi nor ldan pas// 'jal dum g.yul 'gyed rnam mang khyad par sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba// rnam pa sna tshogs 'jal dum rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan can// 
262a7(rgyud): rdo rje nyi ma rgyal po bde mchog sgyu mas bstan du gsol// sems can sprin la byang chub mchog sbyin sna tshogs char 'bebs pa// bdag gi re ba kun bsgrubs myur du ston// a la la la ho/ mi zad gter gyi dbang bskur khyad
262a8(rgyud): byar bdag la stsal du gsol// khyad par rin chen 'di dag thams cad bud med rin chen rnams kyi phyir// rin chen tshogs kun nang na bud med rin che ni gcig pu mchog/ bud med rin chen dag pa dam pa'i rin du thams/ 
262b1(rgyud): cad 'gro/ glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// rgyal srid thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje nyi ma zhes pa'i phyag rgya'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'ad/ 
262b2(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// drag shul sbyor ba rnal 'byor dpal// rta yi phyag rgya rab tu gnas// thams cad dag par mos pa yis// sdig med stobs kyi ngo thon du// rab tu gnon pa'i rtsal dag gis// 'jig rten thams
262b3(rgyud): cad rab tu 'joms// 'dod chags can la g.yem par ston// gdag pa rnams la gdag par 'gyur// zhi ba rnams la zhi bar 'gyur// drag shal can la drag shul spor// zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa// zhabs bzhi pa la rmig
262b4(rgyud): pa bzhi/ rta mgrin rgyal po chen po ste// dbang phyug dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// g.yon pa 'dzub mo'i khu tshur gyis// dpal ldan pad ma sna tshogs 'dzin// rdo rjer bcas shing slob pa sgrub// g.yas pa ba dan gsum par bya// 
262b5(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// shin du ltung bar gyur pa yang // de ma thag tu kun smad nas// lding ba thams cad rab tu sgrub// thams cad dag pa mnyam par sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje slong ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// 
262b6(rgyud): g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis// brkyang bskum pa yi tshul byas nis// khro bo'i dkyil mo dkrung bcas te// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu gzhig/ dpal rdo rje khro bo rab tu gnas pa'o// de nas phyag rgya shis pa 'di/ 
262b7(rgyud): rta mchog dpal dang ldan pa'i glu// lalus rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa// khyad par da ni bshad par bya// myos byed stong pas lhag par bde ba 'dod pa'i gzugs ston pa// gdul ba'i dbang gis gshin rje stong pas
262b8(rgyud): lhag par rab tu 'jigs// zhi ba'i skur yang tshangs pa stong pas lhag par shin du ston// dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog tu de bzhin gshegs kun 'grub par mdzod// thams cad rnam dag mos pas ngo thon stobs gnon/ 
263a1(rgyud): @/ pas/ hi he he hUM/ dbang phyug thams cad rab shig rab tu shig/ rab kyis rtsal gyis gnon pa yi// stobs kyis ngo thon dbang phyug non// sbyor na du lu d+ya lu/ mig gsum pa lags gsum grub drongs// rab kyi
263a2(rgyud): rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngi thi ni mthu chen non// mnyam sbyor ru ta ma Ta snying las dpal mo drongs shig rab drongs shig/ rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon po'i stobs kyis de thon tshangs pa gnon// sbyor chen tshangs pas grol ma
263a3(rgyud): drongs shig/ sma ra ra Ta/ rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyi ngo thon dga' dbang non// mnyam sbyor kun gyis bdag la bdag drongs a la la la ho// gdug cing khro la rab tu gtum pa'i sems can bsgral ba'i phyir// grub zhugs
263a4(rgyud): a la la la ho/ oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hUM phaT phaT/ mdza' bo'i mi la bya 'am mi bya yongs su rtogs pa de dag med kyang bla// de 'dra'i mdza' bo sgyu ma yin pas de la mdza' bshes su zhig zer// rgol ba gang la bya 'am mi byi yongs su
263a5(rgyud): rtog pa med kyang bla/ de 'dra rgol ba sgyu ma yin pa de la dpal zhes su zhog zer// glu 'di blangs pa tsam gyis ni// rta mchog mnyam par sbyor ba yi// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// thams
263a6(rgyud): cad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// 'dzub mos mthe rong mnan nas ni// rang gi mthe bos 'dzub mo min na// dpal grub spyan gyis phyag rgya ste// 'dzub mo mig gi 'bras bur bya// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas// rdo rje spyan ni
263a7(rgyud): gnyis dag tu// khong stong du ni sbyar bar bya// dpal grub rdo rje spyan yin no// 'dis ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang // de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du// tshe 'di nyid lnga 'grub par 'gyur// dpal
263a8(rgyud): grub spyan ni grub pa ste// sems can thams cad dbang byed pa// las kyi dngos grub rab 'byam rnams// ma lus dngos grub myur du 'grub// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyor nas// 'dzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ mthe bong rtse mo
263b1(rgyud): mnyam par gzhag/ khong stong mi 'gyur dam pa po// spyi bo'i 'tshams su rab gzhag nas// 'di yis bsrung ba byas nas 'di// sangs rgyas dngos grub ma lus pa// lus pa med par rab tu 'grub// sems dpa'i gtsug tor gyi
263b2(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo gyen du dbye// 'dzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ mthe bong gnyis kyi mche ba gtsigs// 'jigs pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin ma// grub pa bdud la sogs pa za// de bzhin du ni rmongs par byed// dbab pa tham/ 
263b3(rgyud): cad rab tu 'grub// de bzhin rnam par shes pa sgrub// gter rnams 'byin par byed pa dang // de bzhin nor bu 'phrog par byed// ngal sa po ni dpal mnan te// dpal mo dag kyang phrogs nas ni// mngag gzhug mar ni byed pa dang // 
263b4(rgyud): gnod sbyin ma dang dga' ba spyod// gnod sbyin dag gi sde dpon du// 'di yis myur du 'grub par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas// gung mo mnyam par rab tu smra ba// mthe bong mthe'u chung
263b5(rgyud): medab mo bzhi/ pad mo dri mido rab tu rgyas// 'dis ni sdig rnams byang bar 'gyur// sdig pa byang na rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas byang chub mngon 'tshang rgya// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// dpal pad+ma mo rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// 
263b6(rgyud): rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar la// 'dzub mo mnyam par phyir bkug ste// mthe drong rdo rje g.yas pa ni// rdo rje dpal gyi nor bu ste// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// nam mkha' thams cad rab 'grub ste// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog
263b7(rgyud): mkha' las dngos rnams thams cad spyod// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas// mthe'u chung srin lag mnyam par brkyang // 'dzub mo rtse bsnyams bkug pa ni// dpal mchog rta zhes grags pa ste// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// sa
263b8(rgyud): rgyas byang chub rab 'grel na// thams cad dga' bar byed pa'i dpal// lha mi skal bzangs smos mi dgos// dam tshig gi phyag rgya shes pa'o// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// mtshan ma'i phyag rgyar ldan byas te// thams
264a1(rgyud): cad 'byung ba'i sbyor ba yis// bdag gi lha ni bdag nyid bya// 'dis ni sangs rgyas thams cad dpal// de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// sarba
264a2(rgyud): rgyas kun bdag dngos grub ni// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog 'dis// mi 'grub 'byor par mi 'gyur/ 
264a3(rgyud): ba'i/ dam pa'i rgya chen gang yang med// dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// dza lta'i gzugs dang dbyibs su ldon// bde bas nyid kyis kun gyi bdag/ kun gyi bdag la zhugs par bya// phyag
264a4(rgyud): rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong ldang // rgyal po sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba/ skal ba bzang po dpal ye shes sems dpa'
264a5(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// chags pa med cing ma chags med// dbu ma'ang dmigs su yid ma yin// bud med kun gyi sbyor ba 'dis// gnyis su med pa'i theg pa'i mchog/ phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro
264a6(rgyud): 'ong lding dpal ldan sgyu ma kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje sems dpar rab tu 'grub// sgyu ma thams cad kyi lha mo'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// yod pa ma yin med pa min// dbu ma'ang dmigs su yod pa min// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba
264a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa'o// thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa// thams cad sgyu ma lta bu ste// ji ltar sgyu ma thams cad du// mthong ba dang ni
264a8(rgyud): reg par 'gyur// dmigs su yod pa'ang ma yin te// de bzhin 'gro ba kun gyi tshul// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ang ldang // bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ mkha' las dngos rnams thams
264b1(rgyud): cad spyod/ dngos po med par bdag sbyor bas// nam mkha' kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ shin du brtag pa 'grub par 'gyur// ji ltar pad mo dmar po 'di// chags pa'i nyes pas mi gos pa
264b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor ldan pa'ang de bzhin du// gnas kyis nyes pas yong mi gos// shin du gdug cing drag po la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi sbyor ba ni// rnam par rgyal phyir rab tu drag/ thams cad dag phyir
264b3(rgyud): mos pa yis/ sdig med stobs kyi ngo thon du// drag shul sbyor bas mnyam sbyor ba// 'jig rten thams cad gzhom par bya// sbyor ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// sbyor ba ji snyed yod kun dang // byed pa rnam pa sna tshogs la/ 
264b4(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi rgya// dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// byed pa'i phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong ldang // chags pa chen po dbang phyug dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// kun
264b5(rgyud): du sna tshogs skal bzang po// dpal dam tshig ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// bya ba dang ni zlog pa dang // khyad par du ni 'phrog pa dang // yan lag kun du byed pa yis// de ni nor rnams kun kyang 'phrog/ 'o byed mkhyud la sogs
264b6(rgyud): pa yi/ khams gsum pa yang rgyas 'debs so// thar par byed cing gsod par byed// shi ba'ang mod la sos par byed// sbyor ba'i longs spyod thams cad kyi// gnas gsum po ni ma lus par// rgyas btab rmongs byas
264b7(rgyud): bslab nas su/ gar byas nas ni za bar byed// sbyor ba kun gyi bdi myong bas// khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang // thal bar 'gyur ba'ang 'tsho bar byed// sbyor ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya
264b8(rgyud): shes pa'o// lha mo kun gyi bde ba'i mchog/ mdzes pa'i zhal ni rnam bsgyur zhing // bde ba myong bar rab sbyor ba// mdzes par lta zhing gar byed pa// sangs rgyas pad mo rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// rgyas
265a1(rgyud): btab rmongs byas zos pa dang // thal byar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// bud med khams gsum sgyu ma che// mdzes pa'i gzhin ni rnam bsgyur ba// rim 'gros chas shing steg pa'i mchog/ mdzes par lta
265a2(rgyud): pa'i gar byas pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad mo 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum po// rgyas btab rmongs byas bslang nas ni// zos nas slar yang 'tsho bar byed// sangs rgyas byang chub mnyam sbyar ba// rab tu dga' bar lta
265a3(rgyud): zhing 'dzum// shin du srid pa yang dag sgrub// gsang bar lha la gnas na ni// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// srid pa shin du kun bsgrubs nas// gnas gsum dag ni sgrub par byed
265a4(rgyud): steg la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan// mdzes pa'i gzhin ni rnam bsgyur zhing // rim gror bcas te steg pa'i mchog/ steg pa'i lta bas gar byed cing // mdzes pa'i tshul dang thabs rnams kyis// drag po dbang po nye dbang
265a5(rgyud): bcas/ nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// 'jig rten gsum dge sgrub par byed// mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa'i kha// khro zhing 'dzum dang bcas pa'i gzhin// khro la 'gyur bar bcas shing 'dzum// gsul bar lta zhing
265a6(rgyud): legs par gnas/ drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa// rgyal po'i sgyu mas rnam rgyal nas// khams gsum dag ni sgrub par byed// 'dod chags myos pas dben spyo ba// mdzes pa'i gzhin ni
265a7(rgyud): rnam par 'gyur/ 'di ni gzhin gyi phyag rgya mchog/ khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed// drag po mche ba rnon po gtsigs// gdug pa za ba 'jigs 'jigs ltar// g.yas kyi gzhin gyi phyag rgya yis// khams gsum
265a8(rgyud): dag kyang za bar byed// dngos grub kun gyi bde ba'i mchog/ rab tu dga' bar lta zhing 'dzum// g.yon pa'i gzhin gyi phyag rgya yis// khams gsum dag ni thar bar byed// spyi bor rta mgrin gsang mthong ba// rta gdong ldang
265b1(rgyud): ser kha dog gsal/ so gtsigs pa ni mchu mnan na// 'jig rten thams cad 'jig par byed// gzhin gyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// lha mo kun gyi bde ba'i mchog/ mdzes pa'i ma mcha so so mnan pa'i// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// 
265b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par byed// 'dod chags bde bas dben spro bas// steg pa'i ma mchu sos mnan pa'o// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed// sbyor ba kun gyi bde ba'i mchog/ mdzes
265b3(rgyud): pa'i ma mchu g.yon par byed// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed// sha chen gyi ni ro myong zhing // ma mchu so yis mnan pa yis// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang za bar
265b4(rgyud): byed/ bde ba kun gyi ro myong zhing // ma mchu rnam par mdzes byas pas// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya 'di yis ni// thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tshe bar byed// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// bde ba myong bar rab sbyar ba// zang zing lta ba rnam 'gyur
265b5(rgyud): bas/ rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa yi// khams gsum dag kyang 'tsho bar byed// bud med mkhas pa sgyu ma'i mchog/ mdzes par lto ba'i gar byas paso// rgyas btab rmongs byas bslang nas ni// khams gsum dag kyang sgrub par
265b6(rgyud): byed/ sangs rgyas gsang ba'i mnyam sbyor ba// lta bar rab ni bde bar gnas// lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di no// bud med thams cad dbang du byed// smoni 'tshams khro gnyer 'gyur bar bcas// lta ba rab 'bar rnam par 'gyur// lta ba'i
265b7(rgyud): phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang 'bar bar byed// khro zhing 'gyur dang bcas par 'dzum// lta bar garal bar mdzes par gnas// lnga pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khros pa thams cad rab tu sgrub// steg la sogs
265b8(rgyud): po'i ro dang ldan// stag bcas lta ba'i gar byed pas// lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang gar byed 'gyur// lta ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// na mo stu saR+Wa bud d+he b+ha zhes pa'i phyag rgya la gnas na/ las dang mchod
266a1(rgyud): / ma lus pa/ lus pa med pa thams cad 'grub// rang 'byung rnams kyi mchod pa kun// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa// lan gcig brjod pas grub pa yi// dam pa'i chos
266a2(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya 'dis// gang dag byas par ma gyur cing // spel bar yang ni ma gyur pa'i// dam pa'i phyag chen de dag med// oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tis+tha si d+ha lo tsa na sar+b+ba sa ar+yA sa d+ha ni sAd// chos kyi phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// sems can
266a3(rgyud): thams cad dbang byed pa// stobs kyis myur du bkug nas ni// bran bzhin du ni byed du 'jug/ su b+ha ga sta ma ha na de bi hi ri mi ri ti ri ni shri ye// chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di// 'dod pa bde ba kun sbyin pa'o// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA
266a4(rgyud): chos kyi phyag rgya la gnas pa// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub nas// bud med gzhan lnga ci zhig smos// traM ba b+ha Ta Ta/ trA tra trA Ta/ re ba thams cad kun rdzogs pa// chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di// ra ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o// 
266a5(rgyud): shri badz+ra pad ma ba Da bi mu khi yo kI shwa ri hi hi hau hi// chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'jig/ chos kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// skad kyi gsang gi mthon dman dang // gre bsgyur bcos shing bzlas pa dang / 
266a6(rgyud): dus su rab zhing mchog rnams kyis// hUM la sogs pa'i glu blang zhing // tshig rnams kun gyis ci 'dod par// ji ltar spro ba'i glu kun gyis// hUM gi glu yi phyag rgya dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab sgrub pa'o// lha mo kun
266a7(rgyud): gyi lha mo mchog/ cha lugs bzhin du gar byas shing // kA ka l+ya sha Da ba la sogs// glu rnams thams cad rjes su blang // oM byis glu yi phyag rgya ni// tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis ci dgar blang // ma lus lus pa
266a8(rgyud): med pa yi// sems can thams cad thar par byed// rdo rje drag po gad mo che// mkhur ba'i dbugs kyi rlung 'byin cing // 'brug gi sgra ltar zab pa yi// ru lu ru lu'i sgra phyung na// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// 
266b1(rgyud): khams gsum dag kyang rgyas 'debs shing // thar par byed cing gsod par byed// shi ba'ang mod la 'tsho bar byed// rdo rje drag tu dgod pa'i phyag rgya'o// he zhes bya ba'i glu'i phyag rgya// thams cad dag par rab sgrub
266b2(rgyud): pa'o/ hi zhes bya ba glu yi rgya// khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar byed// ka ka l+yang dang tso ra'i dbyangs// de bzhin rab tu gdangs snyan dang // ka ha la'i glu'i rgya 'joms pa thams cad sgrub pa'o// glu yi phyag rgya
266b3(rgyud): shes pa'o// gling bu dang ni rgyud gcig dang // de bzhin rgyud ni sdug pa dang // sil snyan phyag rgya bshad pa rnams// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// cha lugs bzhin du gar byed pas// ma brdungs par
266b4(rgyud): yang rab tu 'grub// las rnams kun la mchog tu ni// brdungs nas dpal ni bzhi gyur grub// snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs dang // bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang // rnam par sel la sogs pa'i thabs// dngos
266b5(rgyud): grub thams cad rab thub pa'o// dzaM hUM baM do// ru Ta ma Ta/ sl-i ra ra Ta/ hu lu hu lu/ pri sad d+ha DI ka hUM dzA ka ni/ du ni hUM druM ma Ta ki hUM dzA/ hu lu hu lu/ a la la ta/ shud d+ha sid d+h+ya/ da ri sha ya saR+YA na/ Ta
266b6(rgyud): g+han gro/ Ta g+hen ge/ Ta g+he na tra g+h+r-i na g+hen g+hen/ g+hen g+hen te/ g+hen ha na te/ TakrI d+h+waM dz+dza/ g+hen te/ g+ho do/ Takl-i hU~M gtum/ a la la ho/ ru tu ma Te/ thal mo brdab pa rtag pa'o// Ta g+hen g+hen/ ta b+h+ren he
266b7(rgyud): g+h+nAn/ ta g+hen/ Ta g+hen/ g+h+nAn Ta g+hen rgyun gyi rnga'o// aM aM AM/ hUM ha naM/ d+h+waM d+hA d+haM/ dam tshig gsum gyi rnga'o// d+h+we kro'u ko'u/ ko'u ko'u ko'u/ d+h+we badz+ra badz+ra d+he/ ko'u ko'u ko'u ko'u ko'u/ hUM dz+yA hU b+h+yo hUM
266b8(rgyud): hU~M b+h+yo hU~M b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo/ ke'u ke'u ko'u ko'u ko'u/ d+hi/ ko'u ko'u ko'u ke'u ko'u/ dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i rdo rje rnga'i phyag rgya'o// pad ma pad ma hr-i/ pad ma pad me ste/ pad ma pad ma dz+hi/ pad ma
267a1(rgyud): pad ma ki ta tA kin/ pad ma pad ma kr-i/ pad ma pad ma hA/ dang la pad mo brdab pa'i rnga'o// da~Md+da dzAtra/ pa Tha ba Na kha Tha ba \u0f7f/ ba pi ba/ TeT TaT/ Ta TaT/ tata ta/ trAtra/ dra / 
267a2(rgyud): tran tra te/ rgyal dro'i rnga'o// takli hUM b+h+ra/ taklI hUM d+h+waM/ bsnyems pa'i 'gros so// traHtra pra pra pra pra tra myur zhing rab tu myur ba'o// ta DA ban dA/ ta ta band/ ta pran+d+han/ ta ta banA dra ta ba/ ts+tshin tatra
267a3(rgyud): bi ban ta/ ta bam+men/ dang la rta mchog rnam par rol pa'o// ta Da ba/ ta DA ba/ ta Da ba/ ta Da ba/ trad// shin du m+WAr ba rnga'i phyag rgya ste// sil snyan gyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// rdo rje sems dpor bdag
267a4(rgyud): sbyor bas/ lag gnyis rdo rje bcings pa yi// rdo rje se gol brdabs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya// 'di yi bka' tsam gyis skrag nas// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i// sangs
267a5(rgyud): rgyas kun kyang 'udu 'gyur na// gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig dgos// g.yon pa'i se gol brdabs pa dang // thal mo dal bus brdabs pas 'grub// g.yas pa'i thal mo yin par gsungs// gnyi ga 'ja
267a6(rgyud): kun du bsdud pa yin// thal mo'i sbyor bas rab sbyor bas// lam gyi tshul bzhin 'brang ba dang // thal mo dal bus bsdu ba dang // thal mo drag tu bsdu ba dang // glu dang sil snyan gar byed pas// steg dang
267a7(rgyud): dpal dang snying rje dang // dgod dang khro dang 'jigs pa dang // mi sdug ngo mtshar zhi ba yi// nyams kyi phyag rgya rang don sgrub// steg la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan// sna tshogs phyag rgya'i gar byed pas/ 
267a8(rgyud): thams cad bdag nyid rgyar sbyor bas// dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub// rdo rje sems dpa' steg pa la// dpa' la dpa' bo de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i snying rje ba// dgod pa 'jig rten dbang
267b1(rgyud): phyug mchog/ rdo rje nyi ma khro ba la// rdo rje drag po 'jigs pa la// shAkya thub pa mi sdug la// ngo mtshar la ni a ral li// rab tu ni la sangs rgyas rtag/ sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba'i phyir// dngos po/ 
267b2(rgyud): kun gyi rang bzhin gyis// nye bar gnas shing byin gyis rlob// blta bas mi ngoms pa yi gzugs// thams cad de nyid ston par mdzad// legs so zhes pa grub pa yi// mchog tu gyur pa'ang rab tu
267b3(rgyud): stsol/ thams cad bdag nyid 'grub pa'i mchog/ ra ba thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// sangs rgyas kun du 'gyur ba'i mchog/ rnal 'byor dam pa ster bar 'gyur// phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'di dag gis// rang gi
267b4(rgyud): mchod pa rab tu sbyar// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha// sbyor ba thams cad rnam sprul dang // phyag rgya phyag rgya'i lan rnams dang // sna tshogs phyag rgya rnam sprul pas// yid la bsam pa kun rdzogs phyir/ 
267b5(rgyud): mchod pa rab tu sbyor bar bya// kun du sna tshogs skal bzang po// kun gyi slob dpon bdag nyid bsgyur// kun 'byung la sogs sbyor ba yis// rgol ba dag kyang gar bya ste// de nas rgol bas ci tshogs
267b6(rgyud): par sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung bar bsgyur// de nas slad du rgol ba yang // rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por bsgyur// rgol ba'ang de nas tshul bzhin du// pad ma'o gar byung mchog tu bsgyur// de nas slang
267b7(rgyud): du rgol ba yang // rdo rje nyi ma mchog tu bsgyur// de nas phyir yang rgol ba ni// rta mchog 'byung bar bsgyur bar bya// de nas slad du rgol ba yang // bdag nyid 'byung bas rab tu sgrub// de nas phyag rgya
267b8(rgyud): shrIs pa 'di/ sdom pa thams cad rab ston pa// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi glu// khyad par du ni bshad par bya// lo lar dri med zla ba'i dkyil 'khor stong pas mdzes pa'i gzugs su rnam par snang / 
268a1(rgyud): la lar rab tu 'jigs pa'i nyi ma bye ba phrag dgu'i 'od zer mchog pas 'jigs// la lar mdangs bzang gzi chen bde dang zhi bar ldan pa rgyal ba gzugs su sdang // la lar 'gro ba thams
268a2(rgyud): cad mnyam par gzhog pa'i gzugs ldan gsung mchog ldan par ston// rdo rje sems dpa' grub phyir 'dul mkhas ma lus bde ba'i mchog rnams las// a ral thams cad mnyam sbyor grub par mdzod// 
268a3(rgyud): ru ta ma ta ma/ a la la la ho// rnam pa mang po 'dul bar mdzad pa'i tshul la gar mkhan mchog gi gar mdzad pa// dam tshig gar gyi dbang phyug sangs rgyas gar mkhan gar mdzad// a la la la ho// rnam
268a4(rgyud): mang bde mchog rab tu gar mdzad pa'i// thar pa'i bde ba'ang thob par mdzod// 'di dag glu ni blangs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ 'grub par 'gyur/ 
268a5(rgyud): ba gdon mi za// de ltar rab tu gar byas te// de las gang zhig pha ma gyur pa// tshogs la de yis tshogs kyi zas// yon dang bcas par 'bul bar 'gyur// mchod pa'i cho ga 'di dag gis// sdig pa kun
268a6(rgyud): las thar bar 'gyur// bsod nams thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur// de bzhin rtag par bsrung bar 'gyur// rims dang ngag dang dbyig dug dang // mkha' 'gros brtse dang gdon rnams dang // bdud dang sems
268a7(rgyud): can dmyal ba rnams/ Da'i ni sra rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// dngos grub rnams dang phun sum tshogs// dga' dang de bzhin bdag po dang // sangs rgyas dam pa thams cad dang // phyag rgya'i mchog rnams grub
268a8(rgyud): par 'gyur/ gar gyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// rab tu dga' ba rjes su chags pa dga' ba'i mda' gzhu rab tu phra ba'i rgyas btab pas// rab tu dga' bar sbyor ba'i bde bas myong ba bde ba thams cad bden
268b1(rgyud): la grub par rab tu bde mchog rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i longs spyod dang / rab tu dga' ba'i dbang phyug tshe mchog grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs to// rta mchog ho/ 
268b2(rgyud): rab tu sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog la rol cig ho// bde bas rnam par rol hUM// snang bar mdzod// a la la la ho// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs kyis// slob ma gzung du/ 
268b3(rgyud): gsol/ kye bde ba'i mchog grub par mdzod// e ma'o bde ba bde ba stsol// dam pa rab tu zhugs par mdzod// bdag la rab tu dgyes par gyur// a la la la ho// e ma'o shi shi zhugs
268b4(rgyud): shig zhugs shig/ mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ longs bskor kun du zhugs// 'di dag glur ni blangs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ mkha' 'gro sgyu bde ba'i mchog/ grub
268b5(rgyud): par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// rdo rje sems dpa' sdud pa dang // rdo rje rin chen bla med pa/ rdo rje ches ni gsung ba dang // rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// hUM rdo rje las kyi mda' gzhu la phyag 'tshal lo// 
268b6(rgyud): dpal rdo rje chags pa'i dam tshig la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje kha nA ka rab tu 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal rdo rje dril bu 'khrol ba la phyag 'tshal lo// la lngar rab tu drag cing skye bo drag pa'i bud med
268b7(rgyud): sku ltar rab tu snang // 'gro ba mtho' yas 'dul phyir la lar rab tu rno ba'i 'khor lo phyag na bsnams pa'i sku// la lar rab tu nges shing mi 'gyur sbyin pa tshangs pa'i sku yang ston par mdzad// la lar rab/ 
268b8(rgyud): tu'abar ba'i chags pa phrad mo'i rgyal po dam tshig bdag la grub par mdzod// thams cad dbang bskur dbang phyug dam pa mi bzad gter mchog bdag la grub par mdzad du gsol// kun mchog rgyas
269a1(rgyud): / mtshan nas rgyal bsgred pa rdo rje rin chen shin du che ba bdag la mdzod// la lar mkhas pa'i gzugs kyang 'dzin// ma lar dus mtha ngas sbyar drag/ la lar rgyal ba'i dpung po ba ni/ 
269a2(rgyud): du zhing la lar dus mtha' dus su rta mchog 'dod sbyor 'dod pa sgrub// rdo rje glu'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// me tog dkar dang dmar ba dang // mthing kha ser po kun du bsdus// me tog phyag
269a3(rgyud): rgya mchog 'di ni// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la spro// rgya skye gas mthing kha ljang khu'i mchog/ mtshon sna bzhi yis btsos pa dang // dkar po lnga yi phyag rgya dag/ snga ma bzhin du mnyam par 'grub/ 
269a4(rgyud): khams las byung ba thams cad dang // srog dang rtsa ba de bzhin te// rnam par mdzes shing dri zhim pa// snga ma bzhin du mnyam par sgrub// tsan dan gnyis dang bla rtsi dang // ga pur na ge sha la ki/ 
269a5(rgyud): bdug pa bu ram dang sbyar ba// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// gan dar dri dang gu gul dang // sa rdzag pur bla rtsi dang // rdzas 'di dag las btsos pa'i mar// me mar byas na snang ba skyes/ 
269a6(rgyud): can dan gur gum sgro ka dang // ga pur dang ni bla rtsi dag/ becos pa'i bdug pa 'grub pa ste// spos kyi phyag rgya spos mchog 'gyur// ka ko la dang sug sbrel dang // gla sgang ga pur bla rtsi dang // 
269a7(rgyud): 'di rnams zhi bi mor btags pa ni// seng ldeng bu ram dag dang sbyar// shing rtsa pa tra lo dwa dang // na le sham dang ga pur sbyar// ha sa ka ra'i shing mar gyis// sbrus pa kha yi spos yin no// 
269a8(rgyud): dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya sbyor ba'o// me tog dmar pos sangs rgyas la// rdo rje can la sna tshogs pa// 'jig rten dbang la me tog dkar// ser po mkha' las byung ba la// tsan dan
269b1(rgyud): bdug pas sangs rgyas la// rdo rje can la du rus ka/ spyan ras gzigs la ka pi ta// ce pog rdo rje nyi ma la// mar me phreng bas sangs rgyas la// rdo rje can la mar me bdun// spyan ras gzigs la
269b2(rgyud): brgyad/ stong ni rdo rje nyi ma la// sangs rgyas rnams la tsan dan spos// rdo rje can la gur gum yin// spyan ras gzigs la tsan dan dmar// ga pur rdo rje nyi ma la// me tog kun dang bdug pa kun// de bzhin
269b3(rgyud): mar me thams cad dang // spros rnams thams cad rdo rje rta la dbul du rung // mchod pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// sgeg mo dang ni na chung dang // myos dang de bzhin bdud rtsi dang // gcig pu dpa'
269b4(rgyud): dang 'dod chags sra// g.yon can bran mo de bzhin te// lan tshwa la sogs ro kun dang // kha ra la sogs bdud rtsi bzhin// bdag nyid kun gyi ro sgrub pa// ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub// sha dang chang
269b5(rgyud): dang ldan pa yi// bzang ba sna tshogs grub pa ni// dga' ba'i longs spyod skal mchog ste// tshe yi dam pa rab tu 'grub// a mA'i sman dang dgun 'grum dang // bA na sa dang na le ke ra// u ru ka lnga sogs pa yi// 
269b6(rgyud): 'bras bu'i phyag rgya mchog 'di rnams// dngos grub 'bras bu thams cad 'thob// kha ra sbrang rtsi byug pa yis// a mra la sogs tshig gus byug/ sa ha ka ra'i mar la sogs// mnyam pa'i dri yis bsku bar
269b7(rgyud): byayung dang rgya skyegs la sogs pa'i// mtshon gyis 'thun par kha bsgyur nas// shun pa dro ba la sogs byas// mchod pa'i tshe ni dbul bar bya// 'bras bu'i bcos pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// 
269b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams la bshos 'bul ba// sha dang chang ni rnam par spang // glu dang sil snyan grub pa dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan po dan dang // shaM dang chang dang ljon pa ni// gtor
270a1(rgyud): ma'i mchog te sna tshogs pa'o// bdag gi phyugs chen skal bzang po// rdo rje'i las ni dpal grub pa'o// bshos dang gtor ma dkar po dang // pad mo'i me tog ldan pa ni// 
270a2(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang gtso bo la// phul nas dgos pa thams cad 'grub// rgyal po'i kha zas sna tshogs pa// sha dang chang dang ldan pa dang // glu dang sil snyan skal bzangs dag/ rdo rje
270a3(rgyud): nyin+do'i 'khor la dbul// kha zas kun gyi ro rnams dang // sha dang sha yi mchog rnams dang // sha yi sbyor dang sha gro dang // bshos dag rdo rje rta la dbul// mchod pa dang gtor ma'i phyag rgya'o// 
270a4(rgyud): mthe bong sems dpa'i dkyil mo dkrung // 'dzug mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ gung mo gnyis ni mnyam par sbyor// lhag ma rdo rje thal mor bya// sangs rgyas rin chen phyag rgya 'di// rang byung
270a5(rgyud): rnams kyis dbang bskur bya// rgyali srid thams cad ma lus pa// lus pa med pa myur du 'grub// spyi bo dang ni dpral ba dang // rna ba gnyis dang lhag par ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi rin chen mchog/ 
270a6(rgyud): dbu rgyan kun du brgyan par bya// dbu rgyan bcing bas bcings nas ni// 'bying zhing mtha' nas dgrol bar bya// dar gyi mtha' ma sbyangs pa ltar// byas nas thal mos brtan par bya// sangs rgyas
270a7(rgyud): pad mo rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// de yi dgra med sdig med par// bdag gi longs spyod nyid du spyod// 'di yis bsrung bar byas nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpa' dang 'dra// sangs rgyas
270a8(rgyud): kun gyi dngos grub che// 'khor los bsgyur bar rab tu 'grug/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// nor bu rin po che dbu rgyan mnyam par sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// 
270b1(rgyud): sor mo thams cad nang du bsnol// sor mo rtse mo kun sprad nas// mthe bong rdo rjes munan pa ni// sna dang mig phubs lta bu ste// pad mo rin chen phyag rgya 'di// bdag nyid chen por dbang bskur ba// rgyal srid
270b2(rgyud): thams cad ma lus pa// lus pa med par myur du 'grub// spyi bo dang ni dpral ba dang // rna ba gnyis dang lhag par sbyar// thod pa'i phreng ba dbu brgyan te// sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu 'bar// dbu rgyan bcing
270b3(rgyud): pas bcings nas ni// 'gying bas mtha' nas dgrol bar bya// dar gyi mtha' ma sbyang ba ltar// byas nas thal mo brtan par bya// 'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal dang 'dra// khams
270b4(rgyud): gsum dag ni rgyal srid che// 'khor los bsgyur ba rab tu 'grub// dpal rdo rje he ru ka pad mo'i nor bu rin po che'i dbu rgyan mnyam par sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal phreng ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo
270b5(rgyud): mnyam sbyar te// lag gnyis nor bu rin chen du// ji ltar rigs pas mnyam byas nas// 'dzub mo mthe bong rtse mo bzhi// yongs su bsgyur te bteg nas su// dpral bar legs par bzhag nas ni// khams
270b6(rgyud): gsum bdag po rgyal ba dag/ ma lus lus pa med par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa shin du brkyang pa yi// 'dzub mo shin du mdun par bcing // gung mo mthe bong rtse mo can/ 
270b7(rgyud): rdo rje phyag rgya yongs su bsgyur// yongs su bsgyur te btig nas kyang // khro gnyer du ni legs bzhag nas// rgyal srid thams cad rab 'grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// 'di yis bsrung ba byas/ 
270b8(rgyud): na ni/ rdo rje las ni dpali dang 'dra// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab 'grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// ma mo dang ni byad ma dang // mkha' 'gro ma yang lhag par 'grub// dur khrod dngos grub thams
271a1(rgyud): cad dang las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i phyag rgya'o// mthe bong dpa' bo dkyil mo dkrung // 'dzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ gung mo gnyis ni mnyam
271a2(rgyud): par sbyar/ lhag ma rdo rje thal mo'o// rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya 'di// rang byung rnams kyi dbang bskur ba'o// 'jig rten dbang po dam pa kun// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// 'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni// 
271a3(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad dpal dang 'dra// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe 'grub pa'o// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar
271a4(rgyud): ba/ 'dzub mo bsnyams te phyi rol dgug/ mthe bong gnyis ni rab tu brkyang // rdo rje nor bu zhes kyang bya// dpral bar myu gu bzhag pa ni/ bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs shing // rgyal srid
271a5(rgyud): thams cad rab grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// dpal nor bu rin po che dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o// sangs rgyas rin chen pad mo dang // de bzhin rdo rje rin chen dang // yid bzhin nor
271a6(rgyud): bu rin chen mchog/ rtang mchog rab tu 'grub par 'gyur// phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya'o// sor mo phan tshun bsnol ba ni// rdo rje thal mo yin par bshad// sor mo thams cad
271a7(rgyud): bsdams pa ni// rdo rje bsdams pa yin par bshad// rdo rje bsdams pa byas nA ni// 'dzub mo mthe bong mngal dag tu// g.yas pa'i mthe bo'i mtshan ma yi// rtse mo bcug la bsdam par bya/ 
271a8(rgyud): dga' chen dpal gyi rdo rje sde// phyag rgya thams cad rang byung ba// rab 'byam las rnams dngos grub ni// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// dga' ba'i rdo rje bcings nas ni// gung mo bcings pa'i
271b1(rgyud): nang du gzhug/ mthe bong mthe chung rtse mo can// rdo rje phyag rgya yongs su bsgyur// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang // de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang // tshe 'di nyid la
271b2(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur// dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje'i phyag rgya las/ de nas gung mo lcags kyu ni// bdag gi snying khar sbyar bar bya// 'di ni thams cad dgug pa'i rgya// de ma thag tu phyag rgya 'dis/ 
271b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas pad mo dag pa 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum lnga// bkug ste dbang du byas nas ni// las rnams kun la sbyor bar byed// dpal bde ba chen po lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// 
271b4(rgyud): bsdam pa byas nas ni// gung mo bcings pa'i nang du gzhug/ mthe'u chung mthe bong rtse mo can// rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs bsgyur nas// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang // sbyor ba 'di yis mi dka'
271b5(rgyud): na/ dngos grub gzhan dang las kyi mchog/ rab 'byam gzhan lta ci zhig smros// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings pa las// sbyor ldan thal mo
271b6(rgyud): khong stong sbyor// khams gsum dag ni ma lus paro// de ma thag tu 'bebs par byed// dpal rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya'o// de yi phyag rgya bcings pa las// gung mo de bzhin bkug nas ni// rdo rje
271b7(rgyud): rdo rje zhes brjod de// gung mo nam mkha'i rdo rje mchog/ phyag rgya 'di yis btab nas nr-i// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // dpal ldan 'dod pa kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// 
271b8(rgyud): dpal rdo rje snying pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdam pa la gnas te// mthe bong rtse mo de bzhin bsnyam// 'dzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa/ 
272a1(rgyud): dag pa kun la rab tu gnas// byang chub sems dpa'i mtha' yas mchog/ dngos grub thams cad rab tu 'grub// dpal rdo rje rab tu gnas pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje'i
272a2(rgyud): pad mo byas pa las// gung mo bcings pa'i dbus no gnas// mthe'u chung bsnyams pa'i rtse mde'u// rdo rje'i mda' ni yongs su 'phang // phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// tshangs pa nye dbang
272a3(rgyud): dga' byed bcas// mthu yos myur du rgyas byas te// khams gsum dag ni sgrub par byed// dpal rdo rje mda'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs bcings nas// gung mo bcings pa'i phyi rol
272a4(rgyud): bzhag/ rdo rje sna tshogs dpal gyi rgyu// ldang ba thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// rdo rje phyag rgya thams cad shes pa'o// a li ka li mnyamo sbyar nas// kha yi thad kar bsdud par bya// de yi 'og tu ri
272a5(rgyud): mo rnams/ yi ge thams cad dgod par bya// gug skyed dag ni lcug mar bya// yi ge rA nau myu gur bya// glang gor zla ba kam pa 'am// tshig gnyis zla ba gnyis su bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams
272a6(rgyud): cad kyi/ phyag rgya mi 'gyur dam pa ste// sangs rgyas dpal gyi ri mor bshad// yi ge dag kyang mi 'gyur mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha'o// bstod dang bcas pa'i mtshan bris na/ 
272a7(rgyud): sdig pa kun las thar bar 'gyur// bsod nams thams cad rab tu 'grub// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor zhes// / rab tu chags pa'i mtshan bris nas// sdug bsngal kun las thar bar
272a8(rgyud): 'gyur// bde ba thams cad rab tu 'grub// chags chen grol ba dpal zhes bya'i// chags pa'i mtshan dag bris nas ni// sdig pa kun las thar bar 'gyur// 'gro ba kun las rab tu gnas// 
272b1(rgyud): snying rje dri med khri dpal zhes// bstod dang bcas pa'i mtshan bris na// sdig pa kun las thar bar 'gyur// dngos grub kun gyi mchog kyang 'gyur// pad mo chags pa'i dpal dag ces// 
272b2(rgyud): chags pa'i mtshan dag bris nas ni// sdig pa kun las thar bar 'gyur// dag pa thams cad rnam par dag/ rdo rje nyi me dpal mdangs zhes// bstod dang bcas pa'i mtshan bris na// sdig
272b3(rgyud): pa kun las thar bar 'gyur// longs spyod kun las rab tu gnas// rta mchog pha rol gnon pa zhes// chags pa'i mtshan dag bris nas ni// sdig pa kun las thar bar 'gyur/ 
272b4(rgyud): dbang phyug thams cad rab tu 'grub// bris nas bsod nams che ba ltar// brjod pa dag kyang de bzhin te// las kyi dngos grub rab 'byam dag/ ma lus par ni myur du 'grub// lhag
272b5(rgyud): pa'i lha ni gang gang gi/ slob dpon gang dang gang yin pas// de dang de yi mtshan dag ni// dpal gyi tshig dang ldan par brjod// slob ma dkyil 'khor btsud nas kyang // yon gyi mchog
272b6(rgyud): dge blangs nas ni// rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur bas// de bzhin gshegs pas de lung bstan// phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'di dag gis// byang chub snying po'i bar du ni// rdo rje'i ming du rab tu
272b7(rgyud): gnas/ de nas sangs rgyas su yang 'gyur// spyod ra dang bcas pa'i ming gi phyag rgya shes pa'o// spyi bor nyug pa gang yin pa'i// phyag 'tshal bar ni bstan pa yin// dpral bar reg
272b8(rgyud): par bya ba ni/ phyag lan yin par shes par bya// smin ma bskul ba gang yin po// sangs rgyas thams cad gnas pa'i brda// g.yos pa nam mkha' 'gro ba 'grub// g.yin pas rnam
273a1(rgyud): par rgyal ba'i mchog/ rang byung rnams kyi brda yi rgyu// mig gnyis g.yo ba grub pa ste// bud med/ g.yon pa bud med bzang mo yin// g.yas pa skyes pa bzang po yi/ 
273a2(rgyud): rna ba dag la reg pa'i brda// g.yas g.yon gnyis ka de bzhin te// g.yon pa legs par blangs pa'i glu// g.yas par legs par smras pa'o// sna yi bu ga gnyis kyi brda// sangs rgyas thams cad
273a3(rgyud): gnas pa ste/ g.yas pa bdag la bdug par bslang // g.yon pa bdag la dri bslang ba'o// lce ni lhag par byed pa dag/ brda yi phyag rgyar gnas pa ste// g.yas par sha yi phyag rgya ste// g.yon pa'i
273a4(rgyud): chang gi phyag rgya'o// mche ba g.yas dang g.yon pa yi// bar du ma mchu mnan pa ni// g.yon pa bud med reg na bde// g.yas pa de bzhin skyes pa'o// lkog mar reg pa'ang de bzhin du// brda yi phyag rgyar
273a5(rgyud): gnas pa ste/ theg pa chen po bla med pa'i// rtog pa thams cad smra ba'i mchog/ snying khar gyen du 'dren pa ni// rang byung phyag rgya'i brda grub pa// rdo rje thams cad 'dren pa brda// 'khor ba shin du sdud pa'o// 
273a6(rgyud): lte ba'i dkyil du reg pa ni// brda yi phyag rgyar gnas pa ste// dbu ma'i nan tan sgrub pa yis// chos kyi 'khor lo chen po'i dkyil// rang gi dbang po bsgreng ba ni// rang byung rnams kyi brda yi rgya// de bas bde
273a7(rgyud): zhing bde ba yis// sangs rgyas thams cad 'thob par 'gyur// phrag pa gnyis ni kun bstod pa// brda yi phyag rgyar gnas pa ste// g.yas pa bkug pa'i phyag rgya yis// g.yon pa slad du gtong ba'o// da
273a8(rgyud): pa g.yas g.yon gnyis ka yis// bdag la mkhyud pa'i phyag rgya ni// g.yas pa thams cad grub pa yin// g.yon pa dbang phyug thams cad 'grub// khu tshur g.yas g.yon gnyis ka yis// khu tshur
273b1(rgyud): bcangs nas 'grol ba dag/ g.yas pa rgyas 'debs phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa mi rnams thong shig pa'o// brla gnyis rab tu bsdams pa ni// g.yas dang g.yon pa de bzhin te// g.yon pa 'dod la rab tu brtson/ 
273b2(rgyud): g.yas pa chos la brtson pa'o// pus mo lha nga'i brda dag kyang // g.yas dang g.yon pa'i de bzhin te// g.yon pa 'dud pa'i phyag rgya ste// g.yas pa rab tu phyag 'tshal ba'o// pus mo g.yas g.yon gnyis dag
273b3(rgyud): ni/ brda yi phyag rgya rab tu gnas// g.yas pa'i chang ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa thams cad rnam par grol// rkang pa gnyis kyis sa mnan pa// g.yon pa thams cad gnon par byed// g.yas pa thams cad
273b4(rgyud): rab tu 'joms// dngos grub las dang bde ba dag/ 'di yis mi 'grub gang yang med// rang don las rnams rab grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// brda yi phyag rgya shes pa'o// oM a d+hi bu zhes
273b5(rgyud): bya ba'i brda/ 'di ni phyag 'tshal zhes ston pa'o// pra ti oM a d+hi pu zhes pa// phyag lan yin par shes par bya// snyoms pa sngon dang mtha' med pa// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ sangs rgyas brda yi
273b6(rgyud): phyag rgya yin/ e ma'o bde ba yin par bshad// e ma'o bde ba dpal gyi mtshan// rdo rje sems dpa' gang brjod pa// sdig pa kun las thar par 'gyur// bde ba thams cad rab tu 'grub// bde ba mchog e
273b7(rgyud): mo'o bde ba dang // sgron ma de bzhin shi shi dag/ rgyas 'debs ma dang rmongs byed dang // zab mo dag dang tshe 'phel ma// sangs rgyas byang chub chos 'khor lo// de bzhin khams gsum rnam par rgyal// 'dod
273b8(rgyud): pa'i lcug ma thams cad kyang // sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya'o// rta dang rdo rje zhal dag dang // de bzhin rdo rje snang ba dang // thal bar rlag pa'i ro langs ma// sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yin no// gling bu dang ni
274a1(rgyud): rgyud rnams dang / de bzhin du ni rgyud gcig dang // stug po dang ni rdza rnga dag/ sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya'o// me tog mchog dang bdug pa'i mchod// de bzhin mar me'i mchod pa
274a2(rgyud): dang / spos dang mchod pa gla rtsi dag/ longs spyod phyag rgya'i brda yin no// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' yas pa// lha mo kun
274a3(rgyud): phyir ji yin no// smin ma bskyod pa mda' ba ni yon// bA ga ling ga e ma'o bde// thod pa pad mo yin par bshad// kha T+wAM ka yang rgyal mtshan che// sangs rgyas phyag rgya pad mor gnas// bde ba kun gyi/ 
274a4(rgyud): ra sa yan/ sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgyar shis// shi shi sangs rgyas kun du bshad// dkyil 'khor la ni 'khor lor bshad// de nyid dam tshig yin par bshad// lha rnams thams cad tshogs pas
274a5(rgyud): na/ skye bo dam pa kun tshogs pa// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// mdza' ba thams cad 'dus pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi brda dag gis// de bzhin mdza' ba 'dus par gsungs// rdo rje sems
274a6(rgyud): dpa' dpal sbyor ba// dkyil 'khor thams cad yin par bshad// lha mo thams cad kun 'dus pas// thams cad sna tshogs skal ba bzang // rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// sangs rgyas
274a7(rgyud): kun du bdag sbyor bas// rnam pa kun mkhyen shes pa'i phyir// kun gyi slob dpon yin par bshad// kun gyi slob dpon rab gnas pa// lha mo thams cad 'dus pas na// sangs rgyas kun gyi brda
274a8(rgyud): dag gis/ kun du sna tshogs skal bzang po// de yi slob ma grub pa 'di// grub pa yis ni rjes grub pa// sangs rgyas brda ni gsang ba yis// rgyal mtsha ba yin par rnam par bshad// de las gzhan
274b1(rgyud): pa'i slob ma kun// mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma rnams// sangs rgyas kun gyi brda dag gis// byang chub sems dpa' yin par bshad// sangs rgyas thams cad rin chen mchog/ dbu rgyan mi 'gyur dam pa
274b2(rgyud): yin/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal srid mchog/ yin par rang byung rnams kyi gsung // thod pa phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang // sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag/ sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis// dpal gyi pad mo'i
274b3(rgyud): tshul du bshad// sangs rgyas rang bzhin grub cig dang // de bzhin pad mo'i rang bzhin gcig/ thams cad la ni dbang bskur che// yin par don kun grub pas gsungs// yon gyi dam pa grub pa ni// nor gyi dbyig
274b4(rgyud): du bshad pa ste// snying yang nor gyi dbrog yin pas// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya bshad// ga pur tsan dan dmar po dang // sbyar ba khrag chen yin par bshad// tshogs kyi dbus su bzhag pa dpal// 
274b5(rgyud): thams cad sdang ba'i ra sa yan// bag zan las ni byas pa'i phyugs// tsan dan dmar pos bskus pa dang // bag phye'i zan las byas pa'i sha/ rgyal po'i zan ces gang bshad pa'o// de nas grub pa'i man/ 
274b6(rgyud): bsgag pa/ dam tshig ces par bshad pa'o// bde mchog bde mchog ces gsungs pa// sangs rgyas bde mchog thams cad kyis// phyag rgya bde ba'i mchog tu gsungs// de bzhin e ma'o bde ba dang / 
274b7(rgyud): snang zhes bya ba rab tu gnas// shi shi zhes pa'ang srid pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis kyang // 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis// phyag rgya dam tshig yin par bshad// 
274b8(rgyud): phyag rgya'ang sbyor ba yin par bshad// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// sbyor ba thams cad yin par bshad// nga ni sna tshogs dam tshig ste// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis// 
275a1(rgyud): sbyor ba thams cad yin par bshad// de yi pa'i longs spyod ni// khams gsum thams cad ma lus pa'o// de yi gzugs dang sgra dang dri// ro dang reg pa bde mos pa'o// gzugs
275a2(rgyud): ni ri mo yin par bshad// sgra ni glu yin zhes bshad pa'o// dri ni rab tu tshim par bshad// ro ni ru sa ya na yin// reg pa bde ba yin par bshad// rab tu reg pa dga' ba'i bde// sangs rgyas brda yi
275a3(rgyud): phyag rgya yis/ chos ni sbyor ba yin par bshad// sbyor ba'i longs spyod thams cad kyis// ji ltar bde ba bsten byed cing // bdag gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor ba// rang gi mchod pa'i dam tshig yin// rjes su sbyor ba'i
275a4(rgyud): mchod na ni/ sbyor ba kun gyi bde ba mchog/ sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis// bde ba chen po yin par bshad// ye shes pa ma la snyoms 'jog pa// rnal 'byor zhes ni bshad pa yin// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag
275a5(rgyud): rgya yis/ ting 'dzin rab tu sbyor ba'ang bshad// lha mo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa'o// 
275a6(rgyud): dga' ba'i spyod pa grub par bshad// rjes su sbyor ba rjes su sgrub// skyes pa ltar byed dga' spyod pa// slar yang rjes su sgrub par bshad// lha mo kun la bde lhags pa// sbyor ba kun la mos pa ni// kun
275a7(rgyud): du sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ ra sa ya na bde bar bshad// thams cad ldang ba kun 'gro ba// dngos grub chen po ldang ba tshor// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgyar bshad// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog
275a8(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po bla na med// dbang phyug kun gyi dam pa mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis brda yis bshad// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po bde mchog ni// sangs rgyas
275b1(rgyud): thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// sbyor ba'i dbang phyug bde chen no// khrag ni me tog yin par bshad// mdangs ni bdug pa yin par brtags// sha chen dag ni mar me ste// thal ba dag na spyos su bshad// chang
275b2(rgyud): ni sgeg mo yin par bo shad// rab tu myos pas sbrang rtsi'o// bu ram chang ni myos byed gsungs// rgun chang dang ni bdud rtsi yin// bdud rtsi lam gyi yon lag brgyad// sangs rgyas kun gyi lnga yin no// rgun dang sbrang
275b3(rgyud): rtsi gcig tu dpa'// tshwa ni 'dod chags sra ba yin// skyur mo khu ba g.yon can yin// ska ba la ni bran mor bshad// chur ba zla ba nya ba yin// sha ni sman gyi mchog yin no// chang ni ra sa ya nar bshad// zas ni chi zhes bya
275b4(rgyud): bar bshad/ bza' ba sna tshogs grub pa yin// sha dang chang du ldan pa dag/ dga' ba'i longs spyod skal bzang po// tshe yi dam pa yin par bshad// a mra rgun 'brum pa na sa// na la ke ri a ru ka/ 'bras bu tshon
275b5(rgyud): po'i khyad par dag/ bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu yin par bshad// oM mra smin pa grol bar bshad// de bzhin bde ba nyal ba dang // bde bas rab tu rmongs pa dag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yin no// 'bras bu chen po
275b6(rgyud): pa na sa/ rgun 'brum gyi ni khu ba'i mtsho// na li ke ri dngos grub che// dam chos 'bras bu a ru ka/ glu ni tshig tu brjod par bshad// dar dir dag ni sil snyan yin// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis// gar ni
275b7(rgyud): rnam par rol par bshad// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba'i// glu dang sil snyan gar byed pa// brda yi dam pas bshad pa yi// sangs rgyas kun gyis rnam sprul pa'o// rab tu zhi ba'i sil snyan glu/ 
275b8(rgyud): ga ra ni shin du rnam sprul pa'o// dur khrod dang ni sil snyan dang // gar ni shin du rnam sprul pa'o// chags bcas glu dang sil snyan dang // gar ni shin du rnam sprul pa'o// mi yi dbang po sil snyan
276a1(rgyud): glu ga ra ni shin du rnam sprul pa'o// rab tu dpa' ba'i sil snyan glu// rang gi rtsal gyis gar byas pa// rta mchog rnam par sprul pa ni// brda yi dam pas rab tu bshad/ 
276a2(rgyud): d+hi zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro yi// khams gsum 'dir ni rnam par brtags// nam mkhar 'gro ba'i phyag rgya dag/ mkha' 'gro zhes ni rab tu grags// kun du sna tshogs phyag rgya ni// thams
276a3(rgyud): cad nam mkha' 'gro ba ste// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'go ma zhes rab tu grags// sgyu ma'i gar dbang grags pa ni// a ral li zhes ming brtags pa// mkha' 'gro ma yang
276a4(rgyud): a ral li/ sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor zhing // sgyu ma kun gyi gar byas pa// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro ma yi dam tshig mchog
276a5(rgyud): bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dpal// rdo rje a ral l-i zhes bshad pa'o// sangs rgyas thams mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ sems dpa' sngon dang mtha' med pa// rdo rje
276a6(rgyud): sems dpa' dga' ba'i mchog/ sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis// de ni skal ba bzang por bshad// gang zhig rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan// skal ba bzang po zhes brjod na// shin du srid pa
276a7(rgyud): kun 'grub cing // de ni dbang phyug chen po 'grub// Ta ki 'dod pa yin par bshad// dga' ba ki li ki la yin// byams pa chu srin yin par bshad// 'dod pa'i dbang po dbang phyug mchog/ 
276a8(rgyud): rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dag/ dam tshig gsum gyi dam pa yin// oM dang b+hu khang kun bshad pa// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis// drangs te bcug nas bcing ba dang // zhugs nas dbang du gyur pa// 
276b1(rgyud): gnyer mo pad mor gnas shes bya ba dang // rdo rje pad mo dbang phyug ma// pad mo lha mo rin chen te// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgyar bshad// nam mkha'i snying po thams cad phyogs// re ba thams cad rdzogs
276b2(rgyud): mdzad pa/ skal ba bzang zhes rnam par grags// rdo rje nyi ma nor bu che// traM pA ba/ Ta Ta/ tra tra tA tra Ta/ kun grags pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yin te// dbang bskur ba dang gter dag dang // rgyal mtshan rtse
276b3(rgyud): mo mchod chen no// sna tshogs pad mo mchod chen no// sna tshogs pad mo thams cad spyan// de bzhin 'jig rten thams cad pa// byang chub kun gyi sems chen po// sna tshogs rdo rje bla na med// thams cad dag par
276b4(rgyud): mos pa yis// 'jig rten thams cad rab 'jig pa// rta mchog dam pa dpal dang ldan// skal bzang rdo rje brda yis bstan// brda yi phyag rgya 'di rnams kyi// dkyil 'khor sbyor ba nges par ni// grogs po
276b5(rgyud): mkhas par bcas pa yis// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// brda yi phyag rgya shes pa'o// rjes su chags par bya'o zhes// cha lugs shes pa bzhin byed cing // dngos grub kun la rjes chags pas// 
276b6(rgyud): mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// kun du kun nas thams cad ni// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun// las kyi dngos grub rab 'byam dag/ ma lus par ni myur du 'grub// rjes su chud par bya'o zhes// cha lug/ 
276b7(rgyud): shes pa bzhin byed pas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje mchog/ cho 'phrul dag ni ston par byed// rjes su sbyar bar bya'o zhes// cha lugs shes pa bzhin byed pas// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ ma lus
276b8(rgyud): lus pa med par 'grub// rjes su sbyor bar bya'o zhes// cha lugs shes pa bzhin byed pas// rli'i byid thams cad dngos grub rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'gyur// rjes su yi ni rang bya zhes// 
278a1(rgyud): cha lugs shes pa bzhin byed pas// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ mchod pa'i las kun myur du 'grub// rjes su gnom par bya'o zhes// cha lugs shes pa bzhin byas
278a2(rgyud): pas rtul phod las rnams thams cad ni// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// ye shes kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// gzugs dang dbyings ni ci 'drar ldan// thams cad
278a3(rgyud): bdag nyid rgyal sbyor bas// mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// kun du kun nas thams cad ni// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun// pra se na yi dngos grub mchog/ ma lus lus pa med par
278a4(rgyud): 'grub/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis// yang dag bden pa'i tshul bzhin du// mthong ba dang ni thos par byed// sa chu me rlung nam mkha' dang // khams
278a5(rgyud): rnams kun ni thams cad las// thams cad mthong zhing thos par byed// rnam par shes pa kun sgrubatsang // kun du thams cad kun gyi bdag/ 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad dang // rnam par shes
278a6(rgyud): pa'i las kun las// thams cad mthong zhing shes par byed// pad mo chags ltar rjes chags shing // sna tshogs pad mo kha 'byed pas// pra se na ni sna tshogs pa// mthong ba dang ni thos par
278a7(rgyud): byed/ me tog bdug pa mar me mchog/ spos dang mchod pa thams cad la// rnam par shes pa kun sgrub pa// thams cad mthong zhing thos par byed// reg dang ma reg rdo rje che// ral gri me long / 
278a8(rgyud): mda' gzhu dang // shing dang chu dang 'bab chu brag/ gzugs brnyan byung ba'i khyim dag las// bya dang de bzhin mi bya dang // stor ba dang ni ma stor dang // phrogs pa dang ni ma phrogs dang // 
278b1(rgyud): de bzhin rnyed dang ma rnyed dang // gson pa dang ni shi ba dang // de bzhin rgyal dang 'pham pa dang // don yod dang ni don med dang // de bzhin grub dang mi gru ba dang // bde dang mi bde cho ga bzhin// lha yul
278b2(rgyud): dag gi don rnams dang // sangs rgyas zhing gi don rnams dang // kun du kun nas thams cad ni// bsams pa mthong zhing thos par byed// rnam par shes pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dang
278b3(rgyud): sbyor ba// ji lta'i dbyibs dang gzugs ldan pas// dur khrod lnga yi gnas rnams dang // ma mos gnas kyi thal ba mchog/ thams cad 'phral ba'i bsrung ba ni// thig le 'am sor ris gsum du bya// 
278b4(rgyud): phyogs 'tshams nam mkha' sa bcings nas// bsrung ba kun gyi bla med pa'o// dpal rdo rje thal ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba bsrung ba'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// ji lta'i dbyibs dang gzugs
278b5(rgyud): ldan pas/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i 'bab chu'i 'gram// lha rdzas zhi ba'i chu mchog gis// gtor ba dang ni blugs pa dang // khrus bye ba dang 'bogs pa yis// phyogs 'tshems nam mkha' sa bcings nas// bsku
278b6(rgyud): ba kun gyi bla med pa'o// dpal rdo rje bdud rtsi dri ma med pa'i chu rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// ji lta'i gzugs dang dbyibs ldan pas// maM yi thod pa'i nang du ni// yungs
278b7(rgyud): dkar bskyed nas blang bar bya// lo ma yungs mar zas su bza'// mgo bskus de bzhin 'bras bu yis// phyogs 'tshams nam mkha' sa bcings nas// bsrung ba kun gyi bla med pa'o// dpal don thams
278b8(rgyud): cad grub po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// ma mchu sa yis legs mnan nas// dpal ldan g.yon du 'bying dang bcas// g.yas par phyogs su 'khor lo'i tshul// bla
279a1(rgyud): / 'og dag tu byin brlabs nas// gnas gsum dag ni rgyas 'debs so// gzhug dka' bdag nyid ngan pa rnams// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bor 'grub// thams cad kyi mchog gan/ 
279a2(rgyud): kyi dbang phyug tu byin gyis rlob pa dpal skal ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// lha mo kun dang 'dus pa yis// kun du sna tshogs skal bzang po// bde ba/
